GS24pmbhasuu:1_0: keṣām śabdānām . laukikānām vaidikānām ca . tatra laukikāḥ tāvat : gauḥ aśvaḥ puruṣaḥ hastī śakuniḥ mṛgaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ iti .

GS24pmbhasuu:2: (Pas_2) KA_I,1.6-13 Ro_I,5-7 atha gauḥ iti atra kaḥ śabdaḥ . kim yat tat sāsnālāṅgūlakakudakhuraviṣāṇi artharūpam saḥ śabdaḥ . na iti āha .

GS24pmbhasuu:30_0: evam tarhi saḥ anantam āpnoti jayam paratra vāgyogavit duṣyati ca apaśabdaiḥ . kaḥ. avāgyogavit eva . atha yaḥ vāgyogavit
GS24pmbhasuu:30_1: . vijñānam tasya śaraṇam . kva punaḥ idam paṭhitam . bhrājāḥ nāma ślokāḥ . kim ca bhoḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:88: etat nityaparyāyavācinaḥ grahaṇam na punaḥ kārye yaḥ siddhaśabdaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:89: saṅgrahe tāvat kāryapratidvandvibhāvāt manyāmahe nityaparyāyavācinaḥ grahaṇam iti . iha api tat eva . atha vā santi ekapadāni api avadhāraṇāni
GS24pmbhasuu:90_0: . tat yathā : abbhakṣaḥ vāyubhakṣaḥ iti . apaḥ eva bhakṣayati vāyum eva bhakṣayati iti gamyate . evam iha api siddhaḥ eva
GS24pmbhasuu:90_1: na sādhyaḥ iti . atha vā pūrvapadalopaḥ atra draṣṭavyaḥ : atyantasiddhaḥ siddhaḥ iti . tat yathā devadattaḥ dattaḥ , satyabhāmā
GS24pmbhasuu:91: viśeṣapratipattiḥ na hi sandehāt alakṣaṇam iti nityaparyāyavācinaḥ grahaṇam iti vyākhyāsyāmaḥ . kim punaḥ anena varṇyena . kim na mahatā
GS24pmbhasuu:92: kaṇṭhena nityaśabdaḥ eva upāttaḥ yasmin upādīyamāne asandehaḥ syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:93_0: maṅgalārtham . māṅgalikaḥ ācāryaḥ mahataḥ śāstraughasya maṅgalārtham siddhaśabdam āditaḥ prayuṅkte . maṅgalādīni hi śāstrāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:93_1: prathante vīrapuruṣakāṇi ca bhavanti āyuṣmatpuruṣakāṇi ca . adhyetāraḥ ca siddhārthāḥ yathā syuḥ iti . ayam khalu api nityaśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:94: kūṭastheṣu avicāliṣu bhāveṣu vartate . kim tarhi . ābhīkṣṇye api vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:95: tat yathā nityaprahasitaḥ nityaprajalpitaḥ iti . yāvatā ābhīkṣṇye api
GS24pmbhasuu:96: vartate tatra api anyena eva arthaḥ syāt vyākhyānataḥ viśeṣapratipattiḥ na hi sandehāt alakṣaṇam iti . paśyati tu ācāryaḥ maṅgalārthaḥ ca eva
GS24pmbhasuu:97: siddhaśabdaḥ āditaḥ prayuktaḥ bhaviṣyati śakṣyāmi ca enam nityaparyāyavācinam varṇayitum iti . ataḥ siddhaśabdaḥ eva upāttaḥ na nityaśabdaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:98: (Pas_10.2) KA_I,7.8-8.1 Ro_I,30-32 atha kam punaḥ padārtham matvā eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:99: vigrahaḥ kriyate siddhe śabde arthe sambandhe ca iti . ākṛtim iti āha .
GS24pmbhasuu:100: kutaḥ etat . ākṛtiḥ hi nityā . dravyam anityam . atha dravye padārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:101: katham vigrahaḥ kartavyaḥ . siddhe śabde arthasambandhe ca iti . nityaḥ hi arthavatām arthaiḥ abhisambandhaḥ . atha vā dravye eva padārthe eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:102: vigrahaḥ nyāyyaḥ siddhe śabde arthe sambandhe ca iti. dravyam hi nityam
GS24pmbhasuu:103: ākṛtiḥ anityā . katham jñāyate . evam hi dṛśyate loke . mṛt kayā cit
GS24pmbhasuu:104: ākṛtyā yuktā piṇḍaḥ bhavati . piṇḍākṛtim upamṛdya ghaṭikāḥ kiryante .
GS24pmbhasuu:105_0: ghaṭikākṛtim upamṛdya kuṇḍikāḥ kriyante . tathā suvarṇam kayā cit ākṛtyā yuktam piṇḍaḥ bhavati . piṇḍākṛtim upamṛdya rucakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:105_1: kriyante . rucakākṛtim upamṛdya kaṭakāḥ kriyante . kaṭakākṛtim upmṛdya svastikāḥ kriyante . punaḥ āvṛttaḥ suvarṇapiṇḍaḥ punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:105_2: aparayā ākṛtyā yuktaḥ khadirāgārasavarṇe kuṇḍale bhavataḥ . ākṛtiḥ anyā ca anyā ca bhavati dravyam punaḥ tad eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:106_0: ākṛtyupamardena dravyam eva avaśiṣyate . ākṛtau api padārthe eṣaḥ vigrahaḥ nyāyyaḥ siddhe śabde arthe sambandhe ca iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:106_1: nanu ca uktam ākṛtiḥ anityā iti . na etat asti . nityā ākṛtiḥ . katham . na kva cit uparatā iti kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:107: sarvatra uparatā bhavati . dravyāntarasthā tu upalabhyate . atha vā na
GS24pmbhasuu:108_0: idam eva nityalakṣaṇam dhruvam kūṭastham avicāli anapāyopajanavikāri anutpatti avṛddhi avyayayogi iti tan nityam iti . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:108_1: api nityam yasmin tattvam na vihanyate . kim punaḥ tattvam . tadbhāvaḥ tattvam . ākṛtau api tattvam na vihanyate . atha vā
GS24pmbhasuu:108_2: kim naḥ etena idam nityam idam anityam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:109_0: . yat nityam tam padārtham matvā eṣaḥ vigrahaḥ kriyate siddhe śabde arthe sambandhe ca iti . katham punaḥ jñāyate siddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:109_1: śabdaḥ arthaḥ sambandhaḥ ca iti . lokataḥ . yat loke artham upādāya śabdān prayuñjate . na eṣām nirvṛttau yatnam kurvanti
GS24pmbhasuu:109_2: . ye punaḥ kāryāḥ bhāvāḥ nirvṛttau tāvat teṣām yatnaḥ kriyate . tat yathā . ghaṭena kāryam kariṣyan kumbhakārakulam gatvā
GS24pmbhasuu:109_3: āha kuru ghaṭam . kāryam anena kariṣyāmi iti . na tadvat śabdān
GS24pmbhasuu:110: prayokṣyamāṇaḥ vaiyākaraṇakulam gatvā āha . kuru śabdān . prayokṣye iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:111: tāvati eva artham upādāya śabdān prayuñjate .
GS24pmbhasuu:112: (Pas_11) KA_I,8.1-22 Ro_I,32-35 yadi tarhi lokaḥ eṣu pramāṇam kim
GS24pmbhasuu:113_0: śāstreṇa kriyate . lokataḥ arthaprayukte śabdaprayoge śāstreṇa dharmaniyamaḥ . lokataḥ arthaprayukte śabdaprayoge śāstreṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:113_1: dharmaniyamaḥ kriyate . kim idam dharmaniyamaḥ iti . dharmāya niyamaḥ dharmaniyamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:114: dharmārthaḥ vā niyamaḥ dharmaniyamaḥ dharmaprayojanaḥ vā niyamaḥ dharmaniyamaḥ . yathā laukikavaidikeṣu . priyataddhitāḥ dākṣiṇātyāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:115: yathā loke vede ca iti prayoktavye yathā laukikavaidikeṣu iti prayuñjate .
GS24pmbhasuu:116: atha vā yuktaḥ eva taddhitārthaḥ . yathā laukikeṣu vaidikeṣu ca kṛtānteṣu . loke tāvat abhakṣyaḥ grāmyakukkuṭaḥ abhakṣyaḥ grāmyaśūkaraḥ iti ucyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:117: bhakṣyam ca nāma kṣutpratīghātārtham upādīyate . śakyam ca anena
GS24pmbhasuu:118: śvamāṃsādibhiḥ api kṣut pratihantum . tatra niyamaḥ kriyate . idam bhakṣyam . idam abhakṣyam iti . tathā khedāt strīṣu pravṛttiḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:119: samānaḥ ca khedavigamaḥ gamyāyām ca agamyāyām ca . tatra niyamaḥ kriyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:120: iyam gamyā iyam agamyā iti . vede khalu api payovrataḥ brāhmaṇaḥ yavāgūvrataḥ rājanyaḥ āmikṣāvrataḥ vaiśyaḥ iti ucyate . vratam ca nāma
GS24pmbhasuu:121: abhyavahārārtham upādīyate . śakyam ca anena śālimāṃsādīni api vratayitum
GS24pmbhasuu:122: . tatra niyamaḥ kriyate . tathā bailvaḥ khādiraḥ vā yūpaḥ syāt iti ucyate . yūpaḥ ca nāma paśvanubandhārtham upādīyate . śakyam ca anena kim cit eva
GS24pmbhasuu:123: kāṣṭham ucchritya anucchritya vā paśuḥ anubanddhum . tatra niyamaḥ kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:124_0: . tathā agnau kapālāni adhiśritya abhimantrayate . bhṛgūṇām aṅgirasām gharmasya tapasā tapyadhvam iti . antareṇa api mantram
GS24pmbhasuu:124_1: agniḥ dahanakarmā kapālāni santāpayati . tatra niyamaḥ kriyate . evam kriyamāṇam abhyudayakāri bhavati iti . evam iha api
GS24pmbhasuu:124_2: samānāyām arthagatau śabdena ca apaśabdena ca dharmaniyamaḥ kriyate . śabdena eva arthaḥ abhidheyaḥ na apaśabdena iti . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:125: (Pas_12) KA_I,8.23-10.3 Ro_I,35-39 asti aprayuktaḥ . santi vai śabdāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:126_0: aprayuktāḥ . tat yathā ūṣa tera cakra peca iti . kim ataḥ yat santi aprayuktāḥ . prayogāt hi bhavān śabdānām sādhutvam adhyavasyati
GS24pmbhasuu:126_1: . ye idānīm aprayuktāḥ na amī sādhavaḥ syuḥ . idam vipratiṣiddham yat ucyate santi vai śabdāḥ aprayuktāḥ iti . yadi santi
GS24pmbhasuu:126_2: na aprayuktāḥ . atha aprayuktāḥ na santi . santi ca aprayuktāḥ ca iti vipratiṣiddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:127_0: prayuñjānaḥ eva khalu bhavān āha santi śabdāḥ aprayuktāḥ iti . kaḥ ca idānīm anyaḥ bhavajjātīyakaḥ puruṣaḥ śabdānām prayoge
GS24pmbhasuu:127_1: sādhuḥ syāt . na etat vipratiṣiddham . santi iti tāvat brūmaḥ yat etān śāstravidaḥ śāstreṇa anuvidadhate . aprayuktāḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:127_2: brūmaḥ yat loke aprayuktāḥ iti . yat api ucyate kaḥ ca idānīm anyaḥ bhavajjātīyakaḥ puruṣaḥ śabdānām prayoge sādhuḥ syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:127_3: iti . na brūmaḥ asmābhiḥ aprayuktāḥ iti . kim tarhi . loke aprayuktāḥ iti . nanu ca bhavān api abhyantaraḥ loke . abhyantaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:127_4: aham loke na tu aham lokaḥ . asti aprayuktaḥ iti cet na arthe śabdaprayogāt . asti aprayuktaḥ iti cet tat na . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:127_5: . arthe śabdaprayogāt . arthe śabdāḥ prayujyante . santi ca eṣām śabdānām arthāḥ yeṣu artheṣu prayujyante . aprayogaḥ prayogānyatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:127_6: . aprayogaḥ khalu eṣāṃ śabdānām nyāyyaḥ . kutaḥ . prayogānyatvāt . yat eteṣām śabdānām arthe anyān śabdān
GS24pmbhasuu:128: prayuñjate . tat yathā . ūṣa iti etasya śabdasya arthe kva yūyam uṣitāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:129: tera iti asya arthe kim yūyam tīrṇāḥ . cakra iti asya arthe kim yūyam
GS24pmbhasuu:130: kṛtavantaḥ . peca iti asya arthe kim yūyam pakvavantaḥ iti . aprayukte dīrghasattravat . yadi api aprayuktāḥ avaśyam dīrghasattravat lakṣaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:131: anuvidheyāḥ . tat yathā . dīrghasattrāṇi vārṣaśatikāni vārṣasahasrikāṇi ca
GS24pmbhasuu:132: . na ca adyatve kaḥ cit api vyavaharati . kevalam ṛṣisampradāyaḥ dharmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:133_0: iti kṛtvā yājñikāḥ śāstreṇa anuvidadhate . sarve deśāntare . sarve khalu api ete śabdāḥ deśāntare prayujyante . na ca ete
GS24pmbhasuu:133_1: upalabhyante . upalabdhau yatnaḥ kriyatām . mahān hi śabdasya prayogaviṣayaḥ . saptadvīpā vasumatī trayaḥ lokāḥ catvāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:133_2: vedāḥ sāṅgāḥ sarahasyāḥ bahudhā vibhinnāḥ ekaśatam
GS24pmbhasuu:134_0: adhvaryuśākhāḥ sahasravartmā sāmavedaḥ ekaviṃsatidhā bāhvṛcyam navadhā ātharvaṇaḥ vedaḥ vākovākyam itihāsaḥ purāṇam vaidyakam
GS24pmbhasuu:134_1: iti etāvān śabdasya prayogaviṣayaḥ . etāvantam śabdasya prayogaviṣayam ananuniśamya santi aprayuktāḥ iti vacanam kevalam
GS24pmbhasuu:135: prayogaviṣaye te te śabdāḥ tatra tatra niyataviṣayāḥ dṛśyante . tat yathā . śavatiḥ gatikarmā kambojeṣu eva bhāṣitaḥ bhavati . vikāre enam āryāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:136: bhāṣante śavaḥ iti . hammatiḥ surāṣṭreṣu raṃhatiḥ prācyamadhyeṣu gamim eva
GS24pmbhasuu:137: tu āryāḥ prayuñjate . dātiḥ lavanārthe prācyeṣu dātram udīcyeṣu . ye ca api ete bhavataḥ aprayuktāḥ abhimatāḥ śabdāḥ eteṣām api prayogaḥ dṛśyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:138: kva . vede . yat vaḥ revatīḥ revatyam tat ūṣa . yat me naraḥ śrutyam brahma cakra . yatra naḥ cakra jarasam tanunām iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:139_0: (Pas_13) KA_I,10.4-11.14 Ro_I,39-42 kim punaḥ śabdasya jñāne dharmaḥ āhosvit prayoge . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . jñāne dharmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:139_1: iti cet tathā adharmaḥ . jñāne dharmaḥ iti cet tathā adharmaḥ prāpnoti . yaḥ hi śabdān
GS24pmbhasuu:140: jānāti apaśabdān api asau jānāti . yathā eva śabdajñāne dharmaḥ evam apaśabdajñāne api adharmaḥ . atha vā bhūyān adharmaḥ prāpnoti .bhūyāṃsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:141: apaśabdāḥ alpīyāṃsaḥ śabdāḥ . ekaikasya śabdasya bahavaḥ apabhraṃśāḥ . tat yathā . gauḥ iti asya gāvī goṇī gotā gopotalikā iti evamādayaḥ apabhraṃśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:142: . ācāre niyamaḥ . ācāre punaḥ ṛṣiḥ niyamam vedayate . te asurāḥ helayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:143_0: helayaḥ iti kurvantaḥ parābabhūvuḥ iti . astu tarhi prayoge . prayoge sarvalokasya . yadi prayoge dharmaḥ sarvaḥ lokaḥ abhyudayena
GS24pmbhasuu:143_1: yujyeta . kaḥ ca idānīm bhavataḥ matsaraḥ yadi sarvaḥ lokaḥ abhyudayena yujyeta . na khalu kaḥ cit matsaraḥ . prayatnānarthakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:144: prayatnena bhavitavyam na ca prayatnaḥ phalāt vyatirecyaḥ . nanu ca ye
GS24pmbhasuu:145: kṛtaprayatnāḥ te sādhīyaḥ śabdān prayokṣyante . te eva sādhīyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:146_0: abhyudayena yokṣyante . vyatirekaḥ api vai lakṣyate . dṛśyante hi kṛtaprayatnāḥ ca apravīṇāḥ akṛtaprayatnāḥ ca pravīṇāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:146_1: tatra phalavyatirekaḥ api syāt . evam tarhi na api jñāne eva dharmaḥ na api
GS24pmbhasuu:147: prayoge eva . kim tarhi śāstrapūrvake prayoge abhyudayaḥ tat tulyam vedaśabdena . śāstrapūrvakam yaḥ śabdān prayuṅkte saḥ abhyudayena yujyate
GS24pmbhasuu:148_0: . tat tulyam vedaśabdena . vedaśabdāḥ api evam abhivadanti . yaḥ agniṣṭomena yajate yaḥ u ca enam evam veda . yaḥ agnim nāciketam
GS24pmbhasuu:148_1: cinute yaḥ u ca enam evam veda . aparaḥ āha : tat tulyam vedaśabdena iti . yathā vedaśabdāḥ niyamapūrvam adhītāḥ phalavantaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:148_2: bhavanti evam yaḥ śāstrapūrvakam śabdān prayuṅkte saḥ abhyudayena yujyate iti . atha vā punaḥ astu jñāne eva dharmaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:148_3: . nanu ca uktam jñāne dharmaḥ iti cet tathā adharmaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . śabdapramāṇakāḥ vayam . yat śabdaḥ āha tat asmākam
GS24pmbhasuu:148_4: pramāṇam . śabdaḥ ca śabdajñāne dharmam āha na
GS24pmbhasuu:149: apaśabdajñāne adharmam . yat ca punaḥ aśiṣṭāpratiṣiddham na eva tat doṣāya bhavati na abhyudayāya . tat yathā . hikkitahasitakaṇḍūyitāni na eva
GS24pmbhasuu:150: doṣāya bhavanti na api abhyudayāya . atha vā abhyupāyaḥ eva apaśabdajñānam śabdajñāne . yaḥ apaśabdān jānāti śabdān api asau jānāti . tat evam jñāne
GS24pmbhasuu:151_0: dharmaḥ iti bruvataḥ arthāt āpannam bhavati apaśabdajñānapūrvake śabdajñāne dharmaḥ iti . atha vā kūpakhānakavat etat bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:151_1: . tat yathā kūpakhānakaḥ khanan yadi api mṛdā pāṃsubhiḥ ca avakīrṇaḥ bhavati saḥ apsu sañjātāsu tataḥ eva tam guṇam āsādayati
GS24pmbhasuu:151_2: yena saḥ ca doṣaḥ nirhaṇyate bhūyasā ca abhyudayena yogaḥ bhavati evam iha api yadi api apaśabdajñāne adharmaḥ tathā api
GS24pmbhasuu:151_3: yaḥ tu asau śabdajñāne dharmaḥ tena saḥ ca doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:152: nirghāniṣyate bhūyasā ca abhyudayena yogaḥ bhaviṣyati . yat api ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:153_0: ācāre niyamaḥ iti yājñe karmaṇi saḥ niyamaḥ . evam hi śrūyate . yarvāṇaḥ tarvāṇaḥ nāma ṛṣayaḥ babhūvuḥ pratyakṣadharmāṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:153_1: parāparajñāḥ viditaveditavyāḥ adhigatayāthātathyāḥ . te tatrabhavantaḥ yat vā naḥ tat
GS24pmbhasuu:154: vā naḥ iti proyoktavye yar vā ṇaḥ tar vā ṇaḥ iti prayuñjate yājñe punaḥ karmaṇi na apabhāṣante . taiḥ punaḥ asuraiḥ yājñe karmaṇi apabhāṣitam .
GS24pmbhasuu:156_0: (Pas_14) KA_I,11.14-12.27 Ro_I,42-47 atha vyākaraṇam iti asya śabdasya kaḥ padārthaḥ . sūtram . sūtre vyākaraṇe ṣaṣṭhyarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:156_1: anupapannaḥ . sūtre vyākaraṇe ṣaṣṭhyarthaḥ na upapadyate vyākaraṇasya sūtram iti . kim hi tat
GS24pmbhasuu:157: anyat sūtrāt vyākaraṇam yasya adaḥ sūtram syāt . śabdāpratipattiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:158: śabdānām ca apratipattiḥ prāpnoti vyākaraṇāt śabdān pratipadyāmahe iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:159: na hi sūtrataḥ eva śabdān pratipadyante . kim tarhi . vyākhyānataḥ ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:160_0: nanu ca tat eva sūtram vigṛhītam vyākhyānam bhavati . na kevalāni carcāpadāni vyākhyanam vṛddhiḥ āt aic iti . kim tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:160_1: udāharaṇam pratyudāharaṇam vākyādhyāhāraḥ iti etat samuditam vyākhyānam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:161_0: evam tarhi śabdaḥ . śabde lyuḍarthaḥ . yadi śabdaḥ vyākaraṇam lyuḍarthaḥ na upapadyate vyākriyate anena iti vyākaraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:161_1: na hi śabdena kim cit vyākriyate . kena tarhi . sūtreṇa . bhave . bhave ca taddhitaḥ na upapadyate vyākaraṇe bhavaḥ yogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:161_2: vaiyākaraṇaḥ iti . na hi śabde bhavaḥ yogaḥ . kva tarhi . sūtre . proktādayaḥ ca taddhitāḥ . proktādayaḥ ca taddhitāḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:162: kāśakṛtsnam iti . na hi pāṇininā śabdāḥ proktāḥ . kim tarhi . sūtram .
GS24pmbhasuu:163: kimartham idam ubhayam ucyate bhave proktādayaḥ ca taddhitāḥ iti na proktādayaḥ ca taddhitāḥ iti eva bhave api taddhitaḥ coditaḥ syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:164_0: purastāt idam ācāryeṇa dṛṣṭam bhave taddhitaḥ iti tat paṭhitam . tataḥ uttarakālam idam dṛṣṭam proktādayaḥ ca taddhitāḥ iti

GS24pmbhasuu:492_0: yayā pratyāyyante sā sañjñā ye pratīyante te sañjñinaḥ iti . yat api ucyate kriyamāṇe api sañjñādhikāre sañjñāsañjñinoḥ asandehaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:502: tasmāt ktinpratyayaḥ . ādaicaḥ api akṣarasamāmnāye upadiṣṭāḥ .

GS24pmbhasuu:506: vṛddhiśabdasya ādaicaḥ . ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭasya ādeśāḥ ucyante na ca atra
GS24pmbhasuu:507: ṣaṣṭhīm paśyāmaḥ . āgamāḥ tarhi ime syuḥ . vṛddhiśabdasya ādaicaḥ āgamāḥ .

GS24pmbhasuu:510_1: . tat yathā . itaratra api devadattaśabdaḥ āvartate na māṃsapiṇḍaḥ . atha vā pūrvoccāritaḥ sañjñī paroccāritā sañjñā . kutaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:512_0: māṅgalikaḥ ācāryaḥ mahataḥ śāstraughasya maṅgalārtham vṛddhiśabam āditaḥ prayuṅkte . maṅgalādīni hi śāstrāṇi prathante vīrapuruṣakāṇi

GS24pmbhasuu:514: sañjñā iti . bhavati ca asya sampratyayaḥ . tatra etat syāt kṛtaḥ pūrvaiḥ abhisambandhaḥ iti . iha api kṛtaḥ pūrvaiḥ abhisambandhaḥ . kaiḥ .

GS24pmbhasuu:517_0: (P_1,1.1.4) KA_I,40.18-41.4 Ro_I,133-134 sataḥ vṛddhyādiṣu sañjñābhāvāt tadāśraye itaretarāśrayatvāt asiddhiḥ . sataḥ sañjñinaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:519: na itaratrāṇāya bhavati. nanu ca bhoḥ itaretarāśrayāṇi api kāryāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:520: dṛśyante . tat yathā . nauḥ śakaṭam vahati śakaṭam ca nāvam vahati . anyat api tatra kim cit bhavati jalam sthalam vā . sthale śakaṭam nāvam vahati .

GS24pmbhasuu:533_1: taparaḥ tatkālasya iti tatkālānām grahaṇam yathā syāt . keṣām . udāttānundāttasvaritānām .

GS24pmbhasuu:537_1: guṇāḥ iti . evam hi dṛśyate loke . ekaḥ ayam ātmā udakam nāma . tasya guṇabhedāt anyatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:538_0: bhavati : anyat idam śītam anyat idam ūṣṇam iti . nanu ca bhoḥ abhedakāḥ api guṇāḥ dṛśyante . tat yathā . devadattaḥ muṇḍī
GS24pmbhasuu:538_1: api jaṭī api śikhī api svām ākhyām na jahāti . tathā bālaḥ yuvā vṛddhaḥ vatsaḥ damyaḥ balīvardaḥ iti . ubhayam idam guṇeṣu

GS24pmbhasuu:711_0: iti . dhātoḥ eva tarhi na prāpnoti . na evam vijñāyate dhātoḥ vihitasya kṅiti iti . katham tarhi . dhātoḥ vihite kṅiti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:711_1: . atha vā kāryakālam hi sañjñāparibhāṣam . yatra kāryam tatra draṣṭavyam . pugantalaghūpadhasya guṇaḥ bhavati iti upasthitam

GS24pmbhasuu:712: etasmin yoge kṅidgrahaṇam tad anavakāśam . tasya anavakāśatvāt guṇavṛddhī
GS24pmbhasuu:713_0: na bhaviṣyataḥ . atha vā ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati bhavati upadhālakṣaṇasya guṇasya pratiṣedhaḥ iti yat ayam trasigṛdhidhṛṣikṣipeḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:713_3: guṇasya pratiṣedhaḥ iti . tataḥ knusanau kitau karoti . roravītyarthena api na arthaḥ . kṅiti iti ucyate . na ca atra kṅitam
GS24pmbhasuu:713_4: paśyāmaḥ . pratyayalakṣaṇena prāpnoti . na lumatā tasmin iti pratyayalakṣaṇapratiṣedhaḥ . atha api na lumatā aṅgasya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:713_5: ucyate evam api na doṣaḥ . katham . na lumatā lupte aṅgādhikāraḥ pratinirdiśyate . kim tarhi . yaḥ asau lumatā lupyate tasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:713_6: yat aṅgam tasya yat kāryam tat na

GS24pmbhasuu:728: adīdhet , adīdhayuḥ iti ca guṇadarśanāt apratiṣedhaḥ . anarthakaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ . prajapatiḥ vai yat kim cana manasā adīdhet .

GS24pmbhasuu:729_1: : adīdhayuḥ iti . ayam jusi guṇaḥ pratiṣedhaviṣaye [pratiṣedhaviṣayaḥ] ārabhyate . saḥ yathā eva
GS24pmbhasuu:730: kṅiti na iti etam pratiṣedham bādhate evam imam api bādhate . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . jusi guṇaḥ pratiṣedhaviṣaye ārabhyamāṇaḥ tulyajātīyam pratiṣedham

GS24pmbhasuu:733_0: na ca aprāpte kṅiti na iti etasmin pratiṣedhe jusi guṇaḥ ārabhyate . asmin punaḥ prāpte ca aprāpte ca . yadi tarhi ayam yogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:733_1: na ārabhyate katham dīdhyat iti . dīdhyat iti śyanvyatyayena . dīdhyat iti śyan eṣaḥ vyatyayena bhaviṣyati . iṭaḥ ca api
GS24pmbhasuu:733_2: grahaṇam śakyam akartum . katham akaṇiṣam araṇiṣam , kaṇitā śvaḥ , raṇitā śvaḥ iti . ārdhadhātukasya iṭ valādeḥ iti atra
GS24pmbhasuu:733_3: iṭ iti vartamāne punaḥ iḍgrahaṇasya prayojanam iṭ eva yathā syāt yat anyat prāpnoti tat mā bhūt iti . kim ca anyat prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:734: guṇaḥ . yadi niyamaḥ kriyate pipaṭhiṣateḥ apratyayaḥ pipaṭḥīḥ : dīrghatvam na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . āṅgam yat kāryam tat niyamyate . na ca etat

GS24pmbhasuu:751_0: (P_1,1.7.3) KA_I,57.27-59.2 Ro_I,186-190 atha yatra bahūnām ānantaryam kim tatra dvayoḥ dvayoḥ saṃyogasñjñā bhavati āhosvit

GS24pmbhasuu:760_0: (P_1,1.7.4) KA_I,59.3-24 Ro_I,190-192 svarānantarhitavacanam . svaraiḥ anantarhitāḥ halaḥ saṃyogasañjñāḥ bhavanti iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:760_1: . kim prayojanam . vyavahitānām mā bhūt . pacati panasam . nanu ca anantarāḥ iti ucyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:761_0: tena vyavahitānām na bhaviṣyati . dṛṣṭam ānantaryam vyavahite . vyavahite api anantaraśabdaḥ dṛśyate . tat yathā : anantarau
GS24pmbhasuu:761_1: imau grāmau iti ucyate . tayoḥ ca eva antarā nadyaḥ ca parvatāḥ ca bhavanti . yadi tarhi vyavahite api anantaraśabdaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:761_2: ānantaryavacanam idānīm kimartham syāt . ānantaryavacanam kimartham iti cet ekapratiṣedhārtham . ekasya halaḥ saṃyogasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:761_3: mā bhūt iti . kim ca syāt yadi ekasya halaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:762: saṃyogasañjñā syāt . iyeṣa , uvoṣa . ijādeḥ ca gurumataḥ anṛcchaḥ iti ām
GS24pmbhasuu:763: prasajyeta . na vā atajjātīyavyavāyāt . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:764: atajjātīyasya vyavāyāt . atajjātīyakam hi loke vyavadhāyakam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:765: katham punaḥ jñāyate atajjātīyakam loke vyavadhāyakam bhavati iti . evam hi kam cit kaḥ cit pṛcchati . anantare* ete brāhmaṇakule* iti . saḥ āha .

GS24pmbhasuu:767: atajjātīyakam vyavadhāyakam bhavati . katham anantarau imau grāmau iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:768: grāmaśabdaḥ ayam bahvarthaḥ . asti eva śālāsamudāye vartate . tat yathā grāmaḥ dagdhaḥ iti . asti vāṭaparikṣepe vartate . tat yathā grāmam
GS24pmbhasuu:769_0: praviṣṭaḥ . asti manuṣyeṣu vartate . tat yathā grāmaḥ gataḥ , grāmaḥ āgataḥ iti . asti sāraṇyake sasīmake sasthaṇḍilake vartate

GS24pmbhasuu:769_2: imau grāmau iti . sarvatra eva hi

GS24pmbhasuu:779_2: punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ bhavati mukhagrahaṇam śakyam akartum . kena idānīm ubhayavacanānām bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:780: prāsādavāsinyāyena . tat yathā . ke cit prāsādavāsinaḥ ke cit bhūmivāsinaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:781: ke cit ubhayavāsinaḥ . ye prāsādavāsinaḥ gṛhyante te prāsādavāsigrahaṇena . ye bhūmivāsinaḥ gṛhyante te bhūmivāsinyāyena . ye ubhayavāsinaḥ gṛhyante
GS24pmbhasuu:782_0: te prāsādavāsigrahaṇena bhūmivāsinyāyena ca . evam iha api ke cit mukhavacanāḥ ke cit nāsikāvacanāḥ ke cit ubhayavacanāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:782_1: . tatra ye mukhavacanāḥ gṛhyante te mukhagrahaṇena . ye nāsikāvacanāḥ gṛhyante te nāsikāgrahaṇena . ye ubhayavacanāḥ gṛhyante
GS24pmbhasuu:783: nāsikāgrahaṇena ca. bhavet ubhayavacanānām siddham . yamānusvārāṇām api prāpnoti . na eva doṣaḥ na prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:784: (P_1,1.8.3) KA_I,60.17-26 Ro_I,194-195 itaretarāśrayam tu bhavati . kā itaretarāśrayatā . sataḥ anunāsikasya sañjñayā bhavitavyam sañjñayā ca
GS24pmbhasuu:785: nāma anunāsikaḥ bhāvyate . tat itaretarāśrayam bhavati . itaretarāśrayāṇi ca kāryāṇi na prakalpante . anunāsikasañjñāyām itaretarāśraye uktam .
GS24pmbhasuu:786: siddham tu nityaśabdatvāt iti . nityāḥ śabdāḥ . nityeṣu śabdeṣu sataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:787_0: anunāsikasya sañjñā kriyate . na sañjñayā anunāsikaḥ bhāvyate . yadi tarhi nityāḥ śabdāḥ kimartham śāstram . kimartham śāstram
GS24pmbhasuu:787_1: iti cet nivartakatvāt siddham . nivartakam śāstram . katham . āṅ asmai aviśeṣeṇa upadiṣṭaḥ ananunāsikaḥ . tasya sarvatra
GS24pmbhasuu:787_2: ananunāsikabuddhiḥ prasaktā . tatra anena nivṛttiḥ kriyate . chandasi aci parataḥ āṅaḥ ananunāsikasya prasaṅge
GS24pmbhasuu:789_0: (P_1,1.9.1) KA_I,61.2-7 Ro_I,195-197 tulayā sammitam tulyam . āsyam ca prayatnaḥ ca āsyaprayatnam . tulyāsyam tulyaprayatnam
GS24pmbhasuu:789_1: ca savarṇasañjñam bhavati . kim punaḥ āsyam . laukikam āsyam oṣṭhāt prabhṛti prāk kākalakāt
GS24pmbhasuu:790: . katham punaḥ āsyam . asyanti anena varṇān iti āsyam . annam etat āsyandate iti vā āsyam . atha kaḥ prayatnaḥ . prayatanam prayatnaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:791: prapūrvāt yatateḥ bhāvasādhanaḥ naṅpratyayaḥ . yadi laukikam āsyam kim āsyopādāne prayojanam . sarveṣām hi tat tulyam bhavati . vakṣyati etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:793: (P_1,1.9.2) KA_I,61.8-62.14 Ro_I,197-202 savarṇasañjñāyām bhinnadeśeṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ prayatnasāmānyāt . savarṇasañjñāyām bhinnadeśeṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:794: bhavati jabagaḍadaśām . kim kāraṇam . prayatnasāmānyāt . eteṣām hi samānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:795: prayatnaḥ . siddham tu āsye tulyadeśaprayatnam savarṇam . siddham etat.
GS24pmbhasuu:796: katham . āsye yeṣām tulyaḥ deśaḥ yatnaḥ ca te savarṇasañjñāḥ bhavanti iti vaktavyam . evam api kim āsyopādāne prayojanam . sarveṣām hi tat tulyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:797_0: prayatnaviśeṣaṇam āsyopādānam . santi hi āsyāt bāhyāḥ prayatnāḥ . te hāpitāḥ bhavanti . teṣu satsu asatsu api savarṇasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:797_1: sidhyati . ke punaḥ te . vivārasaṃvārau śvāsanādau ghoṣavadaghoṣatā alpaprāṇatā mahāprāṇatā iti . tatra vargāṇām prathamadvitīyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:797_2: vivṛtakaṇṭhāḥ śvāsānupradānāḥ aghoṣāḥ . eke alpaprāṇāḥ apare mahāprāṇāḥ . tṛtīyacaturthāḥ saṃvṛtakaṇṭhāḥ nādānupradānāḥ ghoṣavantaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:797_3: . eke alpaprāṇāḥ apare mahāprāṇāḥ . yathā tṛtīyāḥ tathā pañcamāḥ ānunāsikyavarjam . ānunāsikyam teṣām adhikaḥ guṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:798_0: . evam api avarṇasya savarṇasañjñā na prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . bāhyam hi āsyāt sthānam avarṇasya . sarvamukhasthānam avarṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:798_1: eke icchanti . evam api vyapadeśaḥ na prakalpate : āsye yeṣām tulyaḥ deśaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:799_0: vyapadeśivadbhāvena vyapadeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam savarṇasañjñayām
GS24pmbhasuu:799_1: bhinnadeśeṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ prayatnasāmānyāt iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na hi laukikam āsyam . kim tarhi . taddhitāntam āsyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:799_2: āsye bhavam āsyam śarīrāvayavāt yat . kim punaḥ āsye bhavam . sthānam karaṇam ca . evam api prayatnaḥ aviśeṣitaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:799_3: . prayatnaḥ ca viśeṣitaḥ . katham . na hi prayatanam prayatnaḥ . kim tarhi . prārambhaḥ yatnasya prayatnaḥ . yadi prārambhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:799_4: yatnasya prayatnaḥ evam api avarṇasya eṅoḥ ca savarṇasañjñā prāpnoti . praśliṣṭavarṇau etau . avarṇasya tarhi aicoḥ ca savarṇasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:799_5: prāpnoti . vivṛtatarāvarṇau etau . etayoḥ eva tarhi mithaḥ savarṇasañjñā prāpnoti . na etau tulyasthānau . udāttādīnām tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:799_6: savarṇasañjñā na prāpnoti . abhedakāḥ udāttādayaḥ . atha vā kim naḥ etena prārambhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:800: yatnasya prayatnaḥ iti .prayatanam eva prayatnaḥ . tat eva ca taddhitāntam āsyam . yat samānam tat āśrayiṣyāmaḥ . kim sati bhede . sati iti āha .
GS24pmbhasuu:801: sati eva hi bhede savarṇasañjñayā bhavitavyam . kutaḥ etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:802: bhedādhiṣṭhānā hi savarṇasañjñā . yadi hi yatra sarvam samānam tatra syāt savarṇasañjñāvacanam anarthakam syāt . yadi tarhi sati bhede kim cit
GS24pmbhasuu:803_0: samānam iti kṛtva savarṇasañjñā bhaviṣyati śakārachakārayoḥ ṣakāraṭhakārahoḥ sakārathakārayoḥ savarṇasañjñā prāpnoti . eteṣām
GS24pmbhasuu:803_1: hi sarvam anyat samānam karaṇavarjam . evam tarhi prayatanam eva prayatnaḥ tat eva taddhitāntam āsyam na tu ayam dvandvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:803_2: : āsyam ca prayatnaḥ ca āsyaprayatnam iti . kim tarhi . tripadaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ : tulyaḥ āsye prayatnaḥ eṣām iti . atha vā pūrvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:803_3: tatpuruṣaḥ tataḥ bahuvrīhiḥ : tulyaḥ āsye tulyāsyaḥ , tulyāsyaḥ prayatnaḥ eṣām iti . atha vā paraḥ tatpuruṣaḥ tataḥ bahuvrīhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:803_4: : āsye yatnaḥ āsyayatnaḥ , tulyaḥ āsyayatnaḥ eṣām iti (P_1,1.9.3) KA_I,62.15-26 Ro_I,202-203 tasya . tasya iti tu vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:804: . kim prayojanam . yaḥ yasya tulyāsyaprayatnaḥ saḥ tasya savarṇasañjñaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:805: yathā syāt . anyasya tulyāsyaprayatnaḥ anyasya savarṇasañjñaḥ mā bhūt .
GS24pmbhasuu:806: tasya avacanam vacanaprāmāṇyāt . tasya iti na vaktavyam . anyasya tulyāsyaprayatnaḥ anyasya savarṇasañjñaḥ kasmāt na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:808: tulyāsyaprayatnaḥ saḥ anyasya savarṇasañjñaḥ syāt savarṇasañjñāvacanam anarthakam syāt . sambandhiśabdaiḥ vā tulyam . sambandhiśabdaiḥ vā punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:809: tulyam etat . tat yathā sambandhiśabdāḥ : mātari vartitavyam , pitari śuśrūṣitavyam iti . na ca ucyate svasyām mātari svasmin vā pitari iti
GS24pmbhasuu:810_0: sambandhāt ca etat gamyate yā yasya mātā yaḥ ca yasya pitā iti . evam iha api tulyāsyaprayatnam savarṇam iti atra sambandiśabdau
GS24pmbhasuu:810_1: etau . tatra sambandhāt etat gantavyam : yat prati yat tulyāsyaprayatnam tat prati tat savarṇasañjñam bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:811_0: (P_1,1.9.4) KA_I,62.27-63.23 Ro_I,203-207 ṛkāraḷkārayoḥ savarṇavidhiḥ . ṛkāraḷkārayoḥ savarṇasañjñā vidheyā . hotṛ , ḷkāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:811_1: , hotṝḷkāraḥ . kim prayojanam . akaḥ savarṇe dīrghaḥ iti dīrghatvam yathā syāt . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:812: prayojanam . vakṣyati etat . savarṇadīrghatve ṛti , rṛvāvacanam ḷti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:813: lḷvāvacanam iti . tat savarṇe yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt : dadhi , ḷkāraḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:814_0: madhu , ḷkāraḥ iti . yat etat savarṇadīrghatve ṛti iti etat ṛtaḥ iti vakṣyāmi . tataḥ ḷti . ḷti ca vā lḷ bhavati . ṛtaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:814_1: eva . tat na vaktavyam bhavati . avaśyam tat vaktavyam . ūkālaḥ ac hrasvardīrghaplutasañjñaḥ bhavati iti ucyate . na ca rṛkāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:815: asti . rṛkārasya , lḷkārasya ca actvam vakṣyāmi . tat ca avaśyam vaktavyam plutaḥ yathā syāt : hotṛ , ṛkāraḥ hotṝkāraḥ , hotṛ3kāraḥ , hotṛ , ḷkāraḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:816: hotḷkāraḥ , hotḷ3kāraḥ . kim punaḥ atra jyāyaḥ . savarṇasañjñāvacanam eva jyāyaḥ . dīrghatvam ca eva hi siddham bhavati. api ca ṛkāragrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:817: ḷkāragrahaṇam sannihitam bhavati . yathā iha bhavati : ṛti akaḥ: khaṭva ṛśyaḥ , māla ṛśyaḥ idam api saṅgṛhītam bahavati : khaṭva , ḷkāraḥ, māla ,
GS24pmbhasuu:818: ḷkāraḥ iti . vā supi āpiśaleḥ : uparkārīyati , upārkārīyati , idam api siddham bhavati : upalkārīyati, upālkārīyati iti . yadi tarhi ṛkāragrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:819: ḷkāragrahaṇam sannihitam bhavati uḥ aṇ raparaḥ , ḷkārasya api raparatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:820_0: prāpnoti . ḷkārasya laparatvam vakṣyāmi . tat ca avaśyam vaktavyam asatyām savarṇasañjñāyām vidhyartham . tat eva satyām
GS24pmbhasuu:820_1: rephabādhanārtham bhaviṣyati . iha tarhi raṣābhyām naḥ ṇaḥ samānapade iti ṛkāragrahaṇam coditam mātṝṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:821: , pitṝṇām iti evamartham . tat iha api prāpnoti : kḷpyamānam paśya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:822_0: atha asatyām api savarṇasañjñāyām iha kasmāt na bhavati : prakḷpyamānam paśya iti . cuṭutulaśarvyavāye na iti vakṣyāmi .
GS24pmbhasuu:822_1: aparaḥ āha : tribhiḥ ca madhyamaiḥ vargaiḥ laśasaiḥ ca vyavāye na iti vakṣyāmi iti . varṇaikadeśāḥ ca varṇagrahaṇena gṛhyante
GS24pmbhasuu:822_2: iti yaḥ asau ḷkāre lakāraḥ tadāśrayaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati . yadi evam na arthaḥ raṣābhyām ṇatve
GS24pmbhasuu:823: ṛkāragrahaṇena . varṇaikadeśāḥ ca varṇagrahaṇena gṛhyante iti yaḥ asau ṛkāre rephaḥ tadāśrayam ṇatvam bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:824_0: (P_1,1.10) KA_I,63.25-65.6 Ro_I,207-211 ajjhaloḥ pratiṣedhe śakārapratiṣedhaḥ ajjhaltvāt . ajjhaloḥ pratiṣedhe śakārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:824_1: śakāreṇa savarṇasañjñāyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . ajjhaltvāt . ac ca eva hi śakāraḥ hal ca . katham tāvat actvam
GS24pmbhasuu:824_2: . ikāraḥ savarṇagrahaṇena śakāram api gṛhṇāti iti actvam . halṣu upadeśāt haltvam . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:825: . tatra savarṇalope doṣaḥ . tatra savarṇalope doṣaḥ bhavati . paraśśatāni kāryāṇi . jharaḥ jhari savarṇe iti lopaḥ na prāpnoti . siddham anactvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:826: siddham etat . katham . anactvāt . katham anactvam . spṛṣṭam sparśānām karaṇam . īṣatspṛṣṭam antaḥsthānām . vivṛtam ūṣmaṇām . īṣat iti anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:827: . svarāṇām vivṛtam . īṣat iti nivṛttam . vākyāparisamāpteḥ vā .
GS24pmbhasuu:828: vākyāparisamāpteḥ vā siddham etat . kim idam vākyāparisamāpteḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:829_0: varṇānām upadeśaḥ tāvat . upadeśottarakālā itsañjñā . itsañjñottarakālaḥ ādiḥ antyena saha itā iti pratyāhāraḥ . pratyāhārottarakālā
GS24pmbhasuu:829_1: savarṇasañjñā . savarṇasañjñottarakālam aṇ udit savarṇasya ca apratyayaḥ iti savarṇagrahaṇam . etena sarveṇa samuditena vākyena
GS24pmbhasuu:830: grahaṇam bhavati . ca ca atra ikāraḥ śakāram gṛhṇāti . yathā eva tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:831: ikāraḥ śakāram na gṛhṇāti evam īkāram api na gṛhṇīyāt . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:832: kumārī , īhate kumārīhate . akaḥ savarṇadīrghatvam na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yat etat akaḥ savarṇe dīrghaḥ iti pratyāhāragrahaṇam tata ikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:833_0: īkāram gṛhṇāti . śakāram na gṛhṇāti . aparaḥ āha : ajjhaloḥ pratiṣedhe śakārapratiṣedhaḥ ajhaltvāt . ajjhaloḥ pratiṣedhe
GS24pmbhasuu:833_1: śakārasya śakāreṇa savarṇasañjñāyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . ajjhaltvāt . ac ca eva śakāraḥ hal ca . katham tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:834_0: api gṛhṇāti iti actvam . halṣu upadeśāt haltvam . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . tatra savarṇalope doṣaḥ . tatra savarṇalope doṣaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:834_1: . paraśśatāni kāryāṇi . jharaḥ jhari savarṇe iti lopaḥ na prāpnoti . siddham anactvāt . siddham etat . katham . anactvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:834_2: . katham anactvam . vākyāparisamāpteḥ vā . uktā vākyāparisamāptiḥ . asmin pakṣe vā iti etat asamarthitam bhavati . etat ca
GS24pmbhasuu:834_3: samarthitam . katham . astu vā śakārasya śakāreṇa savarṇasañjñā mā vā bhūt . nanu ca uktam : paraśśatāni kāryāṇi . jharaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:835: prāpnoti iti . mā bhūt lopaḥ . nanu ca bhedaḥ bhavati . sati lope dviśakāram asati lope triśakāram . na asti bhedaḥ . asati api lope
GS24pmbhasuu:836: dviśakāram eva . katham . vibhāṣā dvirvacanam . evam api bhedaḥ . asati lope kadā cit dviśakāram kadā cit triśakāram sati lope dviśakāram eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:837: saḥ eṣaḥ katham bhedaḥ na syāt . yadi nityaḥ lopaḥ syāt . vibhāṣā tu saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:840_0: pragṛhyasañjñā ucyate . taparaḥ tatkālasya iti tatkālānām savarṇānām grahaṇam yathā syāt . keṣām . udāttānudāttasvaritānām
GS24pmbhasuu:840_1: . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . plutānām tu pragṛhyasañjñā na prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . atatkālatvāt . na hi plutāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:841: tasyāsiddhatvāt tatkālāḥ eva bhavanti . siddhaḥ plutaḥ svarasandhiṣu .
GS24pmbhasuu:842: katham jñāyate siddhaḥ plutaḥ svarasandhiṣu iti . yat ayam plutapragṛhyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:843_0: aci iti plutasya prakṛtibhāvam śāsti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . sataḥ hi kāryiṇaḥ kāryeṇa bhavitavyam . kim etasya jñāpane
GS24pmbhasuu:843_1: prayojanam . aplutāt aplute iti etat na vaktavyam bhavati . kim ataḥ yat siddhaḥ plutaḥ svarasandhiṣu . sañjñāvidhau asiddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:843_2: . tasya asiddhatvāt tatkālāḥ eva bhavanti . sañjñāvidhau ca siddhaḥ . katham . kāryakālam sañjñāparibhāṣam . yatra kāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:843_3: tatra upasthitam draṣṭavyam . pragṛhyaḥ prakṛtyā iti
GS24pmbhasuu:844_0: upasthitam idam bhavati īdūdet dvivacanam pragṛhyam iti . kim punaḥ plutasya pragṛhyasañjñāvacane prayojanam . pragṛhyāśrayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:844_1: prakṛtibhāvaḥ yathā syāt . mā bhūt evam . plutaḥ prakṛtyā iti evam bhaviṣyati . na evam śakyam . upasthite hi doṣaḥ syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:844_2: . aplutavat upasthithe iti atra paṭhiṣyati hi ācāryaḥ : vadvacanam plutakāryapratiṣedhārtham ,
GS24pmbhasuu:845: plutapratiṣedhe hi pragṛhyplutapratiṣedhaprasaṅgaḥ anyena vihitatvāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:846_0: tasmāt plutasya pragṛhyasañjñā eṣitavyā pragṛhyāśrayaḥ prakṛtibhāvaḥ yathā syāt . yadi punaḥ dīrghāṇām ataparāṇām pragṛhyasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:846_1: ucyeta . evam api ekāraḥ eva ekaḥ savarṇān gṛhṇīyāt . īkārokārau na gṛhṇīyātām . kim kāraṇam . anaṇtvāt . yadi punaḥ hrasvānām
GS24pmbhasuu:846_2: ataparāṇām pragṛhyasañjñā ucyeta . na evam śakyam . iha api prasajyeta : akurvahi , atra akurvahi atra iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:847_0: tasmāt dīrghāṇām eva taparāṇām pragṛhyasañjñā vaktavyā . dīrghāṇām ca ucyamānā plutānām na prāpnoti . evam tarhi kim naḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:847_1: etena yatnena yat siddhaḥ plutaḥ svarasandhiṣu iti . asiddhaḥ plutaḥ . tasya asiddhatvāt tatkālāḥ eva bhavanti iti . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:848: aci iti. plutabhāvī prakṛtyā iti evam etat vijñāyate . katham yat tat
GS24pmbhasuu:849: prayojanam uktam . kriyate tat nyāse eva aplutāt aplute iti . evam api yat

GS24pmbhasuu:1003_1: bhavān grāmyam pāṃsurapādam aprakaraṇajñam āgatam bravītu gopālakam ānaya kaṭajakam ānaya
GS24pmbhasuu:1004_0: iti . ubhayagatiḥ tasya bhavati sādhīyaḥ vā yaṣṭihastam gamiṣyati . yathā eva tarhi arthāt prakaraṇāt vā loke kṛtrimākṛtrimayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1004_1: kṛtrime sampratyayaḥ bhavati evam iha api prāpnoti . jānāti hi asau bahvādīnām iyam sañjñā kṛtā iti . na yathā loke tathā
GS24pmbhasuu:1005_0: anyatra api na avaśyam iha eva . tat yathā : kartuḥ īpsitatamam karma iti kṛtrimā sañjñā . karmapradeśeṣu ca ubhayagatiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1005_1: bhavati . karmaṇi dvitīyā iti kṛtrimasya grahaṇam kartari karmavyatihāre iti akṛtrimasya . tathā sādhakatamam karaṇam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1005_2: kṛtrimā karaṇasañjñā . karaṇapradeśeṣu ca ubhayagatiḥ bhavati . kartṛkaraṇayoḥ tṛtīyā iti kṛtrimasya grahaṇam śabdavairakalahābhrakaṇvameghebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1005_3: karaṇe iti akṛtrimasya . tathā ādhāraḥ adhikaraṇam iti kṛtrimā adhikaraṇasañjñā . adhikaraṇepradeśeṣu ca ubhayagatiḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:1005_4: . saptamī adhikaraṇe ca iti kṛtrimasya grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:1006_0: vipratiṣiddham ca anadhikaraṇavāci iti akṛtrimasya . atha vā na idam sañjñākaraṇam . tadvadatideśaḥ ayam : bahugaṇavatuḍatayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1006_1: saṅkhyāvat bhavanti iti . saḥ tarhi vatinirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na hi antareṇa vatim atideśaḥ gamyate . antareṇa api vatim atideśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1006_2: gamyate . tat yathā : eṣaḥ brahmadattaḥ . abrahmadattam brahmadattaḥ iti āha . te manyāmahe :
GS24pmbhasuu:1007: brahmadattavat ayam bhavati iti . evam iha api asaṅkhyām saṅkhyā iti āha .
GS24pmbhasuu:1008_0: saṅkhyāvat iti gamyate . atha vā ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati bhavati ekādikāyāḥ saṅkhyāyāḥ saṅkhyāpradeśeṣu saṅkhyāsampratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1008_1: iti yat ayam saṅkhyāyāḥ atiśadantāyāḥ kan iti tiśadantāyāḥ pratiṣedham śāsti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . na hi kṛtrimā tyantā
GS24pmbhasuu:1008_2: śadantā vā saṅkhyā asti . nanu ca iyam asti ḍatiḥ . yat tarhi śadantāyāḥ pratiṣedham śāsti . yat ca api
GS24pmbhasuu:1009: tyantāyāḥ pratiṣedham śāsti . nanu ca uktam ḍatyartham etat syāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1010_0: arthavadgrahaṇe na anarthakasya iti arthavataḥ tiśabdasya grahaṇam . na ca ḍateḥ tiśabdaḥ arthavān. atha vā mahatī iyam sañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:1010_1: kriyate . sañjñā ca nāma yataḥ na laghīyaḥ . kutaḥ etat . laghvartham hi sañjñākaraṇam . tatra mahatyāḥ sañjñāyāḥ karaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:1011: saṅkhyāyate anayā saṅkhyā iti . ekādikayā ca api saṅkhyāyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:1012_0: uttarārthena ca api na arthaḥ saṅkhyāgrahaṇena . idam prakṛtam anuvartiṣyate . idam vai sañjñārtham uttaratra ca sañjñiviśeṣaṇārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1012_1: . na ca anyārtham prakṛtam anyārtham bhavati . na khalu api anyat prakṛtam anuvartanāt anyat bhavati . na hi godhā sarpantī
GS24pmbhasuu:1013: yat tāvat ucyate na ca anyārtham prakṛtam anyārtham bhavati iti anyārtham api prakṛtam anyārtham bhavati . tat yathā : śālyartham kulyāḥ praṇīyante
GS24pmbhasuu:1014: tābhyaḥ ca pāṇīyam pīyate upaśpṛśyate ca śālayaḥ ca bhāvyante . yad api ucyate na khalu api anyat prakṛtam anuvartanāt anyat bhavati . na hi godhā
GS24pmbhasuu:1015: sarpantī sarpaṇāt ahiḥ bhavati iti . bhavet dravyeṣu etat evam syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:1016_0: śabdaḥ tu khalu yena yena viśeṣeṇa abhisambadhyate tasya tasya viśeṣakaḥ bhavati . atha vā sāpekṣaḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:1016_1: na ca anyat kim cit apekṣyam asti . te saṅkhyām eva apekṣiṣyāmahe (P_1,1.23.2) KA_I,82.10-83.8 Ro_I,263-265 adhyardhagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:1016_2: ca samāsakanvidhyartham . adhyardhagrahaṇam ca kartavyam . kim prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1019: . luki ca agrahaṇam . luki ca adhyardhagrahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:1020: adhyardhapūrvadvigoḥ luk asañjñāyām iti . dvigoḥ iti eva siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:1021: ardhapūrvapadaḥ ca pūraṇapratyayāntaḥ . ardhapūrvapadaḥ ca pūraṇapratyayāntaḥ saṅkhyāsañjñaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1025: adhikagrahaṇam ca aluki kartavyam . kim prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1028: uttarapadavṛddhyartham adhikaṣāṣṭhikaḥ , adhikasāptatikaḥ . aluki iti kim
GS24pmbhasuu:1029: artham . adhikaṣāṣṭhikaḥ , adhikasāptatikaḥ . bahuvrīhau ca agrahaṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1030: bahuvrīhau ca adhikaśabdasya grahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati : saṅkhyayā avyayāsannādūrādhikasaṅkhyāḥ saṅkhyeye iti . saṅkhyā iti eva siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:1031_0: bahvādīnām agrahaṇam . bahvādīnām grahaṇam śakyam akartum . kena idānīm saṅkhyāpradeśeṣu saṅkhyasampratyayaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1031_1: jñāpakāt siddham . kim jñāpakam . yat ayam vatoḥ iṭ vā iti saṅkhyāyāḥ vihitasya kanaḥ vatvantāt iṭam śāsti . vatoḥ eva tat
GS24pmbhasuu:1031_2: jñāpakam syāt . na iti āha . yogāpekṣam jñāpakam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1033: ṣaṭsañjñāyām upadeśagrahaṇam kartavyam . upadeśe ṣakāranakārāntā saṅkhyā
GS24pmbhasuu:1034: ṣaṭsañjñā bhavati iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . śatādyaṣṭanoḥ numnuḍartham . śatāni sahasrāṇi . numi kṛte ṣṇāntā ṣaṭ iti ṣaṭsañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:1035: prāpnoti . upadeśagrahaṇāt na bhavati . aṣṭānām iti atra ātve kṛte ṣaṭsañjñā na prāpnoti . upadeśagrahaṇāt bhavati . uktam vā . kim uktam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1036: iha tāvat śatāni sahasrāṇi iti . sannipātalakṣaṇaḥ vidhiḥ animittam
GS24pmbhasuu:1037_0: tadvighātasya iti . aṣṭanaḥ api uktam . kim uktam . aṣṭanaḥ dīrghagrahaṇam ṣaṭsañjñājñāpakam ākārāntasya nuḍartham iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1037_1: atha vā ākāraḥ api atra nirdiśyate . ṣakārāntā nakārāntā ākārāntā ca saṅkhyā ṣaṭsañjñā bhavati iti . iha api tarhi prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:1037_2: : sadhamadhaḥ dyumnaḥ ekāḥ taḥ ekāḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ekaśabdaḥ ayam bahvarthaḥ . asti eva saṅkhyāpadam . tat yathā ekaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1037_3: , dvau , bahavaḥ iti . asti asahāyavācī . tat yathā : ekāgnayaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1038_0: ekahalāni , ekākibhiḥ kṣudrakaiḥ jitam iti . asahāyaiḥ iti arthaḥ . asti anyārthe vartate . tat yathā : prajam ekā rakṣati
GS24pmbhasuu:1038_1: urjam ekā iti . anyā iti arthaḥ . sadhamadaḥ dyumnaḥ ekāḥ taḥ . anyāḥ iti arthaḥ . tat yaḥ anyārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:1039_0: vartate tasya eṣaḥ prayogaḥ . iha tarhi prāpnoti : dvabhyām iṣṭaye viṃśatya ca iti . evam tarhi saptame yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:1039_1: . aṣṭābhyaḥ auś . tataḥ ṣaḍbhyaḥ : ṣaḍbhyaḥ ca yat uktam aṣṭābhyaḥ api tat bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1040: tataḥ luk : luk ca bhavati ṣaḍbhyaḥ iti . atha vā upariṣṭāt yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . aṣṭanaḥ ā vibhaktau . tataḥ rāyaḥ : rāyaḥ ca vibhaktau
GS24pmbhasuu:1041: ākārādeśaḥ bhavati . hali iti ubhayoḥ śeṣaḥ . yadi evam priyāṣṭau
GS24pmbhasuu:1042: priyāṣṭāḥ iti na sidhyati priyāṣṭānau priyāṣṭānaḥ iti ca prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1044_0: (P_1,1.25) KA_I,84.9-12 Ro_I,269 idam ḍatigrahaṇam dviḥ kriyate saṅkhyāsañjñāyām ṣaṭsañjñāyām ca . ekam śakyam akartum .
GS24pmbhasuu:1044_1: katham . yadi tāvat saṅkhyāsañjñāyām kriyate ṣaṭsañjñāyām na kariṣyate . katham . ṣṇāntā ṣaṭ iti atra ḍati iti anuvartiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:1045: saṅkhyāsañjñāyām na kariṣyate . ḍati ca iti atra saṅkhyāsañjñā anuvartiṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:1046: (P_1,1.26) KA_I,84.14-85.17 Ro_I,270-272 niṣṭhāsañjñāyām samānaśabdapratiṣedhaḥ . niṣṭhāsañjñāyām samānaśabdānām pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1047: kartavyaḥ . lotaḥ gartaḥ iti . niṣṭhāsañjñāyām samānaśabdāpratiṣedhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1048: niṣṭhāsañjñāyām samānaśabdapratiṣedhaḥ . anarthakaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ . niṣṭhāsañjñā kasmāt na bhavati . anubandhaḥ anyatvakaraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1049: anubandhaḥ kriyate . saḥ anyatvam kariṣyati . anubandhaḥ anyatvakaraḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1050: cet na lopāt . anubandhaḥ anyatvakaraḥ iti cet tat na . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1051: lopāt . lupyate atra anubandhaḥ . lupte atra anubandhe na anyatvam bhaviṣyati . tat yathā : katarat devadattasya gṛham . adaḥ yatra asau
GS24pmbhasuu:1052: kākaḥ iti . utpatite kāke naṣṭam tat gṛham bhavati . evam iha api lupte anubandhe naṣṭaḥ pratyayaḥ bhavati . yadi api lupyate jānāti tu asau
GS24pmbhasuu:1053_0: sānubandhakasya iyam sañjñā kṛtā iti . tat yathā itaratra api : katarat devadattasya gṛham . adaḥ yatra asau kākaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1053_1: utpatite kāke yadi api naṣṭam tat gṛham bhavati antataḥ tam uddeśam jānāti . siddhaviparyāsaḥ ca . siddhaḥ ca viparyāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1053_2: . yadi api jānāti sandehaḥ tasya bhavati : ayam saḥ taśabdaḥ lotaḥ gartaḥ iti ayam saḥ taśabdaḥ lūnaḥ gīrṇaḥ iti . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:1053_3: itaratra api : katarat devadattasya gṛham . adaḥ yatra asau kākaḥ iti . utpatite kāke yadi api naṣṭam tat gṛham bhavati antataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1053_4: tam uddeśam jānāti . sandehaḥ tu tasya bhavati : idam tat gṛham idam tat gṛham iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1054: evam tarhi . kārakakālaviśeṣāt siddham . kārakakālaviśeṣau upādeyau .
GS24pmbhasuu:1055: bhūte yaḥ taśabdaḥ kartari karmaṇi bhāve ca iti . tat yathā itaratra api .
GS24pmbhasuu:1056_0: yaḥ eṣaḥ manuṣyaḥ prekṣāpūrvakārī bhavati saḥ adhruveṇa nimittena dhruvam nimittam upādatte vedikām puṇḍarīkam vā . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:1056_1: api prākīrṣṭa iti atra prāpnoti . luṅi sijādidarśanāt . luṅi sijādidarśanāt na bhaviṣyati . yatra tarhi sijādayaḥ na dṛśyante
GS24pmbhasuu:1056_2: prābhitta iti . dṛśyante atra api sijādayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1057: kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . yathā eva ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:1058: anupadiṣṭān kārakakālaviśeṣān avagacchati evam etat api avagantum arhati :
GS24pmbhasuu:1060: (P_1,1.27.1) KA_I,86.2-8 Ro_I,273-274 sarvādīni iti kaḥ ayam samāsaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1061: bahuvrīhiḥ iti āha . kaḥ asya vigrahaḥ . sarvaśabdaḥ ādiḥ yeṣām tāni imāni iti . yadi evam sarvaśabdasya sarvanāmasañjñā na prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1062: anyapadārthatvāt bahuvrīheḥ . bahuvrīhiḥ ayam anyapadārthe vartate . tena yat anyat sarvaśabdāt tasya sarvanāmasñjñā prāpnoti . tat yathā citraguḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1063_0: ānīyatām iti ukte yasya tāḥ gāvaḥ bhavanti sa ānīyate na gāvaḥ . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . bhavati bahuvrīhau tadguṇasaṃvijñānam api
GS24pmbhasuu:1063_1: . tat yathā : citravāsam ānaya . lohitoṣṇīṣāḥ ṛtvijaḥ pracaranti . tadguṇaḥ ānīyate tadguṇāḥ ca pracaranti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1065_0: pūrvapadāt sañjñāyām agaḥ iti ṇatvam prāpnoti . tasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . sarvanāmasañjñāyām nipātanāt ṇatvābhāvaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1065_1: sarvanāmasañjñāyām nipātanāt ṇatvam na bhaviṣyati . kim etat nipātanam nāma . atha kaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ nāma . aviśeṣeṇa kim cit
GS24pmbhasuu:1065_2: uktvā viśeṣeṇa na iti ucyate . tatra vyaktam ācāryasya abhiprāyaḥ gamyate : idam na bhavati iti . nipātanam api evañjātīyakam
GS24pmbhasuu:1065_3: eva . aviśeṣeṇa ṇatvam uktvā viśeṣeṇa nipātanam kriyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:1066_0: tatra vyaktam ācāryasya abhiprāyaḥ gamyate : idam na bhavati iti . nanu ca nipātanāt ca aṇatvam syāt yathāprāptam ca ṇatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:1066_1: . kim anye api evam vidhayaḥ bhavanti . iha ikaḥ yaṇ aci iti vacanāt ca yaṇ syāt yathāprāptaḥ ca ik śrūyeta . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1066_2: . asti atra viśeṣaḥ . ṣaṣṭhyā atra nirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1067_0: kriyate . ṣaṣṭhī ca punaḥ sthāninam nivartayati . iha tarhi : kartari śap divādibhyaḥ śyan iti vacanāt ca śyan syāt yathāprāptaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1067_1: ca śap śrūyeta . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . śabādeśāḥ śyanādayaḥ kariṣyante . tat tarhi śapaḥ grahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . prakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:1067_2: anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . kartari śap iti . tat vai prathamānirdiṣṭam ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭena ca iha arthaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1068: divādibhyaḥ iti eṣā pañcamī śap iti prathamāyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayiṣyati :
GS24pmbhasuu:1069: tasmāt iti uttarasya . pratyayavidhiḥ ayam . na ca pratyayavidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:1070: pañcamyaḥ prakalpikāḥ bhavanti . na ayam pratyayavidhiḥ . vihitaḥ pratyayaḥ prakṛtaḥ ca anuvartate . iha tarhi : avyayasarvanāmnām akac prāk
GS24pmbhasuu:1071: ṭeḥ iti . vacanāt ca akac syāt yathāprāptaḥ ca kaḥ śrūyeta . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1072_0: . na aprāpte hi ke akac ārabhyate . saḥ bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . nipātanam api evañjātīyakam eva . na aprāpte ṇatve nipātanam
GS24pmbhasuu:1072_1: ārabhyate . tat bādhakam bhaviṣyati . yadi tarhi nipātanāni api evañjātīyakāni bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:1073: samaḥ tate doṣaḥ bhavati . iha anye vaiyākaraṇāḥ samaḥ tate vibhāṣā lopam ārabhante : samaḥ hi tatayoḥ vā iti . satatam , santatam , sahitam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1074: saṃhitam iti . iha punaḥ bhavān nipātanāt ca malopam icchati aparasparāḥ kriyāsātatye iti yathāprāptam ca alopam santatam iti . etat na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1075: kartavyaḥ atra yatnaḥ . bādhakāni eva hi nipātanāni bhavanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1077: sañjñopasarjanībhūtānām sarvādīnām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . sarvaḥ nāma kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1078: cit . tasmai sarvāya dehi . atisarvāya dehi . saḥ katham kartavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1079: pāṭhāt paryudāsaḥ paṭhitānām sañjñākaraṇam . pāṭhāt eva paryudāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1080_0: kartavyaḥ . śuddhānām paṭhitānām sañjñā kartavyā . sarvādīni sarvanāmasañjñāni bhavanti . sañjñopasarjanībhūtāni na sarvādīni
GS24pmbhasuu:1080_1: . kim aviśeṣeṇa . na iti āha . viśeṣeṇa ca . kim prayojanam sarvādyānantaryakāryārtham . sarvādīnām ānantaryeṇa yat ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:1081_0: api sañjñopasarjanībhūtānām mā bhūt iti . kim prayojanam . prayojanam ḍatarādīnām adbhāve . ḍatarādīnām adbhāve prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:1081_1: . atikrāntam idam bṛāhmaṇakulam katarat , atikataram brāhmaṇakulam iti . tyadādividhau ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:1082_0: tyadādividhau ca prayojanam . atikrāntaḥ ayam brāhmaṇaḥ tam atitat brāhmaṇaḥ iti . sañjāpratiṣedhaḥ tāvat na vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1082_1: upariṣṭāt yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . pūrvaparāvaradakṣiṇottarāparādharāṇi vyavasthāyām . tataḥ asañjñāyām iti . sarvādīni iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1083: tāni draṣṭavyāni . upasarjanapratiṣedhaḥ ca na kartavyaḥ . anupasarjanāt iti eṣaḥ yogaḥ pratyākhyāyate . tam evam abhisambhantsyāmaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1084: anupasarjana* a* at iti . kim idam a* at iti . akārātkārau śiṣyamāṇau anupasarjanasya draṣṭavyau . yadi evam atiyuṣmat atyasmat iti na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:1085: . praśliṣṭanirdeśaḥ ayam : anupasarjana* a* a* at iti . akārāntāt akārātkārau śiṣyamāṇau anupasarjanasya draṣṭavyau . atha vā aṅgādhikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:1086: yat ucyate gṛhyamāṇavibhakteḥ tat bhavati . yadi evam paramapañca
GS24pmbhasuu:1087: paramasapta ṣaḍbhyaḥ luk iti luk na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .

GS24pmbhasuu:1254: navāśabdasya yaḥ arthaḥ tasya sañjñā bhavati iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . śabdasañjñāyām hi arthāsampratyayaḥ yathā anyatra .
GS24pmbhasuu:1255: śabdasañjñāyām hi satyām arthasya asampratyayaḥ syāt yathā anyatra .
GS24pmbhasuu:1256_0: anyatra api śabdasañjñāyām śabdasya sampratyayaḥ bhavati na arthasya . kva anyatra . dādhāḥ ghu adāp taraptamapau ghaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1256_1: ghugrahaṇeṣu ghagrahaṇeṣu ca śabdasya sampratyayaḥ bhavati na arthasya . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . itikaraṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1256_2: arthanirdeśārthaḥ . itikaraṇaḥ kriyate . saḥ arthanirdeśārthaḥ bhaviṣyati . kim gatam etat itinā āhosvit śabādhikyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1257: arthādhikyam . gatam iti āha . kutaḥ . lokataḥ . tat yathā loke gauḥ ayam iti āha iti gośabdāt itikaraṇaḥ paraḥ prayujyamānaḥ gośabdam svasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1258: padārthāt pracyāvayati . saḥ asau svasmāt padārthāt pracyutaḥ yā asau arthapadārthakatā tasyāḥ śabdapadārthakaḥ sampadyate . evam iha api
GS24pmbhasuu:1259_0: navāśabdāt itikaraṇaḥ paraḥ prayujyamānaḥ navāśabdam svasmāt padārthāt pracyāvayati . saḥ asau svasmāt padārthāt pracyutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1259_1: yā asau śabdapadārthakatā tasyāḥ laukikam artham sampratyāyayati . na vā iti yat gamyate na vā iti yat pratīyate iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1261: samānaśabdānām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ : navā kuṇḍikā navā ghaṭikā iti . kim ca syāt yadi eteṣām api vibhāṣāsañjñā syāt . vibhāṣā diksamāse bahuvrīhau
GS24pmbhasuu:1262: : dakṣiṇapūrvasyām śālāyām . acirakṛtāyām sampratyayaḥ syāt . na vā vidhipūrvakatvāt pratiṣedhasamapratyayaḥ yathā loke . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1263_0: kim kāraṇam . vidhipūrvakatvāt . vidhāya kim cit na vā iti ucyate . tena pratiṣedhavācinaḥ samapratyayaḥ bhavati . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:1263_1: loke : grāmaḥ bhavatā gantavyaḥ na vā . na iti gamyate . asti kārṇam yena loke pratiṣedhavācinaḥ samapratyayaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1263_2: kim kāraṇam . viliṅgam hi bhavān loke nirdeśam karoti . āṅga hi samānaliṅgaḥ nirdeśaḥ kriyatām pratyagravācinaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1264: sampratyayaḥ bhaviṣyati . tat yathā : grāmaḥ bhavatā gantavyaḥ navaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1265: pratyagraḥ iti gamyate . etat ca eva na jānīmaḥ : kva cit vyākaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:1266_0: samānaliṅgaḥ nirdeśaḥ kriyate iti . api ca kāmacāraḥ prayoktuḥ śabdānām abhisambandhe . tat yathā : yavāgūḥ bhavatā bhoktavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:1266_1: navā . yadā yavāgūśabdaḥ bhujinā abhisambadhyate bhujiḥ navāśabdena tadā pratiṣedhavācinaḥ sampratyayaḥ bhavati : yavāgūḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1267: na iti gamyate . yadā yavāgūśabdaḥ navāśabdena abhisambadhyate na bhujinā
GS24pmbhasuu:1268: tadā pratyagravācinaḥ sampratyayaḥ bhavati : yavāgūḥ navā bhavatā
GS24pmbhasuu:1269_0: bhoktavyā . pratyagrā iti gamyate . na ca iha vayam vibhāṣāgrahaṇena sarvādīni abhisambadhnīmaḥ : diksamāse bahuvrīhau sarvādīni
GS24pmbhasuu:1269_1: vibhāṣā bhavanti iti . kim tarhi . bhavatiḥ abhisambadhyate : diksamāse bahuvrīhau sarvādīni bhavanti vibhāṣā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1270: (P_1,1.44.3) KA_I,103.3-104.7 Ro_I,325-328 vidhyanityatvam anupapannam pratiṣedhasañjñākaraṇāt . vidhyanityatvam na upapadyate : śuśāva ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1271: śuśuvatuḥ , śuśuvuḥ , śiśvāya , śiśviyatuḥ , śiśviyuḥ . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1272_0: pratiṣedhasañjñākaraṇāt . pratiṣedhasya iyam sañjñā kriyate . tena vibhāṣāpradeśeṣu pratiṣedhasya eva sampratyayaḥ syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:1272_1: siddham tu prasajyapratiṣedhāt . siddham etat . katham . prasajyapratiṣedhāt prasajya kim cit na vā iti ucyate . tena ubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:1273: vipratiṣiddham tu . vipratiṣiddham tu bhavati . atra na jñāyate : kena abhiprāyeṇa prasajati kena nivṛttim karoti iti . na vā prasaṅgasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1274: anyatra pratiṣedhaviṣayāt . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1275: prasaṅgasāmarthyāt . prasaṅgasāmarthyāt ca vidhiḥ bhaviṣyati anyatra pratiṣedhaviṣayāt pratiṣedhasāmarthyāt ca pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:1276: vidhiviṣayāt . tat etat kva siddham bhavati . yā aprāpte vibhāṣā . yā hi prāpte kṛtasāmarthyaḥ tatra pūrveṇa vidhiḥ iti kṛtvā pratiṣedhasya eva
GS24pmbhasuu:1277: sampratyayaḥ syāt . etat api siddham . katham . vibhāṣā iti mahatīsañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:1278_0: kriyate . sañjñā ca nāma yataḥ na laghīyaḥ . kutaḥ etat . laghvartham hi sañjñākaraṇam . tatra mahatyāḥ sañjñāyāḥ karaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:1278_1: etat prayojanam ubhayoḥ sañjñā yathā vijñāyeta : na iti ca vā iti ca . tatra yā tāvat aprāpte vibhāṣā tatra pratiṣedhyam
GS24pmbhasuu:1278_2: na asti iti kṛtvā vā iti anena vikalpaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1279: bhaviṣyati . yā hi prāpte vibhāṣā tatra ubhayam upasthitam bhavati : na iti ca vā iti ca . tatra na iti anena pratiṣiddhe vā iti anena vikalpaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1281: vipratiṣedhayoḥ yugapadvacanam na upapadyate : śuśāva śuśuvatuḥ śuśuvuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1282_0: śiśvāya śiśviyatuḥ śiśviyuḥ . kim kāraṇam . bhavati iti cet na pratiṣedhaḥ . bhavati iti cet pratiṣedhaḥ na prāpnoti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:1282_1: iti cet na vidhiḥ . na it cet vidhiḥ na sidhyati . siddham tu pūrvasya uttareṇa bādhitatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:1283: siddham etat. katham . pūrvavidhim uttarvidhiḥ bādhate . itikaraṇaḥ arthanirdeśāṛthaḥ iti uktam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1285_0: vibhāṣā tasya sādhutvam . sādhvanuśāsane asmin śāstre yasya vibhāṣā kriyate saḥ vibhāṣā sādhuḥ syāt . samāsaḥ ca eva hi vibhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:1285_1: . tena samāsasya eva vibhāṣā sādhutvam syāt . astu . yaḥ sādhuḥ saḥ prayokṣyate.
GS24pmbhasuu:1286: asādhuḥ na prayokṣyate . na ca eva hi kadā cit rājapuruṣaḥ iti asyām
GS24pmbhasuu:1287_0: avasthāyām asādhutvam iṣyate . api ca dvedhāpratipattiḥ . dvaidham śabdānām apratipattiḥ . icchāmaḥ ca punaḥ vibhāṣāpradeśeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:1287_1: dvaidham śabdānām pratipattiḥ syāt iti tat ca na sidhyati . yasya punaḥ kāryāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1288: śabdāḥ vibhāṣā asau samāsam nirvartayati . yasya api nityāḥ śabdāḥ tasya api eṣaḥ na doṣaḥ . katham . na vibhāṣāgrahaṇena sādhutvam abhisambadhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:1289_0: . kim tarhi . samāsasañjñā abhisambadhyate : samāsaḥ iti eṣā sañjñā vibhāṣā bhavati iti . tat yathā : medhyaḥ paśuḥ vibhāṣitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1289_1: . medhyaḥ anaḍvān vibhāṣitaḥ iti . na etat vicāryate : anaḍvān na anaḍvān iti . kim tarhi ālabdhavyaḥ na ālabdhavyaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1289_2: . kārye yugapadanvācayayaugapadyam kāryeṣu śabdeṣu yugapat anvācayena ca yat ucyate tasya yugapadvacanatā prāpnoti : tavyattavyānīyaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1289_3: , ḍhak ca maṇḍūkāt iti . yasya punaḥ nityāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1290_0: śabdāḥ prayuktānām asau sādhutvam anvācaṣṭe . nanu ca yasya api kāryāḥ tasya api eṣaḥ na doṣaḥ . katham . pratyayaḥ paraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1290_1: bhavati iti ucyate . na ca ekasyāḥ prakṛteḥ anekasya pratyayasya yugapat paratvena sambhavaḥ asti
GS24pmbhasuu:1291_0: . na api brūmaḥ pratyayamālā prāpnoti . kim tarhi . kartavyam iti prayoktavye yugapat dvitīyasya tṛtīyasya ca prayogaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:1291_1: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . arthagatyarthaḥ śabdaprayogaḥ . artham sampratyāyayiṣyāmi iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1292: śabdaḥ prayujyate . tatra ekena uktatvāt tasya arthasya dvitīyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1293: prayogeṇa na bhavitavyam uktārthānām aprayogaḥ iti . ācāryadeśaśīlane ca tadviṣayatā . ācāryadeśaśīlanena yat ucyate tasya tadviṣayatā prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1294_0: ikaḥ hrasvaḥ aṅyaḥ gālavasya prācām avṛddhāt phin bahulam iti gālavāḥ eva hrasvān prayuñjīran prākṣu ca eva hi phin syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1294_1: . tat yathā : jamadagniḥ vai etat pañcamam avadānam avādyat tasmāt na ajāmadagnyaḥ pañcāvattam juhoti . yasya punaḥ nityāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1294_2: śabdāḥ gālavagrahaṇam tasya pūjārtham deśagrahaṇam ca kīrtyartham . nanu ca yasya api kāryāḥ tasya api pūjārtham gālavagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:1294_3: syāt deśagraham ca kīrtyartham . tatkīrtane ca dvedhāpratipattiḥ . tatkīrtane ca dvaidham śabdānām apratipattiḥ syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:1295: icchāmaḥ ca punaḥ ācāryagrahaṇeṣu deśagrahaṇeṣu ca dvaidham śabdānām pratipattiḥ syāt iti tat ca na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1297: aśiṣyaḥ vā punaḥ ayam yogaḥ . kim kāraṇam . viditatvāt . yat anena yogena
GS24pmbhasuu:1298: prārthyate tasya arthasya viditatvāt . ye api hi etām sañjñām na ārabhante te api vibhāṣā iti ukte anityatvam avagacchanti . yājñikāḥ khalu api
GS24pmbhasuu:1299_0: sañjñām anārabhamāṇāḥ vibhāṣā iti ukte anityatvam avagacchanti . tat yathā . medhyaḥ paśuḥ vibhāṣitaḥ . medhyaḥ anaḍvān vibhāṣitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1299_1: iti . ālabdhavyaḥ na ālabdhavyaḥ iti gamyate . ācāryaḥ khalu api sañjñām ārabhamāṇaḥ bhūyiṣṭham anyaiḥ api śabdaiḥ etam artham
GS24pmbhasuu:1299_2: sampratyāyayati bahulam anyatarasyām ubhayathā vā ekeṣām iti .

GS24pmbhasuu:1422_0: anusvāra : anusvāraḥ ca na sidhyati : dviṣantapaḥ , parantapaḥ . maḥ anusvāraḥ hali iti anusvāraḥ na prāpnoti . mā bhūt evam
GS24pmbhasuu:1422_1: . naḥ ca apadāntasya jhali iti evam bhaviṣyati . yaḥ tarhi na jhalparaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1423: vahaṃlihaḥ gauḥ , abhraṃlihaḥ vāyuḥ . anusvāra . śībhāva : śībhāvaḥ ca na

GS24pmbhasuu:1426: yadi parādiḥ guṇaḥ pratiṣedhyaḥ : trapuṇe jatune tumburuṇe . gheḥ ṅiti iti

GS24pmbhasuu:1427_1: iti vṛddhiḥ prāpnoti . vṛddhi . auttva : auttvam ca pratiṣedhyam : trapuṇi jatuni tumburuṇi . idudbhyām aut at ca gheḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1428: dīrgha : dīrghatvam ca na sidhyati : kuṇḍāni vanāni . nopadhāyāḥ sarvanāmasthāne ca asambuddhau iti dīrghatvam na prāpnoti . mā bhūt evam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1429: ataḥ dīrghaḥ yañi supi ca iti evam bhaviṣyati . iha tarhi : asthīni dadhīni priyasakhīni brāhmaṇakulāni . dīrgha . nalopa : nalopaḥ ca na
GS24pmbhasuu:1430_0: sidhyati : agne trī te vajinā trī sadhasthā , ta tā piṇḍānām . nalopaḥ prātipadikāntasya iti nalopaḥ na prāpnoti . nalopa
GS24pmbhasuu:1430_1: . anusvāra : anusvāraḥ ca na sidhyati : dviṣantapaḥ , parantapaḥ . maḥ anusvāraḥ hali iti anusvāraḥ na prāpnoti . mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:1430_2: evam . naḥ ca apadāntasya jhali iti evam
GS24pmbhasuu:1431: bhaviṣyati . yaḥ tarhi na jhalparaḥ : vahaṃlihaḥ gauḥ , abhraṃlihaḥ vāyuḥ . anusvāra . śībhāvenakārapratiṣedhaḥ : śībhāve nakārasya pratiṣedhaḥ
