GS24pmbhasuu:1432_1: evam na bhaviṣyati . yaḥ tarhi nirdiśyate tasya na prāpnoti . kasmāt . numā vyavahitatvāt . evam tarhi pūrvāntaḥ kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:1432_2: . pūrvānte napuṃsakopasarjanahrasvatvam dvigusvaraḥ ca . yadi pūrvantaḥ kriyate napuṃsakopasarjanahrasvatvam dvigusvaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1432_3: ca na sidhyati . napuṃsakopasarjanahrasvatvam : ārāśastriṇī dhānāśaṣkulinī niṣkauśāmbinī nirvārāṇasinī . dvigusvara : pañcāratninī
GS24pmbhasuu:1432_4: daśāratninī . numi kṛte anantyatvāt ete vidhayaḥ na prāpnunvanti . na vā bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:1433_0: bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . bahiraṅgaḥ num , antaraṅgāḥ ete vidhayaḥ . asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge . dvigusvare bhūyān parihāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1433_1: : saṅghātabhaktaḥ asau na utsahate avayavasya igantatām vihantum iti kṛtvā dvigusvaraḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:1434_0: (P_1,1.48) KA_I,117.4-118.4 Ro_I,357-359 kimartham idam ucyate . ecaḥ ik savarṇākāranivṛttyartham . ecaḥ ik bhavati iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:1435: eṅaḥ hrasvaśāsaneṣu ardhaḥ ekāraḥ ardhaḥ okāraḥ vā mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1436: akāranivṛttyartham ca . imau aicau samāhāravarṇau . mātrā avarṇasya mātrā
GS24pmbhasuu:1437_0: ivarṇovarṇayoḥ . tayoḥ hrasvaśāsaneṣu kadā cit avarṇaḥ syāt kadā cit ivarṇovarṇau . mā kadā cit avarṇam bhūt iti evamartham
GS24pmbhasuu:1437_1: idam ucyate . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . dīrghaprasaṅgaḥ . dīrghāḥ tu ikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1438: prāpnuvanti . kim kāraṇam . sthāne antaratamaḥ bhavati iti . nanu ca hrasvādeśe iti ucyate . tena dīrghāḥ na bhaviṣyanti . viṣyārtham etat syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1439: . ecaḥ hrasvaprasaṅge ik bhavati iti . dīrghāprasaṅgaḥ tu nivartakatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:1440: dīrghāṇām tu ikām aprasaṅgaḥ . kim kāraṇam . nivartakatvāt . na anena ikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1441_0: nirvartyante . kim tarhi . anikaḥ nivartyante . siddhāḥ eva hrasvāḥ ikaḥ ca anikaḥ ca . tatra anena anikaḥ nivartyante .
GS24pmbhasuu:1441_1: savarṇanivṛttyarthena tāvat na arthaḥ . siddham eṅaḥ sasthānatvāt . siddham etat . katham . eṅaḥ sasthānatvāt ikārokārau
GS24pmbhasuu:1441_2: bhaviṣyataḥ . ardhaḥ ekāraḥ aradhaḥ okāraḥ vā na
GS24pmbhasuu:1442: bhaviṣyati . nanu ca eṅaḥ sasthānatarau ardhaḥ ekāraukārau . na tau staḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1443_0: yadi hi tau syātām tau eva ayam upadiśet . nanu ca bhoḥ chandogānām sātyamugrirāṇāyanīyāḥ ardham ekāram ardham okāram ca
GS24pmbhasuu:1443_1: adhīyate : sujāte eśvasūnṛte , adhvaryo odribhiḥ sutam , śukram te enyat yajatam te enyat
GS24pmbhasuu:1444_0: iti . pārṣadakṛtiḥ eṣā tatrabhavatām . na eva loke na anyasmin vede ardhaḥ ekāraḥ ardhaḥ okāraḥ vā asti . akāranivṛttyarthena
GS24pmbhasuu:1444_1: api na arthaḥ . aicoḥ ca uttarabhūyastvāt . aicoḥ ca uttarabhūyastvāt avarṇaḥ na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1445: bhūyasī mātrā ivarṇovarṇayoḥ alpīyasī avarṇasya . bhūyasaḥ eva grahaṇāni
GS24pmbhasuu:1446: bhaviṣyanti . tat yathā brāhmaṇagrāmaḥ ānīyatām iti ucyate tatra ca avarataḥ pañcakārukī bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1447_0: (P_1,1.49.1) KA_I,118.6-7 Ro_I,360 kim idam sthāneyogā iti . sthāne yogaḥ asyāḥ sā iyam sthāneyogā . saptamyalopaḥ nipātanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1447_1: . tṛtiyāyā vā etvam : sthānena yogaḥ asyāḥ sā iyam sthāneyogā .
GS24pmbhasuu:1449_0: ucyate . ṣaṣṭhyāḥ sthāneyogavacanam niyamārtham . niyamāṛthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . ekaśatam ṣaṣṭhyarthāḥ yāvantaḥ vā te sarve
GS24pmbhasuu:1449_1: ṣaṣṭhyām uccāritāyām prāpnuvanti . iṣyate ca vyākaraṇe yā ṣaṣṭhī sā sthāneyogā eva syāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1450_0: tat ca antareṇa yatnam na sidhyati iti ṣaṣṭhyāḥ sthāneyogavacanam niyamārtham . evamartham idam ucyate . asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:1450_1: etat . kim tarhi iti . avayavaṣaṣṭhyādiṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ śāsaḥ gohaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1451: avayavaṣaṣṭhyādayaḥ tu na sidhyanti . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . śāsaḥ it aṅhaloḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1452: iti śāseḥ ca antyasya syāt upadhāmātrasya ca . ūt upadhāyāḥ gohaḥ iti gohaḥ ca antyasya syāt upadhāmātrasya ca . avayavaṣaṣṭhyādīnām ca aprāptiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1453_0: yogasya asandigdhatvāt . avayavaṣaṣṭhyādīnām ca niyamasya aprāptiḥ . kim kāraṇam . yogasya asandigdhatvāt . sandehe niyamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1453_1: na ca avayavaṣaṣṭhyādiṣu sandehaḥ . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate. laukikaḥ ayam dṛṣṭāṇtaḥ . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:1453_2: yathā loke : kam cit kaḥ cit pṛcchati : grāmāntaram gamiṣyāmi panthānam me bhavān upadiśatu iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1454_0: . saḥ tasmai ācaṣṭe . amuṣmin avakāśe hastadakṣiṇaḥ grahītavyaḥ amuṣmin avakāśe hastavāmaḥ iti . yaḥ tu atra tiryakpathaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1454_1: bhavati na tasmin sandehaḥ iti kṛtvā na asau upadiśyate . evam iha api sandehe niyamaḥ na ca avayavaṣaṣṭhyādiṣu sandehaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1454_2: . atha vā sthāne ayogā sthāneyogā kim idam ayogā iti . avyaktayogā ayogā . atha vā yogavatī yogā . kā punaḥ yogavatī
GS24pmbhasuu:1455_0: . yasyāḥ bahavaḥ yogāḥ . kutaḥ etat . bhūmni hi matup bhavati . viśiṣṭā vā ṣaṣṭhī sthāneyogā . atha vā kim cid liṅgam āsajya
GS24pmbhasuu:1455_1: vakṣyāmi : itthaṃliṅgā ṣaṣṭhī sthāneyogā bhavati iti . na tat liṅgam avayavaṣaṣṭhyādiṣu kariṣyate . yadi evam śāsaḥ it aṅhaloḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1455_2: śā hau śāsigrahaṇam kartavyam sthāneyogārtham liṅgam āsaṅkṣyāmi iti . na kartavyam . yat eva adaḥ purastāt avayavaṣaṣṭhyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:1455_3: prakṛtam etat uttaratra anuvṛttam sat sthāneyogārtham bhaviṣyati . katham . adhikāraḥ nāma triprakāraḥ . kaḥ cit ekadeśasthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1456_0: sarvam śāstram abhijvalayati yathā pradīpaḥ supravijvalitaḥ sarvam veśma abhijvalayati . aparaḥ adhikāraḥ yathā rajjvā ayasā
GS24pmbhasuu:1456_1: vā baddham kāṣṭham anukṛṣyate tadvat anukṛṣyate cakāreṇa . aparaḥ adhikāraḥ pratiyogam tasya anirdeśārthaḥ iti yoge yoge
GS24pmbhasuu:1456_2: upatiṣṭhate . tat yadā eṣaḥ pakṣaḥ adhikāraḥ pratiyogam tasya anirdeśārthaḥ iti tadā hi yat eva adaḥ purastāt avayavaṣaṣṭhyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:1456_3: prakaṛtam etat uttaratra anuvṛttam sat sthāneyogārtham bhaviṣyati . sampratyayamātram etat bhavati . na hi anuccārya śabdam
GS24pmbhasuu:1456_4: liṅgam śakyam āsaṅktum . evam tarhi ādeśe tat liṅgam kariṣyate tat prakṛtim āskantsyati . yadi niyamaḥ kriyate yatra ekā
GS24pmbhasuu:1456_5: ṣaṣṭhī anekam ca viśeṣyam tatra na sidhyati : aṅgasya , halaḥ , aṇaḥ , samprasāraṇasya iti . hal api viśeṣyaḥ aṇ api viśeṣyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1456_6: samprasāraṇam api viśeṣyam . asati punaḥ niyame kāmacāraḥ ekayā ṣaṣthyā anekam viśeṣayitum . tat yathā .
GS24pmbhasuu:1457_0: devadattasya putraḥ pāṇiḥ kambalaḥ iti . tasmāt na arthaḥ niyamena . nanu ca uktam ekaśatam ṣaṣṭhyarthāḥ yāvantaḥ vā te sarve
GS24pmbhasuu:1457_1: ṣaṣṭhyām uccāritāyām prāpnuvanti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yadi api loke bahavaḥ abhisambandhāḥ ārthāḥ yaunāḥ maukhāḥ srauvāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1457_2: ca śabdasya tu śabdena kaḥ anyaḥ abhisambandhaḥ bhavitum arhati anyat ataḥ sthānāt . śabdasya api śabdena
GS24pmbhasuu:1458: anantarādayaḥ abhisambandhāḥ . asteḥ bhūḥ bhavati iti sandehaḥ : sthāne anantare samīpe iti . sandehamātram etat bhavati . sarvasandeheṣu ca idam
GS24pmbhasuu:1459: upatiṣṭhate : vyākhyānataḥ viśeṣapratipattiḥ na hi sandehāt alakṣaṇam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1460: . sthāne iti vyākhyāsyāmaḥ . na tarhi idānīm ayam yogaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1461_0: vaktavyaḥ ca . kim prayojanam . ṣaṣṭhyantam sthānena yathā yujyeta yataḥ ṣaṣṭhī uccāritā . kim kṛtam bhavati . nirdiśyamānasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1461_1: ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti eṣā paribhāṣā na kartavyā bhavati (P_1,1.50.1) KA_I,120.2-13 Ro_I,364-366 kim udāharaṇam . ikaḥ yaṇ aci
GS24pmbhasuu:1462: : dadhi atra madhu atra : tālusthānasya tālusthānaḥ oṣṭhasthānasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1463: oṣṭhasthānaḥ yathā syāt . na etat asti . saṅkhyātānudeśena api etat
GS24pmbhasuu:1464: siddham . idam tarhi : tasthasthamipām tāmtamtāmaḥ iti ekārthasya ekārthaḥ dvyarthasya dvyarthaḥ bahvarthasya bahuvarthaḥ yathā syāt . nanu ca etat
GS24pmbhasuu:1465: api saṅkhyātānudeśena eva siddham . idam tarhi : akaḥ savarṇe dīrghaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1466: : daṇḍāgram , kṣupāgram , dadhi indraḥ , madhu uṣṭraḥ iti :
GS24pmbhasuu:1467_0: kaṇṭhasthānayoḥ kaṇṭhasthānaḥ tālusthānayoḥ tālusthānaḥ oṣṭhasthānayoḥ oṣṭhasthānaḥ yathā syāt iti . atha sthāne iti vartamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:1467_1: punaḥ sthānagrahaṇam kimartham . yatra anekavidham āntaryam tatra sthānataḥ eva
GS24pmbhasuu:1468_0: āntaryam balīyaḥ yathā syāt . kim punaḥ tat . cetā stotā : pramāṇataḥ akāraḥ guṇaḥ prāpnoti sthānataḥ ekāraukārau . punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1468_1: sthānagrahaṇāt ekāraukārau bhavataḥ . atha tamabgrahaṇam kimartham . jhayaḥ haḥ anyatarasyām iti atra soṣmaṇaḥ soṣmāṇaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1469: nādavantaḥ iti tṛtīyāḥ . tamapgrahaṇena soṣmāṇaḥ nādavantaḥ ca te bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:1470: caturthāḥ : vāg ghasati triṣṭub bhasati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1472: ucyate . sthāninaḥ ekatvanirdeśāt anekādeśanirdeśāt ca sarvaprasaṅgaḥ tasmāt sthānentaratamavacanam . sthānī ekatvena nirdiśyate : akaḥ iti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1473_0: anekaḥ ca punaḥ ādeśaḥ pratinirdiśyate : dīrghaḥ iti . sthāninaḥ ekatvanirdeśāt anekādeśanirdeśāt ca sarvaprasaṅgaḥ . sarve
GS24pmbhasuu:1473_1: sarvatra prāpnuvanti . iṣyate ca antaratamāḥ eva syuḥ iti . tat ca antareṇa yatnam na sidhyati . tasmāt sthāne antaratamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1474_0: evamartham idam ucyate . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . yathā punaḥ iyam antaratamanirvṛtttiḥ sā kim prakṛtitaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:1474_1: : sthānini antaratame ṣaṣṭhī , āhosvit ādeśataḥ : sthāne prāpyamāṇānām antaratamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1475: ādeśaḥ bhavati iti . kutaḥ punaḥ iyam vicāraṇā . ubhayathā api tulyā
GS24pmbhasuu:1476_0: saṃhitā : sthānentaratama , uraṇ raparaḥ iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi prakṛtitaḥ : ikaḥ yaṇ aci : yaṇām ye antaratamāḥ ikaḥ tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:1476_1: ṣaṣṭhī , yatra ṣaṣṭhī tatra ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti iha eva syāt : dadhi atra madhu atra .
GS24pmbhasuu:1477_0: kumārī atra brahmabandhvartham iti atra na syāt . ādeśataḥ punaḥ antaratamanirvṛttau satyām sarvatra ṣaṣṭhī , yatra ṣaṣṭhī
GS24pmbhasuu:1477_1: tatra ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti sarvatra siddham bhavati . tathā ikaḥ guṇavṛddhī :
GS24pmbhasuu:1478_0: guṇavṛddhyoḥ ye antaratamāḥ ikaḥ tatra ṣaṣṭhī , yatra ṣaṣṭhī tatra ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti iha eva syāt : netā lavitā nāyakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1478_1: lāvakaḥ . cetā stotā cāyakaḥ stāvakaḥ iti atra na syāt . ādeśataḥ punaḥ antaratamanirvṛttau
GS24pmbhasuu:1479_0: satyām sarvatra ṣaṣṭhī , yatra ṣaṣṭhī tatra ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti sarvatra siddham bhavati . tathā ṛvarṇasya guṇavṛddhiprasaṅge
GS24pmbhasuu:1479_1: guṇavṛddhyoḥ yat antaratamam ṛvarṇam tatra ṣaṣṭhī , yatra ṣaṣṭhī tatra ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1480: iha eva syāt : kartā hartā , āstārakaḥ , nipārakaḥ . āstaritā niparitā kārakaḥ , hārakaḥ iti atra na syāt . ādeśataḥ punaḥ antaratamanirvṛttau
GS24pmbhasuu:1481: satyām sarvatra ṣaṣṭhī , yatra ṣaṣṭhī tatra ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti sarvatra siddham bhavati . atha ādeśataḥ antaratamanirvṛttau satyām ayam doṣaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1482: vāntaḥ yi pratyaye : sthāninirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . okāraukārayoḥ iti vaktavyam ekāraikārayoḥ mā bhūt iti . prakṛtitaḥ punaḥ antaratamanirvṛttau
GS24pmbhasuu:1483: satyām vāntādeśasya yā antaratamā prakṛtiḥ tatra ṣaṣṭhī , yatra ṣaṣṭhī tatra ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti antareṇa sthāninirdeśam siddham bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1484: ādeśataḥ api antaratamanirvṛttau satyām na doṣaḥ . katham . vāntagrahaṇam na kariṣyate . yi pratyaye ecaḥ ayādayaḥ bhavanti iti eva. yadi na kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:1485: ceyam , jeyam iti atra api prāpnoti . kṣayyajayyau śakyārthe iti etat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati : kṣijyoḥ eva ecaḥ iti . tayoḥ tarhi śakyārthāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1486: anyatra api prāpnoti : kṣeyam pāpam jeyaḥ vṛṣalaḥ iti . ubhayataḥ niyamaḥ vijñāsyate : kṣijyoḥ eva ecaḥ anayoḥ ca śakyāṛthe eva iti . iha api tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:1487: niyamāt na prāpnoti : lavyam , pavyam avaśyalāvyam avaśyapāvyam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1488: tulyajātīyasya niyamaḥ . kaḥ ca tulyajātīyaḥ . yathājātīyakaḥ kṣijyoḥ ec .
GS24pmbhasuu:1489: kathañjātīyakaḥ kṣijyoḥ ec . ekāraḥ . evam api rāyam icchati raiyati atra
GS24pmbhasuu:1490: api prāpnoti . rāyiḥ chāndasaḥ . dṛṣṭānuvidhiḥ chandasi bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1491_0: ūdupadhayāḥ gohaḥ : ādeśataḥ antaratamanirvṛttau satyām upadhāgrahaṇam kartavyam . prakṛtitaḥ punaḥ antaratamanirvṛttau satyām
GS24pmbhasuu:1491_1: ūkārasya gohaḥ yā antaratamā prakṛtiḥ tatra ṣaṣṭhī , yatra ṣaṣṭhī tatra ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1492: antareṇa upadhāgrahaṇam siddham bhavati . ādeśataḥ api antaratamanirvṛttau
GS24pmbhasuu:1493: satyām na doṣaḥ . kriyate etat nyāse eva . radābhyām niṣṭhātaḥ naḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1494_0: pūrvasya ca daḥ : ādeśataḥ antaratamanirvṛttau satyām takāragrahaṇam kartavyam . prakṛtitaḥ punaḥ antaratamanirvṛttau satyām
GS24pmbhasuu:1494_1: nakārasya niṣṭhāyām yā antaratamā prakṛtiḥ tatra ṣaṣṭhī , yatra ṣaṣṭhī tatra ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti antareṇa takāragrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:1494_2: siddham bhavati . ādeśataḥ api antaratamanirvṛttau satyām na doṣaḥ . kriyate etat nyāse eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:1495: (P_1,1.50.3) KA_I,122.1-20 Ro_I,370-372 kim punaḥ idam nirvartakam :
GS24pmbhasuu:1496_0: antaratamāḥ anena nirvartyante , āhosvit pratipādakam : anyena nirvṛttānām anena pratipattiḥ . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . sthāne
GS24pmbhasuu:1496_1: antaratamanirvatake sthāninivṛttiḥ . sthāne antaratamanirvatake sarvasthāninām nivṛttiḥ prāpnoti . asya api prāpnoti : dadhi
GS24pmbhasuu:1496_2: madhu . astu . na kaḥ cit anyaḥ ādeśaḥ pratinirdiśyate . tatra āntaryataḥ dadhiśabdasya dadhiśabdaḥ eva madhuśabdasya madhuśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1496_3: eva ādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . yadi ca evam kva cit vairūpyam tatra doṣaḥ syāt : bisam bisam , musalam musalam . iṇkoḥ iti ṣatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:1496_4: prāpnoti . api ca iṣṭā vyavasthā na prakalpeta . tat yathā tapte
GS24pmbhasuu:1497_0: bhrāṣṭre tilāḥ kṣiptāḥ muhūrtam api na avatiṣṭhante evam ime varṇāḥ muhūrtam api na avatiṣṭheran . astu tarhi pratipādakam
GS24pmbhasuu:1497_1: : anyena nirvṛttānām anena pratipattiḥ . nirvṛttapratipattau nirvṛttiḥ nirvṛttapratipattau nirvṛttiḥ na sidhyati . sarve
GS24pmbhasuu:1498_0: kim tarhi ucyate nirvṛttiḥ na sidhyati iti . na sādhīyaḥ nirvṛttiḥ siddhā bhavati . na brūmaḥ nirvṛttiḥ na sidhyati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1498_1: kim tarhi . iṣṭā vyavasthā na prakalpeta . na sarve sarvatra iṣyante . idam idānīm kimartham syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:1499_0: anarthakam ca . anarthakam etat syāt . yaḥ hi bhuktavantam brūyāt mā bhukthāḥ iti kim tena kṛtam syāt . uktam vā . kim uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:1499_1: . siddham tu ṣaṣṭhyadhikāre vacanāt iti . ṣaṣṭhyadhikāre ayam yogaḥ kartvyaḥ : sthāne antaratamaḥ ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭasya .
GS24pmbhasuu:1501: pratyātmam iti ca vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . yaḥ yasya antaratamaḥ sa tasya sthāne yathā syāt anyasya antaratamaḥ anyasya sthāne mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1503: kim kāraṇam . svabhāvasiddhatvāt . svabhāvataḥ etat siddham . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:1504: samājeṣu samāśeṣu samavāyeṣu ca āsyatām iti ucyate . na ca ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:1505: pratyātmam iti pratyātmam ca āsate . antaratamavacanam ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:1506: antaratamavacanam ca aśiṣyam . yogaḥ ca api ayam aśiṣyaḥ . kutaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1507: svabhāvasiddhatvāt eva . tat yathā : samājeṣu samāśeṣu samavāyeṣu ca āsyatām iti ukte na eva kṛśāḥ kṛśaiḥ saha āsata na pāṇḍavaḥ pāṇḍubhiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1508_0: yeṣām eva kim cit arthakṛtam āntaryam taiḥ eva saḥ āsate . tathā gāvaḥ divasam caritavatyaḥ yaḥ yasyāḥ prasavaḥ bhavati tena
GS24pmbhasuu:1508_1: saha śerate . tathā yāni etāni goyuktakāni saṅghuṣṭakāni bhavanti tāni anyonyam paśyanti
GS24pmbhasuu:1509_0: sabdam kurvanti . evam tāvat cetanāvatsu . acetaneṣu api . loṣṭaḥ kṣiptaḥ bāhuvegam gatvā na eva tiryak gacchati na ūrdhvam
GS24pmbhasuu:1509_1: ārohati pṛthivīvikāraḥ pṛthivīm gacchati āntaryataḥ . tathā yā etāḥ āntarikṣyaḥ sūkṣmāḥ āpaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1510: tāsām vikāraḥ dhūmaḥ saḥ ākāśadeśe nivāte na eva tiryak gacchati na avāk avarohati abvikāraḥ apaḥ eva gacchati āntaryataḥ . tathā jyotiṣaḥ vikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1511: arciḥ ākāśadeśe nivāte suprajvalitaḥ na eva tiryak gacchati na avāk avarohati jyotiṣaḥ vikāraḥ jyotiḥ eva gacchati āntaryataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1512_0: (P_1,1.50.5) KA_I,123.17-125.15 Ro_I, 373-377 vyañjanasvaravyatikrame ca tatkālaprasaṅgaḥ . vyañjanavyatikrame svaravyatikrame
GS24pmbhasuu:1512_1: ca tatkālatā prāpnoti . vyañjanavyatikrame : iṣṭam uptam . āntaryataḥ ardhamātrikasya vyañjanasya ardhamātrikaḥ ik prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:1512_2: . na eva loke na ca vede
GS24pmbhasuu:1513: ardhamātrikaḥ ik asti . kaḥ tarhi . mātrikaḥ . yaḥ asti saḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1514_0: svaravyatikrame : dadhi atra madhu atra kumārī atra brahmabandhvartham iti . āntaryataḥ mātrikasya dvimātrikasya ikaḥ mātrikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1514_1: dvimātrikaḥ vā yaṇ prāpnoti . na eva loke na ca vede mātrikaḥ dvimātrikaḥ vā yaṇ asti .kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1515: tarhi . ardhamātrikaḥ . yaḥ asti saḥ bhaviṣyati . akṣu ca anekavarṇādeśeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:1516_0: . akṣu ca anekavarṇādeśeṣu tatkālatā prāpnoti . idamaḥ iś : āntaryataḥ ardhtṛtīyamātrasya idamaḥ sthāne ardhtṛtīyamātram
GS24pmbhasuu:1516_1: ivarṇam prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . bhāvyamānena savarṇānām grahaṇam na iti evam na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1517: guṇavṛddhyejbhāveṣu ca . guṇavṛddhyejbhāveṣu ca tatkālatā prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:1518: khaṭvā indraḥ khaṭvendraḥ khaṭvā udakam khaṭvodakam khaṭvā īṣā khaṭveṣā khaṭvā ūḍhā khaṭvoḍhā khaṭvā elakā khaṭvailakā khaṭvā odanaḥ khaṭvaudanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1519: , khaṭvā aitikayanaḥ khaṭvaitikāyanaḥ , khaṭvā aupagavaḥ khaṭvaupagavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1520_0: iti . āntaryataḥ trimātrcaturmātrāṇām sthāninām trimātracaturmātrāḥ ādeśāḥ prāpnuvanti . na eṣaḥ doṣāḥ . tapare guṇavṛddhī
GS24pmbhasuu:1520_1: . nanu ca taḥ paraḥ yasmāt saḥ ayam taparaḥ . na iti āha . tāt api paraḥ taparaḥ . yadi tāt api paraḥ taparaḥ ṝdoḥ ap iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1520_2: iha eva syāt : yavaḥ , stavaḥ . lavaḥ , pavaḥ iti atra
GS24pmbhasuu:1521: na syāt . na eṣaḥ takāraḥ . kaḥ tarhi . dakāraḥ . kim dakāre prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1522: atha kim takāre prayojanam . yadi asandehārthaḥ takāraḥ dakāraḥ api . atha mukhasukhārthaḥ takāraḥ dakāraḥ api . ejbhāve : kurvāte kurvāthe .
GS24pmbhasuu:1523: āntaryataḥ ardhatṛtīyamātrasya ṭisañjñakasya ardhatṛtīyamātraḥ eḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:1524_0: . na eva loke na ca vede ardhatṛtīyamātraḥ eḥ asti . ṛvarṇasya guṇavṛddhiprasaṅge sarvaprasaṅgaḥ aviśeṣāt . ṛvarṇasya guṇavṛddhiprasaṅge
GS24pmbhasuu:1524_1: sarvaprasaṅgaḥ . sarve guṇavṛddhisañjñakāḥ ṛvarṇasya sthāne prāpnuvanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1525_0: kim kāraṇam . aviśeṣāt . na hi kaḥ cit viśeṣaḥ upādīyate evañjātīyakaḥ guṇavṛddhisañjñakaḥ ṛvarṇasya sthāne bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1525_1: anupādīyamāne viśeṣe sarvaprasaṅgaḥ . na vā ṛvarṇasya sthāne raparaprasaṅgāt avarṇasya āntaryam
GS24pmbhasuu:1526_0: . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . ṛvarṇasya sthāne raparaprasaṅgāt . uḥ sthāne aṇ prasajyamānaḥ eva raparaḥ bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1526_1: ucyate . tatra ṛvarṇasya āntaryataḥ rephavataḥ rephavān akāraḥ eva antaratamaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1527_0: sarvādeśaprasaṅgaḥ tu anekāltvāt . sarvādeśaprasaṅgaḥ tu guṇavṛddhisañjñakaḥ ṛvarṇasya prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . anekāltvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1527_1: . anekāl śit sarvasya iti . na vā anekāltvasya tadāśrayatvāt ṛvarṇādeśasya avighātaḥ . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . anekāltvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1528: yadā ayam uḥ sthāne tadā anekāl . anekāltvasya tadāśrayatvāt ṛvarṇādeśasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1529: vighātaḥ na bhaviṣyati . athavā anāntaryam eva etayoḥ āntaryam . ekasya api antaratamā prakṛtiḥ na asti aparasya api antaratamaḥ ādeśaḥ na asti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1530: etat eva etayoḥ āntaryam . samprayogaḥ vā naṣṭāśvadagdharathavat . atha vā naṣṭāśvadagdharathavat samprayogaḥ bhavati . tat yathā : tava aśvaḥ naṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1531_0: mama api rathaḥ dagdhaḥ . ubhau samprayujyāvahai iti . evam iha api : tava api antaratamā prakṛtiḥ na asti mama api antaratamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1531_1: ādeśaḥ na asti . astu nau samprayogaḥ iti . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . cetanāvatsu arthāt prakaraṇāt vā loke samprayogaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:1531_2: . varṇāḥ ca punaḥ acetanāḥ . tatra kiṅkṛtaḥ samprayogaḥ . yadi api varṇāḥ acetanāḥ yaḥ tu asau prayuṅkte saḥ cetanāvān
GS24pmbhasuu:1532: . ejavarṇayoḥ ādeśe avarṇam sthāninaḥ avarṇapradhānatvāt . ejavarṇayoḥ ādeśe avarṇam prāpnoti :khaṭvā elakā , mālā aupagavaḥ . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1533_0: sthāninaḥ avarṇapradhānatvāt . sthānī hi atra avarṇapradhānaḥ . siddham tu ubhayāntaryāt . siddham etat . katham . ubhayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1533_1: yaḥ antaratamaḥ tena bhavitavyam . na ca avarṇam ubhayoḥ antaratamam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1534_0: (P_1,1.51.1) KA_I,125.17-126.19 Ro_I,378-381 kim idam uraṇraparavacanam anyanivṛttyartham : uḥ sthāne aṇ eva bhavati raparaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1534_1: ca iti , āhosvit raparatvam anena vidhīyate : uḥ sthāne aṇ ca anaṇ ca aṇ tu raparaḥ eva . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . uraṇraparavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:1534_2: anyanivṛttyartham cet udāttādiṣu doṣaḥ . uraṇraparavacanam anyanivṛttyartham cet udāttādiṣu doṣaḥ bhavati . ke punaḥ udāttādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1535: kṛtiḥ , hṛtiḥ , kṛtam , hṛtam , prakṛtam , prahṛtam nṝṃḥ pāhi . astu tarhi uḥ sthāne aṇ ca anaṇ ca aṇ tu raparaḥ iti . yaḥ uḥ sthāne saḥ raparaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1536: cet guṇavṛddhyoḥ avarṇāpratipattiḥ . yaḥ uḥ sthāne saḥ raparaḥ iti cet guṇavṛddhyoḥ avarṇāpratipattiḥ . kartā hartā vārṣagaṇyaḥ . kim hi sādhīyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1537: ṛvarṇasya asavarṇe yat avarṇam syāt na punaḥ eṅaicau . pūrvasmin api pakṣe
GS24pmbhasuu:1538: eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim hi sādhīyaḥ tatra api ṛvarṇasya asavarṇe yat avarṇam syāt na punaḥ ivarṇovarṇau . atha matam etat uḥ sthāne aṇaḥ ca anaṇaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:1539_0: prasaṅge aṇ eva bhavati raparaḥ ca iti siddhā pūrvasmin pakṣe avarṇasya pratipattiḥ . yat tu tat uktam udāttādiṣu doṣaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:1539_1: iti iha saḥ doṣaḥ jāyate . na jāyate . jāyate saḥ doṣaḥ . katham . udāttaḥ iti anena aṇaḥ api pratinirdiśyante anaṇaḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:1539_2: . yadi api pratinirdiśyante na tu prāpnuvanti . kim kāraṇam . sthāne antaratamaḥ bhavati . kutaḥ nu khalu
GS24pmbhasuu:1540_0: dvayoḥ paribhāṣayoḥ sāvakāśayoḥ samavasthitayoḥ sthāne antaratamaḥ uḥ aṇ raparaḥ iti ca sthāne antaratamaḥ iti anayā paribhāṣayā
GS24pmbhasuu:1540_1: vyavasthā bhaviṣyati na punaḥ uḥ aṇ raparaḥ iti . ataḥ kim . ataḥ eṣaḥ doṣaḥ jāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:1541: : udāttādiṣu doṣaḥ iti . ye ca api ete ṛvarṇasya sthāne pratipadam ādeśāḥ ucyante teṣu raparatvam na prāpnoti : ṝtaḥ it dhātoḥ ut oṣṭhyapūrvasya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1542_0: . siddham tu prasaṅge raparatvāt . siddham etat . katham . prasaṅge raparatvāt . uḥ sthāne aṇ prasajyamānaḥ eva raparaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:1542_1: iti . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . sthāne iti vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:1543: sthānaśabdaḥ ca prasaṅgavācī . yadi evam ādeśaḥ aviśeṣitaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1544: ādeśaḥ ca viśeṣitaḥ . katham . dvitīyam sthānagrahaṇam prakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:1545: anuvartate. tatra evam abhisambandhaḥ kariṣyate : uḥ sthāne aṇ sthāne iti . uḥ prasaṅge aṇ prasajyamānaḥ eva raparaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1546_0: (P_1,1.51.2) KA_I,126.20-127.3 Ro_I,382 atha aṇgrahaṇam kimartham na uḥ raparaḥ iti eva ucyeta . uḥ raparaḥ iti iyati ucyamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:1546_1: kaḥ idānīm raparaḥ syāt . yaḥ uḥ sthāne bhavati . kaḥ ca uḥ sthāne bhavati . ādeśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1547: ādeśaḥ raparaḥ iti cet rīrividhiṣu raparapratiṣedhaḥ . ādeśaḥ raparaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1548: cet rīrividhiṣu raparatvasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . ke punaḥ rīrividhayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1550: . ānaṅ : hotāpotārau . anaṅ : kartā hartā . rīṅ : mātrīyati pitrīyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1551: riṅ : kriyate hriyate . udāttādiṣu ca . kim . raparatvasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kṛtiḥ , hṛtiḥ , kṛtam , hṛtam , prakṛtam , prahṛtam nṝṃḥ pāhi
GS24pmbhasuu:1554_0: ekādeśasya upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam : khaṭvarśyaḥ , mālarśyaḥ . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . uḥ sthāne aṇ prasajyamānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1554_1: eva raparaḥ bhavati iti ucyate na ca ayam uḥ eva sthāne aṇ śiṣyate . kim tarhi . uḥ ca anyasya ca
GS24pmbhasuu:1555: . avayavagrahaṇāt siddham . yat atra ṛvarṇam tadāśrayam raparatvam bhaviṣyati . tat yathā māṣāḥ na bhoktavyāḥ iti miśrāḥ api na bhujyante .
GS24pmbhasuu:1556_0: avayavagrahaṇāt siddham iti cet ādeśe rāntapratiṣedhaḥ . avyayavagrahaṇāt siddham iti cet ādeśe rāntasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1556_1: : hotāpotārau . yathā eva uḥ ca anyasya ca sthāne aṇ raparaḥ bhavati evam yaḥ uḥ sthāne aṇ ca anaṇ ca saḥ api raparaḥ syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1556_2: . yadi punaḥ ṛvarṇāntasya sthāninaḥ raparatvam ucyeta : khaṭvarśyaḥ , mālarśyaḥ . na evam śakyam . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt : kartā
GS24pmbhasuu:1556_3: hartā kirati girati . ṛvarṇāntasya iti ucyate . na ca etat ṛvarṇāntam . nanu ca etat api vyapadeśivadbhāvena ṛvarṇāntam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1557: arthavatā vyapadeśivadbhāvaḥ na ca eṣaḥ arthavān . tasmāt na evam śakyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1558: na cet evam upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . iha ca raparatvapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1559_0: vaktavyaḥ : mātuḥ , pituḥ iti . ubhayam na vaktavyam . katham . iha yaḥ dvayoḥ ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭayoḥ prasaṅge bhavati labhate
GS24pmbhasuu:1559_1: asau anyatarataḥ vyapadeśam . tat yathā devadattasya putraḥ , devadattāyāḥ putraḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1560: katham mātuḥ pituḥ iti . astu atra raparatvam . kā rūpasiddiḥ . rāt sasya iti sakārasya lopaḥ rephasya visarjanīyaḥ . na evam śakyam . iha hi mātuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1561: karoti , pituḥ karoti iti apratyayavisarjanīyasya iti ṣatvam prasajyeta .
GS24pmbhasuu:1562: apratyayasvisarjanīyasya iti ucyate . pratyayavisarjanīyaḥ ca ayam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1563: lupyate atra pratyayaḥ rāt sasya iti . evam tarhi bhrātuṣputragrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:1564: jñāpakam ekādeśanimittāt ṣatvapratiṣedhasya . yat ayam kaskādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:1565: bhrātuṣputraśabdam paṭhati tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na ekādeśanimitttāt ṣatvam bhavati iti.
GS24pmbhasuu:1566_0: (P_1,1.51.4) KA_I,127.25-130.2 Ro_I,385-391 kim punaḥ ayam pūrvāntaḥ āhosvit parādiḥ āhosvit abhaktaḥ . katham ca ayam pūrvāntaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1566_1: syāt katham vā parādiḥ katham vā abhaktaḥ . yadi antaḥ iti vartate tataḥ pūrvāntaḥ . atha ādiḥ iti vartate tataḥ parādiḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:2335: bhavati iti . sañjñākaraṇe kṅidgrahaṇe asampratyayaḥ śabdabhedāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:2336: sañjñākaraṇe kṅidgrahaṇe asampratyayaḥ syāt . kim kāraṇam . śabdabhedāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:2337: anyaḥ hi śabdaḥ kṅiti iti anyaḥ kiti iti ṅiti iti ca . tathā kidgrahaṇeṣu ṅidgrahaṇeṣu ca anayoḥ eva sampratyayaḥ syāt . tadvadatideśaḥ tarhi ayam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2338: gāṅkuṭādibhyaḥ añṇit ṅidvat bhavati iti . asaṃyogāt liṭ kidvat bhavati iti . saḥ tarhi vatinirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na hi antareṇa vatim atideśaḥ gamyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2339: . antareṇa api vatim atideśaḥ gamyate . tat yathā : eṣaḥ brahmadattaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2340: abrahmadattam brahmadattaḥ iti āha . te manyāmahe brahmadattavat ayam bhavati iti . evam iha api aṅitam ṅit iti āha . ṅidvat iti gamyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:2341: akitam kit iti āha . kidvat iti gamyate . tadvadatideśe akidvidhiprasaṅgaḥ . tadvadatideśe akidvidhiḥ api prāpnoti . sṛjidṛśoḥ jhali am akiti :
GS24pmbhasuu:2342: sisṛkṣati didṛkṣate : akillakṣaṇaḥ amāgamaḥ prāpnoti . siddham tu prasajyapratiṣedhāt . siddham etat . katham . prasajya ayam pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2343_0: kriyate : kiti na iti . sarvatra sanantāt ātmanepadapratiṣedhaḥ . sarveṣu pakṣeṣu sanantāt ātmanepadam prāpnoti . uccukuṭiṣati
GS24pmbhasuu:2343_1: nicukuṭiṣati : ṅiti iti ātmanepadam prāpnoti . tasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . siddham tu pūrvasya kāryātideśāt . siddham etat
GS24pmbhasuu:2343_2: . katham . pūrvasya yat kāryam tat atidiśyate . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate .

GS24pmbhasuu:2345: pāṭaliputre iva pāṭaliputravat evam ṅiti iva ṅidvat .

GS24pmbhasuu:2348: pṛthaganubandhatve prayojanam vacisvapiyajādīnām asamprasāraṇam sārvadhātuke caṅādiṣu ca. sārvadhātuke prayojanam : yathā iha bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2349: suptaḥ , suptavān iti evam svapitaḥ , svapithaḥ : atra api prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2350: caṅādiṣu prayojanam . ke punaḥ caṅādayaḥ . caṅaṅnajiṅṅvanibathaṅnaṅaḥ .

GS24pmbhasuu:2352: atra api prāpnoti . najiṅ : yathā iha bhavati suptaḥ iti evam svapnak :
GS24pmbhasuu:2353_0: atra api prāpnoti . ṅvanip : yathā iha bhavati iṣṭaḥ iti evam yajvā : atra api prāpnoti . athaṅ : yathā iha bhavati uṣitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2353_1: iti evam āvasathaḥ : atra api prāpnoti . naṅ : yathā iha bhavati iṣṭam evam yajñaḥ : atra api prāpnoti . jāgraḥ aguṇavidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2353_2: . jāgarteḥ aguṇavidhiḥ prayojanam . yathā iha bhavati jāgṛtaḥ , jāgṛthaḥ iti aṅiti iti paryudāsaḥ evam jāgaritaḥ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2354: jāgaritavān iti atra api prāpnoti . aparaḥ āha : jāgraḥ guṇavidhiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2355: jāgarteḥ guṇavidhiḥ prayojanam . yathā iha bhavati jāgaritaḥ , jāgaritavān evam jāgṛtaḥ jāgṛthaḥ iti atra api prāpnoti . kuṭādīnām iṭpratiṣedhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2356: kuṭādīnām iṭpratiṣedhaḥ prayojanam . yathā iha bhavati lūtvā pūtvā śryukaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2357: kiti iti iṭpratiṣedhaḥ evam nuvitā dhuvitā : atra api prāpnoti . ktvāyām kitpratiṣedhaḥ ca . ktvāyām kitpratiṣedhaḥ ca prayojanam . kim ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:2358: iṭpratiṣedhaḥ ca . na iti āha . adeśe ayam caḥ paṭhitaḥ . ktvāyām ca kitpratiṣedhaḥ iti . yathā iha bhavati devitvā sevitvā na ktvā seṭ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2359: pratiṣedhaḥ evam kuṭitvā puṭitvā : atra api prāpnoti . atha vā deśe eva ayam caḥ paṭhitaḥ . ktvāyām kitpratiṣedhaḥ ca iṭpratiṣedhaḥ ca .

GS24pmbhasuu:2377: (P_1,2.7) KA_I,195.4-12 Ro_II,15 kimartham mṛḍādibhyaḥ parasya ktvaḥ kittvam ucyate . kit eva hi ktvā . na ktvā seṭ iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:2378_0: tadbādhanārtham . yadi tarhi mṛḍādibhyaḥ parasya ktvaḥ kittvam ucyate na arthaḥ na ktvā seṭ iti anena kittvapratiṣedhena

GS24pmbhasuu:2378_2: api tarhi niyamān na prāpnoti : lūtvā pūtvā . atra api akittvam prāpnoti . tulyajātīyasya niyamaḥ . kaḥ ca tulyajātīyaḥ .

GS24pmbhasuu:2381_1: kittvam ucyate guṇaḥ mā bhūt iti : cicīṣati tuṣṭūṣati . na etat asti prayojanam . dīrghārambhāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:2382: dīrghatvam atra bādhakam bhaviṣyati . kṛte bhavet . kṛte khalu dīrghatve
GS24pmbhasuu:2383_0: guṇaḥ prāpnoti . anarthakam tu . anarthakam evam sati dīrghatvam syāt . na anarthakam . hrasvārtham . hrasvānām dīrghavacanasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2383_1: guṇaḥ na bhaviṣyati . bhavet hrasvānām dīrghavacanasāmarthyāt guṇaḥ na syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:2384_0: dīrghāṇām tu prasajyate . dīrghāṇām tu khalu guṇaḥ prāpnoti . nanu ca dīrghāṇām api dīrghavacanasāmarthyāt guṇaḥ na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:2384_1: . na dīrghāṇām dīrghāḥ prāpnuvanti . kim kāraṇam . na hi bhuktavān punaḥ bhuṅkte na ca kṛtaśmaśruḥ punaḥ śmaśrūni kārayati
GS24pmbhasuu:2384_2: . nanu ca punaḥ pravṛttiḥ api dṛṣṭā bhuktavān ca punaḥ bhuṅkte kṛtaśmaśruḥ ca punaḥ śmaśrūni kārayati .
GS24pmbhasuu:2385_0: sāmarthyāt hi punaḥ bhāvyam . sāmarthyāt tatra punaḥ pravṛttiḥ bhavati bhojanaviśeṣāt śilpiviśeṣāt vā . dīrghāṇām punaḥ dīrghatvavacane
GS24pmbhasuu:2385_1: na kim cit prayojanam asti . akṛtakāri khalu api śāstram agnivat . tat yathā agniḥ yad adagdham tat dahati . dīrghāṇām api
GS24pmbhasuu:2385_2: dīrghavacane etat prayojanam guṇaḥ mā bhūt iti . kṛtakāri khalu api śāstram parjanyavat . tat yathā parjanyaḥ yāvat ūnam
GS24pmbhasuu:2385_3: pūrṇam ca sarvam abhivarṣati . yathā eva tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:2386: dīrghavacanasāmarthyāt guṇaḥ na bhavati evam ṝdittvam api na prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:2387: cikīrṣati jihīrṣati iti. ṝdittvam dīrghasaṃśrayam . na akṛte dīrghe
GS24pmbhasuu:2388: ṝdittvam prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . ṝtaḥ iti ucyate . bhavet hrasvānām na
GS24pmbhasuu:2389_0: akṛte dīrghe ṝdittvam syāt dīrghāṇām tu khalu akṛte api dīrghatve ṝdittvam prāpnoti . dīrghāṇām na akṛte dīrghe . dīrghāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:2389_1: api na akṛte dīrghe ṝdittvam prāpnoti . yadā dīrghatvena guṇaḥ bādhitaḥ tataḥ uttarakālam
GS24pmbhasuu:2390_0: ṝdittvam bhavati . ṇilopaḥ tu prayojanam . idam tarhi prayojanam : ṇilopaḥ yathā syāt iti : jñīpsati . kva astāḥ kva nipatitāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2390_1: kva kittvam kva ṇilopaḥ . kaḥ vā abhisambandhaḥ yat sati kittve ṇilopaḥ syāt asati na syāt . eṣaḥ abhisambandhaḥ yat sati
GS24pmbhasuu:2390_2: kittve sāvakāśam dīrghatvam paratvāt ṇilopaḥ bādhate . asati punaḥ kittve anavakāśam dīrghatvam yathā eva guṇam bādhate evam
GS24pmbhasuu:2390_3: ṇilopam api bādheta . tatra ṇilopasya avakāśaḥ : kāraṇā hāraṇā . dīrghatvasya avakāśaḥ : cicīṣati tuṣṭūṣati . iha ubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:2391: : jñīpsati . paratvāt ṇilopaḥ . asati api kittve sāvakāśam dīrghatvam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2392_0: kaḥ avakāśaḥ . isbhāvaḥ . nimitsati pramitsati . mīnātiminotyoḥ dīrghatve kṛte mīgrahaṇena grahaṇam yathā syāt . yathā eva
GS24pmbhasuu:2392_1: tarhi asati kittve sāvakāśam dīrghatvam paratvāt ṇilopaḥ bādhate evam guṇaḥ api bādheta .
GS24pmbhasuu:2393: tasmāt kittvam vaktavyam . ikaḥ kittvam guṇaḥ mā bhūt dīrghārambhāt kṛte bhavet |

GS24pmbhasuu:2582_1: tatpuruṣaḥ iti . tat yaḥ tādarthyāt tācchabdyam tasya iha grahaṇam (P_1,2.43.1) KA_I,214.13-22 Ro_II,63-64 prathamānirdiṣṭam

GS24pmbhasuu:2583: .prathamānirdiṣṭam samāse upasajanam iti cet anirdeśāt prathamāyāḥ samāse sañjñāyāḥ aprasiddhiḥ . na hi kaṣṭādīnām samāse prathamām paśyāmaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2584_0: siddham tu samāsavidhāne vacanāt . siddham etat . katham . samāsavidhāne prathamānirdiṣṭam upasarjanasañjñam bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2584_1: vaktavyam . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vā tādarthyāt tācchabdyam . na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2585: tādarthyāt tācchabdyam bhavati. samāsārtham śāstram samāsaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2587_0: tataḥ anyatra api upasarjanasañjñāprasaṅgaḥ . yasya vidhau prathamānirdeśaḥ kriyate tataḥ anyatra api tasya upasarjanasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:2587_1: prāpnoti : rajñaḥ kumārīm rājakumārīm śritaḥ . śritādisamāse dvitīyāntam prathamānirdiṣṭam . tasya ṣaṣṭhīsamāse api upasarjanasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:2588: siddham tu yasya vidhau tam prati iti vacanāt . siddham etat . katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:2589_0: yasya vidhau yat prathamānirdiṣṭam tam prati tat upasarjanasañjñam bhavati iti vaktavyam . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2589_1: . upasarjanam iti mahatī sañjñā kriyate . sañjñā ca nāma yataḥ na laghīyaḥ . kutaḥ etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:2590: laghvartham hi sañjñākaraṇam . tatra mahatyāḥ sañjñāyāḥ karaṇe etat prayojanam anvarthasañjñā yathā vijñāyeta . apradhānam upasarjanam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2591: pradhānam upasarjanam iti ca sambandhiśabdau etau . tatra sambandhāt etat
GS24pmbhasuu:2592_0: gantavyam : yam prati yat apradhānam tam prati tat upasarjanasñjñam bhavati iti . atha yatra dve ṣaṣṭhyante kasmāt tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:2592_1: pradhānasya upasarjanasañjñā na bhavati : rājñaḥ puruṣasya rājapuruṣasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2593: ṣaṣṭhyantayoḥ upasarjanatve uktam . kim uktam . ṣaṣṭhyantayoḥ samāse arthābhedāt pradhānasya apūrvanipātaḥ iti . evam na ca idam akṛtam bhavet
GS24pmbhasuu:2594_0: upsarjanam pūrvam iti arthaḥ ca abhinnaḥ iti kṛtvā pradhānasya pūrvanipātaḥ na bhaviṣyati . yadi api tāvat etat upasarjanakāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:2594_1: parihṛtam idam aparam prāpnoti . rājñaḥ kumāryāḥ rājakumāryāḥ . gostriyoḥ upasarjanasya iti hrasvatvam prāpnoti . uktam vā
GS24pmbhasuu:2594_2: . kim uktam . paravat liṅgam iti śabdaśabdārthau iti . tatra aupadeśikasya hrasvatvam .

GS24pmbhasuu:2599: pūrvanipāte na iti . kim tarhi . paryudāsaḥ ayam : yat anyat pūrvanipātāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2600: iti . pūrvanipāte avyāpāraḥ . yadi kena cit prāpnoti tena bhaviṣyati .

GS24pmbhasuu:2604: śabdaśardārthau iti . tatra aupadeśikasya hrasvatvam . ātideśikasya śravaṇam bhaviṣyati .

GS24pmbhasuu:2618_1: nagaram iti akāraḥ matvarthīyaḥ : āḍhyāḥ asmin santi iti tat idam āḍhyam iti . gomat idam iti

GS24pmbhasuu:2620: vākyasya prātipadikasñjñāyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ : devadatta gām abhyāja
GS24pmbhasuu:2621: śuklām . devadatta gām abhyāja kṛṣṇām iti . kim kāraṇam . arthavattvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:2622_0: arthavat hi etat vākyam bhavati . na vai padārthāt anyasya arthasya upalabdhiḥ bhavati vākye . padārthāt anyasya anupalabdhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2622_1: iti cet padārthābhisambandhasya upalabdhiḥ . padārthāt anyasya anupalabdhiḥ iti cet evam ucyate : padārthābhisambandhasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2622_2: upalabdhiḥ bhavati vākye . iha devadatta iti ukte kartā nirdiṣṭaḥ karma kriyāguṇau ca anirdiṣṭau . gām iti ukte karma nirdiṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:2622_3: kartā kriyāguṇau ca anirdiṣṭau . abhyāja iti ukte
GS24pmbhasuu:2623_0: kriyā nirdiṣṭā kartṛkarmaṇī guṇaḥ ca anirdiṣṭaḥ . śuklām iti ukte guṇaḥ nirdiṣṭaḥ kartṛkarmaṇī kriyā ca anirdiṣṭā . iha idānīm
GS24pmbhasuu:2623_1: devadatta gām abhyāja śuklām iti ukte sarvam nirdiṣṭam bhavati : devadattaḥ eva kartā na anyaḥ . gauḥ eva karma na anyat
GS24pmbhasuu:2623_2: . abhyājiḥ eva kriyā na anyā . śuklām eva na kṛṣṇām iti . eteṣām padānām sāmānye vartamānānām yadviśeṣe avasthānam
GS24pmbhasuu:2624: saḥ vākyārthaḥ . tasmāt pratiṣedhaḥ . tasmāt pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . arthavatsamudāyānām samāsagrahaṇam niyamārtham .
GS24pmbhasuu:2625_0: arthavatsamudāyānām samāsagrahaṇam niyamārtham bhaviṣyati : samāsaḥ eva arthavatām samudāyāyānām prātipadikasañjñaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2625_1: na anyaḥ iti . yadi niyamaḥ kriyate prakṛtipratyayasamudāyasya prātipadikasañjñā na prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:2626_0: bahupaṭavaḥ , uccakaiḥ iti . kim punaḥ atra prātipadikasañjñayā prārthyate . prātipadikāt iti svādyutpattiḥ yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:2626_1: na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yathā eva atra aprātipadikatvāt svādyutpattiḥ na bhavati evam luk api na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:2627_0: . tatra yā eva antarvartinī vibhaktiḥ tasyāḥ eva śravaṇam bhaviṣyati . na evam śakyam . svare hi doṣaḥ syāt . bahupaṭavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2627_1: iti evam svaraḥ prasajyeta bahupaṭavaḥ iti ca iṣyate . paṭhiṣyati hi ācāryaḥ : citaḥ saprakṛteḥ bahvakajartham iti . tasyām
GS24pmbhasuu:2627_2: punaḥ luptāyam yā anyā vibhaktiḥ utpadyate tasyāḥ prakṛtyanekadeśatvāt antodāttatvam na bhaviṣyati . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2627_3: jñāpayati bhavati prakṛtipratyayasamudāyasya prātipadikasañjñā iti yat ayam aprayayaḥ iti pratiṣedham śāsti . saḥ ca tadantapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2627_4: . saḥ tarhi jñāpakārthaḥ pratyayapratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . nanu ca ayam prāptyarthaḥ api vaktavyaḥ . na arthaḥ prāptyarthena
GS24pmbhasuu:2628: kṛttaddhitagrahaṇam niyamārtham bhaviṣyati : kṛttaddhitāntasya eva pratyayāntasya prātipadikasañjñā bhaviṣyati na anyasya pratyayāntasya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2629_0: . saḥ eṣaḥ ananyārthaḥ pratyayapratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ prakṛtipratyayasamudāyasya vā prātipadikasañjñā vaktavyā . ubhayam na

GS24pmbhasuu:2637_1: . nityasambandhau etau arthau prakṛtiḥ pratyayaḥ iti . pratyayena nityasambandhāt kevalasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2638_0: aprayogaḥ na bhaviṣyati . anyat bhavān pṛṣṭaḥ anyat ācaṣṭe . āmrān pṛṣṭaḥ kovidārān ācaṣṭe . arthavattā na upapadyate kevalena
GS24pmbhasuu:2638_1: avacanāt iti bhavān asmābhiḥ coditaḥ kevalasya aprayoge hetum āha . evam ca kila nāma kṛtvā codyate : samudāyasya arthe prayogāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2638_2: avayavānām aprasiddhiḥ iti . siddham tu anvayavyatirekābhyām . siddham etat . katham . anvayāt vyatirekāt ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:2639: kaḥ asau anvayaḥ vyatirekaḥ vā . iha vṛkṣaḥ iti ukte kaḥ cit śabdaḥ śrūyate : vṛkṣaśabdaḥ akārāntaḥ sakārāntaḥ ca pratyayaḥ . arthaḥ api kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2640: cit gamyate : mūlaskandhaphalapalāśavān ekatvam ca . vṛkṣau iti ukte kaḥ cit śabdaḥ hīyate kaḥ cit upajāyate kaḥ cit anvayī : sakāraḥ hīyate ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2641_0: aukāraḥ upajāyate vṛkṣaśabdaḥ akārāntaḥ anvayī . arthaḥ api kaḥ cit hīyate kaḥ cit upajāyate kaḥ cit anvayī : ekatvam hīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2641_1: dvitvam upajāyate mūlaskandhaphalapalāśavān anvayī . te manyāmahe : yaḥ śabdaḥ hīyate tasya asau arthaḥ yaḥ arthaḥ hīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2641_2: . yaḥ śabdaḥ upajāyate tasya asau arthaḥ yaḥ arthaḥ upajāyate . yaḥ śabdaḥ anvayī tasya asau arthaḥ yaḥ arthaḥ anvayī.
GS24pmbhasuu:2642: viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . bahavaḥ hi śabdāḥ ekārthāḥ bhavanti . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:2643: indraḥ śakraḥ puruhūtaḥ purandaraḥ , kanduḥ koṣṭhaḥ kuśūlaḥ iti . ekaḥ ca śabdaḥ bahvarthaḥ . tat yathā : akṣāḥ pādāḥ māṣāḥ iti . ataḥ kim na
GS24pmbhasuu:2644: sādhīyaḥ arthavattā siddhā bhavati . na brūmaḥ arthavattā na sidhyati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2645_0: .varṇitā arthavattā anvayavyatirekābhyām eva . tatra kutaḥ etat : ayam prakṛtyarthaḥ ayam pratyayārthaḥ iti na punaḥ prakṛtiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2645_1: eva ubhau arthau brūyāt pratyayaḥ eva vā . sāmānyaśabdāḥ ete evam syuḥ . sāmānyaśabdāḥ ca na antareṇa viśeṣam prakaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2645_2: vā viśeṣeṣu avatiṣṭhante . yataḥ tu niyogataḥ vṛkṣaḥ iti ukte svabhāvataḥ kasmin cid arthe pratītiḥ upajāyate ataḥ manyāmahe
GS24pmbhasuu:2645_3: na ime sāmānyaśabdāḥ iti . na cet sāmānyaśabdāḥ prakṛtiḥ prakṛtyarthe vartate pratyayaḥ pratyayārthe .
GS24pmbhasuu:2646_0: (P_1,2.45.4) KA_I,220.9-24 Ro_II,79-80 kim punaḥ ime varṇāḥ arthavantaḥ āhosvit anarthakāḥ . varṇasya arthavadanarthakatve
GS24pmbhasuu:2646_1: uktam . kim uktam . arthavantaḥ varṇāḥ dhātuprātipadikapratyayanipātānām ekavarṇānām arthadarśanāt . varṇavyatyaye ca arthāntaragamanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2646_2: . varṇānupalabdhau ca anarthagateḥ . saṅghātārthavattvāt ca . saṅghātasya aikārthyāt subabhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2648: varṇavyatyayāpāyopajanavikāreṣu arthadarśanāt iti . tatra idam aparihṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:2649: : saṅghātārthavattvāt ca iti . tasya parihāraḥ . saṅghātārthavattvāt ca iti cet dṛṣṭaḥ hiatadarthena guṇena guṇinaḥ arthabhāvaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2650: saṅghātārthavattvāt ca iti cet dṛśyate hi punaḥ atadarthena guṇena guṇinaḥ arthabhāvaḥ . tat yathā . ekaḥ tantuḥ tvaktrāṇe asamarthaḥ tatsamudāyaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:2651_0: kambalaḥ samarthaḥ . ekaḥ taṇḍulaḥ kṣutpratighāte asamarthaḥ tatsamudāyaḥ ca vardhatikam samarthaḥ . ekaḥ ca balvajaḥ bandhane
GS24pmbhasuu:2651_1: asamarthaḥ tatsamudāyaḥ ca rajjuḥ samarthā bhavati . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . bhavati hi tatra yā ca yāvatī ca arthamātrā . bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2651_2: hi kim cit prati ekaḥ tantuḥ tvaktrāṇe samarthaḥ ekaḥ ca taṇḍulaḥ kṣutpratighāte samarthaḥ ekaḥ ca balvajaḥ bandhane samarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2651_3: . ime punaḥ varṇāḥ atyantāya eva anarthakāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2652: yathā tarhi rathāṅgāni vihṛtāni pratyekam vrajikriyām prati asamarthāni bhavanti tatsamudāyaḥ ca rathaḥ samarthaḥ evam eṣām varṇānām samudāyāḥ arthavantaḥ avayavāḥ anarthakāḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2653: (P_1,2.45.5) KA_I,220.25-221.10 Ro_II,81-82 nipātasya anarthakasya prātipadikatvam . nipātasya anarthakasya prātipadikasañjñā vaktavyā .
GS24pmbhasuu:2654: khañjati nikhañjati lambate pralambate . kim punaḥ atra
GS24pmbhasuu:2655_0: prātipadikasañjñayā prārthyate . prātipadikāt iti svādyutpattiḥ , subantam padam iti padasañjñā , padasya padāt iti nighātaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2655_1: yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . satyām api prātipadikasañjñāyām svādyutpattiḥ na prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . na hi prātipadikasañjñāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:2655_2: eva svādyutpattiḥ pratibaddhā . kim tarhi . ekatvādiṣu artheṣu svādayaḥ vidhīyante na ca
GS24pmbhasuu:2656: eṣām ekatvādayaḥ santi . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . aviśeṣeṇa utpadyante . utpannānām niyamaḥ kriyate . atha vā prakṛtārthān apekṣya niyamaḥ . ke ca prakṛtāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2657_0: ekatvādayaḥ . ekasmin eva arthe ekavacanam na dvayoḥ na bahuṣu . dvayoḥ eva dvivacanam na ekasmin na bahuṣu . bahuṣu eva
GS24pmbhasuu:2657_1: artheṣu bahuvacanam na ekasmin na dvayoḥ iti . atha vā ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati anarthakānām api
GS24pmbhasuu:2658: eteṣām bhavati arthavatkṛtam iti yat ayam adhiparī* anarthakau iti anarthakayoḥ gatyupasargasañjābādhikām karmapravacanīyasañjñām śāsti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2659: (P_1,2.45.6) KA_I,221.11-222.7 Ro_II,82-85 kim punaḥ ayam paryudāsaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2660: yat anyat pratyayāt āhosvit prasajya ayam pratiṣedhaḥ : pratyayaḥ na iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2661_0: kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . apratyayaḥ iti cet tibekādeśe pratiṣedhaḥ antavattvāt . apratyayaḥ iti cet tibekādeśe pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2661_1: : kāṇḍe kuḍye . kim kāraṇam . antavattvāt . tibatipoḥ ekādeśaḥ atipaḥ antavat syāt . asti anyat tipaḥ iti kṛtvā prātipadikasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:2661_2: prāpnoti . astu tarhi prasajyapratiṣedhaḥ : pratyayaḥ na iti . na pratyayaḥ iti cet ūṅekādeśe pratiṣedhaḥ ādivattvāt . na
GS24pmbhasuu:2662_0: prāpnoti : brahmabandhūḥ . kim kāraṇam . ādivattvāt . pratyayāpratyayayoḥ pratyayasya ādivat syāt . tatra pratyayaḥ na iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2662_1: pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati utpadyante ūṅantāt svādayaḥ iti yat ayam na ūṅdhātvoḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2662_2: vibhaktisvarasya pratiṣedham śāśti . atha vā dve hi atra prātipadikasañjñe : avayavasya api samudāyasya api . tatra avayavasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2662_3: yā prātipadikasañjñā tayā antavadbhāvāt svādyutpattiḥ bhaviṣyati . sublope ca pratyayalakṣaṇatvāt . sublope ca pratyayalakṣaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:2662_4: pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti : rājā takṣā . pratyayalakṣaṇena pratyayaḥ na iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2663_0: na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na pratyayalakṣaṇena pratiṣedhaḥ bhavati iti yat ayam na ṅisambuddhyoḥ iti pratiṣedham
GS24pmbhasuu:2663_1: śāsti . atha vā punaḥ astu paryudāsaḥ . nanu ca uktam : apratyayaḥ iti cet tibekādeśe pratiṣedhaḥ antavattvāt iti . prasajyapratiṣedhe
GS24pmbhasuu:2663_2: api eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . dve hi atra prātipadikasañjñe : avayavasya api samudāyasya api . gṛhyate ca prātipadikāprātipadikayoḥ ekādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2663_3: prātipadikagrahaṇena . tasmāt ubhābhyām api vaktavyam syāt : hrasvaḥ napuṃsake yat tasya iti . kim ca napuṃsake .
GS24pmbhasuu:2664: napuṃsakam yasya guṇaḥ . kasya ca napuṃsakam guṇaḥ . prātipadikasya .
GS24pmbhasuu:2666: samāsagrahaṇe uktam . kim uktam . arthavatsamudāyānām samāsagrahaṇam niyamārtham iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2667: (P_1,2.47.1) KA_I,222.13-223.11 Ro_II,85-88 prātipadikagrahaṇam kimartham . napuṃsakahrasvatve prātipadikagrahaṇam tibnivṛttyartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:2669: tibantasya hrasvatvam mā bhūt : kāṇḍe kuḍye . ramate brāhmaṇakulam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2670_0: avyayapratiṣedhaḥ . avyayānām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ : doṣā brāhmaṇakulam divā brāhmaṇakulam iti . saḥ tarhi vaktavyaḥ . na
GS24pmbhasuu:2670_1: vaktavyaḥ . na atra avyayam napuṃsake vartate . kim tarhi . adhikaraṇam atra avyayam
GS24pmbhasuu:2671: napuṃsakasya . iha tarhi prāpnoti : kāṇḍībhūtam vṛṣalakulam , kuḍyībhūtam vṛṣalakulam iti . na vā liṅgābhāvāt . na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2672: liṅgābhāvāt . aliṅgam avyayam . kim punaḥ ayam avyayasya eva parihāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2673: āhosvit tibantasya api . tibantasya api iti āha . katham . avyayam hi kim
GS24pmbhasuu:2674: cit vibhaktyarthapradhānam kim cit kriyāpradhānam . uccaiḥ, nīcaiḥ iti vibhaktyarthapradhānam , hiruk pṛthak iti kriyāpradhānam . tibantam ca api
GS24pmbhasuu:2675_0: kim cit vibhaktyarthapradhānam kim cit kriyāpradhānam . kāṇḍe kuḍye* iti vibhaktarthyapradhānam , ramate brāhmaṇakulam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2675_1: kriyāpradhānam . na ca etayoḥ arthayoḥ liṅgasaṅkhyābhyām yogaḥ asti . avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam . kriyamāṇe api hi prātipadikagrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:2675_2: iha prasajyeta : kāṇḍe kuḍye . dve hi atra prātipadikasañjñe avayavasya api samudāyasya api .
GS24pmbhasuu:2677: tasmāt ubhābhyām api vaktavyam syāt : hrasvaḥ napuṃsake yat tasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2678: kim ca napuṃsake . napuṃsakam yasya guṇaḥ . kasya ca napuṃsakam guṇaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2680: (P_1,2.47.2) KA_I,223.12-16 Ro_II,88 yañekādeśadīrghaittveṣu pratiṣedhaḥ . yañekādeśadīrghaittveṣu pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2682: yañekādeśadīrghaittveṣu bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt siddham . bahiraṅgāḥ ete vidhayaḥ . antaraṅgam hrasvatvam . asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge .
GS24pmbhasuu:2684: upasarjanahrasvatve ca . kim . yañekādeśadīrghaittveṣu pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ : atikhaṭvāya atikhaṭvārtham atikhaṭvebhyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2685: upasarjanahrasvatve ca . kim . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt siddham iti eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:2686: bahiraṅgāḥ ete vidhayaḥ . antaraṅgam hrasvatvam . asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge .
GS24pmbhasuu:2687: (P_1,2.48.2) KA_I,223.22-225.14 Ro_II,89-94 goṭāṅgrahaṇam kṛnnivṛttyartham . goṭāṅgrahaṇam kartavyam . kim idam ṭāṅ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2688: pratyāhāragrahaṇam . kva sanniviṣṭānām pratyāhāraḥ . ṭāpaḥ prabhṛti ā
GS24pmbhasuu:2689_0: ṣyaṅaḥ ṅakārāt . kim prayojanam . kṛnnivṛttyartham . kṛtstriyāḥ dhātustriyāḥ ca hrasvatvam mā bhūt iti : atitantrīḥ , atiśrīḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2689_1: , atilakṣmīḥ iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . strīgrahaṇam svaryate . tatra svaritena adhikāragatiḥ bhavati . striyām
GS24pmbhasuu:2690: teṣām grahaṇam vijñāsyate . svaritena adhikāragatiḥ bhavati iti na doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2691: bhavati . yadi evam pratyayagrahaṇam idam bhavati . tatra pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ tadādeḥ grahaṇam bhavati iti iha na prāpnoti : atirājakumāriḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2692_0: atisenānīkumāriḥ iti . astrīpratyayena iti evam tat . īyasaḥ bahuvrīhau puṃvadvacanam . īyasaḥ bahuvrīhau puṃvadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2692_1: . bahvyaḥ śreyasyaḥ asya bahuśreyasī vidyamānaśreyasī . pūrvapadasya ca pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2693_0: gosamāsanivṛttyartham . pūrvapadasya ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kim prayojanam . gosamāsanivṛttyartham . gonivṛttyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:2693_1: samāsanivṛttyartham ca . gonivṛttyartham tāvat : gokulam , gokṣīram , gopālakaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2694_0: samāsanivṛttyartham : rājakumārīputraḥ , senānīkumārīputraḥ iti . kim ucyate samāsanivṛttyartham iti na punaḥ asamāsaḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:2694_1: kim cit pūrvapadam yadarthaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ syāt . stryantasya prātipadikasya upasarjanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2695: hrasvaḥ bhavati iti ucyate na ca antareṇa samāsam stryantam prātipadikam upasarjanam asti . nanu ca idam asti : khaṭvāpādaḥ , mālāpādaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2696: ekādeśe kṛte antādivadbhāvāt prāpnoti . ubhayataḥ āśraye na antādivat .
GS24pmbhasuu:2697: gonivṛttyarthena tāvat na arthaḥ . gontasya prātipadikasya upasarjanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2698: hrasvaḥ bhavati iti ucyate na ca etat gontam . nanu ca etat api vyapadeśivadbhāvena gontam . vyapadeśivadbhāvaḥ aprātipadikena .
GS24pmbhasuu:2699_0: samāsanivṛttyarthena ca api na arthaḥ . stryantasya prātipadikasya upasarjanasya hrasvaḥ bhavati iti ucyate . pradhānam upasarjanam
GS24pmbhasuu:2699_1: iti ca sambandhiśabdau etau . tatra sambandhāt etat gantavyam : yam prati yat
GS24pmbhasuu:2700_0: apradhānam tasya cet saḥ antaḥ bhavati iti . avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam . ucyamāne api hi pratiṣedhe iha prasajyeta :
GS24pmbhasuu:2700_1: pañca kumāryaḥ priyāḥ asya pañcakumārīpriyaḥ , daśakumārīpriyaḥ iti . kapi ca . kapi ca pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2701_0: vaktavyaḥ : bahukumārīkaḥ , bahuvṛṣalīkaḥ . dvandve ca . dvandve ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ : kukkuṭamayūryau . uktam vā .
GS24pmbhasuu:2701_1: kim uktam . kapi tāvat uktam : na kapi iti pratiṣedhaḥ iti . na etat asti uktam . ke aṇaḥ iti yā hrasvaprāptiḥ tasyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2701_2: . kutaḥ etat . anantarasya vidhiḥ vā bhavati pratiṣedhaḥ vā iti . avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam . yaḥ hi manyate yā ca yāvatīca
GS24pmbhasuu:2701_3: hrasvaprāptiḥ tasyāḥ sarvasyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ iti iha api tasya pratiṣedhaḥ prasajyeta : priyam grāmaṇi brāhmaṇakulam asya priyagrāmaṇikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2701_4: . idam tarhi uktam : kapi kṛte anantyatvāt hrasvatvam na bhaviṣyati . idam iha sampradhāryam : kap kriyatām hrasvatvam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2701_5: . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt kap . antaraṅgam hrasvatvam . antaraṅgataraḥ kap . nanu ca ayam kap samāsāntaḥ ici ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2701_6: . tādarthyāt tācchabdyam bhaviṣyati . yeṣām padānām samāsaḥ na tāvat teṣām anyat bhavati . kapam tāvat pratīkṣate . dvandve
GS24pmbhasuu:2701_7: api uktam . kim uktam . paravat liṅgam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2702: śabdaśabdārthau iti . tatra aupadeśikasya hrasvatvam ātideśikasya śravaṇam bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:2703_0: (P_1,2.49) KA_I,225.16-23 Ro_II,95 taddhitaluki avantyādīnām pratiṣedhaḥ . taddhitaluki avantyādīnām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2703_1: : avantī kuntī kurūḥ . taddhitaluki avantyādīnām apratiṣedhaḥ alukparatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:2704_0: taddhitaluki avantyādīnām apratiṣedhaḥ . anarthakaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ . luk kasmāt na bhavati . alukparatvāt . luki
GS24pmbhasuu:2704_1: iti ucyate . na ca atra lukam paśyāmaḥ . luki iti na eṣā parasaptamī śakyā vijñātum . na hi lukā paurvāparyam asti . kā tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:2705: satsaptamī cet prāpnoti . evam tarhi idam iha vyapadeśyam sat ācāryaḥ na vyapadiśati . kim . upasarjanasya iti vartate . na ca jātiḥ upasarjanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2706: (P_1,2.50) KA_I,226.2-18 Ro_II,96-98 it goṇyāḥ na iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2707: goṇyāḥ na iti eva vaktavyam . na arthaḥ ittvena . kā rūpasiddhiḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2708: pañcagoṇiḥ , daśagoṇiḥ . hrasvatā hi vidhīyate . hrasvatvam atra vidhīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2709_0: : gostriyoḥ upasarjanasya iti . iti vā vacane tāvat . it iti vā ucyeta na iti vā kaḥ nu atra viśeṣaḥ . mātrārtham vā kṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:2709_1: bhavet . atha vā mātrārtham idam vaktavyam : goṇīmātram idam goṇiḥ . aparaḥ āha : goṇyāḥ ittvam prakaraṇāt . aśiṣyam goṇyāḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:2797_0: ekaśeṣaḥ ucyeta . kim kṛtam bhavati . kaḥ cit vacanalopaḥ parihṛtaḥ bhavati . tat tarhi samāsagrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2797_1: . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . tiṣyapunarvasvoḥ nakṣatradvandve bahuvacanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2798: dvivacanam nityam iti . samāse iti cet svarasamāsānteṣu doṣaḥ . samāse iti cet svarasamāsānteṣu doṣaḥ bhavati . svara : aśvaḥ ca aśvaḥ ca aśvau.
GS24pmbhasuu:2799: samāsāntodāttatve kṛte ekaśeṣaḥ prāpnoti . idam iha sampradhāryam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2800: samāsāntodāttattvam kriyatām ekaśeṣaḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt samāsāntodāttatvam . samāsāntodāttatve ca doṣaḥ bhavati . svara .
GS24pmbhasuu:2801_0: samāsānta : ṛk ca ṛk ca ṛcau . samāsānte kṛte asārūpyāt ekaśeṣaḥ na prāpnoti . idam iha sampradhāryam : samāsāntaḥ kriyatām
GS24pmbhasuu:2801_1: ekaśeṣaḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt samāsāntaḥ . samāsānte ca doṣaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:2802: aṅgāśraye ca ekaśeṣavacanam . aṅgāśraye ca kārye ekaśeṣaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2803_0: svasā ca svasārau ca svasāraḥ . aṅgāśraye kṛte asārūpyāt ekaśeṣaḥ na prāpnoti . idam iha sampradhāryam : aṅgāśrayam kriyatām
GS24pmbhasuu:2803_1: ekaśeṣaḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt aṅgāśrayam . tiṅsamāse tiṅsamāsavacanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2804: tiṅsamāse tiṅsamāsaḥ vaktavyaḥ . ekam tiṅgrahaṇam anarthakam . samāse tiṅsamāsaḥ iti eva siddham . na anarthakam . tiṅsamāse prakṛte tiṅsamāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2805: vaktavyaḥ . tiṅvidhipratiṣedhaḥ ca . tiṅ ca kaḥ cit vidheyaḥ kaḥ cit pratiṣedhyaḥ . pacati ca pacati ca pacataḥ : taḥśabdaḥ vidheyaḥ tiśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2806: pratiṣedhyaḥ . yadi punaḥ asamāse ekaśeṣaḥ ucyeta . asamāse vacanalopaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2807_0: yadi asamāse vacanalopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . nanu ca utpatatā eva vacanalopam coditāḥ smaḥ . dvivacanabahuvacanavidhim dvandvapratiṣedham
GS24pmbhasuu:2807_1: ca vakṣyati tadartham punaḥ codyate . dvivacanabahuvacanavidhiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2808_0: dvivacanabahuvacanāni vidheyāni : vṛkṣaḥ ca vṛkṣaḥ ca vṛkṣau , vṛkṣaḥ ca vṛkṣaḥ ca vṛkṣaḥ ca vṛkṣāḥ iti . dvandvapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2808_1: ca . dvandvasya ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ : vṛkṣaḥ ca vṛkṣaḥ ca vṛkṣau , vṛkṣaḥ ca vṛkṣaḥ ca vṛkṣaḥ ca vṛkṣāḥ iti . cārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:2808_2: dvandvaḥ iti dvandvaḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . anavakāśaḥ ekaśeṣaḥ dvandvam bādhiṣyate . sāvakāśaḥ ekaśeṣaḥ . kaḥ avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2808_3: . tiṅantāni avakāśaḥ . yadi punaḥ pṛthak sarveṣām vibhaktyantānām ekaśeṣaḥ ucyeta . kim kṛtam bhavati . kaḥ cit vacanalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2808_4: parihṛtaḥ bhavati . vibhaktyantānām ekaśeṣe vibhaktyantānām ekaśeṣe vibhaktyantānām eva tu nivṛttiḥ bhavati . ekavibhaktyantānām
GS24pmbhasuu:2809: pṛthagvibhaktipratiṣedhārtham . ekavibhaktyantānām iti tu vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . pṛthagvibhaktipratiṣedhārtham . pṛthagvibhaktyantānām mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:2810: : brāhmaṇābhyām ca kṛtam brāhmaṇābhyām ca dehi . na vā arthavipratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2811: yugapadvacanābhāvaḥ . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . arthavipratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2812: . vipratiṣiddhau etau arthau kartā saṃpradānam iti aśakyau yugapat nirdeṣṭum . tayoḥ vipratiṣiddhatvāt yugapadvacanam na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:2813: anekārthāśrayaḥ ca punaḥ ekaśeṣaḥ . anekam artham sampratyāyayiṣyāmi iti ekaśeṣaḥ ārabhyate . tasmāt na ekaśabdatvam . tasmāt ekaśabdatvam na
GS24pmbhasuu:2814: bhaviṣyati . ayam tarhi doṣaḥ : kaḥ cit vacanalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2815_0: dvivacanabahuvacanavidhiḥ dvandvapratiṣedhaḥ ca iti . yadi punaḥ prātipadikānām ekaśeṣaḥ ucyeta . kim kṛtam bhavati . vacanalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2815_1: parihṛtaḥ bhavati . prātipadikānām ekaśeṣe mātṛmātroḥ pratiṣedhaḥ sarūpatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:2816: prātipadikānām ekaśeṣe mātṛmātroḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ : mātā ca janayitrī mātārau ca dhānyasya mātṛmātāraḥ . kim kāraṇam . sarūpatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:2817_0: sarūpāṇi hi etāni prātipadikāni . kim ucyate prātipadikānām ekaśeṣe mātṛmātroḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ iti na punaḥ yasya api
GS24pmbhasuu:2817_1: vibhaktyantānām ekaśeṣaḥ tena api mātṛmātroḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ syāt . tasya api hi
GS24pmbhasuu:2818: etāni kva cit vibhaktyantāni sarūpāṇi : mātṛbhyām ca mātṛbhyāṃ ca iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2819: atha matam etat vibhaktyantānām sārūpye bhavitavyam eva ekaśeṣeṇa iti prātipadikānām eva ekaśeṣe doṣaḥ bhavati . evam ca kṛtvā codyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:2822: haritasya strī hariṇī hariṇasya api hariṇī , hariṇī ca hariṇī ca hariṇyau . śyetasya strī śyenī śyenasya api śyenī , śyenī ca śyenī ca śyenyau .
GS24pmbhasuu:2823_0: rohitasya strī rohiṇī rohiṇasya api rohiṇī , rohiṇī ca rohiṇī ca rohiṇyau . na vā padasya arthe prayogāt . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2823_1: . kim kāraṇam . padasya arthe prayogāt . padam arthe prayujyate vibhaktyantam ca padam . rūpam ca iha āśrīyate . rūpanirgrahaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2823_2: ca śabdasya na antareṇa laukikam prayogam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2824: tasmin ca laukike prayoge sarūpāṇi etāni . aparaḥ āha : na vā padasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2825: arthe prayogāt . na vā eṣaḥ pakṣaḥ eva asti prātipadikānām ekaśeṣaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2826: kim kārāṇam . padasya arthe prayogāt . padam arthe prayujyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2827_0: vibhaktyantam ca padam . rūpam ca iha āśrīyate rūpanirgrahaḥ ca śabdasya na antareṇa laukikam prayogam . tasmin ca laukike
GS24pmbhasuu:2827_1: prayoge prātipadikānām prayogaḥ na asti . atha anena pakṣeṇa arthaḥ syāt : prātipadikānām ekaśeṣaḥ iti . bāḍham arthaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2827_2: kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . etena eva abhihitam sūtreṇa sarūpāṇām ekaśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2828_0: ekavibhaktau iti . katham . vibhaktiḥ sārūpyeṇa āśrīyate . anaimittikaḥ ekaśeṣaḥ . ekavibhaktau yāni sarūpāṇi teṣām ekaśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2828_1: bhavati . kva . yatra vā tatra vā iti . atha anena pakṣeṇa arthaḥ syāt : vibhaktyantānām ekaśeṣaḥ iti . bāḍham arthaḥ . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:2828_2: vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . etat api etena eva abhihitam sūtreṇa sarūpāṇām ekaśeṣaḥ ekavibhaktau
GS24pmbhasuu:2828_3: iti . katham . na idam pāribhāṣikyāḥ vibhakteḥ grahaṇam . kim tarhi . anvarthagrahaṇam : vibhāgaḥ vibhaktiḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2829_0: ekavibhāge yāni sarūpāṇi teṣām ekaśeṣaḥ bhavati iti . nanu ca uktaṃ : kaḥ cit vacanalopaḥ dvivacanabahuvacanavidhiḥ dvandvapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2829_1: ca iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yat tāvat ucyate kaḥ cit vacanalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2830_0: dvivacanabahuvacanavidhiḥiti . sahavivakṣāyām ekaśeṣaḥ . yugapadvivakṣāyām ekaśeṣeṇa bhavitavyam . na tarhi idānīm idam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2830_1: : vṛkṣaḥ ca vṛkṣaḥ ca vṛkṣau , vṛkṣaḥ ca vṛkṣaḥ ca vṛkṣaḥ ca vṛkṣāḥ iti . na etat sahavivakṣāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:2831_0: bhavati . atha api nidarśayitum buddhiḥ evam nidarśayitavyam : vṛkṣau ca vṛkṣau ca vṛkṣau , vṛkṣāḥ ca vṛkṣāḥ ca vṛkṣāḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:2831_1: vṛkṣāḥ iti . yat api ucyate dvandvapratiṣedhaḥ ca vaktavyaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . anavakāśaḥ ekaśeṣḥ dvandvam bādhiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2831_2: . nanu ca uktam sāvakāśaḥ ekaśeṣaḥ . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . tiṅantāni avakāśaḥ iti . na tiṅantāni ekaśeṣārambham
GS24pmbhasuu:2832_0: prayojayanti . kim kāṛaṇam . yathājātīyakānām dvitīyasya padasya prayoge sāmarthyam asti tathājātīyakānām ekaśeṣaḥ . na ca
GS24pmbhasuu:2832_1: tiṅantānām dvitīyasya padasya prayoge sāmarthyam asti . kim kāraṇam . ekā hi kriyā . ekena uktatvāt tasya arthasya dvitīyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2833: aprayogaḥ iti . yadi tarhi ekā kriyā dvivacanabahuvacanāni na sidhyanti :
GS24pmbhasuu:2834: pacataḥ pacanti . na etāni kriyāpekṣāṇi . kim tarhi . sādhanāpekṣāṇi .
GS24pmbhasuu:2835: atha vā punaḥ astu ekavibhaktau iti . nanu ca uktam ekavibhaktau iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:2836_0: na abhāvāt vibhakteḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . parihṛtam etat : arthavat prātipadikam iti prātipadikasañjñā bhaviṣyati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2836_1: nanu ca uktam niyamāt na prāpnoti arthavatsamudāyānām samāsagrahaṇam niyamārtham iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . tulyajātīyasya niyamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2836_2: . kaḥ ca tulyajātīyaḥ . yathājātīyakānām samāsaḥ . kathañjātīyakānām samāsaḥ . subantānām .
GS24pmbhasuu:2837: (P_1,2.64.4) KA_I,238.18-239.11 Ro_II,133-136 sarvatra apatyādiṣu upasaṅkhyānam . sarveṣu pakṣeṣu apatyādiṣu upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2838_0: bhikṣāṇām samūhaḥ bhaikṣam iti . sarvatra iti ucyate prātipadikāṇām ca ekaśeṣe siddham . apatyādiṣu iti ucyate bahavaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:2838_1: apatyādayaḥ : gargasya apatyam bahavaḥ gargāḥ . ekā prakṛtiḥ bahavaḥ ca yañaḥ . asārūpyāt ekaśeṣaḥ na prāpnoti . nanu ca
GS24pmbhasuu:2838_2: yathā eva bahavaḥ yañaḥ evam prakṛtayaḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:2839: bahvyaḥ syuḥ . na evam śakyam . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt : gargāḥ , vatsāḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2840_0: bidāḥ , urvāḥ iti . añ yaḥ bahuṣu yañ yaḥ bahuṣu iti ucyamānaḥ luk na prāpnoti . mā bhūt evam . añantam yat bahuṣu yañantam
GS24pmbhasuu:2840_1: yat bahuṣu iti evam bhaviṣyati . nanu ca uktam : na evam śakyam . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:2841_0: kāśyapapratikṛtayaḥ kāśyapāḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . laukikasya tatra gotrasya grahaṇam na ca etat laukikam gotram . atha vā
GS24pmbhasuu:2841_1: punaḥ astu ekā prakṛtiḥ bahavaḥ ca yañaḥ . nanu ca uktam : asārūpyāt ekaśeṣaḥ na prāpnoti iti . siddham tu samānārthānām
GS24pmbhasuu:2842: samānārthānām ekaśeṣaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . yadi samānārthānām ekaśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2843: ucyate katham akṣāḥ , pādāḥ , māṣāḥ iti . nānārthānām api sarūpāṇām .
GS24pmbhasuu:2844: nānārthānām api sarūpāṇām ekaśeṣḥ vaktavyaḥ . ekārthānām api virūpāṇām .
GS24pmbhasuu:2845: ekārthānām api virūpāṇām ekaśeṣaḥ vaktavyaḥ : vakradaṇḍaḥ ca kuṭiladaṇḍaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2846_0: ca vakradaṇḍau kuṭiladaṇḍāu iti vā . svarabhinnānām yasya uttarasvaravidhiḥ . svarabhinnānām yasya uttarasvaravidhiḥ tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2846_1: ekaśeṣaḥ vaktavyaḥ . akṣaḥ ca akṣaḥ ca akṣau , mīmaṃsakaḥ ca mīmāṃsakaḥ ca mīmaṃsakau .
GS24pmbhasuu:2847: (P_1,2.64.5) KA_I,239.12-240.11 Ro_II,136-139 iha kasmāt na bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2848_0: ekaḥ ca ekaḥ ca , dvau ca dvau ca iti . saṅkhyāyāḥ arthāsampratyayāt anyapadārthatvāt ca anekaśeṣaḥ . saṅkhyāyāḥ arthāsampratyayāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2848_1: ekaśeṣaḥ na bhaviṣyati . na hi ekau iti anena arthaḥ gamyate . anyapadārthatvāt ca saṅkhyāyāḥ ekaśeṣaḥ na bhaviṣyati . ekaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2848_2: ca ekaḥ ca iti asya dvau iti arthaḥ . dvau ca dvau ca iti asya catvāraḥ iti arthaḥ . na etau staḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2849: parihārau . yat tāvat ucyate saṅkhyāyāḥ arthāsampratyayāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2850: arthāsampratyaye api ekaśeṣaḥ bhavati . tat yathā . gārgyaḥ ca gārgyāyaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2851_0: ca gārgyau . na ca ucyate vṛddhayuvānau iti bhavati ca ekaśeṣaḥ . yat api ucyate : anyapadārthatvāt ca iti . anyapadārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:2851_1: api ekaśeṣaḥ bhavati . tat yathā : viṃśatiḥ ca viṃśatiḥ ca viṃśatī iti . tayoḥ catvāriṃśat iti arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2852_0: . evam tarhi na imau pṛthak parihārau . ekaparihāraḥ ayam : saṅkhyāyāḥ arthāsampratyayāt anyapadārthatvāt ca iti . yatra
GS24pmbhasuu:2852_1: hi arthāsampratyayaḥ eva vā anyapadārthatā eva vā bhavati tatra ekaśeṣaḥ gārgyau viṃśatī iti yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:2853: . atha vā na ime ekaśeṣaśabdāḥ . yadi tarhi na ime ekaśeṣaśabdāḥ samudāyaśabdāḥ tarhi bhavanti . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . ekavacanam prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2854: ekārthāḥ hi samudāyāḥ bhavanti . tat yathā yūtham , śatam , vanam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2855: santu tarhi ekaśeṣaśabdāḥ . kiṅkṛtam sārūpyam . anyonyakṛtam sārūpyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2856_0: santi punaḥ ke cit anye api śabdāḥ yeṣām anyonyakṛtaḥ bhāvaḥ . santi iti āha . tad yathā mātā pitā bhrātā iti . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2856_1: . sakṛt ete śabdāḥ pravṛttāḥ apāyeṣu api vartante . iha punaḥ ekena api apāye na
GS24pmbhasuu:2857: bhavati catvāraḥ iti . anyat idānīm etat ucyate sakṛt ete śabdāḥ pravṛttāḥ apāyeṣu api vartante iti . yat tu bhavān asmān codayati santi punaḥ ke cit
GS24pmbhasuu:2858_0: anye api śabdāḥ yeṣām anyonyakṛtḥ bhāvaḥ iti tatra ete asmābhiḥ upanyastāḥ . tatra etat bhavān āha sakṛt ete śabdāḥ pravṛttāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2858_1: apāyeṣu api vartante iti . etat ca vārttam . ekaikaḥ na udyantum bhāram śaknoti yat katham tatra |
GS24pmbhasuu:2859: ekaikaḥ kartā syāt sarve vā syuḥ katham yuktam || kāraṇam udyamanam cet na udyacchati ca antareṇa tat tulyam |
GS24pmbhasuu:2860: tasmāt pṛthak pṛthak te kartāraḥ savyapekṣāḥ tu ||
GS24pmbhasuu:2861_0: (P_1,2.64.6) KA_I,240.12-15 Ro_II,140 prathamamadhyamottamānām ekaśeṣaḥ sarūpatvāt . prathamamadhyamottamānām ekaśeṣaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2861_1: : pacati ca pacasi ca pacathaḥ , pacasi ca pacāmi ca pacāvaḥ , pacati ca pacasi ca pacāmi ca pacāmaḥ . kim punaḥ kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2863: dvivacanabahuvacanayoḥ ca aprasiddhiḥ . kim kāraṇam . ekārthatvāt . ekaḥ ayam avaśiṣyate . tena anena tadarthena bhavitavyam . kimarthena .
GS24pmbhasuu:2864: yadarthaḥ ekaḥ . kimarthaḥ ca ekaḥ . ekaḥ ekārthaḥ . na aikārthyam . na ayam ekārthaḥ . kim tarhi . dvyarthaḥ bahvarthaḥ ca . na aikārthyam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2865: cet ārambhānarthakyam . na aikārthyam iti cet ekaśeṣārambhaḥ anarthakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2866: syāt . iha hi śabdasya svābhāvikī vā anekārthatā syāt vācanikī vā . tat yadi tāvat svābhāvikī aśiṣyaḥ ekaśeṣaḥ ekena uktatvāt . aśiṣyaḥ ekaśeṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2867_0: kim kāraṇam . ekena uktatvāt tasya arthasya dvitīyasya prayogeṇa na bhavitavyam uktārthānām aprayogaḥ iti . atha vācanikī
GS24pmbhasuu:2867_1: tat vaktavyam : ekaḥ ayam aviśiṣyate saḥ ca dvyarthaḥ bhavati bahvarthaḥ ca iti . na vaktavyam . siddham ekaśeṣaḥ iti eva
GS24pmbhasuu:2867_2: . katham punaḥ ekaḥ ayam aviśiṣyate iti anena dvyarthatā bahvarthatā vā śakyā labdhum . tat ca ekaśeṣakṛtam . na hi antareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:2867_3: tadvācinaḥ śabdasya prayogam tasya arthasya gatiḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:2868_0: paśyāmaḥ ca punaḥ antareṇa api tadvācinaḥ śabdasya prayogam tasya arthasya gatiḥ bhavati iti agnicit somasut iti yathā .
GS24pmbhasuu:2868_1: te manyāmahe : lopakṛtam etat yena atra antareṇa api tadvācinaḥ śabdasya prayogam tasya arthasya gatiḥ bhavatiti . evam iha
GS24pmbhasuu:2868_2: api ekaśeṣakṛtam etat yena atra ekaḥ ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:2869: avaśiṣyate iti anena dvyarthatā bahvarthatā vā bhavati . ucyeta tarhi na
GS24pmbhasuu:2870: tu gamyeta . yaḥ hi gām aśvaḥ iti brūyāt aśvam vā gauḥ iti na jātu cit sampratyayaḥ syāt . tena anekārthābhidhāne yatnam kurvatā avaśyam lokaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2871: pṛṣṭhataḥ anugantavyaḥ : keṣu artheṣu laukikāḥ kān śabdān prayuñjate iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2872: loke ca ekasmin vṛkṣaḥ iti prayuñjate dvayoḥ vṛkṣau iti bahuṣu vṛkṣāḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2873: . yadi tarhi lokaḥ avaśyam śabdeṣu pramāṇam kimartham ekaśeṣaḥ ārabhyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:2874: atha kimartham lopaḥ ārabhyate . pratyayalakṣaṇam ācāryaḥ prārthayamānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2875: lopam ārabhate . ekaśeṣārambhe punaḥ asya na kim cit prayojanam asti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2876: nanu ca uktam : pratyartham śabdaniveśāt na ekena anekasya abhidhānam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2877_0: . yadi ca ekena śabdena anekasya arthasya abhidhānam syāt na pratyartham śabdaniveśaḥ kṛtaḥ syāt . pratyartham śabdaniveśāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2877_1: ekena anekasya abhidhānāt apratyartham iti cet tat api pratyartham eva . pratyartham śabdaniveśāt ekena anekasyābhidhānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2878_0: yat api ekena anekasya abhidhānam bhavati tat api pratyartham eva . yat api hi arthau arthau prati tat api pratyartham eva
GS24pmbhasuu:2878_1: . yat api hi arthān arthān prati tat api pratyartham eva . yāvatām abhidhānam tāvatām prayogaḥ nyāyyaḥ . yāvatām arthānām
GS24pmbhasuu:2878_2: abhidhānam bhavati tāvatām śabdānām prayogaḥ iti eṣaḥ pakṣaḥ nyāyyaḥ . yāvatām abhidhānam tāvatām prayogaḥ nyāyyaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2879_0: cet ekena api anekasya abhidhānam . yāvatām abhidhānam tāvatām prayogaḥ nyāyyaḥ iti cet evam ucyate : eṣaḥ api nyāyyaḥ eva
GS24pmbhasuu:2879_1: yat api ekena api anekasya abhidhānam bhavati . yadi tarhi ekena anekasya abhidhānam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2880: plakṣanyagrodhau : ekena uktatvāt aparasya prayogaḥ anupapannaḥ . ekena uktatvāt tasya arthasya aparasya prayogeṇa na bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2881_0: uktārthānām aprayogaḥ iti . ekena uktatvāt aparasya prayogaḥ anupapannaḥ iti cet anuktatvāt plakṣeṇa nyagrodhasya nyagrodhaprayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2881_1: . ekena uktatvāt aparasya prayogaḥ anupapannaḥ iti cet anuktaḥ plakṣeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:2882: nyagrodhārthaḥ iti kṛtvā nyagrodhaśabdaḥ prayujyate . katham anuktaḥ yāvatā idānīm eva uktam ekena api anekasya abhidhānam bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2883: sarūpāṇām ekena api anekasya abhidhānam bhavati na virūpāṇām . kim punaḥ kāraṇam sarūpāṇām ekena api anekasya abhidhānam bhavati na punaḥ virūpāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:2884_0: . abhidhānam punaḥ svābhāvikam . svābhāvikam abhidhānam . ubhayadarśanāt ca . ubhayam khalu api dṛśyate : virūpāṇām api ekena
GS24pmbhasuu:2884_1: anekasya abhidhānam bhavati . tat yathā : dyavā ha kṣamā . dyavā cit asmai pṛthivī namete iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2885: . virūpāṇām kila nāma ekena anekasya abhidhānam syāt kim punaḥ sarūpāṇām .
GS24pmbhasuu:2887: vibhaktau vājapyāyanaḥ . ākṛtyabhidhānāt vā ekam śabdam vibhaktau vājapyāyanaḥ ācāryaḥ nyāyyam manyate : ekā ākṛtiḥ sā ca abhidhīyate iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2888: katham punaḥ jñāyate ekā ākṛtiḥ sā ca abhidhīyate iti . prakhyāviśeṣāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:2889: na hi gauḥ iti ukte viśeṣaḥ prakhyāyate śuklā nīlā kapilā kapotikā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2890: yadi api tāvat prakhyāviśeṣāt jñāyate ekā ākṛtiḥ iti kutaḥ tu etat sā abhidhīyate iti . avyapavargagateḥ ca . avyapavargagateḥ ca manyāmahe
GS24pmbhasuu:2891: ākṛtiḥ abhidhīyate iti . na hi gauḥ iti ukte vyapavargaḥ gamyate śuklā nīlā kapilā kapotikā iti . jñāyate ca ekopadiṣṭam . jñāyate khalu api
GS24pmbhasuu:2892_0: ekopadiṣṭam . gauḥ asya kadā cit upadiṣṭaḥ bhavati . saḥ tam anyasmin deśe anyasmin kāle anyasyām ca vayovasthāyām dṛṣṭvā
GS24pmbhasuu:2892_1: jānāti ayam gauḥ iti . kaḥ punaḥ asya viśeṣaḥ prakhyāviśeṣāt iti ataḥ . tasya eva upodbalakam etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:2893: prakhyāviśeṣāt jñāyate ca ekopadiṣṭam iti . dharmaśāstram ca tathā . evam ca kṛtvā dharmaśāstram pravṛttam : brāhmaṇaḥ na hantavyaḥ . surā na peyā
GS24pmbhasuu:2894_0: iti . brāhmaṇamātram na hanyate surāmātram ca na pīyate . yadi dravyam padārthaḥ syāt ekam brāhmaṇam ahatvā ekām ca surām
GS24pmbhasuu:2894_1: apītvā anyatra kāmacāraḥ syāt . kaḥ punaḥ asya viśeṣaḥ avyapavargagateḥ ca iti ataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2895_0: tasya eva upodbalakam etat : avyapavargagateḥ ca dharmaśāstram ca tathā iti . asti ca ekam anekādhikaraṇastham yugapat .
GS24pmbhasuu:2895_1: asti khalu api ekam anekādhikaraṇastham yugapat upalabhyate . kim . ādityaḥ . tad yathā ekaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2896_0: ādityaḥ anekādhikaraṇasthaḥ yugapat upalabhyate . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . na ekaḥ draṣṭā ādityam anekādhikaraṇastham yugapat
GS24pmbhasuu:2896_1: upalabhate . evam tarhi itīndravat viṣayaḥ . tat yathā ekaḥ indraḥ anekasmin kratuśate āhūtaḥ yugapat sarvatra bhavati evam
GS24pmbhasuu:2897: avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam ekam anekādhikaraṇastham yugapat upalabhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2898: iti. na ekam anekādhikaraṇastham yugapat iti cet tathā ekaśeṣe . yaḥ hi manyate na ekam anekādhikaraṇastham yugapad upalabhyate iti ekaśeṣe tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2899: doṣaḥ syāt . ekaśeṣe api na ekaḥ vṛkṣaśabdaḥ anekam artham yugapat abhidadhīta . avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam ākṛtiḥ abhidhīyate iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2900: dravyābhidhāne hi ākṛtyasampratyayaḥ . dravyābhidhāne sati ākṛteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2901_0: asampratyayaḥ syāt . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . tatra asarvadravyagatiḥ . tatra asarvadravyagatiḥ prāpnoti . asarvadravyagatau kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2901_1: doṣaḥ . gauḥ anubandhyaḥ ajaḥ agnīṣomīyaḥ iti : ekaḥ śāstroktam kurvīta aparaḥ aśāstroktam . aśāstrokte ca kriyamāṇe viguṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2901_2: karma bhavati . viguṇe ca karmaṇi phalānavāptiḥ . nanu ca yasya api ākṛtiḥ padārthaḥ tasya api yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:2902: anavayavena codyate na ca anubadhyate viguṇam karma bhavati . viguṇe ca karmaṇi phalānavāptiḥ . ekā ākṛtiḥ iti ca pratijñā hīyeta . yat ca asya
GS24pmbhasuu:2903: pakṣasya upādāne prayojanam ekaśeṣaḥ na vaktavyaḥ iti saḥ ca idānīm vaktavyaḥ bhavati . evam tarhi anavayavena codyate pratyekam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:2904_0: parisamāpyate yathā ādityaḥ . nanu ca yasya api dravyam padārthaḥ tasya api anavayavena codyate pratyekam ca parisamāpyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2904_1: . ekaśeṣaḥ tvayā vaktavyaḥ . tvayā api tarhi dvivacanabahuvacanāni sādhyāni . codanāyām ca ekasya upādhivṛtteḥ . codanāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:2905: abhidhīyate iti . āgneyam aṣṭākapālam nirvapet : ekam nirupya dvitīyas
GS24pmbhasuu:2906: tṛtīyaḥ ca nirupyate . yadi ca dravyam padārthaḥ syāt ekam nirupya dvitīyasya tṛtīyasya ca nirvapaṇam na prakalpeta . kaḥ punaḥ etayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2907: jāticodanayoḥ viśeṣaḥ . ekā nirvṛttena aparā nirvartyena .
GS24pmbhasuu:2909: dravyābhidhānam vyāḍiḥ ācāryaḥ nyāyyam manyate : dravyam abhidhīyate iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2910_0: tathā ca liṅgavacanasiddhiḥ . evam ca kṛtvā liṅgavacanāni siddhāni bhavanti : brāhmaṇī brāhmaṇaḥ , brāhmaṇau brāhmaṇāḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2910_1: . codanāsu ca tasya ārambhāt . codanāsu ca tasya ārambhāt manyāmahe dravyam abhidhīyate iti . gauḥ anubandhyaḥ ajaḥ agnīṣomīyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2912_0: anekādhikaraṇastham yugapat . na khalu api ekam anekādhikaraṇastham yugapat upalabhyate . na hi ekaḥ devadattaḥ yugapat srughne
GS24pmbhasuu:2912_1: bhavati mathurāyām ca . vināśe prādurbhāve ca sarvam tathā syāt . kim . vinaśyet ca prāduḥ ṣyāt ca . śvā mṛtaḥ iti śvā nāma
GS24pmbhasuu:2912_2: loke na pracaret . gauḥ jātaḥ iti sarvam gobhūtam anavakāśam syāt . asti ca vairūpyam . asti khalu api
GS24pmbhasuu:2913_0: vairūpyam : gauḥ ca gauḥ ca khaṇḍaḥ muṇḍaḥ iti . tathā ca vigrahaḥ . evam ca kṛtvā vigrahaḥ upapannaḥ bhavati : gauḥ ca gauḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2913_1: ca iti . vyartheṣu ca muktasaṃśayam . vyartheṣu ca muktasaṃśayam bhavati . ākṛtau api padārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:2914: ekaśeṣaḥ vaktavyaḥ : akṣāḥ , pādāḥ , māṣāḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2915_0: (P_1,2.64.10) KA_I,245.6-247.16 Ro_II,153-159 liṅgavacanasiddhiḥ guṇasya anityatvāt . liṅgavacanāni siddhāni bhavanti . kutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2915_1: . guṇasya anityatvāt . anityāḥ guṇāḥ apāyinaḥ upāyinaḥ ca . kim ye ete śuklādayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2916: na iti āha . strīpuṃnapuṃsakāni sattvaguṇāḥ ekatvadvitvabahutvāni ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:2917_0: kadā cit ākṛtiḥ ekatvena yujyate kadā cit dvitvena kadā cit bahutvena kadā cit strītvena kadā cit puṃstvena kadācit napuṃsakatvena
GS24pmbhasuu:2917_1: . bhavet liṅgaparihāraḥ upapannaḥ vacanaparihāraḥ tu na upapadyate . yadi hi kadā
GS24pmbhasuu:2918_0: cit ākṛtiḥ ekatvena yujyate kadā cit dvitvena kadā cit bahutvena ekā ākṛtiḥ iti pratijñā hīyeta . yat ca asya pakṣasya upādāne
GS24pmbhasuu:2918_1: prayojanam uktam ekaśeṣaḥ na vaktavyaḥ iti saḥ ca idānīm vaktavyaḥ bhavati . evam tarhi liṅgavacanasiddhiḥ guṇavivakṣānityatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2919: . kutaḥ . guṇavivakṣāyāḥ anityatvāt . anityā guṇavivakṣā . kadā cit ākṛtiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2920_0: ekatvena vivakṣitā bhavati kadā cit dvitvena kadā cit bahutvena kadā cit strītvena kadā cit puṃstvena kadā cit napuṃsakatvena
GS24pmbhasuu:2920_1: . bhavet liṅgaparihāraḥ upapannaḥ vacanaparihāraḥ tu na upapadyate . yadi kadā cit
GS24pmbhasuu:2921_0: ākṛtiḥ ekatvena vivakṣitā bhavati kadā cit dvitvena kadā cit bahutvena ekā ākṛtiḥ iti pratijñā hīyeta . yat ca asya pakṣasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2921_1: upādāne prayojanam uktam ekaśeṣaḥ na vaktavyaḥ iti saḥ ca idānīm vaktavyaḥ bhavati . liṅgaparihāraḥ ca api na upapadyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2921_2: . kim kāraṇam . āviṣṭaliṅgā jātiḥ yat liṅgam upādāya pravartate utpattiprabhṛti ā vināśāt tat liṅgam na jahāti . tasmāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:2921_3: vaiyākaraṇaiḥ śakyam laukikam liṅgam āsthātum . avaśyam kaḥ cit
GS24pmbhasuu:2922: svakṛtāntaḥ āstheyaḥ . kaḥ asau svakṛtāntaḥ . saṃstyānaprasavau liṅgam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2923: saṃstyānaprasavau liṅgam āstheyau . kim idam saṃstyānaprasavau iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2924: saṃstyāne styāyateḥ ḍraṭ : strī . sūteḥ sap prasave pumān . nanu ca loke
GS24pmbhasuu:2925: api styāyateḥ eva strī sūteḥ ca pumān . adhikaraṇasādhanā loke strī :
GS24pmbhasuu:2926: styāyati asyām garbhaḥ iti . kartṛsādhanaḥ ca pumān : sūte pumān iti . iha punaḥ ubhayam bhāvasādhanam : styānam pravṛttiḥ ca . kasya punaḥ styānam
GS24pmbhasuu:2927: strī pravṛttiḥ vā pumān . guṇānām . keṣām . śabdasparśarūparasagandhānām .
GS24pmbhasuu:2928_0: sarvāḥ ca punaḥ mūrtayaḥ evamātmikāḥ saṃstyānaprasavaguṇāḥ śabdasparśarūparasagandhavatyaḥ . yatra alpīyāṃsaḥ guṇāḥ tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:2928_1: avarataḥ trayaḥ : śabdaḥ sparśaḥ rūpam iti . rasagandhau na sarvatra . pravṛttiḥ khalu api nityā . na hi iha kaḥ cit api
GS24pmbhasuu:2928_2: svasmin ātmani muhūrtam api avatiṣṭhate . vardhate yāvat anena vardhitavyam apacayena vā yujyate . tat ca ubhayam sarvatra
GS24pmbhasuu:2928_3: . yadi ubhayam sarvatra kutaḥ vyavasthā . vivakṣātaḥ.
GS24pmbhasuu:2929_0: saṃstyānavivakṣāyām strī prasavavivakṣāyām pumān ubhayoḥ api avivakṣāyām napuṃsakam . tatra liṅgavacanasiddhiḥ guṇavivakṣānityatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2929_1: iti liṅgaparihāraḥ upapannaḥ . vacanaparihāraḥ tu na upapadyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:2930: vacanaparihāraḥ ca api upapannaḥ . idam tāvat ayam praṣṭavyaḥ : atha yasya dravyam padārthaḥ katham tasya ekavacanadvivacanabahuvacanāni bhavanti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2931: . evam saḥ vakṣyati : ekasmin ekavacanam dvayoḥ dvivacanam bahuṣu bahuvacanam iti . yadi tasya api vācanikāni na svābhāvikāni aham api evam
GS24pmbhasuu:2932: vakṣyāmi : ekasmin ekavacanam dvayoḥ dvivacanam bahuṣu bahuvacanam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2933_0: na hi ākṛtipadārthikasya dravyam na padārthaḥ dvavyapadārthikasya vā ākṛtiḥ na padārthaḥ . ubhayoḥ ubhayam padārthaḥ . kasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2933_1: cit tu kim cit pradhānabhūtam kim cit guṇabhūtam . ākṛtipadārthikasya ākṛtiḥ pradhānabhūtā dravyam guṇabhūtam . dravyapadārthikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2933_2: dravyam pradhānabhūtam ākṛtiḥ guṇabhūtā . guṇavacanavat vā . guṇavacanavat vā liṅgavacanāni bhaviṣyanti . tat yathā guṇavacanānām
GS24pmbhasuu:2933_3: śabdānām āśrayataḥ liṅgavacanāni bhavanti : śuklam vastram , śuklā śāṭī śuklaḥ kambalaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2934: śuklau kambalau śuklāḥ kambalāḥ iti . yat asau dravyam śritaḥ bhavati guṇaḥ tasya yat liṅgam vacanam ca tat guṇasya api bhavati . evam iha api
GS24pmbhasuu:2935: yat asau dravyam śritā ākṛtiḥ tasya yat liṅgam vacanam ca tat ākṛteḥ api bhaviṣyati . adhikaraṇagatiḥ sāhacaryāt . ākṛtau ārambhaṇādīnām sambhavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2936_0: na asti iti kṛtvā ākṛtisahacarite dravye ārambhaṇādīni bhaviṣyanti . na ca ekam anekādhikaraṇastham yugapat iti ādityavat
GS24pmbhasuu:2936_1: viṣayaḥ . na khalu api ekam anekādhikaraṇastham yugapat upalabhyate iti ādityavat viṣayaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:2937: tat yathā ekaḥ ādityaḥ anekādhikaraṇasthaḥ yugapat upalabhyate . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . na ekaḥ draṣṭā anekādhikaraṇastham ādityam yugapat upalabhate
GS24pmbhasuu:2938: . evam tarhi itīndravat viṣayaḥ . tad yathā ekaḥ indraḥ anekasmin kratuśate āhūtaḥ yugapat sarvatra bhavati evam ākṛtiḥ yugapat sarvatra
GS24pmbhasuu:2939: bhaviṣyati . avināśaḥ anāśritatvāt . dravyavināśe ākṛteḥ avināśaḥ . kutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2940: . anāśritatvāt . anāśritā ākṛtiḥ dravyam . kim ucyate anāśritatvāt iti yat idānīm eva uktam adhikaraṇagatiḥ sāhacaryāt iti . evam tarhi avināśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2941_0: anaikātmyāt . dravyavināśe ākṛteḥ avināśaḥ . kutaḥ . anaikātmyāt . anekaḥ ātmā ākṛteḥ dravyasya ca . tat yathā vṛkṣasthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2941_1: avatānaḥ vṛkṣe chinne api na vinaśyati . vairūpyavigrahau dravyabhedāt . vairūpyavigrahau api dravyabhedāt bhaviṣyataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2941_2: vyartheṣu ca sāmānyāt siddham . vibhinnārtheṣu ca sāmānyāt siddham sarvam . aśnoteḥ akṣaḥ . padyateḥ pādaḥ . mimīteḥ māṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2941_3: . tatra kriyāsāmānyāt siddham . aparaḥ tu āha . purākalpe etat āsīt
GS24pmbhasuu:2942: ṣoḍaśa māṣāḥ kārṣāpaṇam ṣoḍaśaphalāḥca māṣaśambaṭyaḥ . tatra saṃkhyāsāmānyāt siddham .
