GS24pmbhasuu:3032_1: āha iti . pacati paṭhati : prakṛtyarthaḥ anyaḥ ca anyaḥ ca . pratyayārthaḥ saḥ eva . dhātoḥ ca arthābhedāt pratyayāntareṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3032_2: . dhātoḥ ca arthābhedāt pratyayāntareṣu manyāmahe dhātuḥ eva kriyām āha iti . paktā pacanam pākaḥ iti :
GS24pmbhasuu:3033_0: pratyayārthaḥ anyaḥ ca anyaḥ ca bhavati . prakṛtyarthaḥ saḥ eva. katham punaḥ jñāyate ayam prakṛtyarthaḥ ayam pratyayārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3033_1: iti . siddham tu anvayavyatirekābhyām . anvayāt vyatirekāt ca . kaḥ asau anvayaḥ vyatirekaḥ vā . iha pacati iti ukte kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3033_2: cit śabdaḥ śrūyate : pacśabdaḥ cakārāntaḥ atiśabdaḥ ca pratyayaḥ . arthaḥ api kaḥ cit gamyate : viklittiḥ kartṛtvam ekatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:3033_3: ca . paṭhati iti ukte kaḥ cit śabdaḥ hīyate kaḥ cit upajāyate kaḥ cit anvayī : pacśabdaḥ hīyate paṭhśabdaḥ upajāyate atiśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3034_0: arthaḥ api kaḥ cit hīyate kaḥ cit upajāyate kaḥ cit anvayī : viklittiḥ hīyate paṭhikriyā upajāyate kartṛtvam ca ekatvam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3034_1: anvayī . te manyāmahe : yaḥ śabdaḥ hīyate tasya asau arthaḥ yaḥ arthaḥ hīyate . yaḥ śabdaḥ upajāyate tasya asau arthaḥ yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3034_2: arthaḥ upajāyate . yaḥ śabdaḥ anvayī tasya asau arthaḥ yaḥ arthaḥ anvayī . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . bahavaḥ hi śabdāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3035: ekārthāḥ bhavanti . tat yathā : indraḥ śakraḥ puruhūtaḥ purandaraḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3036_0: kanduḥ koṣṭhaḥ kuśūlaḥ iti . ekaḥ ca śabdaḥ bahvarthaḥ . tat yathā : akṣāḥ pādāḥ māṣāḥ iti . ataḥ kim na sādhīyaḥ arthavattā
GS24pmbhasuu:3036_1: siddhā bhavati . na api brūmaḥ arthavattā na sidhyati iti .varṇitā arthavattā anvayavyatirekābhyām eva . tatra kutaḥ etat
GS24pmbhasuu:3036_2: : ayam prakṛtyarthaḥ ayam pratyayārthaḥ iti na
GS24pmbhasuu:3037_0: punaḥ prakṛtiḥ eva ubhau arthau brūyāt pratyayaḥ eva vā . sāmānyaśabdāḥ ete evam syuḥ . sāmānyaśabdāḥ ca na antareṇa prakaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3037_1: viśeṣam vā viśeṣeṣu avatiṣṭhante . yataḥ tu khalu niyogataḥ pacati iti ukte svabhāvataḥ kasmin cit viśeṣe pacatiśabdaḥ vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:3037_2: ataḥ manyāmahe na ime sāmānyaśabdāḥ iti . na cet sāmānyaśabdāḥ prakṛtiḥ prakṛtyarthe vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:3038: pratyayaḥ pratyayārthe . kriyāviśeṣakaḥ upasargaḥ . pacati iti kriyā
GS24pmbhasuu:3039_0: gamyate . tām praḥ viśinaṣṭi . yadi api tāvat atra etat śakyate vaktum yatra dhātuḥ upasargam vyabhicarati yatra na khalu
GS24pmbhasuu:3039_1: tam vyabhicarati tatra katham : adhyeti , adhīte iti . yadi api atra dhātuḥ upasargam na
GS24pmbhasuu:3040_0: vyabhicarati upasargaḥ tu dhātum vyabhicarati . te manyāmahe : yaḥ eva asya adheḥ anyatra arthaḥ sa iha api iti . kaḥ punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3040_1: anyatra adheḥ arthaḥ . adhiḥ uparibhāve vartate . iha tarhi vyaktam arthāntaram gamyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:3041: tiṣṭhati pratiṣṭhate iti . tiṣṭhati iti vrajikriyāyāḥ nivṛttiḥ pratiṣṭhate iti vrajikriyā gamyate . te manyāmahe upasargakṛtam etat yena atra
GS24pmbhasuu:3042_0: vrajikriyā gamyate . praḥ ayam dṛṣṭāpacāraḥ ādikarmaṇi vartate . na ca idam na asti bahvarthāḥ api dhātavaḥ bhavanti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3042_1: . tat yathā : vapiḥ prakiraṇe ḍṛṣṭaḥ chedane api vartate : keśaśmaśru vapati iti . īḍiḥ stuticodanāyācñāsu dṛṣṭaḥ preraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:3042_2: api vartate : agniḥ vai itaḥ vṛṣṭim īṭṭe marutaḥ amutaḥ cyāvayanti iti . karotiḥ abhūtaprādurbhāve dṛṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3043_0: nirmalīkaraṇe api vartate : pṛṣṭham kuru pācau , kuru . unmṛdāna iti gamyate . nikṣepaṇe ca api vartate : kaṭe kuru , ghaṭe
GS24pmbhasuu:3043_1: kuru , aśmānam itaḥ kuru . sthāpaya iti gamyate . evam iha api tiṣṭhatiḥ eva vrajikriyām āha tiṣṭhatiḥ eva vrajikriyāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3043_2: nivṛttim . ayam tarhi doṣaḥ astibhavatividyatīnām dhātutvam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3045: dhātuḥ iti evam lakṣaṇam kriyeta . katham punaḥ jñāyate bhāvavacanāḥ pacādayaḥ iti . yat eṣām bhavatinā sāmānādhikaraṇyam : bhavati pacati ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3046_0: bhavati pakṣyati , bhavati apākṣīt iti . kaḥ punaḥ bhāvaḥ . bhavateḥ svapadārthaḥ bhavanam bhāvaḥ iti . yadi bhavateḥ svapadārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3046_1: bhavanam bhāvaḥ vipratiṣiddhānām dhātusañjñā na prāpnoti : bhedaḥ , chedaḥ . anyaḥ hi bhāvaḥ anyaḥ hi abhāvaḥ . ātaḥ ca anyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3046_2: bhāvaḥ anyaḥ abhāvaḥ iti . yaḥ hi yasya bhāvam icchati saḥ na tasya abhāvam yasya ca abhāvam na tasya bhāvam . pacādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:3046_3: ca dhātusañjñā na prāpnoti . yathā hi bhavatā
GS24pmbhasuu:3047_0: kriyāvacane dhātau karotinā pacādīnām sāmānādhikaraṇyam nidarśitam na tathā bhāvavacane dhātau nidarśyate . karotiḥ pacācīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:3047_1: sarvān kālān sarvān puruṣān sarvāṇi ca vacanāni anuvartate . bhavatiḥ punaḥ vartamānakālam ca eva ekatvam ca . kā tarhi iyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3047_2: vācoyuktiḥ : bhavati pacati , bhavati pakṣyati , bhavati apākṣīt iti . eṣā eṣā vācoyuktiḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3048: pacādayaḥ kriyāḥ bhavatikriyāyāḥ kartryaḥ bhavanti iti . yadi api tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:3049_0: atra etat śakyate vaktum yatra anyā ca anyā ca kriyā yatra khalu sā eva kriyā tatra katham : bhavet api bhavet , syāt api
GS24pmbhasuu:3049_1: syāt iti . atra api anyatvam asti . kutaḥ . kālabhedāt sādhanabhedāt ca . ekasya atra bhavateḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3050: bhavatiḥ sādhanam sarvakālaḥ ca pratyayaḥ . aparasya bāhyam sādhanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3051: vartamānakālaḥ ca pratyayaḥ . yāvatā atra api anyatvam asti pacādayaḥ ca kriyāḥ bhavatikriyāyāḥ kartryaḥ bhavanti iti astu ayam kartṛsādhanaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3052_0: bhavati iti bhāvaḥ iti . kim kṛtam bhavati . vipratiṣiddhānām dhātusañjñā siddhā bhavati . bhavet vipratiṣiddhānām dhātusañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:3052_1: siddhā syāt prātipadikānām api prāpnoti : vṛkṣaḥ , plakṣaḥ iti . kim kāraṇam . etāni api hi bhavanti . evam tarhi karmasādhanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3053_0: bhāvaḥ iti . kriyā ca eva hi bhāvyate svabhāvasiddham tu dravyam . evam api bhavet keṣām cit na syāt yāni na bhāvyante .
GS24pmbhasuu:3053_1: ye tu ete sambandhiśabdāḥ teṣām prāpnoti : mātā pitā bhrātā iti . sarvathā vayam prātipadikaparyudāsāt na mucyāmahe . paṭhiṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3053_2: hi ācāryaḥ : bhūvādipāṭhaḥ prātipadikāṇapayatyādinivṛttyarthaḥ iti . yāvatā paṭhiṣyati pacādayaḥ ca kriyāḥ bhavatikriyāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3053_3: kartryaḥ bhavanti iti astu ayam kartṛsādhanaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3054: bhavati iti bhāvaḥ . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . etena eva abhihitam sūtreṇa bhūvādayaḥ dhātavaḥ iti . katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:3055: na idam ādigrahaṇam . vadeḥ ayam auṇādikaḥ iñ kartṛsādhanaḥ : bhuvam vadanti iti bhūvādayaḥ iti . bhāvavacane tadarthapratyayapratiṣedhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3056: bhāvavacane dhātau tadarthasya pratyayasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ : śiśye iti . kim ca syāt . aśiti iti āttvam prasajyeta . tat hi dhātoḥ vihitam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3057: itaretarāśrayam ca pratyaye bhāvavacanatvam tasmāt ca pratyayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3058_0: itaretarāśrayam ca bhavati . kā itaretarāśrayatā . pratyaye bhāvavacanatvam tasmāt ca pratyayaḥ . utpanne hi pratyaye bhāvavacanatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:3058_1: gamyate saḥ ca tāvat bhāvavacanāt utpannaḥ . tat etat itaretarāśrayam
GS24pmbhasuu:3059: bhavati . itaretarāśrayāṇi ca na prakalpante . siddham tu nityaśabdatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3060: anāśritya bhāvavacanatvam pratyayaḥ . siddham etat . katham . nityāḥ śabdāḥ . nityeṣu ca śabdeṣu anāśritya bhāvavacanatvam pratyayaḥ utpadyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3062_0: prathamam yaḥ bhāvam āha iti . kutaḥ punaḥ prāthamyam . kim śabdataḥ āhosvit arthataḥ . kim ca ataḥ . yadi śabdataḥ sanādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:3062_1: dhātusañjñā na prāpnoti : putrīyati vastrīyati iti . atha arthataḥ siddhā sanādīnām dhātusañjñā saḥ eva tu doṣaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3062_2: : bhāvavacane tadarthapratyayapratiṣedhaḥ iti . evam tarhi na eva arthataḥ na eva śabdataḥ . kim tarhi . abhidhānataḥ . sumadhyame
GS24pmbhasuu:3063_0: (P_1,3.1.4) KA_I,258.7-21 Ro_II,193-196 iha ye eva bhāvavacane dhātau doṣāḥ te eva kriyāvacane api . tatra te eva parihārāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3063_1: . tatra idam aparihṛtam : astibhavatividyatīnām dhātutvam iti . tasya parihāraḥ . kām punaḥ kriyām bhavān matvā āha astibhavatividyatīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:3064_0: prāpnoti iti . kim yat tat devadattaḥ kaṃsapātryām pāṇinā odanam bhuṅkte iti . na brūmaḥ kārakāṇi kriyā iti . kim tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:3064_1: kārakāṇām pravṛttiviśeṣaḥ kriyā . anyathā ca kārakāṇi śuṣkaudane pravartante anyathā ca māṃsaudane .
GS24pmbhasuu:3065: yadi evam siddhā astibhavatividyatīnām dhātusañjñā . anyathā hi kārakāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:3066: astau pravartante anyathā hi mriyatau . ṣaṭ bhāvavikārāḥ iti ha sma āha
GS24pmbhasuu:3067_0: bhagavān vārṣyāyaṇiḥ : jāyate asti vipariṇamate vardhate apakṣīyate vinaśyati iti . sarvathā sthitaḥ iti atra dhātusañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:3067_1: na prāpnoti . bāhyaḥ hi ebhyaḥ tiṣṭhatiḥ . evam tarhi kriyāyāḥ kriyā nivartikā bhavati dravyam dravyasya nivartakam . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:3067_2: hi kaḥ cit kam cit pṛcchati . kimavasthaḥ devadattasya vyādhiḥ iti . saḥ āha : vardhate iti . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:3068_0: apakṣīyate iti . aparaḥ āha : sthitaḥ iti . sthitaḥ iti ukte vardhateḥ ca apakṣīyateḥ ca nivṛttiḥ bhavati . atha vā na antareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:3068_1: kriyām bhūtabhaviṣyadvartamānāḥ kālāḥ vyajyante . astyādibhiḥ ca api
GS24pmbhasuu:3069: bhūtabhaviṣyadvartamānāḥ kālāḥ vyajyante . atha vā na anyat prṣṭena anyat
GS24pmbhasuu:3070: ākhyeyam . tena na bhaviṣyati kim karoti asti iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3072: kriyāvacanaḥ dhātuḥ iti eṣaḥ pakṣaḥ atha api bhāvavacanaḥ dhātuḥ kim gatam etat iyatā sūtreṇa āhosvit anyatarasmin pakṣe bhūyaḥ sūtram kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3073: gatam iti āha . katham . ayam ādiśabdaḥ asti eva vyavasthāyām vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3074: tat yathā : devadattādīn samupaviṣṭān āha : devadattādayaḥ ānīyantām iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3075: te utthāpya ānīyante . asti prakāre vartate . tat yathā : devadattādayaḥ āḍhyāḥ abhirūpāḥ darśanīyāḥ pakṣavantaḥ . devadattaprakārāḥ iti gamyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3076: pratyekam ca ādiśabdaḥ parisamāpyate . bhvādayaḥ iti ca vādayaḥ iti ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:3077: tat yadā tāvat kriyāvacanaḥ dhātuḥ iti eṣaḥ pakṣaḥ tadā bhū iti atra yaḥ ādiśabdaḥ saḥ vyavasthāyām vartate vā iti atra yaḥ ādiśabdaḥ saḥ prakāre .
GS24pmbhasuu:3078_0: bhū iti evamādayaḥ vā iti evamprakārāḥ iti . yadā tu bhāvavacanaḥ dhātuḥ iti eṣaḥ pakṣaḥ tadā vā iti atra yaḥ ādiśabdaḥ saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3078_1: vyavasthāyām bhū iti atra yaḥ ādiśabdaḥ saḥ prakāre . vā iti evamādayaḥ bhū iti evamprakārāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3079: iti . yadi tarhi lakṣaṇam kriyate na idānīm pāṭhaḥ kartavyaḥ . kartavyaḥ ca . kim prayojanam . bhūvādipāṭhaḥ prātipadikāṇapayatyādinivṛttyarthaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3081_0: prātipadikāṇapayatyādinivṛttyarthaḥ . prātipadikanivṛttyarthaḥ āṇapayatyādinivṛttyarthaḥ ca . ke punaḥ āṇapayatyādayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3081_1: āṇapayati vaṭṭati vaḍḍhati iti . svarānubandhajñāpanāya ca . svarānubandhajñāpanāya ca pāṭhaḥ kartavyaḥ : svarān anubandhān
GS24pmbhasuu:3081_2: ca jñāsyāmi iti . na hi antareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:3082_0: pātham svarāḥ anubandhāḥ vā śakyāḥ vijñātum . ye tu ete nyāyyavikaraṇāḥ udāttāḥ ananubandhakāḥ paṭhyante eteṣām pāṭhaḥ śakyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3082_1: akartum . eteṣām api avaśyam āṇapayatyādinivṛttyarthaḥ pāṭhaḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3083: śiṣṭaprayogāt āṇapayatyādīnām nivṛttiḥ bhaviṣyati . saḥ ca avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3084: śiṣṭaprayogaḥ upāsyaḥ ye api paṭhyante teṣām api viparyāsanivṛttyarthaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3085: loke hi kṛṣyarthe kasim prayuñjate dṛśyarthe ca diśim .
GS24pmbhasuu:3086_0: (P_1,3.2.1) KA_I,259.16-23 Ro_II,198-199 upadeśe iti kimartham . abhre āṃ apaḥ : uddeśe yaḥ anunāsikaḥ tasya mā bhūt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3086_1: . kaḥ punaḥ uddeśopadeśayoḥ viśeṣaḥ . pratyakṣam ākhyānam upadeśaḥ , guṇaiḥ prāpaṇam uddeśaḥ . pratyakṣam tāvat ākhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:3086_2: upadeśaḥ . tat yathā : agojñāya kaḥ cit gām sakhthani karṇe vā gṛhītvā upadiśati : ayam gauḥ iti . saḥ pratyakṣam ākhyātam
GS24pmbhasuu:3086_3: āha : upadiṣṭaḥ me gauḥ iti . guṇaiḥ prāpaṇam uddeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3087: . tat yathā : kaḥ cit kam cit āha : devadattam me bhavān uddiśatu iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3088: saḥ ihasthaḥ pāṭaliputrastham devadattam uddiśati : aṅgadī kuṇḍalī kirīṭī
GS24pmbhasuu:3089: vyūḍhoraskaḥ vṛttabāhuḥ lohitākṣaḥ tuṅganāsaḥ citrābharaṇaḥ īdṛśaḥ devadattaḥ iti . saḥ guṇaiḥ prāpyamāṇam āha : uddiṣṭaḥ me devadattaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3090: (P_1,3.2.2) KA_I,259.24-261.3 Ro_II,199-202 itsañjñāyām sarvaprasaṅgaḥ aviśeṣāt . itsañjñāyām sarvaprasaṅgaḥ . sarvasya anunāsikasya itsañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:3091_0: prāpnoti . asya api prāpnoti : abhre āṃ apaḥ . kim kāraṇam . aviśeṣāt . na hi kaḥ cit viśeṣaḥ : upādīyate evañjātīyakasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3091_1: anunāsikasya itsañjñā bhavati iti . anupādīyamāne viśeṣe sarvaprasaṅgaḥ . kim ucyate anupādīyamāne viśeṣe iti . katham na
GS24pmbhasuu:3091_2: nāma upādīyate yadā upadeśe iti ucyate . lakṣaṇena hi upadeśaḥ . saṅkīrṇau uddeśopadeśau . pratyakṣam ākhyānam uddeśaḥ guṇaiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3091_3: ca prāpaṇam upadeśaḥ . pratyakṣam tāvat ākhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:3092: uddeśaḥ . tat yathā : kaḥ cit kam cit āha : anuvākam me bhavān uddiśatu iti . saḥ tasmai ācaṣṭe : iṣetvakam adhīṣva . śannodevīyam adhīṣva iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3093: saḥ pratyakṣam ākhyātam āha : uddiṣṭaḥ me anuvākaḥ . tam adhyeṣye iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3094: guṇaiḥ ca prāpaṇam upadeśaḥ . tat yathā : kaḥ cit kam cit āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:3095_0: grāmantaram gamiṣyāmi . panthānam me bhavān upadiśatu iti . saḥ tasmai ācaṣṭe : amuṣmin avakāśe hastadakṣiṇaḥ grahītavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3095_1: , amuṣmin hastavāmaḥ iti . saḥ guṇaiḥ prāpyamāṇam āha : upadiṣṭaḥ me panthāḥ iti . evam etau saṅkīrṇau uddeśopadeśau . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:3096: . nanu ca lopaḥ eva itkāryam syāt . akāryam lopaḥ . iha hi śabdasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3097: dvyarthaḥ upadeśaḥ . kāryārthaḥ vā bhavati upadeśaḥ śravaṇārthaḥ vā .
GS24pmbhasuu:3098: kāryam ca iha na asti . kārye ca asati yadi śravaṇam api na syāt upadeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3099: anarthakaḥ syāt . idam asti itkāryam : abhre āṃ aṭitaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3100: anantaralakṣaṇāyām itsañjñāyām satyām āditaḥ ca iti iṭpratiṣedhaḥ prasajyeta . siddham tu upadeśane anunāsikavacanāt . siddham etat katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:3101_0: upadeśane yaḥ anunāsikaḥ saḥ itsañjñaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . kim punaḥ upadeśanam . śāstram . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate

GS24pmbhasuu:3182: parasmaipadānām ṇalatususthalathusaṇalvamāḥ iti ṇalādayaḥ bahavaḥ parasmaipadānām iti ekaḥ śabdaḥ . vaiṣamyāt saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3183: ḍāraurasaḥ prathamasya . ḍāraurasaḥ bahavaḥ prathamasya iti ekaḥ śabdaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3184: vaiṣamyāt saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ na prāpnoti . ecaḥ ayavāyāvaḥ . ayavāyāvaḥ bahavaḥ ecaḥ iti ekaḥ śabdaḥ . vaiṣamyāt saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3185: astu tarhi arthataḥ . arthataḥ cet lṛluṭornandyarīhaṇasindhutakṣaśilādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3187: syatāsīlṛluṭoḥ . syatāsī dvau lṛluṭoḥ iti asya trayaḥ arthāḥ . vaiṣamyāt saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ na prāpnoti . nandigrahipacādibhyaḥ lyuṇinyacaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3188: nandyādayaḥ bahavaḥ lyuṇinyacaḥ trayaḥ . vaiṣamyāt saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:3189: prāpnoti . arīhaṇādayaḥ bahavaḥ vuñādayaḥ saptadaśa . vaiṣamyāt saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ na prāpnoti . sindhutakṣaśilādibhyaḥ aṇañau .
GS24pmbhasuu:3190: sindhutakṣaśilādayaḥ bahavaḥ aṇañau dvau . vaiṣamyāt saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:3193: ātmanepadavidhiḥ ca na sidhyati . anudāttaṅitaḥ ātmanepadam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3194_0: anudāttaṅitau dvau ātmanepadam iti asya dvau arthau . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti . niṣṭhā . radābhyām niṣṭhātaḥ naḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3194_1: pūrvasya ca daḥ iti . rephadakārau dvau niṣṭhā iti asya dvau arthau . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti . sārvadhātukadvigrahaṇeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3195_0: śnasoḥ allopaḥ śnamastī dvau sārvadhātukam iti asya dvau arthau . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti . eṅaḥ pūrvatve pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3195_1: . eṅaḥ pūrvatve pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . eṅaḥ padāntāt ati ṅasiṅasoḥ ca . ṅasiṅasau dvau eṅ
GS24pmbhasuu:3196_0: iti asya dvau arthau . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti . astu tarhi śabdataḥ . nanu ca uktam saṅkhyāsāmyam śabdataḥ cet ṇalādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3196_1: parasmaipadānām ḍāraurasaḥ prathamasya ayavāyāvaḥ ecaḥ iti anirdeśaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3197_0: na eṣaḥ doṣāḥ . sthāne antaratamaḥ iti anena vyavasthā bhaviṣyati . kutaḥ āntaryam . ekārthasya ekārthaḥ dvyarthasya dvyarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3197_1: bahvarthasya bahvarthaḥ . saṃvṛtāvarṇasya saṃvṛtāvarṇaḥ vivṛtāvarṇasya vivṛtāvarṇaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3198_0: atiprasaṅgaḥ guṇavṛddhipratiṣedhe kṅiti . atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati guṇavṛddhipratiṣedhe kṅiti . guṇavṛddhī dve kṅitau dvau .
GS24pmbhasuu:3198_1: tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . gakāraḥ api atra nirdiśyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3199: tat gakāragrahaṇam api kartavyam . na kartavyam . kriyate nyāse eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:3200: kakāre gakāraḥ cartvabhūtaḥ nirdiśyate . giti kiti ṅiti iti . udi kūle rujivahoḥ . udikūle dve rujivahau dvau . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3201: na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na udiḥ upapadam . kim tarhi . viśeṣaṇam rujivahoḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3202: utpūrvābhyām rujivahibhyām kūle upapade iti . tacchīlādiṣu dhātutrigrahaṇeṣu . tacchīlādiṣu dhātutrigrahaṇeṣu doṣaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3203: vidibhidicchideḥ kurac . vidibhidicchidayaḥ trayaḥ tacchīlādayaḥ trayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3204: tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti . ghañādiṣu dvigrahaṇeṣu . ghañādiṣu dvigrahaṇeṣu doṣaḥ bhavati . nirabhyoḥ pūlvoḥ . nirabhī dvau pūlvau dvau .
GS24pmbhasuu:3205: tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . iṣyate ca atra
GS24pmbhasuu:3206: saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ : niṣpāvaḥ , abhilāvaḥ iti . evam tarhi akartari ca kārake bhāve ca iti dvau pūlvau ca dvau . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3207: . ave tṝstroḥ karaṇādhikaraṇayoḥ . tṝstrau dvau karaṇādhikaraṇe dve .
GS24pmbhasuu:3208_0: tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti . kartṛkarmaṇoḥ ca bhūkṛñoḥ . kartṛkarmaṇī dve bhūkṛñau dvau . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3208_1: . anavakḷptyamarṣayoḥ akiṃvṛtte api . anavakḷptyamarṣau dvau kiṃvṛttākiṃvṛtte dve . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti . kṛbhvoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3209_0: dvau . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti . adhīyānaviduṣoḥ chandobrāhmaṇāni . chandobrāhmaṇāni iti dve adhīte veda iti ca dvau
GS24pmbhasuu:3209_1: . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti . ropadhetoḥ pathidūtayoḥ . ropadhetoḥ prācām tat gacchati pathidūtayoḥ . ropadhetau dvau
GS24pmbhasuu:3209_2: pathidūtau dvau . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti . tatra bhavataḥ tasya vyākhyānaḥ kratuyajñebhyaḥ . tatra bhavatastasyavyākhyānau
GS24pmbhasuu:3210: tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti . saṅghādiṣu añprabhṛtayaḥ ṣaṅghādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3211: añprabhṛtayaḥ saṅkhyātānudeśena na sidhyanti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3212_0: ghoṣagrahaṇam atra kartavyam . veśoyaśāadeḥ bhagāt yalkhau . veśoyaśāadī dvau yalkhau dvau . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3212_1: . ṅasiṅasoḥ khyatyāt parasya . ṅasiṅasau dvau khyatyau dvau . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3213: na vā samānayogavacanāt . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3214_0: samānayogavacanāt . samānayoge saṅkhyātānudeśam vakṣyāmi . tasya doṣaḥ vidaḥ laṭaḥ vā . tasya etasya lakṣaṇasya doṣaḥ vidaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3214_1: laṭaḥ vā iti saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ na prāpnoti . dhmādhetṭoḥ nāḍīmuṣṭyoḥ ca . dhmādhetṭoḥ nāḍīmuṣṭyoḥ ca saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3214_2: . khalagorathāt initrakaṭyacaḥ ca . saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ na prāpnoti . sindhvapakarābhyām kan aṇañau ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:3215_0: saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ na prāpnoti . yuṣmadasmadoḥ ca ādeśāḥ . yuṣmadasmadoḥ ca ādeśāḥ saṅkhyātānudeśena na sidhyanti . tasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3215_1: yasmin pakṣe alpīyāṃsaḥ doṣāḥ tām āsthāya pratividheyam doṣeṣu . atha vā evam vakṣyāmi .
GS24pmbhasuu:3216_0: yathāsaṅkhyam anudeśaḥ samānām svaritena . tataḥ adhikāraḥ . adhikāraḥ ca bhavati svaritena iti . evam api svaritam dṛṣṭvā
GS24pmbhasuu:3216_1: sandehaḥ syāt . na jñāyate kim ayam samasaṅkhyārthaḥ āhosvit adhikārārthaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3217: sandehamātram etat bhavati . sarvasandeheṣu ca idam upatiṣṭhate vyākhyānataḥ viśeṣapratipattiḥ na hi sandehāt alakṣaṇam iti samasaṅkhyārthaḥ iti vyākhyāsyāmaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3219: adhikāraḥ pratiyogam tasya anirdeśārthaḥ . adhikāraḥ kriyate pratiyogam
GS24pmbhasuu:3220: tasya anirdeśārthaḥ iti . kim idam pratiyogam iti . yogam yogam prati
GS24pmbhasuu:3221_0: pratiyogam . yoge yoge tasya grahaṇam mā kārṣam iti . kim gatam etat iyatā sūtreṇa . gatam iti āha . kutaḥ . lokataḥ . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:3221_1: yathā loke adhikṛtaḥ asau grāme adhikṛtaḥ asau nagare iti ucyate yaḥ yatra vyāpāram gacchati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3222_0: śabdena ca api adhikṛtena kaḥ anyaḥ vyāpāraḥ śakyaḥ avagantum anyat ataḥ yoge yoge upasthānāt . na vā nirdiśyamānādhikṛtatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3222_1: yathā loke . na vā etat prayojanam . kim kāraṇam . nirdiśyamānādhikṛtatvāt yathā loke .
GS24pmbhasuu:3223: nirdiśyamānam adhikṛtam gamyate . tat yathā . devadattāya gauḥ dīyatām
GS24pmbhasuu:3224: yajñadattāya viṣṇumitrāya iti . gauḥ iti gamyate . evam iha api
GS24pmbhasuu:3225: padarujaviśaspṛśaḥ ghañ sṛ sthire bhāve . ghañ iti gamyate . anyanirdeśaḥ tu nivartakaḥ tasmāt paribhāṣā . anyanirdeśaḥ tu loke nivartakaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3226: tat yathā . devadattāya gauḥ dīyatām yajñadattāya kambalaḥ viṣṇumitrāya ca iti . kambalaḥ gonivartakaḥ bhavati . evam iha api abhividhau bhāve inuṇ
GS24pmbhasuu:3227: ghañaḥ nivartakaḥ syāt . tasmāt paribhāṣā kartavyā .
GS24pmbhasuu:3228_0: (P_1,3.11.2) KA_I,272.11-273.5 Ro_II,229-230 adhikāraparimāṇājñānam tu . adhikāraparimāṇājñānam tu bhavati . na jñāyate kiyantam
GS24pmbhasuu:3228_1: avadhim adhikāraḥ anuvartate iti . adhikāraparimāṇajñānārtham tu .
GS24pmbhasuu:3229: adhikāraparimāṇajñānārtham eva tarhi ayam yogaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3230_0: adhikāraparimāṇam jñāsyāmi iti . katham punaḥ svaritena adhikāraḥ iti anena adhikāraparimāṇam śakyam vijñātum . evam vakṣyāmi
GS24pmbhasuu:3230_1: svarite na adhikāraḥ iti . svaritam dṛṣṭvā adhikāraḥ na bhavati iti . kena idānīm adhikāraḥ bhaviṣyati . laukikaḥ adhikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3230_2: . na adhikāraḥ iti cet uktam kim uktam . anyanirdeśaḥ tu nivartakaḥ tasmāt paribhāṣā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3231: adhikārārtham eva tarhi ayam yogaḥ vaktavyaḥ . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:3232: adhikāraparimāṇājñānam tu iti . yāvatithaḥ al anubandhaḥ tāvataḥ yogān iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3233: vacanāt siddham . yāvatithaḥ al anubadhyate tāvataḥ yogān adhikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3234: anuvartate iti vaktavyam . atha idānīm yatra alpīyāṃsaḥ alaḥ bhūyasaḥ ca yogān adhikāraḥ anuvartate katham tatra kartavyam . bhūyasi prāgvacanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3235_0: bhūyasi prāgvacanam kartavyam . prāk amutaḥ iti vaktavyam . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . sandehamātram etat bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3235_1: . sarvasandeheṣu ca idam upatiṣṭhate vyākhyānataḥ viśeṣapratipattiḥ na hi sandehāt alakṣaṇam iti . prāk amutaḥ iti vyākhyāsyāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3235_2: . yadi evam na arthaḥ anena . kena idānīm adhikāraḥ bhaviṣyati . laukikaḥ adhikāraḥ . nanu ca uktam na adhikāraḥ iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:3235_3: uktam . kim uktam . anyanirdeśaḥ tu nivartakaḥ tasmāt paribhāṣā . sandehamātram etat bhavati . sarvasandeheṣu ca idam
GS24pmbhasuu:3236: upatiṣṭhate vyākhyānataḥ viśeṣapratipattiḥ na hi sandehāt alakṣaṇam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3237: inuṇ ghañ iti sandehe ghañ iti vyākhyāsyāmaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3238: (P_1,3.11.3) KA_I,273.6-25 Ro_II,230-232 na tarhi idānīm ayam yogaḥ vaktavyaḥ . vaktavyaḥ ca . kim prayojanam . svaritena adhikāragatiḥ yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:3239: vijñāyeta , adhikam kāryam , adhikaḥ kāraḥ . adhikāragatiḥ : gostriyoḥ upasarjanam iti atra goṭāṅgrahaṇam coditam . tat na kartavyam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3240_0: strīgrahaṇam svarayiṣyate . svaritena adhikāragatiḥ bhavati iti striyām iti evam prakṛtya ye pratyayāḥ vihitāḥ teṣām grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3240_1: vijñāsyate . tatra svaritena adhikāragatiḥ bhavati iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . adhikam kāryam :
GS24pmbhasuu:3241_0: apādānam ācāryaḥ kim nyāyyam manyate . yatra prāpya nivṛttiḥ . tena iha eva syāt : grāmāt āgacchati . nagarāt āgacchati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3241_1: sāṅkāśyakebhyaḥ pāṭaliputrakāḥ abhirūpatarāḥ iti atra na syāt . svaritena adhikarm kāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:3242: bhavati iti atra api siddham bhavati . tathā adhikaraṇam ācāryaḥ kim nyāyyam manyate . yatra kṛtsnaḥ ādhārātmā vyāptaḥ bhavati . tena iha eva
GS24pmbhasuu:3243: syāt : tileṣu tailam . dadhni sarpiḥ iti . gaṅgāyām gāvaḥ . kūpe gargakulam iti atra na syāt . svaritena adhikarm kāryam bhavati iti atra
GS24pmbhasuu:3244_0: api siddham bhavati . adhikam kāryam . adhikaḥ kāraḥ : pūrvavipratiṣedhāḥ na paṭhitavyāḥ bhavanti . guṇavṛddhyauttvatṛjvadbhāvebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3244_1: num pūrvavipratiṣiddham numaciratṛjvadbhāvebhyaḥ nuṭ iti . numnuṭau svarayiṣyete . tatra svaritena adhikaḥ kāraḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3244_2: iti numnuṭau bhaviṣyataḥ . katham punaḥ adhikaḥ kāraḥ iti anena pūrvavipratiṣedhāḥ śakya na paṭhitum . lokataḥ . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:3244_3: loke adhikam ayam kāram karoti iti ucyate yaḥ ayam durbalaḥ san balavadbhiḥ saha bhāram vahati . evam iha api
GS24pmbhasuu:3245: adhikam ayam kāram karoti iti ucyate yaḥ ayam pūrvaḥ san param bādhate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3246: adhikāragatiḥ stryarthā viśeṣāya adhikam kāryam . atha yaḥ anyaḥ adhikaḥ kāraḥ pūrvavipratiṣedhārthaḥ saḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3247: (P_1,3.12.1) KA_I,274.2-11 Ro_II,233 vikaraṇebhyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . cinutaḥ sunutaḥ lunītaḥ punītaḥ . ṅitaḥ iti ātmanepadam
GS24pmbhasuu:3248: prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na evam vijñāyate ṅakāraḥ it asya saḥ ayam ṅit
GS24pmbhasuu:3249: ṅitaḥ iti . katham tarhi . ṅakāraḥ eva it ṅit ṅitaḥ . atha vā upadeśe iti vartate . atha vā uktam etat siddham tu pūrvasya kāryātideśāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3250: sarvathā caṅaṅbhyām prāpnoti . evam tarhi dhātoḥ iti vartate . kva prakṛtam . bhūvādayaḥ dhātavaḥ iti . tat vai prathamānirdiṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:3251: pañcamīnirdiṣṭena ca iha arthaḥ . arthāt vibhaktivipariṇāmaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3252: tat yathā . uccāni devadattasya gṛhāṇi . āmantrayasva enam . devadattam iti gamyate . devadattasya gāvaḥ aśvāḥ hiraṇyam iti . āḍhyaḥ vaidhaveyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3253_0: devadattaḥ iti gamyate . purastāt ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭam sat arthāt dvitīyānirdiṣṭam prathamānirdiṣṭam ca bhavati . evam iha api
GS24pmbhasuu:3253_1: purastāt prathamānirdiṣṭam sat arthāt pañcamīnirdiṣṭam bhaviṣyati (P_1,3.12.2) KA_I,274.11-275.15 Ro_II,233-237 kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:3254_0: ucyate . ātmanepadavacanam niyamārtham . niyamārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . kim ucyate niyamārthaḥ ayam iti na punaḥ vidhyarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3254_1: api syāt . lavidhānāt vihitam . lavidhānāt hi ātmanepadam parasmaipadam ca vihitam . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3254_2: . vikaraṇaiḥ tu vyavahitatvāt niyamaḥ na prāpnoti . idam iha sampradhāryam . vikaraṇāḥ kriyantām niyamaḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3254_3: . paratvāt vikaraṇāḥ . nityāḥ khalu api vikaraṇāḥ . kṛte api niyame prāpnuvanti akṛte api prāpnuvanti . nityatvāt paratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3255_0: vikaraṇeṣu kṛteṣu vikaraṇaiḥ vyavahitatvāt niyamaḥ na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . anavakāśaḥ niyamaḥ . sāvakāśaḥ . kaḥ avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3255_1: . ye ete lugvikaraṇāḥ śluvikaraṇāḥ liṅliṭau ca . yadi punaḥ iyam paribhāṣā vijñāyeta . kim kṛtam bhavati . kāryakālam sañjñāparibhāṣam
GS24pmbhasuu:3255_2: yatra kāryam tatra draṣṭavyam . lasya tibādayaḥ bhavanti iti upasthitam idam bhavati anudāttaṅitaḥ ātmanepadam śeṣāt kartari
GS24pmbhasuu:3255_3: parasmaipadam iti . evam api itaretarāśrayam bhavati . kā itaretarāśrayatā . abhinirvṛttānām lasya sthāne tibādīnām ātmanepadaparasmaipadasañjñayā
GS24pmbhasuu:3256_0: tibādayaḥ bhāvyante . tat itaretarāśrayam bhavati . itaretarāśrayāṇi kāryāṇi ca na prakalpante . parasmaipadeṣu tāvat na
GS24pmbhasuu:3256_1: itaretarāśrayam bhavati . parasmaipadānukramaṇam na kariṣyate . avaśyam kartavyam anuparābhyām kṛñaḥ iti evamartham . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:3256_2: ca etat api ātmanepadānukramaṇe eva kariṣye . svaritañitaḥ kartrabhipraye kriyāphale ātmanepadam bhavati kartari . anuparābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:3256_3: kṛñaḥ na iti . ātmanepadeṣu ca api na itaretarāśrayam bhavati . katham . bhāvinī sañjñā vijñāsyate

GS24pmbhasuu:3784: nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na hi antareṇa bhāvapratyayam guṇapradhānaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3785: nirdeśaḥ . iha ca : iti eke manyante , tat eke manyante iti paratvāt ekavacanam prāpnoti . bahuṣu bahuvacanam iti eṣaḥ yogaḥ paraḥ kariṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3786: sūtraviparyāsaḥ kṛtaḥ bhavati . iha ca : bahuḥ odanaḥ , bahuḥ sūpaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3787: paratvāt bahuvacanam prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yat tāvat ucyate na hi antareṇa bhāvaprayayam guṇapradhānaḥ bhavati nirdeśaḥ iti tan na .
GS24pmbhasuu:3788_0: antareṇa api bhāvapratyayam guṇapradhānaḥ bhavati nirdeśaḥ . katham . iha kadā cit guṇaḥ guṇiviśeṣakaḥ bhavati . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:3788_1: paṭaḥ śuklaḥ iti . kadā cit ca guṇinā guṇaḥ vypadiśyate . paṭhasya śuklaḥ iti . tat yadā tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:3789: guṇaḥ guṇiviśeṣakaḥ bhavati paṭaḥ śuklaḥ iti tadā sāmānādhikaraṇyam guṇaguṇinoḥ . tadā na antareṇa bhāvapratyayam guṇapradhānaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3790_0: nirdeśaḥ . yadā tu guṇinā guṇaḥ vyapadiśyate paṭasya śuklaḥ iti svapradhānaḥ tadā guṇaḥ bhavati . tadā dravye ṣaṣṭhī . tadā
GS24pmbhasuu:3790_1: antareṇa bhāvapratyayam guaṇapradhānaḥ bhavati nirdeśaḥ . na ca iha vayam ekatvādibhiḥ karmādīn viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . kim tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:3790_2: . karmādibhiḥ ekatvādīn viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . katham . ekasmin ekavacanam . kasyaikasmin . karmaṇaḥ .

GS24pmbhasuu:3793_3: yathā sadhamādaḥ dyumnaḥ ekāḥ tāḥ . anyāḥ iti arthaḥ . tat yaḥ anyārthe vartate tasya eṣaḥ prayogaḥ .

GS24pmbhasuu:3799: iṣyate ca avyatikaraḥ syāt iti . tat ca antareṇa yatnam na sidhyati iti niyamārtham vacanam . evamartham idam ucyate . atha etasmin niyamārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:3800_0: sati kim punaḥ ayam pratyayaniyamaḥ : ekasmin eva ekavacanam , dvayoḥ eva dvivacanam , bahuṣu eva bahuvacanam iti . āhosvit
GS24pmbhasuu:3800_1: arthaniyamaḥ : ekasmin ekavacanam eva , dvayoḥ dvivacanam eva , bahuṣu bahuvacanam eva iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:3800_2: pratyayaniyame avyayānām padasañjñābhāvaḥ asubantatvāt . tatra pratyayaniyame avyayānām padasañjñā na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3801: uccaiḥ nīcaiḥ iti . kim kāraṇam . asubantatvāt . arthaniyame siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:3802: arthaniyame siddham bhavati . astu arthaniyamaḥ . atha vā punaḥ astu pratyayaniyamaḥ . nanu ca uktam : tatra pratyayaniyame avyayānām
GS24pmbhasuu:3803: padasañjñābhāvaḥ asubantatvāt iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . supām karmādayaḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:3804: arthāḥ saṅkhyā ca eva tathā tiṅām . supām saṅkhyā ca eva arthaḥ karmādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3805: ca . tathā tiṅām . prasiddhaḥ niyamaḥ tatra . prasiddhaḥ tatra niyamaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3806: niyamaḥ prakṛteṣu vā . atha vā prakṛtān arthān apekṣya niyamaḥ . ke ca prakṛtāḥ . ekatvādayaḥ . ekasmin eva ekavacanam na dvayoḥ na bahuṣu .

GS24pmbhasuu:3816_1: ca vṛkṣasya parṇam patati iti . apādānasañjñā ca prāpnoti . kva . vṛkṣasya parṇam patati .

GS24pmbhasuu:3821: karmasañjñāprasaṅgaḥ ca akathitasya brāhmaṇasya putram panthānam pṛcchati iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kārakaḥ iti mahatī sañjñā kriyate . sañjñā ca nāma

GS24pmbhasuu:3830_1: . eṣaḥ dhikaraṇasya pākaḥ . etat adhikaraṇasya kartṛtvam . edhāḥ pakṣyanti ā viklitteḥ jvaliṣyanti iti jvalvanakriyā karaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3830_2: pākaḥ . edhāḥ pakṣyanti viklitteḥ jvaliṣyanti iti kurvanti kāṣṭhāni pacanti iti ucyante . tatra tadā paciḥ vartate . eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3831_0: udyamananipātanāni kartuḥ chidikriyā . udyamananipātanāni kurvan devadattaḥ chinatti iti ucyate . tatra tadā chidiḥ vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:3831_1: . eṣaḥ pradhānakartuḥ chedaḥ . etat pradhānakartuḥ kartṛtvam . yat tat na tṛṇena tatparaśoḥ chedanam . yat tat samāne udyamane

GS24pmbhasuu:3834: apādānādīnām tu aprasiddhiḥ . apādānādīnām kartṛtvasya aprasiddhiḥ . yathā hi bhavatā karaṇādhikaraṇayoḥ kartṛtvam nirdarśitam na tathā apādānādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:3835: kartṛtvam nidarśyate . na vā svatantraparatantratvāt tayoḥ paryāyeṇa vacanam vacanāśrayā ca sañjñā . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3836: svatantraparatantratvāt . sarvatra eva atra svātantryam pāratantryam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3837_0: vivakṣitam . tayoḥ paryāyeṇa vacanam . tayoḥ svātantryapāratantryayoḥ paryāyeṇa vacanam bhaviṣyati . vacanāśrayā ca sañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:3837_1: bhaviṣyati . tat yathā . balāhakāt vidyotate . balāhake vidyotate . balāhakaḥ vidyotate iti

GS24pmbhasuu:3838_1: karaṇādhikaraṇayoḥ kartṛtvam nidarśitam apādānīnām kartṛtvanirdarśanāya . paryāptaḥ hyekaḥ pulākaḥ sthālyāḥ nirdarśanāya
GS24pmbhasuu:3838_2: . kim tarhi . sañjñāyāḥ aprasiddhiḥ . yāvatā sarvatra eva atra svātantryam vidyate pāratantryam ca tatra paratvāt kartṛsañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:3838_3: eva prāpnoti . atra api na vā svatantryaparatantratvāt tayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3839: paryāyeṇa vacanam vacanāśrayā ca sañjñā iti eva . yathā punaḥ idam
GS24pmbhasuu:3840: sthālyāḥ svātantryam nidarśitam sambhavanakriyām dhāraṇakriyām ca kurvatī sthālī svatantrā iti kva idānīm paratantrā syāt . yat tat prakṣālanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3841: parivartanam vā . na vai evamartham sthālī upādiyate prakṣālanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3842_0: parivartanam ca kariṣyāmi iti . katham tarhi . sambhavanakriyām dhāraṇakriyām ca kariṣyati iti . tatra ca sau svatantrā .
GS24pmbhasuu:3842_1: kva idānīm paratantrā . evam tarhi sthālīsthe yatne kathyamāne sthālī svatantrā kartṛsthe yatne kathyamāne paratantrā . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:3843_0: yatne kathyamāne sthālī sambhavanakriyām dhāraṇakriyām ca karoti . tatra asau svatantrā . kva idānīm paratantrā . evam tarhi

GS24pmbhasuu:4148_5: . śeṣe prathamaḥ eva bhavati na anyaḥ iti . upapadaniyame śeṣagrahaṇam śakyam akartum .

GS24pmbhasuu:4153_1: madhyamāt asmadi uttamaḥ pratiṣedhena . yuṣmadi madhyamāt asmadi uttamaḥ iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena . yuṣmadi madhyamaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:4156: vipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . yadā ca ekaśeṣaḥ na . kadā ca ekaśeṣaḥ na .

GS24pmbhasuu:4158: ekaśeṣena na bhavitavyam . tvam ca aham ca pacasi pacāmi ca iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4159_0: kriyāpṛthaktve ca dravyapṛthaktvadarśanam anumānam uttaratra anekaśeṣabhāvasya . kriyāpṛthaktve ca dravyapṛthaktvam dṛśyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4159_1: . tat yathā pacasi pacāmi ca tvam ca aham ca iti . tat anumānam uttarayoḥ api kriyayoḥ ekaśeṣaḥ na bhavati iti . evam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4159_2: kṛtvā saḥ pi adoṣaḥ bhavati yat uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:4160: tatra yuṣmadasmadanyeṣu prathamapratiṣedhaḥ śeṣatvāt iti . tatra api hi
GS24pmbhasuu:4161: evam bhavitavyam tvam ca devadattaḥ ca pacasi pacati ca . aham ca devadattaḥ ca pacāmi pacati ca iti . yat tāvat ucyate na vā yuṣmadasmadoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4162: anekaśeṣabhāvāt tadadhikaraṇānām api anekaśeṣabhāvāt avipratiṣedhaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4163_0: dṛśyate hi yuṣmadasmadoḥ cānekaśeṣaḥ tadadhikaraṇānām ca ekaśeṣaḥ . tat yathā tvam ca aham ca vṛttrahan ubhau samprayujyāvahai
GS24pmbhasuu:4163_1: iti . yat api ucyate kriyāpṛthaktve ca dravyapṛthaktvadarśanam anumānam uttaratra
GS24pmbhasuu:4164_0: anekaśeṣabhāvasya iti . kriyāpṛthaktve khalu api dravyaikaśeṣaḥ bhavati iti dṛśyate . tat yathā akṣāḥ bhajyantām bhakṣyantām
GS24pmbhasuu:4164_1: dīvyantām iti . evam ca kṛtvā saḥ api doṣo bhavati yat uktam tatra yuṣmadasmadanyeṣu prathamapratiṣedhaḥ śeṣatvāt iti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:4165: tu yuṣmadasmadoḥ pratiṣedhāt iti . saḥ tarhi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . śeṣe prathamaḥ vidhīyate . na hi śeṣaḥ ca anyaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4166: śeṣagrahaṇena gṛhyate . bhavet prathamaḥ na syān . madhyamottamau api na

GS24pmbhasuu:4168: na ca yuṣmadasmadī anyaḥ ca yuṣmadasmadgrahaṇena gṛhyate . yat atra yuṣmat
GS24pmbhasuu:4169: yat ca asmat tattadāśrayau madhyamottamau bhaviṣyataḥ . yathā eva tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:4170_0: yat atra yuṣmat yat ca smat tadāśrayau madhyamottamau bhavataḥ evam yaḥ atra śeṣaḥ tadāśrayaḥ prathamaḥ prāpnoti . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:4170_1: śeṣe upapade prathamaḥ vidhīyate . upoccāri padam upapadam . yat ca atra upoccāri na saḥ śeṣaḥ yaḥ ca śeṣaḥ na tat upoccāri
GS24pmbhasuu:4171_0: madhyamottamau api na prāpnutaḥ . kim kāraṇam . yuṣmadasmadoḥ upapadayoḥ madhyamottamau ucyete . upoccāri padam upapadam
GS24pmbhasuu:4171_1: . yat ca atra upoccāri na te yuṣmadasmadī ye ca yuṣmadasmadī na tat upoccāri . evam tarhi śeṣeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:4172: sāmānādhikaraṇye prathamaḥ vidhīyate . na ca atra śeṣeṇa eva sāmānādhikaraṇyam . bhavet prathamaḥ na syāt . madhyamottamau api na
GS24pmbhasuu:4173: prāpnutaḥ . kim kāraṇam . yuṣmadasmadbhyām sāmānādhikaraṇye madhyamottamau
GS24pmbhasuu:4174: ucyete na ca atra yuṣmadasmadbhyām eva sāmānādhikaraṇyam . evam tarhi tyadādīni sarvaiḥ nityam iti evam atra yuṣmadasmadoḥ śeṣaḥ bhaviṣyati .

GS24pmbhasuu:4178_0: (P_1,4.105,107-108.2) KA_I,353.27-354. 15 Ro_II,477-478 yuṣmadi madhyamaḥ asmadi uttamaḥ iti eva ucyate. tau iha na prāpnutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4178_1: : paramatvam pacasi . paramāham pacāmi iti . tadantavidhinā bhaviṣyati . iha api tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:4179: tadantavidhinā prāpnutaḥ : atitvam pacati . atyaham pacati iti . ye ca api
GS24pmbhasuu:4180_0: ete samānādhikaraṇavṛttayaḥ taddhitāḥ tatra ca madhyamottamau na prāpnutaḥ : tvattaraḥ pacasi mattaraḥ pacāmi iti . tvadrūpaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:4181: asmadvati iti evam bhaviṣyati . iha api tarhi prāpnutaḥ : atitvam pacati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4182_0: atyaham pacati iti . evam tarhi yuṣmadi sādhane asmadi sādhane iti evam bhaviṣyati . evam ca kṛtvā saḥ api adoṣaḥ bhavati

GS24pmbhasuu:4183_0: utsargaḥ kariṣyate . tasya yuṣmadasmadoḥ upapadayoḥ madhyamottamau apavādau bhaviṣyataḥ . tatra yuṣmadgandhaḥ ca asmadgandhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4183_1: ca asti iti kṛtvā madhyamottamau bhaviṣyataḥ . atha iha katham bhavitavyam . atvam tvam sampadyate tvadbhavati madbhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4183_2: iti . āhosvit tvadbhavasi madbhavāmi iti . tvadbhavati madbhavati iti evam bhavitavyam .

GS24pmbhasuu:4185: bhavati . tat yathā . gauḥ anubandhyaḥ ajaḥ agnīṣhomīyaḥ iti na bāhīkaḥ anubadhyate . katham tarhi bāhīke vṛddhyāttve bhavataḥ . gauḥ tiṣṭhati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4186: gām ānaya iti . arthāśraye etat evam bhavati . yat hi śabdāśrayam
GS24pmbhasuu:4187: śabdamātre tat bhavati . śabdāśraye ca vṛddhyāttve .
GS24pmbhasuu:4189: cet adrutāyām asaṃhitam . paraḥ sannikarṣaḥ saṃhitā cet adrutāyām vṛttau
GS24pmbhasuu:4190: saṃhitāsañjñā na prāpnoti . drutāyām eva hi paraḥ sannikarṣo varṇānām na adrutāyām . tulyaḥ samnikarṣaḥ . tulyaḥ samnikarṣaḥ varṇānām

GS24pmbhasuu:4218_1: . bhāvāvirāmabhāvitvāt śabdasya vasānalakṣaṇam na . bhāvāvirāmabhāvitvāt śabdasya avasānalakṣaṇam

GS24pmbhasuu:4225: vipūrvāt dhāñaḥ karmasādhanaḥ ikāraḥ . vidhīyate vidhiḥ iti . kim punaḥ vidhīyate . samāsaḥ vibhaktividhānam parāṅgavadbhāvaḥ ca . kim punaḥ ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:4226: adhikāraḥ āhosvit paribhāṣā . kaḥ punaḥ adhikāraparibhāṣayoḥ viśeṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4227: adhikāraḥ pratiyogam tasya anirdeśārthaḥ iti yoge yoge upatiṣṭhate .
GS24pmbhasuu:4228: paribhāṣā punaḥ ekadeśasthā satī sarvam śāstram abhijvalayati pradīpavat .
GS24pmbhasuu:4229: tat yathā pradīpaḥ suprajvalitaḥ ekadeśasthaḥ sarvam veśma abhijvalayati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4230: kaḥ punaḥ atra prayatnaviśeṣaḥ . adhikāre sati svarayitavyam paribhāṣāyām punaḥ satyām sarvam apekṣyam . tathā idam aparam dvaitam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4231_0: ekārthībhāvaḥ vā sāmarthyam syāt vyapekṣā vā iti . tatra ekārthībhāve sāmarthye adhikāre ca sati samāsaḥ ekaḥ saṅgṛhītaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4231_1: bhavati bibhaktividhānam parāṅgavadbhāvaḥ ca asaṅgṛhītaḥ . vyapekṣāyām punaḥ sāmarthye adhikāre ca sati bibhaktividhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:4231_2: parāṅgavadbhāvaḥ ca saṅgṛhītaḥ samāsaḥ tu ekaḥ asaṅgṛhītaḥ . anyatra khalu api samarthagrahaṇāni yuktagrahaṇāni ca kartavyāni
GS24pmbhasuu:4231_3: bhavanti . kva anyatra . isusoḥ sāmarthye na
GS24pmbhasuu:4232: cavāhāhaivayukte iti . vyapekṣāyām punaḥ sāmarthye paribhāṣāyām ca satyām
GS24pmbhasuu:4233_0: yāvān vyākaraṇe padagandhaḥ asti saḥ sarvaḥ saṅgṛhītaḥ bhavati samāsaḥ tu ekaḥ asaṅgṛhītaḥ . tatra ekārthībhāvaḥ sāmarthyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4233_1: paribhāṣā ca iti evam sūtram abhinnatarakam bhavati . evam api kva cit akartavyam samarthagrahaṇam kriyate kva cit ca kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4233_2: na kriyate . akartavyam tāvat kriyate samarthānām prathamāt vā iti . kartavyam ca na kriyate karmaṇi aṇ samarthāt iti . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:4233_3: ca gamyate tatra sāmarthyam . kumbhakāraḥ nagarakāraḥ iti . satyam gamyate utpanne tu pratyaye . saḥ eva tāvat

GS24pmbhasuu:4238_1: . ṣaṣṭhī subantena samasyate : rājapuruṣaḥ , brāhmaṇakambalaḥ . samarthagrahaṇam kimartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:4239: bhāryā rājñaḥ . puruṣaḥ devadattasya . saptamī śauṇḍaiḥ : akṣaśauṇḍaḥ ,

GS24pmbhasuu:4241: śauṇḍaḥ pibati pānāgāre . atha kriyamāṇe api samarthagrahaṇe iha kasmāt na bhavati mahat kaṣṭam śritaḥ iti . na vā bhavati mahākaṣṭaśritaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4242_0: bhavati yadā etat vākyam bhavati : mahat kaṣṭam mahākaṣṭam , mahākaṣṭam śritaḥ mahākaṣṭaśritaḥ iti . yadā tu etat vākyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4242_1: bhavati : mahat kaṣṭam śritaḥ iti tadā na bhavitavyam tadā ca prapnoti . tadā kasmāt na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4243: kasya kasmāt na bhavati . kim dvayoḥ āhosvit bahūnām . bahūnām kasmāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:4244: bhavati . sup supā iti vartate . nanu ca bhoḥ ākṛtau śāstrāṇi pravartante
GS24pmbhasuu:4245: . tat yathā prātipadikāt iti vartamāne anyasmāt ca anyasmāt ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4246: prātipadikāt utpattiḥ bhavati . satyam etat . ākṛtiḥ tu pratyekam
GS24pmbhasuu:4247: parisamāpyate . yāvati etat parisamāpyate prātipadikāt iti tāvataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4248_0: utpattyā bhavitavyam . pratyekam ca etat parisamāpyate na samudāye . evam iha api yāvati etat parisamāpyate sup supā iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4248_1: tāvataḥ samāsena bhavitavyam . dvayoḥ dvayoḥ ca etat parisamāpyate na bahuṣu . dvayoḥ tarhi kasmāt na bhavati . asāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4248_2: . katham asāmarthyam . sāpekṣam asamartham bhavati iti . yadi sāpekṣam asamartham bhavati iti ucyate rājapuruṣaḥ abhirūpaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4248_3: rājapuruṣaḥ darśanīyaḥ atra vṛttiḥ na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4249: pradhānam atra sāpekṣam . bhavati ca pradhānasya sāpekṣasya api samāsaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4250: yatra tarhi apradhānam sāpekṣam bhavati tatra te vṛttiḥ na prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:4251: devadattasya gurukulam , devadattasya guruputraḥ , devadattasya dāsabhāryā iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . samudāyapekṣā atra ṣaṣṭḥī sarvam gurukulam apekṣate
GS24pmbhasuu:4252: . yatra tarhi na samudāyapekṣā ṣaṣṭḥī tatra vṛttiḥ na prāpnoti : kim odanaḥ śālīnām . saktvāḍhakam āpaṇīyānām . kutaḥ bhavān pāṭaliputrakaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4253: iha ca api : devadattasya gurukulam , devadattasya guruputraḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:4254_0: devadattasya dāsabhāryā iti : yadi eṣā samudāyapekṣā ṣaṣṭḥī syāt na etat niyogataḥ gamyeta devadattasya yaḥ guruḥ tasya yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4254_1: putraḥ iti . kim tarhi . anyasya api guruputraḥ devadattasya kim cit iti eṣaḥ arthaḥ gamyeta .
GS24pmbhasuu:4255: yataḥ tu niyogataḥ devadattasya yaḥ guruḥ tasya yaḥ putraḥ iti eṣaḥ arthaḥ gamyate ataḥ manyāmahe na samudāyapekṣā ṣaṣṭḥī iti . anyatra khalu api
GS24pmbhasuu:4256_0: samarthagrahaṇe sāpekṣasya api kāryam bhavati . kva anyatra . isusoḥ sāmarthye . brāhamaṇasya sarpiḥ karoti iti . tasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4256_1: na aeta śakyak vaktum sāpekṣam asamartham bhavati iti . vṛttiḥ tarhi kasmāt na bhavati mahat
GS24pmbhasuu:4257: kaṣṭam śritaḥ iti . saviśeṣaṇānām vṛttiḥ na vṛttasya vā viśeṣaṇam na prayujyate iti vaktavyam . yadi saviśeṣaṇānām vṛttiḥ na vṛttasya vā
GS24pmbhasuu:4258: viśeṣaṇam na prayujyate iti ucyate devadattasya gurukulam devadattasya guruputraḥ devadattasya dāsabhāryā iti atra vṛttiḥ na prāpnoti .

GS24pmbhasuu:4259_1: iti . na vaktavyam . vṛttiḥ tarhi kasmāt na bhavati . agamakatvāt . iha samānārthena vākyena bhavitavyam samāsena ca . yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4259_2: ca iha arthaḥ vākyena gamyate mahat kaṣṭam śritaḥ iti na jātu cit samāsena asau gamyate mahat
GS24pmbhasuu:4260_0: kaṣṭaśritaḥ iti . etasmāt hetoḥ brūmaḥ agamakatvāt iti . na brūmaḥ apaśabdaḥ syāt iti . yatra gamakaḥ bhavati bhavati tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:4260_1: vṛttiḥ . tat yathā : devadattasya gurukulam , devadattasya guruputraḥ , devadattasya dāsabhāryā iti . yadi agamakatvam hetuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4260_2: na arthaḥ samarthagrahaṇena . iha api bhāryā rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ devadattasya iti yaḥ arthaḥ vākyena gamyate na
GS24pmbhasuu:4261: asau jātu cit samāsena asau gamyate bhārya rājapuruṣaḥ devadattasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4262_0: tasmāt na arthaḥ samarthagrahaṇena . idam tarhi prayojanam . asti asamarthasamāsaḥ nañsamāsaḥ gamakaḥ . tasya sādhutvam mā

GS24pmbhasuu:4269_0: iti . samāse na bhavati . rājapuruṣaḥ iti . yatheṣṭam anyatareṇa abhisambandhaḥ bhavati vākye . rajñaḥ puruṣaḥ puruṣaḥ rājñaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4269_1: iti . samāse na bhavati . rājapuruṣaḥ iti . dvau svarau bhavataḥ vākye . rajñaḥ puruṣaḥ . samāse punaḥ ekaḥ eva . rājapuruṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4270: viśeṣāḥ . kim tarhi . vācanikāni etāni . āha hi bhagavān supaḥ dhātuprātipadikayoḥ upasarjanam pūrvam samāsasya antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4271_0: . ime tarhi ekārthībhāvkṛtāḥ viśeṣāḥ . saṅkhyāviśeṣaḥ vyaktābhidānam lkupasarjanaviśeṣaṇam cayogaḥ iti . saṅkhyāviśeṣaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4271_1: vākye . rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ rājñoḥ puruṣaḥ rājñām puruṣaḥ iti . samāse na bhavati .

GS24pmbhasuu:4272_1: bhavān tam uccārayatu gaṃsyate saḥ viśeṣaḥ . nanu ca na etena evam bhavitavyam . na hi śabdakṛtena nāma arthena bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4273_0: bhavitavyam . tat etat evam dṛśyatām . artharūpam eva etat evañjātīyakam yena atra viśeṣaḥ na gamyate iti . avaśyam ca etat
GS24pmbhasuu:4273_1: evam vijñeyam . yaḥ hi manyate yaḥ asau viśeṣavācī śabdaḥ tadasānnidhyāt atra viśeṣaḥ na gamyate iti iha tasya viśeṣaḥ gamyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:4274_0: vyaktābhidhānam bhavati vākye . brāhmaṇasya kambalaḥ tiṣṭhati iti . samāse punaḥ avyaktam . brāhmaṇakambalaḥ tiṣṭhati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4274_1: . sandehaḥ bhavati sambuddhiḥ syāt ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ vā iti . eṣaḥ api aviśeṣaḥ . bhavati hi kim
GS24pmbhasuu:4275: cit vākye avyaktam tat ca samāse vyaktam . vākye tāvat avyaktam . ardham paśoḥ devadattasya iti . sandehaḥ bhavati paśuguṇasya vā devadattasya yat

GS24pmbhasuu:4278_0: upasarjanaviśeṣaṇam bhavati vākye . ṛddhasya rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ iti . samāse na bhavati . rājapuruṣaḥ iti . eṣaḥ api adoṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4278_1: samāse api upasarjanaviśeṣaṇam bhavati . tat yathā devadattasya gurukulam devadattasya guruputraḥ devadattasya dāsabhāryā
GS24pmbhasuu:4278_2: iti . cayogaḥ bhavati vākye . svacayogaḥ svāmicayogaḥ ca . svacayogaḥ rājñaḥ gauḥ ca aśvaḥ ca

GS24pmbhasuu:4281_0: samāse na bhavati . devadattayajñadattaviṣṇumitrāṇām gauḥ iti . atha etasmin ekārthībhāvkṛte viśeṣe kim svābhāvikam śabdaiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4281_1: arthābhidhānam āhosvit vācanikam . svābhāvikam iti āha . kutaḥ etat . arthānādeśāt . na hi arthāḥ ādiśyante . katham punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4281_2: arthān ādiśan evam brūyāt na arthāḥ ādiśyante it . yat āha bhavān anekam anyapadārthe cārthe dvandvaḥ apatye rakte nirvṛtte
GS24pmbhasuu:4281_3: iti . na etāni arthādeśanāni . svabhāvataḥ eteṣām śabdānām
GS24pmbhasuu:4282_0: eteṣu artheṣu abhiniviṣṭānām nimittatvena anvākhyānam kriyate . tat yathā . kūpe hastadakṣiṇaḥ panthāḥ . abhre candramasam
GS24pmbhasuu:4282_1: paśya iti . svabhāvataḥ tatrasthasya pathaḥ candramasaḥ ca nimittatvena anvākhyānam kriyate . evam iha api cārthe yaḥ saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4282_2: dvandvasamāsaḥ anyapadārthaḥ yaḥ saḥ bahuvrīhiḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4283_0: . kim puna kāraṇam na ādiśyante . tat ca laghvartham . laghvartham hi arthāḥ na ādiśyante . avaśyam hi anena arthān ādiśatā
GS24pmbhasuu:4283_1: kena cit śabdena nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ syāt . tasya ca tāvat kena kṛtaḥ yena asau kriyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:4284_0: atha tasya kena cit kṛtaḥ tasya kena kṛtaḥ iti anavasthā . asambhavaḥ khalu api ādeśaḥ tasya . kaḥ hi nāma samarthaḥ dhātuprātipadikapratyayanipātānām
GS24pmbhasuu:4284_1: arthān ādeṣṭum . na ca etat mantavyam pratyayārthe nirdiṣṭe prakṛtyarthaḥ anirdiṣṭaḥ iti . bhavati hi guṇābhidhāne guṇinaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4284_2: sampratyayaḥ . tat yathā śuklaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ iti . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . sāmānyaśabdāḥ ete evam syuḥ . sāmanyaśabdāḥ ca na antareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:4284_3: viśeṣam prakaraṇam vā viśeṣeṣu avatiṣṭhante . yataḥ tu khalu niyogataḥ vṛkṣaḥ iti ukte svabhāvataḥ kasmin cit eva viśeṣe
GS24pmbhasuu:4285: manyāmahe na ime sāmānyaśabdāḥ iti . na cet sāmānyaśabdāḥ prakṛtiḥ prakṛtyarthe vartate pratyayaḥ pratyayārthe vartate . apravṛttiḥ khalu api
GS24pmbhasuu:4286_0: arthādeśanasya . bahavaḥ hi śabdāḥ yeṣām arthāḥ na vijñāyante . jarbharī turpharītū . antareṇa khalu api śabdaprayogam bahavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4286_1: arthāḥ gamyante akṣinikocaiḥ pāṇivihāraiḥ ca . na khalu api nirjñātasya arthasya anvyākhyane kim cit prayojanam asti . yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4287: paścāt astam eti madhuraḥ guḍaḥ kaṭukam śṛṅgaveram iti kim tena kṛtam syāt

GS24pmbhasuu:4292_1: teṣām evam bruvatām kim jahatsvārthā vṛttiḥ āhosvit ajahatsvārthā . kim ca ataḥ . yadi jahatsvārthā vṛttiḥ rājapuruṣam ānaya

GS24pmbhasuu:4293_1: iti dvivacanam prāpnoti . kā punaḥ vṛttiḥ nyāyyā . jahatsvārthā . yuktam punaḥ yat
GS24pmbhasuu:4294: jahatsvārthā nāma vṛttiḥ syāt . bāḍham yuktam . evam hi dṛśyate loke .
GS24pmbhasuu:4295: puruṣaḥ ayam parakarmaṇi pravartamānaḥ svam karma jahāti . tat yathā takṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:4296_0: rājakarmaṇi vartamānaḥ svam karma jahāti . evam yuktam yat rājā puruṣārthe vartamānaḥ svam artham jahyāt upaguḥ ca apartyārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:4296_1: vartamānaḥ svam artham jahyāt . nanu ca uktam rājapuruṣam ānaya iti ukte puruṣamātrasya ānayanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4297: prāpnoti aupagavam ānaya iti ukte apatyamātrasya iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4298: jahat api asau svārtham na atyantāya jahāti . yaḥ parārthavirodhī svārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4299: tam jahāti . tat yathā takṣā rājakarmaṇi vartamānaḥ svam takṣakarma jahāti na hikkitahasitakaṇḍūyitāni . na ca ayam arthaḥ parārthavirodhī viśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4300_0: nāma . tasmāt na hāsyati . atha vā anvayāt viśeṣaṇam bhaviṣyati . tat yathā . ghṛtaghaṭaḥ tailaghaṭaḥ iti niṣikte ghṛte taile
GS24pmbhasuu:4300_1: vā anvyayāt viśeṣaṇam bhavati ayam ghṛtaghaṭaḥ ayam tailaghaṭaḥ iti . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . bhavati hi tatra yā ca yāvatī ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4301: agnau niṣṭapya ghṛtaghaṭam tṛṇakūrcena prakṣālayatu . na gaṃsyate saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4302: viśeṣaḥ . yathā tarhi mallikāpuṭaḥ campakaputaḥ iti niṣkīrṇāsu api sumanaḥsu anvayāt viśeṣaṇam bhavati ayam mallikapuṭaḥ ayam campakapuṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4303: iti . atha vā samarthādhikāraḥ ayam vṛttau kriyate . sāmartham nama bhedaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4304_0: saṃsargaḥ vā . aparaḥ āha : bhedasaṃsargau vā sāmarthyam iti . kaḥ punaḥ bhedaḥ saṃsargaḥ vā . iha rājñaḥ iti ukte sarvam
GS24pmbhasuu:4304_1: svam prasaktam puruṣaḥ iti ukte sarvaḥ svāmi prasaktaḥ . iha idānīm rājapuruṣaḥ iti ukte rājā
GS24pmbhasuu:4305: puruṣam nivartayati anyebhyaḥ svāmibhyaḥ puruṣaḥ api rājānam anyebhyaḥ svebhyaḥ . evam etasmin ubhayataḥ vyavacchinne yadi jahāti kāmam jahātu .
GS24pmbhasuu:4306: na jātu cit puruṣamātrasya ānayanam bhaviṣyati . atha vā punaḥ astu ajahatsvārthā vṛttiḥ . yuktam punaḥ yat ajahatsvārthā nāma vṛttiḥ syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:4307_0: bāḍham yuktam . evam hi dṛśyate loke . bhikṣukaḥ ayam dvitīyām bhikṣām āsādya pūrvām na jahāti sañcayāya pravartate . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:4307_1: ca uktam ubhayoḥ vidyamānasvārthayoḥ dvayoḥ dvivacanam iti dvivacanam prāpnoti iti . kasyāḥ punaḥ dvivacanam prāpnoti . prathāmāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4307_2: . na prathamāsamarthaḥ rājā ṣaṣṭhyāḥ tarhi . na ṣaṣṭhīsamarthaḥ puruṣaḥ . prathamāyāḥ eva tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:4308_0: prāpnoti . nanu ca uktam na prathamāsamarthaḥ rājā iti . abhinihitaḥ saḥ saḥ arthaḥ antarbhūtaḥ prātipadikārthaḥ sampannaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4308_1: . tatra prātipadikārthe prathamā iti prathamāyāḥ eva dvivacanam prāpnoti . saṅghātasya aikārthyāt na avayavasaṅkhyātaḥ subutpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4308_2: . saṅghātasya ekatvam arthaḥ . tena avayavasaṅkhyātaḥ subutpattiḥ na bhaviṣyati . parasparavyapekṣā sāmarthyem eke . parasparavyapekṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:4308_3: sāmarthyem eke icchanti . kā punaḥ śabdayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4309: vyapekṣā . na brūmaḥ śabdayoḥ iti . kim tarhi . arthayoḥ . iha rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ iti ukte rājā puruṣam apekṣate mama ayam iti . puruṣaḥ api rājānam
GS24pmbhasuu:4310: apekṣate aham asya iti . tayoḥ abhisambandhasya ṣaṣṭhī vācikā bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4311: tathā kaṣṭam śritaḥ iti kriyākārakayoḥ abhisambandhasya dvitīyā vācikā bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4313: ekārthībhāvaḥ sāmarthyam atha api vyapekṣā sāmarthyam kim gatam etat iyatā sūtreṇa āhosvit anyatarasmin pakṣe bhūyaḥ sūtram kartavyam . gatam iti āha
GS24pmbhasuu:4314: . katham . samaḥ ayam arthaśabdena saha samāsaḥ . sam ca upasargaḥ .

GS24pmbhasuu:4315_1: śabdaḥ prayujyate yena samaḥ sāmarthyam syāt . tatra prayogāt etat gantavyam nūnam atra kaḥ cit prayogārhaḥ śabdaḥ na prayujyate

GS24pmbhasuu:4364: (P_2,1.1.9) KA_I,370.1-371.24 Ro_II,540-546 samānādhikaraṇeṣu upasaṅkhyānam asamarthatvāt . samānādhikaraṇeṣu upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4365: vīraḥ pūruṣaḥ vīrapuruṣaḥ . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . asamarthatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4366: . katham asamarthatvam . dravyam padārthaḥ iti cet. yadi dravyam padārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4367: na bhavati tadā sāmarthyam . atha hi guṇaḥ padārthaḥ bhavati tadā
GS24pmbhasuu:4368_0: sāmarthyam . anyaḥ hi vīratvam guṇaḥ anyaḥ hi puruṣatvam . na anyatvam asti iti iyatā sāmarthyam bhavati . anyaḥ hi devadattaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4368_1: gobhyaḥ aśvebhyaḥ ca na ca tasya etāvatā sāmartham bhavati . kaḥ vā viśeṣaḥ yat guṇe padārthe sāmarthyam syāt dravye ca na
GS24pmbhasuu:4368_2: syāt . eṣaḥ viśeṣaḥ . ekam tayoḥ adhikaraṇam anyaḥ ca vīratvam guṇaḥ anyaḥ puruṣatvam . dravyapadārthikasya api tarhi guṇabhedāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4368_3: sāmarthyam bhaviṣyati . aśakyaḥ dravyapadārthikena dravyasya guṇakṛtaḥ upakāraḥ pratijñātum . nanu ca abhyantaraḥ asau bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4368_4: . yadi api abhyantaraḥ na tu gamyate . na hi guḍaḥ iti ukte madhuratvam gamyate śṛṅgaveram iti vā kaṭukatvam . guṇapadārthikena
GS24pmbhasuu:4368_5: api tarhi aśakyaḥ guṇasya dravyakṛtaḥ upakāraḥ pratijñātum . atha guṇapadārthikaḥ pratijānīte dravyapadārthikaḥ api kasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4369: evam anayoḥ sāmarthyam syāt vā na vā . kva ca tāvat idam syāt samānādhikaraṇena iti . yatra sarvam samāman : indraḥ śakraḥ puruhūtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4370: purandaraḥ . kanduḥ koṣṭhaḥ kuśūlaḥ iti . na evañjātīyakānām samāsena
GS24pmbhasuu:4371_0: bhavitavyam pratyayena vā utpattavyam . kim kāraṇam . arthagatyarthaḥ śabdaprayogaḥ . artham pratyāyayiṣyāmi iti śabdaḥ prayujyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4371_1: . tatra ekena uktatvāt tasya arthasya dvitīyasya prayogeṇa na bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam . uktārthānām aprayogaḥ iti . na

GS24pmbhasuu:4373_1: cit sadbhāvānyabhāvau na staḥ ucyate ca samānādhikaraṇena iti . tatra prakarṣagatiḥ vijñāsyate :

GS24pmbhasuu:4402_1: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na idam bahuvrīhyavayavasya tatpuruṣasya lakṣaṇam ārabhyate .

GS24pmbhasuu:4543: anupādīyamane viśeṣe sarvaprasaṅgaḥ . balirakṣitābhyām ca anarthakam
GS24pmbhasuu:4544: vacanam . balirakṣitābhyām ca samāsavacanam anarthakam . yaḥ hi mahārājāya
GS24pmbhasuu:4545_0: baliḥ mahārājārthaḥ saḥ bhavati . tatra tadarthaḥ iti eva siddham . yadi punaḥ vikṛtiḥ caturthyantā prakṛtyā saha samasyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4545_1: iti etat lakṣaṇam kriyeta . vikṛtiḥ prakṛtyā iti cet aśvaghāsādīnām upasaṅkhyānam . vikṛtiḥ prakṛtyā iti cet aśvaghāsādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:4545_2: upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . aśvaghāsaḥ śvaśrūsuram hastividhā iti . arthena nityasamāsavacanam . arthśabdena nityasamāsaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4545_3: . brāhmaṇārtham kṣatriyārtham . kim vikṛtiḥ caturthyantā prakṛtyā saha samasyate iti ataḥ arthena nityasamāsaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4545_4: . na iti āha sarvathā arthena nityasamāsaḥ vaktavyaḥ vigrahaḥ mā
GS24pmbhasuu:4546_0: bhūt iti . sarvaliṅgatā ca . sarvaliṅgatā ca vaktavyā . brāhmaṇārtham payaḥ brāhmaṇārthaḥ sūpaḥ brāhmaṇārthā yavāgūḥ iti

GS24pmbhasuu:4550: yat tāvat ucyate vikṛtiḥ prakṛtyā iti vaktavyam . na vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4551: ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāyapati vikṛtiḥ caturthyantā prakṛtyā saha samasyate iti yat ayam balirakiṣitagrahaṇam karoti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4552_0: yathājātīyakānām samāse balirakṣitagrahaṇena arthaḥ tathājātīyakānām samāsaḥ . yadi ca vikṛtiḥ caturthyantā prakṛtyā saha
GS24pmbhasuu:4552_1: samasyate na tadarthamātreṇa tataḥ balirakiṣitagrahaṇam arthavat bhavati . yat api ucyate aśvaghāsādīnām upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4553_0: aśvaghāsādayaḥ ṣaṣṭhīsamāsāḥ bhaviṣyanti . yat hi yadartham bhavati ayam api tatra abhisambandhaḥ bhavati asya idam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4553_1: tat yathā guroḥ idam gurvartham iti . nanu ca svarabhedaḥ bhavati . caturthīsamāse sati pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaratvena bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4553_2: ṣaṣṭhīsamāse punaḥ antodāttatvena ṇa asti bhedaḥ . caturthīsamāse api sati antodāttatvena eva bhavitavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4554: katham . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati vikṛtiḥ caturthyantā prakṛtisvarā bhavati na caturthīmātram iti yat ayam caturthī tadarthe arthe kte ca iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4555: arthagrahaṇam ktagrahaṇam ca karoti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4556_0: yathājātīyakānām arthagrahaṇena ktagrahaṇena ca arthaḥ tathājātīyakānām prakṛtisvaratvam . yadi ca vikṛtiḥ caturthyantā prakṛtyā
GS24pmbhasuu:4556_1: bhavati na caturthīmātram tataḥ arthagrahaṇam ktagrahaṇam ca arthavat bhavati .yat
GS24pmbhasuu:4557: api ucyate arthena nityasamāsaḥ vaktavyaḥ iti . na vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4558: sarthappratyayaḥ kariṣyate . kim kṛtam bhavati . na ca eva hi kadā cit
GS24pmbhasuu:4559_0: vigrahaḥ bhavati . api ca sarvaliṅgatā siddhā bhavati . yadi sarthappratayaḥ kriyate itsañjñā na prāpnoti . atha api katham
GS24pmbhasuu:4559_1: cit itsañjñā syāt evam api śryartham bhvartham iti aṅgasya iti iyaṅuvaṅau syātām . evam tarhi bahuvrīhiḥ bhavaiṣyati . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:4559_2: kṛtam bhavati . bhavati vai kaḥ cit asvapadavigrahaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ . tat yathā śobhanam mukham asyāḥ sumukhī iti . na evam śakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4559_3: . iha hi mahadartham iti āttvakapau prasajyetām . evam tarhi tadarthasya uttarapadasya arthaśabdaḥ ādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4560_0: kariṣyate . kim kṛtam bhavati . na ca eva kadā cit ādeśena vigrahaḥ bhavati . api ca sarvaliṅgatā siddhā bhavati . tat tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:4560_1: vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . caturthī subantena saha samasyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:4561: tataḥ tadarthārtha . tadarthasya uttarapadasya arthaśabdaḥ ādeśaḥ bhavati . iha api tarhi samāsaḥ prāpnoti chātrāya rucitam chātrāya svaditam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4562_0: ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati tādarthye ya caturthī sā samasyate na caturthīmātram iti yat ayam hitasukhagrahaṇam karoti . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:4562_1: kṛtvā jñāpakam . yathājātīyakānām samāse hitasukhagrahaṇena arthaḥ tathājātīyakānam samāsaḥ . yadi ca tādarthye yā caturthī
GS24pmbhasuu:4562_2: sā samasyate na caturthīmātram tataḥ hitasukhagrahaṇam arthavat bhavati . iha api tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:4563_0: tadarthasya uttarapadasya arthaśabdaḥ ādeśaḥ prāpnoti . yūpāya dāru yūpadāru rathadāru . vāvacanam vidhāsyate . iha api tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:4563_1: vibhāṣā prāprnoti . brāhmaṇāṛtham kṣatriyārtham iti . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:4589_0: (P_2,1.51.1) KA_I,393.2-19 Ro_II,607-609 samāhāraḥ iti kaḥ ayam śabdaḥ . samāṅpūrvāt harateḥ sarmasādhane ghañ . samāhriyate

GS24pmbhasuu:4589_3: sati kim abhidhīyate . yat tat auttarādharyam . kaḥ punaḥ gavām samāhāraḥ . yat tat arjanam krayaṇam bhiṣaṇam aparaharaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4590_0: . yadi evam vikṣipteṣu pūleṣu goṣu carantīṣu na sidhyati . evam tarhi samabhyāśīkaraṇam samāhāraḥ . evam api pañcagrāmī ṣaṇṇagarī

GS24pmbhasuu:4596: . asambhavāt bhāvānayanasya dravyānayanam bhaviṣyati . atha vā avyatirekāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4599_0: pratyayottarapadayoḥ bhavati . evam bhavitum arhati . dvigusañjñā pratyayottarapadayoḥ cet itaretarāśrayatvāt aprasiddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4599_1: . dvigusañjñā pratyayottarapadayoḥ cet itaretarāśrayatvāt aprasiddhiḥ . kā etaretarāśrayatā . dvigunimitte pratyayottarapade
GS24pmbhasuu:4600: ca dvigusañjñā . tat etat itaretarāśrayam . itaretarāśrayāṇi ca na

GS24pmbhasuu:4602: bahuvrīhivat . arthe cet taddhitotpattiḥ na prāpnoti . pāñcanāpitiḥ ,

GS24pmbhasuu:4607_1: bhāvinī sañjñā vijñāsyate . tat yathā : kaḥ cit kam cit tantuvāyam āha : asya sūtrasya śāṭakam vaya iti . saḥ paśyati . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:4607_2: śāṭakaḥ na vātavyaḥ atha vātavyaḥ na śāṭakaḥ . śāṭakaḥ vātavyaḥ ca iti vipratiṣiddham . bhāvinī khalu asya
GS24pmbhasuu:4608: sañjñā abhipretā . saḥ manye vātavyaḥ yasmin ute śāṭakaḥ iti etat bhavati

GS24pmbhasuu:4612_1: bhikṣāmahe . dārāḥ naḥ syuḥ . dhanāni naḥ syuḥ iti . evam iha api taddhitārthe dviguḥ bhavati

GS24pmbhasuu:4712_1: mahataḥ arthān ākāṅkṣanti . ekena māṣeṇa śatasahasram . ekena kuddālakena khārīsahasram .
GS24pmbhasuu:4713: tatra karmadhārayaprakṛtibhiḥ matvarthīyaiḥ abhidhānam astu bahuvrīhiṇā iti bahuvrīhiṇā bhaviṣyati laghutvāt . katham sarvadhanī sarvabījī

GS24pmbhasuu:4910: (P_2,2.24.2) KA_I, 421.17-423.14 Ro_II,704-710 padārthābhidhāne anuprayogānupapattiḥ abhihitatvāt . padārthasya abhidhāne anuprayogasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4911: anupapattiḥ . citraguḥ devadattaḥ iti . kim kāraṇam . abhihitatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:4912: citraguśabdena abhihitaḥ saḥ arthaḥ iti kṛtvā anuprayogaḥ na prāpnoti . na vā anabhihitatvāt . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . anabhihitatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:4913: citraguśabdena anabhihitaḥ saḥ arthaḥ iti kṛtvā anuprayogaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4914_0: katham anabhihitaḥ yāvatā idānīm eva uktam padārthābhidhāne anuprayogānupapattiḥ abhihitatvāt iti . sāmānyābhidhāne hi viśeṣānabhidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:4914_1: . sāmānye hi abhidhīyamāne viśeṣaḥ anabhhitaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4915: tatra avaśyam viśeṣārthinā viśeṣaḥ anuprayoktavyaḥ . citraguḥ . kaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4916: devadattaḥ iti. bhavet siddham yadā sāmānye vṛttiḥ . yadā tu khalu viśeṣe vṛttiḥ tadā na sidhyati . citrā gāvaḥ devadattasya citraguḥ devadattaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4917: . tat api siddham . katham . na idam ubhayam yugapat bhavati vākyam ca samāsaḥ ca . yadā vākyam tadā na samāsaḥ . yadā samāsaḥ tadā na vakyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4918: yadā samāsaḥ tadā sāmānye vṛttiḥ . tatra avaśyam viśeṣārthinā viśeṣaḥ anuprayoktavyaḥ . citraguḥ . kaḥ . devadattaḥ iti. sāmānyasya eva tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:4919: anuprayogaḥ na prāpnoti . citragu tat . citragu kim cit . citragu sarvam iti . sāmānyam api yathā viśeṣaḥ tadvat . citragu iti ukte sandehaḥ syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:4920: sarvam vā viśvam vā iti . tatra avaśyam sandehanivṛttyartham viśeṣārthinā viśeṣaḥ anuprayoktavyaḥ . atha vā vibhaktyarthaḥ abhidīyate . etat ca atra
GS24pmbhasuu:4921: yuktam yat vibhaktyarthaḥ abhidhīyate . tatra hi sarvapaścāt padam vartate asya iti . vibhaktyarthābhidhāne adravyasya liṅgasaṅkhyopacārānupapattiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4923: bahuyavam bahuyavā bahuyavaḥ bahuyavau bahuhavāḥ iti . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:4924_0: vibhaktyarthābhidhāne adravyasya liṅgasaṅkhyopacārānupapattiḥ vibhaktyarthābhidhāne dravyasya ye liṅgasaṅkhye tābhyām vibhaktyarthasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4924_1: upacāraḥ anupapannaḥ . bahuyavam bahuyavāḥ bahuyavaḥ bahuyavau bahuhavāḥ iti . katham hi anyasya liṅgasaṅkhyābhyām anyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4924_2: upacāraḥ syāt . siddham tu yathā guṇavacaneṣu . siddham etat. katham . yathā guṇavacaneṣu .
GS24pmbhasuu:4925: guṇavacaneṣu uktam : guṇavacanānām śabdānām āśrayataḥ liṅgavacanāni bhavanti iti . tat yathā śuklam vastram śuklā śāṭī śuklaḥ kambalaḥ śuklau
GS24pmbhasuu:4926_0: kambalau śuklāḥ kambalāḥ iti . yat asau dravyam śritaḥ bhavati guṇaḥ tasya yat liṅgam vacanam ca tat guṇasya api bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4926_1: . evam iha api yat asau dravyam śritaḥ vibhaktyarthaḥ tasya yat liṅgam vacanam ca tat samāsasya api bhaviṣyati . yadi tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:4927: katham abhihitaḥ bhavati sadravyaḥ saliṅgaḥ sasaṅkhyaḥ ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:4928: arthagrahaṇasāmarthyāt . iha anekam anyapade iti iyatā siddham . katham punaḥ pade nāma vṛttiḥ syāt . śabdaḥ hi eṣaḥ . śabde asambhavāt arthe
GS24pmbhasuu:4929_0: kāryam vijñāsyate . saḥ ayam evam siddhe sati yat arthagrahaṇam karoti tasya etat prayojanam kṛtsnaḥ padārthaḥ yathā abhidhīyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:4929_1: sadravyaḥ saliṅgaḥ sasaṅkhyaḥ ca iti . yadi tarhi kṛtsnaḥ padārthaḥ abhidhīyate laiṅgāḥ sāṅkhyāḥ ca vidhayaḥ na sidhyanti
GS24pmbhasuu:4929_2: . uktam vā . kim uktam . liṅgeṣu tāvat . siddham tu striyāḥ prātipadikaviśeṣaṇatvāt svārthe ṭābādayaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4930_0: sāṅkhyeṣu api uktam karmādīnām anuktāḥ ekatvādayaḥ iti kṛtvā sāṅkhyāḥ bhaviṣyanti . prathamā tarhi na prāpnoti . samayāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4930_1: bhaviṣyati . yadi sāmayikī na niyogataḥ anyāḥ kasmāt na bhavanti . karmādīnām abhāvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:4931: ṣaṣṭhī tarhi prāpnoti . śeṣalakṣaṇā ṣaṣṭhī . aśeṣatvāt na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4932: evam api vyatikaraḥ . ekasmin api dvivacanabahuvacane prāpnutaḥ dvayoḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:4933_0: ekavacanabahuvacane bahuṣu api ekavacanadvivacane . arthataḥ vyavasthā bhaviṣyati . atha vā saṅkhyā nāma iyam parapradhānā
GS24pmbhasuu:4933_1: . saṅkhyeam anyā viśeṣyam . yadi ca atra prathamā na syāt saṅkhyeyam aviśeṣitam syāt . atha vā vakṣyati etat . tatra vacanagrahaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4934: prathamā yathā syāt iti . evam api ṣaṣṭhī prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam .

GS24pmbhasuu:4936: vyabhicarati . abhihitaḥ saḥ arthaḥ antarbhūtaḥ prātipadikārthaḥ sampannaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4937: . tatra prātipadikārthe prathamā iti prathamā bhaviṣyati . na tarhi idānīm
GS24pmbhasuu:4938: idam bhavati : citragoḥ devadattasya . bhavati . bāhyam artham apekṣya
GS24pmbhasuu:4942: kim prayojanam . vyadhikaraṇānām mā bhūt iti . pañcabhiḥ bhuktam asya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4943: . avyayānām ca . avyayānām bahuvrīhiḥ vaktavyaḥ . uccairmukhaḥ nīcairmukhaḥ . saptamyupamānapūrvapadasya uttarapadalopaḥ ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:4944: saptamīpūrvasya upamānapūrvasya ca bahuvrīhiḥ vaktavyaḥ uttarapadasya ca lopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kaṇṭhesthaḥ kālaḥ asya kaṇṭhekālaḥ uṣṭramukham iva
GS24pmbhasuu:4945: mukham asya uṣṭramukhaḥ kharamukhaḥ . samudāyavikāraṣaṣṭhyāḥ ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:4946_0: samudāyaṣaṣṭhyāḥ vikāraṣaṣṭhyāḥ ca bahuvrīhiḥ vaktavyaḥ uttarapadasya ca lopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . keśānām samāhāraḥ cūḍā asya keśacūḍaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4946_1: suvarṇasya vikāraḥ alaṅkāraḥ asya suvarṇālaṅkāraḥ . prādibhyaḥ dhātujasya vā . prādibhyaḥ dhātujasya bahuvrīhiḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4947_0: prapatitaparṇaḥ praparṇaḥ prapatitapalāśaḥ prapalāśaḥ . nañaḥ astyarthānām . nañaḥ astyarthānām bahuvrīhiḥ vaktavyaḥ uttarapadasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4947_1: ca vā lopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . avidyamānaputraḥ aputraḥ avidyamānabhāryaḥ abhāryaḥ . tat tarhi bahu vaktavyam . na vā anabhidhānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4948: na vā vaktavyam . asamānādhikaraṇānām bahuvrīhiḥ kasmāt na bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:4949: pañcabhiḥ bhuktam asya iti . anabhidhānāt . tat ca avaśyam anabhidhānam āśrayitavyam . kriyamāṇe api vai parigaṇane yatra abhidhānam na asti na
GS24pmbhasuu:4950_0: bhavati tatra bahuvrīhiḥ . tat yathā pañca bhuktavantaḥ asya iti . atha etasmin sati anabhidhāne yadi vṛttiparigaṇanam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4950_1: vartiparigaṇanam api kartavyam . tat katham kartavyam . arthaniyame matvarthagrahaṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4951: arthaniyame matvarthagrahaṇam kartavyam . matvarthe yaḥ saḥ bahuvrīhiḥ iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt : kaṣṭam śritam anena iti . tathā ca uttarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4952: vacanārthaḥ . evam ca kṛtvā uttarasya yogasya vacanārthaḥ upapannaḥ bhavati . ke cit tāvat āhuḥ : yat vṛttisūtre iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4953_0: saṅkhyāvyayāsannādūrādhikasaṅkhyāḥ saṅkhyeye iti . aparaḥ āha : yat vārttike iti . karmavacanena aprathmāyāḥ . karmavacanena
GS24pmbhasuu:4953_1: aprathmāyāḥ bahuvrīhiḥ vaktavyaḥ . ūḍhaḥ rathaḥ anena ūḍharathaḥ anaḍvān upahṛtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4954_0: paśuḥ rudrāya upahṛtapaśuḥ rudraḥ uddhṛtaḥ odanaḥ sthālyāḥ uddhṛtaudanā sthālī . yadi karmavacanena iti ucyate kartṛvacanena
GS24pmbhasuu:4954_1: katham . prāptam udakam grāmam prāptodakaḥ grāmaḥ āgatāḥ atithayaḥ grāmam āgatātithiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4955: grāmaḥ . kartṛvacanena api . kartṛvacanena api iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4956: aprathamāyāḥ iti kimartham . vṛṣṭe deve gataḥ . aprathamāyāḥ iti ucyamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:4957_0: iha kasmāt na bhavati . vṛṣṭe deve gatam paśya iti . bahiraṅgā atra aprathamā . subadhikāre astikṣīrādivacanam . subadhikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:4957_1: astikṣīrādīnām upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . astikṣīrā brāhmaṇī . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vā avyayatvāt . na vā vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4957_2: kim kāraṇam . avyayatvāt . avyayaḥ ayam astiśabdaḥ . na eṣaḥ asteḥ laṭ . katham avyayatvam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4958: upasargavibhaktisvarapratirūpakāḥ ca nipātasañjñāḥ bhavanti iti nipātasñjñā . nipātaḥ avyayam iti avyayasañjñā .
GS24pmbhasuu:4960: kaḥ ayam samāsaḥ . bahuvrīhiḥ iti aha . kaḥ asya vigrahaḥ . ke sabrahmacāriṇaḥ asya iti . yadi evam kaṭhaḥ iti prativacanam na upapadyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4961_0: . na hi anyat pṛṣṭena anyat ākhyāyate . evam tarhi evam vigrahaḥ kariṣyate : keṣām sabrahmacārī kiṃsbrahmacārī iti . prativacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4961_1: ca eva na upapadyate svare ca doṣaḥ bhavati . kiṃsabrahmacārī iti evam svaraḥ prasajyeta . kiṃsabrahmacārī iti ca iṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4961_2: . evam tarhi evam vigrahaḥ kariṣyate . kaḥ sabrahmacārī kiṃsabrahmacārī iti . bhavet prativacanam upapannam svare tu doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4961_3: bhavati . evam tarhi evam vigrahaḥ kariṣyate .

GS24pmbhasuu:4962_1: uktam kaṭhaḥ iti prativacanam na upapadyate . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . agnaukaravāṇinyāyena bhaviṣyati . tat yathā . kaḥ cit kam cit

GS24pmbhasuu:5787_1: : ādyudāttatvasya pratyayasañjñāsanniyoge prayojanam yasya sañjñākaraṇam tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5789: prayojanam yasya sañjñākaraṇam tasya ādyudāttatvam yathā syāt . asanniyoge hi yasmāt saḥ tadādeḥ ādyudāttatvam tadantasya ca anudāttatvam .

GS24pmbhasuu:5790_1: prasajyeta tadantasya ca anudāttatvam . atha kriyamāṇe api pratyayasañjñāsanniyogena ādyudāttatve anudāttatve ca kasmāt eva
GS24pmbhasuu:5790_2: tadādeḥ ādyudāttatvam na bhavati tadantasya ca anudāttatvam . utpannaḥ pratyayaḥ pratyayāśrayāṇām kāryāṇām nimittam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5790_3: na utpadyamānaḥ . tat yathā ghaṭaḥ kṛtaḥ ghaṭāśrayāṇām kāryāṇām nimittam bhavati na kriyamāṇaḥ . na vā prakṛteḥ ādyudāttavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5790_4: jñāpakam tadādeḥ agrahaṇasya . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . yat ayam ñniti ādiḥ nityam iti prakṛteḥ ādyudāttatvam śāsti
GS24pmbhasuu:5790_5: tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na tadādeḥ ādyudāttatvam bhavati iti . tadantasya tarhi anudāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:5791_0: prāpnoti . prakṛtisvarasya ca vidhānasāmarthyāt pratyayasvarābhāvaḥ . yat ayam dhātoḥ antaḥ prātipadikasya antaḥ iti prakṛteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5791_1: antodāttatvam śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na tadantasya anudāttatvam bhavati iti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . yatra hi anudāttaḥpratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5793_0: ādyudāttatvam ucyate . pratyayasañjñāsanniyogena ādyudāttatve kṛte āgamāḥ anudāttāḥ yathā syuḥ iti . na vā āgamasya anudāttavacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5793_1: . na vā etat api prayojanam asti . kim kāraṇam . āgamasya anudāttavacanāt . āgamāḥ anudāttāḥ bhavanti iti vakṣyāmi . ke punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5793_2: āgamāḥ anudāttatvam prayojayanti . iṭ . lavitā . iṭ tāvat na prayojayati . idam iha sampradhāryam . iṭ kriyatām ādyudāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:5794: paratvāt iḍāgamaḥ . nityam ādyudāttatvam . kṛte api iṭi prāpnoti akṛte api
GS24pmbhasuu:5795: prāpnoti . iṭ api nityaḥ . kṛte api ādyudāttatve prāpnoti akṛte api
GS24pmbhasuu:5796: prāpnoti . anityaḥ iṭ . anyathāsvarasya kṛte ādyudāttatve prapnoti anyathāsvarasya akṛte . svarabhinnasya ca prāpnuvan vidhiḥ anityaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5797: . ādyudāttatvam api anityam . anyasya kṛte iṭi prāpnoti anyasya akṛte .
GS24pmbhasuu:5798: śabdāntarasya ca prāpnuvan vidhiḥ anityaḥ bhavati . ubhayoḥ anityayoḥ paratvāt iḍāgamaḥ . antaraṅgam tarhi ādyudāttatvam . kā antaraṅgatā .
GS24pmbhasuu:5799: utpattisanniyogena ādyudāttatvam ucyate . utpanne pratyaye prakṛtipratyayau āśritya aṅgasya iḍāgamaḥ . ādyudāttatvam api na
GS24pmbhasuu:5800: antaraṅgam yāvatā pratyaye āśrīyamāṇe prakṛtiḥ api āśritā bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5801: antaraṅgam eva ādyudāttatvam . katham . idānīm eva hi uktam na pratyayasvaravidhau tadādividhiḥ bhavati iti . sīyuṭ tarhi prayojayati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5802: avacane hi sīyuḍādeḥ ādyudāttatvam . akriyamāṇe hi āgamānudāttatve
GS24pmbhasuu:5803_0: kriyamāṇe api pratyayasañjñāsanniyogena ādyudāttatve sīyuḍādeḥ liṅaḥ ādyudāttatvam prasajyeta . laviṣīya paviṣīya . tat tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:5803_1: vaktavyam āgamāḥ anudāttāḥ bhavanti iti . na vaktavyam . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati āgamāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5804: anudāttāḥ bhavanti iti yat ayam yāsuṭ parasamaipadeṣu udāttaḥ ṅit ca iti āha . na etat asti jñāpakam vakṣyati etat . yāsuṭaḥ ṅidvacanam pidartham
GS24pmbhasuu:5805: udāttavacanam ca iti . śakyam anena vaktum : yāsuṭ parasmaipadeṣu bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5806: apit ca liṅ bhavati iti . saḥ ayam evam laghīyasā nyāsena siddhe sati yat garīyāṃsam yatnam ārabhate tat jñapayati ācāryaḥ āgamāḥ anudāttāḥ bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:5807: iti . śakyam idam labdhum . yadi eva vacanāt atha api jñāpakāt āgamāḥ anudāttāḥ bhavanti . āgamaiḥ tu vyavahitatvāt ādyudāttatvam na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5808: āgamāḥ avidyamānavat bhavanti iti vakṣyāmi . yadi āgamāḥ avidyamānavat
GS24pmbhasuu:5809: bhavanti iti ucyate lavitā avādeśaḥ na prāpnoti . svaravidhau iti vakṣyāmi
GS24pmbhasuu:5810: . evam api lavitā udāttāt anudāttasya svaritaḥ iti svaritaḥ na prāpnoti .

GS24pmbhasuu:6228_0: ṛcchipratiṣedhaḥ jñāpakaḥ uccheḥ āmbhāvasya . yat ayam anṛcchaḥ iti pratiṣedham śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ tugnimittā yasya

GS24pmbhasuu:6228_2: . na arthaḥ prāptyarthena . ṛcchatyṝtām iti ṛccheḥ liṭi guṇavacanam jñāpakam na ṛccheḥ liṭi ām bhavati iti . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:6228_3: jñāpakam . artyartham etat syāt . katham punaḥ ṛccheḥ liṭi guṇaḥ ucyamānaḥ artyarthaḥ śakyaḥ vijñātum . sāmarthyāt . ṛcchiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6228_4: liṭi na asti iti kṛtvā prakṛtyartham vijñāyate . tat yathā . tiṣṭhateḥ it jighrateḥ vā iti caṅi tiṣṭhatijighratī na staḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6228_5: iti kṛtvā prakṛtyartham vijñāyate . kim punaḥ arteḥ guṇavacane prayojanam . āratuḥ āruḥ etat rūpam yathā syāt .

GS24pmbhasuu:6229_1: bhavati iti guṇe kṛte raparate aratuḥ aruḥ iti etat rūpam prasajyeta . atha abhyāsagrahaṇena grahaṇam uḥ attvam raparatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:6229_2: halādiśeṣaḥ ataḥ ādeḥ iti dīrghatvam ātaḥ lopaḥ iṭi ca iti ākāralopaḥ atuḥ uḥ iti vacanam eva śrūyeta . guṇa punaḥ sati guṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:6229_3: kṛte raparatve ca dvirvacanam ataḥ ādeḥ iti dīrghatvam . tataḥ siddham bhavati yathā āṭatuḥ āṭuḥ iti . kim punaḥ savarṇadīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:6229_4: tāvat bhavati na punaḥ uḥ attvam . paratvāt uḥ attvena bhavitavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6230_0: antaraṅgatvāt . antaraṅgam savarṇadīrghatvam . bahiraṅgam uḥ attvam . kā antaraṅgatā . varṇau āśritya savarṇadīrghatvam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6230_1: aṅgasya uḥ attvam . uḥ attvam api antaraṅgam . katham . vakṣyati etat . prāk abhyāsavikārebhyaḥ aṅgādhikāraḥ iti . ubhayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6230_2: antaraṅgayoḥ paratvāt uḥ attvam . uḥ attve kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:6231: raparatvam halādiśeṣaḥ ataḥ ādeḥ iti dīrghatvam parasya rūpasya yaṇādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6232: . siddham bhavati āratuḥ āruḥ iti . atha api katham cit arteḥ liṭi guṇena arthaḥ syāt . evam api na doṣaḥ . ṛcchatyṝtām iti ṛkāraḥ api nirdiśyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:6233: katham . ayam . ṛcchati ṛ ṛtām ṛcchatyṝtām iti . iha api tarhi prāpnoti .

GS24pmbhasuu:6246: anuprayogaḥ yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . āmantam avyaktapadārthakam . tena aparisamāptaḥ arthaḥ iti kṛtvā anuprayogaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:6250: anuprayogavacanam kriyate . ātmanepadam yathā syāt . ucyamāne api etasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:6251: avaśyam ātmanepadārthaḥ yatnaḥ kartavyaḥ . astibhūpratiṣedhārthena ca api
GS24pmbhasuu:6252: na arthaḥ . iṣṭaḥ sarvānuprayogaḥ . sarveṣām eva kṛbhvastīnām anuprayogaḥ iṣyate . kim iṣyate eva āhosvit prāpnoti api . iṣyate ca prāpnoti ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:6253: katham . kṛñ iti na etat dhātugrahaṇam . kim tarhi . pratyāhāragrahaṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6254: kva sanniviṣṭānām pratyāhāraḥ . kṛbhvastiyoge iti ataḥ prabhṛti ā kṛñaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6255: ñakārāt . sarvānuprayogaḥ iti cet aśiṣyam arthābhāvāt . sarvānuprayogaḥ iti cet aśiṣyam kṛñaḥ anuprayogavacanam . kim kāraṇam . arthābhāvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:6256_0: āmantam avyaktapadārthakam . tena aparisamāptaḥ arthaḥ iti kṛtvā anuprayogaḥ bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam . kṛbhvastīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:6256_1: eva anuprayogaḥ yathā syāt pacādīnām mā bhūt iti . etat api na asti prayojanam . arthābhāvāt ca anyasya . arthābhāvāt ca
GS24pmbhasuu:6256_2: anyasya siddham . kṛbhvastayaḥ kriyāsāmānyavācinaḥ . kriyāviśeṣavācinaḥ pacādayaḥ . na ca sāmānyavācinoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6257: eva viśeṣavācinoḥ eva va prayogaḥ bhavati . tatra viśeṣavācinaḥ utpattiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6258: sāmānyavācinaḥ anuprayokṣyante . liṭparārtham vā . liṭparārtham tarhi kṛñaḥ anuprayogavacanam kriyate . liṭparasya eva anuprayogaḥ yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:6259: anyaparasya mā bhūt iti . kimparasya punaḥ prāpnoti . laṭparasya . na laṭparasya anuprayogeṇa bhūtakālaḥ viśeṣitaḥ syāt . niṣṭhāparasya tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:6260: naniṣṭhāparasya anuprayogeṇa puruṣopagrahau viśeiṣitau syātām . luṅparasya tarhi . na luṅparasya anuprayogeṇa anadyatanaḥ bhūtakālaḥ viśeṣitaḥ syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:6261: laṅparasya tarhi . na laṅparasya anuprayogeṇa anadyatanaḥ parokṣaḥ kālaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6262: viśeṣitaḥ syāt . ayam tarhi bhūte parokṣe anadyatane laṅ vidhīyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:6263_0: haśaśvatoḥ laṅ ca iti . tatparasya mā bhūt iti . atat api na asti prayojanam . ekasyāḥ ākṛteḥ caritaḥ prayogaḥ dvitīyasyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6263_1: tṛtīyasyāḥ ca na bhavati . tat yathā goṣu svāmi aśveṣu ca iti . na ca bhavati goṣu ca aśvānām ca svāmī iti . arthasamāpteḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:6268_0: (P_3,1.43) KA_II,49.2-50.28 Ro_III,125-130 kva ayam cliḥ śrūyate . na kva cit śrūyate . sijādayaḥ ādeśāḥ ucyante . yad na
GS24pmbhasuu:6268_1: kva cit śrūyate kimarthaḥ tarhi cluḥ utsargaḥ kriyate . na sic utsargaḥ eva kartavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6269_0: tasya ksādayaḥ apavādāḥ bhaviṣyanti . ata uttaram paṭhati . clyutsargaḥ sāmānyagrahaṇārthaḥ . cliḥ utsargaḥ kriyate sāmānyagrahaṇārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6269_1: . kva sāmānyagrahaṇārthena arthaḥ . mantra ghasahvaraṇaśavṛdahādvṛckṛgamijanibhyaḥ leḥ iti . tatra avarataḥ trayāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:6270: grahaṇam kartavyam syāt . caṅaṅoḥ sicaḥ ca . ksavidhāne ca aniḍvacane
GS24pmbhasuu:6271: clisampratyayārthaḥ . ksavidhāne ca aniḍvacane clisampratyayārthaḥ cliḥ utsargaḥ kriyate . cleḥ aniṭaḥ ksaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . ghasḷbhāve ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:6272_0: ghasḷbhāve ca clav eva kṛte lṛditaḥ iti aṅ siddhaḥ bhavati . atha citkaraṇam kimartham . cleḥ citkaraṇam viśeṣaṇāṛtham .
GS24pmbhasuu:6272_1: cleḥ citkaraṇam kriyate viśeṣaṇārtham . kva viśeṣaṇārthena arthaḥ . cleḥ sic iti . leḥ sic iti ucyamāne liṅliṭoḥ api prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:6272_2: . na etat asti prayojanam . luṅi iti ucyate . na ca luṅi liṅliṭau bhavataḥ . atha iditkaraṇam kimartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:6274_0: sāmānyagrahaṇārtham . kva sāmānyagrahaṇārthena arthaḥ . mantre ghasahvaraṇaśavṛdahādvṛckṛgamijanibhyaḥ leḥ iti āmaḥ iti ca
GS24pmbhasuu:6274_1: . ikāre ca idānīm sāmānyagrahaṇārthe kriyamāṇe avaśyam sāmānyagrahaṇāvighātārthaḥ cakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . kva sāmānyagrahaṇāvighātārthena
GS24pmbhasuu:6274_2: arthaḥ cakāreṇa . atra eva . yat tāvat ucyate clyutsargaḥ sāmānyagrahaṇārthaḥ iti . kriyamāṇe api vai clyutsarge tāni eva
GS24pmbhasuu:6274_3: trīṇi grahaṇāni bhavanti . clu luṅi cleḥ sic leḥ iti . yat etat leḥ iti tat parārtham bhaviṣyati . katham . yat etat gātisthāghupābhūbhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6274_4: sicaḥ parasmaipadeṣu iti atra sicaḥ grahaṇam etat leḥ iti vakṣyāmi . yadi leḥ iti ucyate dheṭaḥ cātuḥśabdyam prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6275: adadhat adhāt adhāsīt . adadhāt iti api prāpnoti . na caṅaḥ luki

GS24pmbhasuu:6277: caṅam paśyāmaḥ . pratyayalakṣaṇena . na lumatā tasmin iti pratyayalakṣaṇapratiṣedhaḥ . bahuvacane tarhi cātuḥśabdyam prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6278: adadhan adhuḥ adhāsiṣuḥ . adhān iti api prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ātaḥ iti jusbhāvaḥ bhaviṣyati . na sidhyati . sijgrahaṇam tatra anuvartate .

GS24pmbhasuu:6279_1: . yadi luk sijapavādaḥ vijñāyate mā hi dātām mā hi dhātām iti atra ādiḥ sicaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:6281_0: jusbhāvaḥ prāpnoti . tasmāt ātaḥ iti atra sijgrahaṇam anuvartyam . tasmin ca anuvartamāne dheṭaḥ cātuḥśabdyam prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6281_1: tasmāt gātisthāghupābhūbhyaḥ sicaḥ parasmaipadeṣu iti atra sicaḥ grahaṇam kartavyam . tasmin ca kriyamāṇe tāni eva trīṇi

GS24pmbhasuu:6283_0: . animittam vā iṭaḥ aniṭaḥ na vā tasmāt iṭ asti saḥ ayam aniṭ iti . atha dhātau viśeṣyamāṇe kva yaḥ aniṭ iti viśeṣayiṣyasi

GS24pmbhasuu:6290_1: . anackaḥ ayam . tatra na arthaḥ svarārthena cakāreṇa anubandhena . iṭi kṛte sāckaḥ
