GS24pmbhasuu:6291_2: . sthānivadbhāvāt cit bhaviṣyati . arthavat tu citkaraṇasāmarthyāt hi iṭaḥ udāttatvam . arthavat tu citkaraṇam . kaḥ arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6291_3: . citkaraṇasāmarthyāt hi iṭaḥ udāttatvam bhaviṣyati . na aprāpte pratyayasvare āgamānudāttatvam ārabhyate . tat yathā eva
GS24pmbhasuu:6291_4: pratyayasvaram bādhate evam sthānivadbhāvāt api yā prāptiḥ tām api bādheta . tasmāt citkaraṇam . tasmāt cakāraḥ kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6291_5: . atha iditkaraṇam kimartham . iditkaraṇam nakāralopābhāvārtham . iditkaraṇam kriyate nakāralopaḥ mā bhūt iti . amaṃsta amaṃsthāḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:8512_1: . phāṇṭāhṛteḥ pratyayasya ṇitkaraṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . vṛddhatvāt prātipadikasya . vṛddham eva etat prātipadikam

GS24pmbhasuu:8515_0: (P_4,1.151) KA_II,262.2-11 Ro_III,610-611 vāmarathasya kaṇvādivat svaravarjam . vāmarathasya kaṇvādivadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8515_1: kim aviśeṣeṇa . na iti āha . svaram varjayitvā . kim prayojanam . vāmarathyasya chātrāḥ vāmarathāḥ . kaṇvādibhyaḥ gotre iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8515_2: aṇ yathā syāt . yadi kaṇvādivat iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8516: ucyate pratyayāśrayam anatidiṣṭam bhavati . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . vāmarathāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8517_0: bahuṣu lopaḥ na prāpnoti . vāmarathānām saṅghaḥ . saṅghāṅkalakṣaṇeṣu añyañiñām aṇ iti aṇ na prāpnoti . yadi punaḥ yañvat
GS24pmbhasuu:8517_1: iti ucyeta . evam api prakṛtyāśritam anatidiṣṭam bhavati . tatro kaḥ doṣaḥ . vāmarathyasya chātrāḥ vāmarathāḥ . kaṇvādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8517_2: gotre iti aṇ na prāpnoti . astu tarhi kaṇvādivat iti eva . katham vāmarathāḥ vāmarathānām saṅghaḥ iti . yat ayam svaravarjam
GS24pmbhasuu:8517_3: iti āha tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ pratyayāśritam api atidiṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:8520_0: aṇvacanam . udīcām añvidhau takṣṇaḥ aṇ vaktavyaḥ . tākṣṇaḥ . yadi punaḥ ayam takṣanśabdaḥ śivādiṣu paṭhyeta . śivādiḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8520_1: cet ṇyavidhiḥ . śivādiḥ iti cet ṇyaḥ vidheyaḥ . tākṣṇyaḥ iti . siddham tu udīcām vā ṇyavacanāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:8521: siddham etat . katham . udīcām vā ṇyavacanāt . udīcām vā ṇyaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . ṇyena mukte yaḥ yataḥ prāpnoti saḥ tataḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:8522: (P_4,1.155) KA_II,262.22-263.15 Ro_III,612-613 kim idam kausalyakārmāryayoḥ vikṛtayoḥ grahaṇam kriyate . evam vikṛtābhyām yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:8523_0: syāt . atyalpam idam ucyate : kausalyakārmāryābhyām ca iti . phiñprakaraṇe dagukosalakarmāracchāgavṛṣaṇām yuṭ ca . phiñprakaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:8523_1: dagukosalakarmāracchāgavṛṣaṇām yuṭ ca iti vaktavyam . dagu dāgavyāyaniḥ kosala kausalyāyaniḥ karmāra karmāryāyaṇiḥ chāga
GS24pmbhasuu:8523_2: chāgyāyaniḥ vṛṣa vārṣyāyaṇiḥ . yadi yuṭ kriyate yuṭi kṛte anāditvāt ādeśaḥ na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8524: idam iha sampradhāryam . yuṭ kriyatām ādeśaḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8525: paratvāt ādeśaḥ . nityaḥ yuṭ . kṛte api ādeśe prāpnoti akṛte api prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:8526: . yuṭ api anityaḥ . anyasya kṛte ādeśe prāpnoti anyasya akṛte .
GS24pmbhasuu:8527: śabdāntarasya ca prāpnuvan vidhiḥ anityaḥ bhavati . antaraṅgaḥ tarhi yuṭ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8528: kā antaraṅgatā . utpattisanniyogena yuṭ ucyate . utpanne pratyaye prakṛtipratyayau āśritya aṅgasya ādeśaḥ ucyate . ādeśaḥ api antaraṅgaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8529: katham . vakṣyati etat āyanādiṣu upadeśivadvacanam svarasiddhyartham iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8530_0: anavakāśaḥ tarhi yuṭ . evam tarhi pūrvāntaḥ kariṣyate . yadi pūrvāntaḥ kriyate dāgavyāyaniḥ oḥ guṇaḥ na prāpnoti . astu tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:8530_1: parādiḥ eva . nanu ca uktam yuṭi kṛte anāditvāt ādeśaḥ na prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8531_0: siddham tu ādiṣṭasya yuḍvacanāt . siddham etat . katham . ādiṣṭasya yuḍvacanāt . yuṭ ca ādiṣṭasya iti vaktavyam . tat tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:8531_1: vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . cena sanniyogaḥ kariṣyate . yuṭ ca . kim ca . yat ca anyat
GS24pmbhasuu:8532: prāpnoti . kim ca anyat prāpnoti . ādeśaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8533_0: (P_4,1.158) KA_II,263.17-264.10 Ro_III,613-614 yadi punaḥ ayam kuṭ parādiḥ kriyeta . kuṭi pratyayādeḥ ādeśānupapattiḥ anāditvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8533_1: . kuṭi sati pratyayādeḥ ādeśaḥ na upapadyate . kim kāraṇam . anāditvāt . kuṭi sati anāditvāt ādeśaḥ na prāpnoti . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:8533_2: pūrvāntaḥ kariṣyate . pūrvānte nalopavacanam . yadi pūrvāntaḥ kriyate nalopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . cārmikāyaṇiḥ vārmikāyaṇiḥ . nalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8533_3: prātipadikāntasya iti nalopaḥ na prāpnoti . parādau punaḥ sati nalopaḥ prātipadikāntasya iti nalopaḥ sidhyati . astu tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:8533_4: parādiḥ eva . nanu ca uktam kuṭi sati anāditvāt ādeśaḥ na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8534: siddham tu ādiṣṭasya kuḍvacanāt . siddham etat . katham . kuṭ ca ādiṣṭasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8535: iti vaktavyam . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . cena sanniyogaḥ kariṣyate . kuṭ ca . kim ca . yat ca anyat prāpnoti . kim ca anyat
GS24pmbhasuu:8536_0: prāpnoti . ādeśaḥ . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam pūrvānte nalopavacanam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8536_1: kriyate etat nyāse eva carmivarmiṇoḥ nalopaḥ ca iti . kāribhyaḥ iñaḥ agotrāt phiñ vipratiṣedhena . kāribhyaḥ iñ bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8537: kāribhyaḥ iñ bhavati iti asya avakāśaḥ āyaskāriḥ lauhakāriḥ . phiñaḥ avakāśaḥ tāpasāyaniḥ sāmmitikāyaniḥ . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . nāpitāyaniḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8539: (P_4,1.161) KA_II,264.12-21 Ro_III,614-615 yadi ṣuk pūrvāntaḥ kriyate mānuṣāḥ bahuṣu lopaḥ prāpnoti . mānuṣāṇām saṅghaḥ saṅghāṅkalakṣaṇeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:8540: añyañiñām it aṇ prāpnoti . astu tarhi parādiḥ . yadi parādiḥ mānuṣī
GS24pmbhasuu:8541_0: añantāt īkāraḥ na prāpnoti . astu tarhi pūrvāntaḥ eva . katham mānuṣāḥ mānuṣāṇām saṅghaḥ iti . ubhayatra laukikasya gotrasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8541_1: grahaṇam na ca etat laukikam gotram . iha tarhi mānuṣyakam iti halaḥ taddhitasya iti lopaḥ prāpnoti . parādau api eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8541_2: . yat hi halaḥ taddhitasya iti halgrahaṇam na tat aṅgaviśeṣaṇam śakyam vijñātum . iha tarhi doṣaḥ syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:8542: vṛkāt ṭeṇyaṇ vārkeṇī iti . tasmāt ubhābhyām eva vaktavyam prakṛtyā ake
GS24pmbhasuu:8544: (P_4,1.162) KA_II,264.23-265.8 Ro_III,616-617 pautraprabhṛteḥ gotrasañjñāyām yasya apatyam tasya pautraprabhṛtisañjñākaraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8545_0: pautraprabhṛteḥ gotrasañjñāyām yasya apatyavivakṣā tasya pautraprabhṛteḥ gotrasañjñā bhavati iti vaktavyam . gargaḥ api hi
GS24pmbhasuu:8545_1: kam cit prati pautraḥ kuśikaḥ api . tatra mā bhūt . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8546_0: samarthānām prathamāt vā iti vartate . samarthānām prathamasya yat apatyam pautraprabhṛti iti vijñāyate . jīvadvaṃśyam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:8546_1: kutsitam . jīvadvaṃśyam ca kutsitam gotrasañjñam bhavati iti vaktavyam . gārgyaḥ tvam jālma. vātsyaḥ tvam jālma . kā punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8546_2: iha kutsā . pitṛtaḥ loke vyapadeśavatā asvatantreṇa bhavitavyam . yaḥ idānīm pitṛmān svatantraḥ bhavati saḥ ucyate gārgyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8546_3: tvam asi jālma . na tvam pitṛtaḥ vyapadeśam arhasi .
GS24pmbhasuu:8547_0: (P_4,1.163) KA_II,265.10-266.15 Ro_III,617-619 jīvati tu vaṃśye yuvā iti pautraprabhṛtyapekṣam ca . jīvati tu vaṃśye yuvā
GS24pmbhasuu:8547_1: iti pautraprabhṛtyapekṣam ca iti vaktavyam . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . pautraprabhṛti iti vartate . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:8548_0: pautraprabhṛti iti vartate iti . kim etasya anvākhyāne prayojanam . tat ca daivadattyartham . devadattasya apatyam devadattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8548_1: iti . anantaram yat apatyam tasya yuvasañjñā mā bhūt iti . devadattasya tarhi pautre
GS24pmbhasuu:8549_0: yuvasañjñā prāpnoti . etat api pautraprabhṛti bhavati . na pautraprabhṛti iti anena apatyam abhisambadhyate : pautraprabhṛti
GS24pmbhasuu:8549_1: yat apatyam iti . kim tarhi . vaṃśye abhisambadhyate : pautraprabhṛtivaṃśye jīvati yat apatyam iti . evam api devadattasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8549_2: dvau putra tayoḥ kanīyasi yuvasañjñā prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:8550_0: bhrātari ca jyāyasi iti . evam tarhi apatyam eva abhisambadhyate na tu pautraprabhṛtisamānādhikaraṇam apatyam . na evam vijñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8550_1: pautraprabhṛti yat apatyam iti . katham tarhi . pautraprabhṛteḥ yat apatyam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8551: vṛddhasya ca pūjāyām . vṛddhasya ca pūjāyām yuvasañjñā vaktavyā .
GS24pmbhasuu:8552: tatrabhavantaḥ gārgyāyaṇāḥ tatrabhavantaḥ vātsyāyanāḥ . kā punaḥ iha pūjā
GS24pmbhasuu:8553: . yuvatvam loke īpsitam pūjā iti upacaryate . tatrabhavantaḥ yuvatvena upacaryamāṇāḥ prītāḥ bhavanti . āpatyaḥ vā gotram . atha vā āpatyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8554: gotrasañjñaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . paramaprakṛteḥ ca āpatyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8555_0: paramaprakṛteḥ ca āpatyaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . āpatyāt jīvadvaṃśyāt svārthe dvitīyaḥ yuvasañjñaḥ . āpatyāt jīvadvaṃśyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8555_1: svārthe dvitīyaḥ pratyayaḥ vaktavyaḥ yuvasañjñaḥ ca bhavati iti vaktavyam . saḥ ca astriyām
GS24pmbhasuu:8556: . saḥ ca astriyām iti vaktavyam . ekogotragrahaṇānarthakyam ca . evam ca kṛtvā ekogotragrahaṇam anarthakam bhavati . bahuvacanalopiṣu ca siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:8557: bahuvacanalopiṣu ca siddham bhavati . tatra bidāṇām apatyam māṇavakaḥ iti vigṛhya bidaśabdāt dvyekayoḥ utpattiḥ bhaviṣyati . baidaḥ baidau .
GS24pmbhasuu:8558: baidasya apatyam bahavaḥ māṇavakāḥ iti vigṛhya bidaśabdāt bahuṣu utpattiḥ bhaviṣyati . bidāḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8560_0: bhrātari iti vartate . sapiṇḍamātre yathā syāt . atha sthavirataragrahaṇam kimartham . ubhayataḥ viśiṣṭe yathā syāt sthānataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8560_1: vayastaḥ ca . atha jīvati iti vartamāne punaḥ jīvatigrahaṇam kimartham . jīvataḥ jīvati yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:8561: syāt mṛte mā bhūt . mṛte hi mārgyaḥ mṛtaḥ iti eva bhavitavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8562_0: (P_4,1.165.2) KA_II,266.21-268.18 Ro_III,621-625 atha gotrayūnayoḥ samāveśaḥ bhavati utāho na . kim ca prāpnoti . bāḍham
GS24pmbhasuu:8562_1: prāpnoti . na hi ayam ekasañjñādhikāraḥ . kim ca ataḥ . gotrayoḥ samāveśe kaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8563: tatkṛtam bhavet . gotrayoḥ samāveśe kaḥ doṣaḥ . tatkṛtam prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8564: gotrāśrayāḥ vidhayaḥ yūni api prāpnuvanti . yāskāyanayaḥ lāhyāyanayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8565: yaskādibhyaḥ gotre iti luk prāpnoti . yaskādiṣu na doṣaḥ asti na yūni iti anuvartanāt . yaskādiṣu na doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . na yūni iti anuvartanāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:8566_0: na yūni iti tatra anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . na taulvalibhyaḥ iti . doṣaḥ atribidapañcālāḥ na yūni iti anuvartanāt . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:8566_1: na yūni iti anuvartate atrayaḥ bidāḥ pañcālāḥ māṇavakāḥ iti na sidhyati . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8567: sambandham anuvartiṣyate . na taulvalibhyaḥ . tadrājasya bahuṣu tena eva astriyām luk bhavati taulvalibhyaḥ yūni na . yaskādibhyaḥ gotre luk
GS24pmbhasuu:8568: bhavati yūni na . taulvalibhyaḥ iti nivṛttam . yañañoḥ ca atribhṛgukutsavasiṣṭhagotamāṅgirobhyaḥ ca luk bhavati . yūni na iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8569: nivṛttam . iha tarhi kāṇvyayanasya chātrāḥ kāṇvyāyanīyāḥ . kaṇvādibhyaḥ gotre iti aṇ prāpnoti . kaṇvādiṣu na doṣaḥ asti na yūni asti tataḥ param .
GS24pmbhasuu:8570: kaṇvādiṣu doṣaḥ na asti . kim kāraṇam . na yūni asti tataḥ param .
GS24pmbhasuu:8571: kaṇvādibhyaḥ yaḥ vihitaḥ tadantāt prātipadikāt iti ucyate . yaḥ ca atra
GS24pmbhasuu:8572_0: kaṇvādibhyaḥ vihitaḥ na tadantam prātipadikam yadantam ca prātipadikam na asau kaṇvādibhyaḥ . iha tarhi aupagavasya apatyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8572_1: aupagaviḥ iti ekaḥ gotre iti etasmāt niyamāt pratyayaḥ na prāpnoti . ekaḥ gotre pratipadam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8573_0: pratipadam atra pratyayāḥ vidhīyante gotrāt yūni astriyām iti . tadantāt tarhi anekaḥ pratyayaḥ prāpnoti . gotrāt yūni ca
GS24pmbhasuu:8573_1: tat smaret . gotrāt yūni astriyām iti tat smaret . kim . ekaḥ iti eva . gotre tarhi aluk uktaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8574: saḥ yūni api prāpnoti . astu . punaḥ yūni luk bhaviṣyati . na evam śakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8575: . phakphiñoḥ doṣaḥ syāt . śālaṅkeḥ yūnaḥ chātrāḥ śālaṅkāḥ pailasya pailāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8576_0: . phakphiñoḥ anyatarasyām iti anyatarasyām śravaṇam prasajyeta . tasmāt yuvasañjñāyām gotrasañjñāyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8576_1: . na vaktavyaḥ . tuḥ niyāmakaḥ . tuḥ kriyate . saḥ niyāmakaḥ bhaviṣyati : jīvati tu vaṃśye

GS24pmbhasuu:9336_1: iti vigṛhya dviśūrpam iti bhaviṣyati . dviśūrpyā krītam iti vigṛhya vākyam eva
GS24pmbhasuu:9337_0: bhaviṣyati . atha asañjñāyām iti kimartham . pāñcalohitikam pāñcakalāpikam . sañjñāpratiṣedhānarthakyam ca tannimittatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9337_1: lopasya . sañjñāpratiṣedhaḥ ca anarthakaḥ . kim kāraṇam . tannimittatvāt lopasya . na antareṇa taddhitam taddhitasya ca lukam
GS24pmbhasuu:9337_2: dviguḥ sañjñā asti . yaḥ tasmāt utpadyate
GS24pmbhasuu:9338_0: na asu tannimittam syāt . evam tarhi idam syāt . pañcānām lohitānām samāhāraḥ pañcalohitī pañcalohityā krītam . atra api
GS24pmbhasuu:9338_1: pañcalohitam iti eva bhavitavyam . katham . uktam hi etat arthaviśeṣāsampratyaye atannimittāt api iti . uktam saṅkhyātve
GS24pmbhasuu:9338_2: prayojanam tasmāt iha adhyardhagrahaṇānarthakyam . uktam saṅkhyātve adhyardhagrahaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9339_0: prayojanam . kim uktam . adhyardhagrahaṇam ca samāsakanvidhyartham luki ca agrahaṇam iti . tasmāt iha adhyardhagrahaṇānarthakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:9339_1: . tasmāt iha adhyardhagrahaṇam anarthakam . dvigoḥ iti eva luk siddhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9340_0: (P_5,1.29) KA_II.349.6-9 Ro_IV.37 kārṣāpaṇasahasrābhyām suvarṇaśatamānayoḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . adhyardhasuvarṇam adhyardhasauvarṇikam
GS24pmbhasuu:9342_0: dvitribhyām iti yat ucyate dvaiyogyam etat draṣṭavyam . kim idam dvaiyogyam iti . dvayoḥ yogayoḥ bhavam dviyogam . dviyogasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9342_1: bhāvaḥ dvaiyogyam iti . dveṣyam vijānīyāt : aviśeṣeṇa itaḥ uttaram dvitribhyām iti . tat ācāryaḥ suhṛt bhūtvā anvācaṣṭe :
GS24pmbhasuu:9343: tatra ca bahugrahaṇam . tatra ca bahugrahaṇam kartavyam . bahuniṣkam bahunaiṣkikam . bahubistam bahubaistikam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9344: (P_5,1.33) KA_II.349.20-350.4 Ro_IV.38 khāryāḥ īkan kevalāyāḥ ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:9345_0: khāryāḥ īkan kevalāyāḥ ca iti vaktavyam . khārīkam . kākiṇyāḥ ca upasaṅkhyānam .kākiṇyāḥ ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . adhyardhakākiṇīkam
GS24pmbhasuu:9345_1: dvikākiṇīkam . kevalāyāḥ ca . kevalāyāḥ ca iti vaktavyam . kākiṇīkam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9346_0: (P_5,1.35) KA_II.350.6-11 Ro_IV.38-39 śataśāṇābhyām vā . śataśāṇābhyām vā iti vaktavyam . adhyardhaśatam adhyardhaśatyam
GS24pmbhasuu:9346_1: pañcaśatam pañcaśatyam adhyardhaśāṇam adhyardhaśāṇyam pañcaśāṇam pañcaśāṇyam . dvitripūrvāt aṇ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:9347: . dvitripūrvāt aṇ ca iti vaktavyam . dviśāṇam triśāṇam dvaiśāṇam traiśāṇam dviśāṇyam triśāṇyam
GS24pmbhasuu:9348: (P_5,1.37) KA_II.350.13-351.6 Ro_IV.39-40 tena krītam iti karaṇāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:9349_0: tena krītam iti atra karaṇāt iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . devadattena krītam . yajñadattena krītam iti . akartrekāntāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:9349_1: akartrekāntāt iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . devadattena pāṇinā krītam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9350_0: saṅkhyaikavacanāt dvigoḥ ca upasaṅkhyānam . saṅkhyāyāḥ iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt . pañcabhiḥ krītam pañcakam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:9350_1: punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . ekavacanāntāt iti vakṣyati . tasya ayam purastāt apakarṣaḥ . ekavacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9351: . ekavacanāntāt iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . śūrpābhyām krītam . śūrpaiḥ krītam iti . dvigoḥ ca . dvigoḥ ca iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:9352_0: dvābhyām śūrpābhyām krītam dviśūrpam triśūrpam iti . yadi ekavacanāntāt iti ucyate mudgaiḥ krītam maudgikam māṣaiḥ krītam
GS24pmbhasuu:9352_1: māṣikam iti na sidhyati . parimāṇasya saṅkhyāyāḥ yat ekavacanam tadantāt iti vaktavyam . tat tarhi ekavacanāntāt iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:9352_2: . tasmin ca kriyamāṇe bahu vaktavyam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:9353: na vaktavyam . kasmāt na bhavati śūrpābhyām krītam . śūrpaiḥ krītam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9354: uktam vā . kim uktam . anabhidhānāt iti . yadi evam karaṇāt akartrekāntāt iti api na vaktavyam . kartuḥ kartrekāntāt vā kasmāt na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:9357: saṃyogaḥ nāma saḥ bhavati idam kṛtvā idam avāpyate iti . utpātaḥ nāma saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9358: bhavati yādṛcchikaḥ bhedaḥ vā chedaḥ vā padmam vā parṇam vā .
GS24pmbhasuu:9360: tasyanimittaprakaraṇe vātapittaśleṣmabhyaḥ śamakopanayoḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . vātasya śamanam kopanam vā vātikam . paittikam ślaiṣmikam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9361: sannipātāt ca . sannipātāt ca iti vaktavyam . sānnipātikam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9363: yatprakaraṇe brahmavarcasāt ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . brahmavarcasasya nimittam brahmvarcasyaḥ . utpātaḥ vā .
GS24pmbhasuu:9364: (P_5,1.47) KA_II.351.20-352.2 Ro_IV.41 tad asmin dīyate asmai iti ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:9365: tad asmin dīyate asmai iti ca iti vaktavyam . pañca vṛddhiḥ vā āyaḥ vā lābhaḥ vā śulkaḥ vā upadā vā dīyate asmai pañcakaḥ . saptakaḥ . aṣṭakaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9366: navakaḥ . daśakaḥ . tat tarhi upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . na kartavyam . yat hi yasmai dīyate tasmin api tat dīyate . tat asmin dīyate iti eva siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:9367: (P_5,1.48) KA_II.352.4-8 Ro_IV.41-42 ṭhanprakaraṇe anantāt upasaṅkhyānam . ṭhanprakaraṇe anantāt upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . dvitīyakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9368_0: . tṛtīyakaḥ . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . pūraṇāt iti ucyate . na ca etat pūraṇāntam . anā etat paryavapannam . pūraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9368_1: nāma arthaḥ . tam artham āha tīyaśabdaḥ . pūraṇam saḥ asau bhavati . pūraṇantāt svārthe bhāge an . saḥ api pūraṇam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:9369: (P_5,1.52) KA_II.352.10-11 Ro_IV.42 tat pacati iti droṇāt aṇ ca . tat pacati iti droṇāt aṇ ca iti vaktavyam . droṇam pacati . drauṇī . drauṇikī
GS24pmbhasuu:9370_0: (P_5,1.55) KA_II.352.13-15 Ro_IV.42-43 kulijāt ca iti siddhe lukkhagrahaṇānarthakyam pūrvsamin trikabhāvāt . kulijāt ca iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9370_1: eva siddham . na arthaḥ lukkhagrahaṇena . kim kāraṇam . pūrvasmin trikabhāvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:9371: pūrvasmin yoge sarvaḥ eṣaḥ trikaḥ nirdiśyate . dvyāḍhakī . dvyāḍhikī .
GS24pmbhasuu:9374: sañjñāyām svārthe pratyayaḥ utpādyaḥ . pañca eva pañcakāḥ śakunayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9375_0: trikāḥ śālaṅkāyanāḥ . saptakāḥ brahmavṛkṣāḥ . tataḥ parimāṇini . tataḥ paraḥ pratyayaḥ parimāṇini iti vaktavyam . pañcakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9375_1: saṅghaḥ . daśakaḥ saṅghaḥ . jīvitaparimāṇe ca upasaṅkhyānam . jīvitaparimāṇe ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . ṣaṣṭiḥ jīvitaparimāṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9376_0: sāptatikaḥ . jīvitaparimāṇe ca iti anarthakam vacanam kālāt iti siddhatvāt . jīvitaparimāṇe ca iti anarthakam vacanam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:9376_1: kāraṇam . kālāt iti siddhatvāt . kālāt iti eva siddham . iha yasya ṣaṣṭiḥ jīvitaparimāṇam ṣaṣtim asu bhūtaḥ bhavati . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:9376_2: tam adhīṣṭaḥ bhṛtaḥ bhūtaḥ bhāvī iti eva siddham . avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam . iha vacane hi lukprasaṅgaḥ . iha hi kriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:9376_3: luk prasajyeta : dviṣāṣṭikaḥ . triṣāṣṭikaḥ . anena sati luk
GS24pmbhasuu:9377: bhavati . tena sati kasmāt na bhavati . ā arhāt iti ucyate . na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:9378_0: kim kāraṇam . na hi ime kālaśabdāḥ . kim tarhi saṅkhyāśabdāḥ ime . ime api kālaśabdāḥ . katham . saṅkhyā saṅkhyeye vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:9378_1: . yadi tarhi yaḥ yaḥ kāle vartate saḥ saḥ kālaśabdaḥ ramaṇīyādiṣu atriprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . ramaṇīyam kālam bhūtaḥ . śobhanam
GS24pmbhasuu:9378_2: kālam bhūtaḥ . atha matam etat . kāle dṛṣṭaḥ śabdaḥ kālaśabdaḥ kālam yaḥ na vyabhicarati iti na ramaṇīyādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:9379_0: atriprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . jīvitaparimāṇe tu upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . iha ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . vārṣaśatikaḥ . vārṣasahasrikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9379_1: iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . na hi varṣaśataśabdaḥ saṅkhyā . kim tarhi saṅkhyeye
GS24pmbhasuu:9380: vartate varṣaśataśabdaḥ . evam tarhi anyebhyaḥ api dṛśyate khāraśatādyartham . anyebhyaḥ api dṛśyate iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9381_0: khāraśatādyartham . khāraśatikaḥ rāśiḥ . khārasahastrikaḥ rāśiḥ . ayam tarhi doṣaḥ . iha vacane hi lukprasaṅgaḥ iti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:9381_1: brūmaḥ yatra kriyamāṇe doṣaḥ tatra kartavyam iti . kim tarhi . yatra kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ tatra kartavyam . kva ca kriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:9381_2: na doṣaḥ . param arhāt . tat tarhi upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . na kartavyam . kālāt iti eva siddham . nanu ca uktam na ime
GS24pmbhasuu:9381_3: kālaśabdāḥ . kim tarhi . saṅkhyāśabdāḥ iti . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:9382: ime api kālaśabdāḥ . katham . saṅkhyā saṅkhyeye vartate . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:9383: yadi tarhi yaḥ yaḥ kāle vartate saḥ saḥ kālaśabdaḥ ramaṇīyādiṣu atriprasaṅgaḥ bhavati iti . uktam vā . kim uktam . anabhidhānāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9385: (P_5,1.57-58.2) KA_II.354.7-9 Ro_IV.46 stome ḍavidhiḥ pañcadaśādyarthaḥ . stome ḍaḥ vidheyaḥ . kim prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9386: pañcadaśādyarthaḥ . pañcadaśaḥ stomaḥ . saptadaśaḥ stomaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9387: (P_5,1.59) KA_II.355.2-357.8 Ro_IV.46-56 ime viṃśatyādayaḥ saprakṛtikāḥ sapratyayakāḥ nipātyante . tatra na jñāyate kā prakṛtiḥ kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9388_0: pratyayaḥ kaḥ pratyayārthaḥ iti . tatra vaktavyam iyam prakṛtiḥ ayam pratyayaḥ ayam pratyayārthaḥ iti . ime brūmaḥ dviśabdāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9388_1: ayam daśadarthābhidāhinaḥ svārthe śaticpratyayaḥ nipātyate vinbhāvaḥ ca . dvau daśatau viṃśatiḥ . viṃśatyādayaḥ daśāt cet
GS24pmbhasuu:9389: viṃśatyādayaḥ daśāt cet samāsaḥ na upapadyate . viṃśatigavam iti . kim kāraṇam . dravyam anabhihitam . tasya anabhihitatvāt ṣaṣṭhī prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9390_0: ṣaṣṭhyantam ca samāse pūrvam nipatati . tatra goviṃśatiḥ iti prāpnoti . na ca evam bhavitavyam . bhavitavyam ca viṃśatigavam
GS24pmbhasuu:9390_1: tu na sidhyati . iha ca triṃśatpūlī catvāriṃśatpūlī samānādhikaraṇalakṣaṇaḥ samāsaḥ na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9391: vacanam ca vidheyam . viṃśatiḥ . dvitvāt daśatoḥ dvayoḥ dvivacanam iti dvivacanam prāpnoti . evam tarhi parimāṇini viṃśatyādayaḥ bhaviṣyanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9392: parimāṇini cet punaḥ svārthe pratyayavidhānam . parimāṇini cet punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9393: svārthe pratyayaḥ vidheyaḥ . viṃśakaḥ saṅghaḥ . ṣaṣṭhīvacanavidhiḥ ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:9394_0: ṣaṣṭhī ca vidheyā . gavām viṃśatiḥ . dravyam abhihitam . tasya abhihitatvāt ṣaṣṭhī na prāpnoti . ekavacanam ca vidheyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9394_1: viṃśatiḥ gāvaḥ . gobhiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyāt bahuṣu bahuvacanam iti bahuvacanam prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9395: anārambhaḥ vā prātipadikavijñānāt yathā sahasrādiṣu . anārambhaḥ vā punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9396_0: viṃśatyādīnām nyāyyaḥ . katham sidhyati . prātipadikavijñānāt . katham prātipadikavijñānam . viṃśatyādayaḥ avyutpannāni prātipadikāni
GS24pmbhasuu:9396_1: yathā sahasrādiṣu . tat yathā sahasram ayutam arbudam iti na ca anugamaḥ kriyate bhavati ca abhidhānam . yathā sahasrādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:9396_2: iti ucyate . atha sahasrādiṣu api katham bhavitavyam . sahasram gavām . sahasram gāvaḥ . sahasragavam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9397: gosahasram iti . yāvatā atra api sandehaḥ na asūyā kartavyā yatra anugamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9398: kriyate . nanu ca uktam viṃśatyādayaḥ daśāt cet samāsavacanānupapattiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9399: parimāṇini cet punaḥ svārthe pratyayavidhānam . ṣaṣṭhīvacanavidhiḥ ca iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9400: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . samudāye viṃśatyādayaḥ bhaviṣyanti . kim vaktavyam etat
GS24pmbhasuu:9401_0: . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . saṅghaḥ iti vartate . saṅghaḥ samūhaḥ samudāyaḥ iti anarthāntaram . te ete viṃśatyādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9401_1: samudāye santaḥ bhāvavacanāḥ bhavanti bhāvavacanāḥ santaḥ guṇavacanāḥ bhavanti guṇavacanāḥ santaḥ aviśiṣṭāḥ bhavanti anyaiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9402_0: kadā cit guṇaḥ guṇiviśeṣakaḥ bhavati . tat yathā śuklaḥ paṭaḥ iti . kadā cit guṇinā guṇaḥ vyapadiśyate : paṭasya śuklaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9402_1: . tat yadā tāvat ucyate viṃśatyādayaḥ daśāt cet samāsavacanānupapattiḥ iti sāmānādhikaraṇyam tadā guṇaguṇinoḥ . vacanaparihāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9403: svārthe pratyayavidhānam iti saṃhanane vṛttaḥ saṃhanane vartiṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:9404: saṅkhyāsaṃhanane vṛttaḥ dravyasaṃhanane vartiṣyate . atha ṣaṣṭhī tadā
GS24pmbhasuu:9405: guṇinā guṇaḥ viśeṣyate . vacanaparihāraḥ ubhayoḥ api . yadi tarhi ime
GS24pmbhasuu:9406_0: viṃśatyādayaḥ guṇavacanāḥ syuḥ sadharmabhiḥ anyaiḥ guṇavacanaiḥ bhavitavyam . anye ca guṇavacanāḥ dravyasya liṅgasaṅkhye
GS24pmbhasuu:9406_1: anuvartante . tat yathā . śuklam vastram . śuklā śāṭī . śuklaḥ kambalaḥ . śuklau kambalau .
GS24pmbhasuu:9407: śuklāḥ kambalāḥ iti . yat asau dravyam śritaḥ guṇaḥ tasya yat liṅgam vacanam ca tat guṇasya api bhavati . viṃśatyādayaḥ punaḥ na anuvartante .
GS24pmbhasuu:9408: anye api vai guṇavacanāḥ na avaśyam dravyasya liṅgasaṅkhye anuvartante .
GS24pmbhasuu:9409: tat yathā . gāvaḥ dhanam . putrā apatyam . indrāgnī devatā . viśvedevāḥ devatā . yāvantaḥ te vāśitām anuyanti sarve te dakṣiṇā samṛddhyai iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9410_0: atha atra ananuvṛttau hetuḥ śakyaḥ vaktum . bāḍham śakyaḥ vaktum . kāmam tarhi ucyatām . iha kadā cit guṇaḥ prādhānyena vivakṣitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9410_1: bhavati . tat yathā : pañca uḍupaśatāni tīrṇāni . pañca phalakaśatāni tīrṇāni . aśvaiḥ yuddham . asibhiḥ yuddham iti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:9410_2: ca asayaḥ yudhyante . asiguṇāḥ puruṣāḥ yudhyante guṇaḥ tu khalu prādhānyena vivakṣitaḥ . iha tāvat gāvaḥ dhanam iti dhinoteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9410_3: dhanam ekaḥ guṇaḥ . saḥ prādhānyena vivakṣitaḥ . putrāḥ apatyam iti apatanāt apatyam ekaḥ guṇaḥ . saḥ prādhānyena vivakṣitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9411: indrāgnī devatā . viśvedevāḥ devatā iti diveḥ aiśvaryakarmaṇaḥ devaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9412: tasmāt svārthe tal . ekaḥ guṇaḥ . saḥ prādhānyena vivakṣitaḥ . yāvantaḥ te vāśitām anuyanti sarve te dakṣiṇā samṛddhyā iti dakṣeḥ vṛddhikarmaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9413: dakṣiṇā ekaḥ guṇaḥ . saḥ prādhānyena vivakṣitaḥ . tasya ekatvāt ekavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:9414: bhaviṣyati . viṃśatyādiṣu ca api ekaḥ guṇaḥ . saḥ prādhānyena vivakṣitaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9415: tasya ekatvāt ekavacanam bhaviṣyati . ayam tarhi viṃśatyādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:9416: bhāvavacaneṣu doṣaḥ . goviṃśatiḥ ānīyatām iti bhāvānayane codite dravyānanam na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . idam tāvat ayam praṣṭavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:9417: atha iha gauḥ anubandhyaḥ ajaḥ agnīṣomīyaḥ iti katham ākṛtau coditāyām dravye ārambhaṇalambhanaprokṣaṇaviśasanādīni kriyante iti . asambhavāt .

GS24pmbhasuu:9539_1: . agotām anapatyatām . bhavet idam yuktam udāharaṇam . ayonitvāya . aśithilatvāya iti . idam tu ayuktam apaśutām iti . na

GS24pmbhasuu:9548: eva ā tvāt ye arthāḥ tatra tvatalau bhaviṣyataḥ yatra ca ucyete . idam tarhi prayojanam . ā tvāt yāḥ prakṛtayaḥ tābhyaḥ ca tvatalau yathā syātām

GS24pmbhasuu:9554: parigaṇitābhyaḥ prakṛtibhyaḥ uttaraḥ bhāvapratyayaḥ vidhīyate . na ca tatra kā cit nañpūrvā prakṛtiḥ gṛhyate . tadantavidhinā prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9555_0: grahaṇavatā prātipadikena tadantavidhiḥ pratiṣidhyate . yatra tarhi tadantavidhiḥ asti . patyantapurohitādibhyaḥ yak iti

GS24pmbhasuu:9969_1: ekā govidhā . ekā hastividhā . atra api prāpnoti . evam tarhi dhāvidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:9971_0: kaḥ punaḥ dhātvarthapṛthagbhāvaḥ . kim yat tat devadattaḥ kaṃsapātryām pāṇinā odanam bhuṅkte iti . na iti āha . kārakapṛthaktvam

GS24pmbhasuu:9979_0: (P_5,3.47) KA_II.411.5-10 Ro_IV.195 pāśapi kutsitagrahaṇam . pāśapi kutsitagrahaṇam kartavyam . vaiyākaraṇapāśaḥ . yājñikapāśaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:9981: na hi apūraṇaḥ tīyaśabdaḥ asti yatra doṣaḥ syāt . nanu ca ayam asti mukhatīyaḥ pārśvatīyaḥ iti . arthavadgrahaṇe na anarthakasya iti evam asya
GS24pmbhasuu:9982: na bhaviṣyati . uttarārtham tarhi pūraṇagrahaṇam kartavyam . prāk ekādaśabhyaḥ acchandasi iti pūraṇāt yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:9983_0: (P_5,3.52) KA_II.411.17-412.10 Ro_IV.19196-197 ekāt ākinici dvibahvarthe pratyayavidhānam . ekāt ākinici dvibahvarthe pratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9983_1: vidheyaḥ . ekākinau . ekākinaḥ iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:9984_0: ekaśabdaḥ ayam saṅkhyāpadam saṅkhyāyāḥ ca saṅkhyeyam arthaḥ . siddham tu saṅkhyādeśavacanāt . siddham etat . katham . dvibahvarthāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9984_1: saṅkhyāyāḥ ekaśabdaḥ ādeśaḥ vaktavyaḥ . asahāyasya vā . asahāyasya vā ekaśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9985: ādeśaḥ vaktavyaḥ . asahāyaḥ ekākī . asahāyau ekākinau . asahāyāḥ ekākinaḥ . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:9986_0: ekāt ākinici dvibahvarthe pratyayavidhānam iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ayam ekaśabdaḥ asti eva saṅkhyāpadam . tat yathā ekaḥ dvau
GS24pmbhasuu:9986_1: bahavaḥ iti . asti anyārthe vartate . tat yathā sadhamādaḥ dyumnaḥ ekāḥ tāḥ . anyāḥ iti arthaḥ . asti asahāyavācī . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:9986_2: . ekāgnayaḥ . ekahalāni . ekākibhiḥ kṣudrakaiḥ jitam iti . tat yaḥ asahāyavācī tasya eṣaḥ prayogaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9988_0: kim idam atiśāyane iti . deśyāḥ sūtranibandhāḥ kriyante . yāvat brūyāt prakarṣe atiśaye iti tāvat atiśāyane iti . kasya punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9988_1: prakarṣe pratyayaḥ utpadyate . ṅyāpprātipadikāt iti vartate . ṅyāpprātipadikasya prakarṣe .
GS24pmbhasuu:9989: ṅyāpprātipadikam vai śabdaḥ na ca śabdasya prakarṣāpakarṣau staḥ . śabde asambhavāt arthe kāryam vijñāsyate . kaḥ punaḥ ṅyāpprātipadikārthaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9990: dravyam . na vai dravyasaya prakarṣe iṣyate . evam tarhi guṇaḥ . evam api guṇagrahaṇam kartavyam . dravyam api ṅyāpprātipadikārthaḥ guṇaḥ api .
GS24pmbhasuu:9991_0: tatra kutaḥ etat guṇasya prakarṣe bhaviṣyati na punaḥ dravyasya prakarṣe iti . kriyamāṇe ca api guṇagrahaṇe samānaguṇagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9991_1: kartavyam śuklāt kṛṣṇe mā bhūt iti . na tarhi idānīm idam bhavati : adhvaryuḥ vai śreyān .
GS24pmbhasuu:9992: pāpīyān pratiprasthātā . andhānām kāṇatamaḥ iti . samānaguṇe eṣā spardhā
GS24pmbhasuu:9993_0: bhavati . adhvaryuḥ vai śreyān anyebhyaḥ praśasyebhyaḥ . pāpīyān pratiprasthātā anyebhyaḥ pāpebhyaḥ . andhānām kāṇatamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9993_1: iti kaṇiḥ ayam saukṣmye vartate . sarve ime kim cit paśyanti . ayam eṣām kāṇatamaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9994: adūraviprakarṣe iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . mahān sarṣapaḥ . mahān himavān iti . jāteḥ na iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt : vṛkṣaḥ ayam plakṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9995: ayam iti . na tarhi idānīm idam bhavati : gotaraḥ . gotarā . aśvataraḥ iti . na eṣaḥ jāteḥ prakarṣaḥ . kasya tarhi . guṇasya . gauḥ ayam śakaṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:9996_0: vahati . gotararḥ ayam yaḥ śakaṭam vahati sīram ca . gauḥ iyam yā samām samām vijāyate . gotarā iyam yā samām samām vijāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:9996_1: strīvatsā ca . aśvaḥ ayam yaḥ catvāri yojanāni gacchati . aśvataraḥ ayam yaḥ aṣṭau yojanāni gacchati . tathā tiṅaḥ ca iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9996_2: atra kriyāgrahaṇam kartavyam sādhanaprakarṣe mā bhūt . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yat tāvat ucyate guṇagrahaṇam kartavyam iti . na kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:9996_3: . yasya prakarṣaḥ asti tasya prakarṣe bhaviṣyati . guṇasya ca eva prakarṣaḥ na dravyasya . katham jñāyate . evam hi dṛśyate
GS24pmbhasuu:9996_4: loke . iha samāne āyāme vistāre paṭasya anyaḥ arghaḥ bhavati kāśikasya anyaḥ māthurasya . guṇāntaram khalu api śilpinaḥ utpādayamānāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9997: prakṣālayanti . anyena śuddham dhautakam kurvanti anyena śaiphālikam
GS24pmbhasuu:9998: anyena mādhyamikam . yat api ucyate kriyamāṇe ca api guṇagrahaṇe samānaguṇagrahaṇam kartavyam śuklāt kṛṣṇe mā bhūt iti . na kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9999_0: samānaguṇe eva spardhā bhavati . nahi āḍhyābhirūpau spardhete . vācakena khalu api utpattavyam na ca śuklāt kṛṣṇe pratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9999_1: utpadyamānaḥ vācakaḥ syāt . yat api ucyate adūraviprakarṣe iti vaktavyam iti . na vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10000: adūraviprakarṣe eva spardhā bhavati . na hi niṣkadhanaḥ śataniṣkadhanena spardhate . yat api ucyate jāteḥ na iti vaktavyam iti . na vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10001_0: jananena yā prāpyate sā jātiḥ na ca etasya arthasya prakarṣāpakarṣau staḥ . yat api ucyate tiṅaḥ ca iti atra kriyāgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:10001_1: kartavyam sādhanaprakarṣe mā bhūt iti . na kartavyam . sādhanam vai dravyam na ca dravyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10002: prakarṣāpakarṣau staḥ . kim punaḥ ekam śauklyam āhosvit nānā . kim ca ataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10003: . yadi ekam prakarṣaḥ na upapadyate . na hi tena eva tasya prakarṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10004: bhavati . atha nānā samānaguṇagrahaṇam kartavyam śuklāt kṛṣṇe mā bhūt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:10005: . asti ekam śauklyam tat tu viśeṣavat . kiṅkṛtaḥ viśeṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10006_0: alpatvamahattvakṛtaḥ . atha vā punaḥ astu ekam nirviśeṣam ca . nanu ca uktam prakarṣaḥ na upapadyate . na hi tena eva tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10006_1: prakarṣaḥ bhavati iti . guṇāntareṇa pracchādāt prakarṣaḥ bhaviṣyati . atha vā punaḥ astu nānā .
GS24pmbhasuu:10007: nanu ca uktam samānaguṇagrahaṇam kartavyam śuklāt kṛṣṇe mā bhūt iti . na kartavyam . samānaguṇe eva spardhā bhavati . nahi āḍhyābhirūpau spardhete
GS24pmbhasuu:10008: . vācakena khalu api utpattavyam na ca śuklāt kṛṣṇe pratyayaḥ utpadyamānaḥ vācakaḥ syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:10010: bhavitavyam . dvitīyāntāt atiśayyamānāt . śuklam atiśete śuklataraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10011: kṛṣṇam atiśete kṛṣṇataraḥ . yadi dvitīyāntāt atiśayyamānāt kālaḥ atiśete kālīm kālitaraḥ iti prāpnoti kālataraḥ iti ca iṣyate . tathā kālī atiśete
GS24pmbhasuu:10012_0: kālam kālataraḥ iti prāpnoti kālitarā iti ca iṣyate . tathā gārgyaḥ atiśete gargān gargataraḥ iti prāpnoti gārgyataraḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:10012_1: ca iṣyate . tathā gargāḥ atiśerate gārgyam gārgyatarāḥ iti prāpnoti gargatarāḥ iti ca iṣyate . evam tarhi prathamāntāt svārthikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10013_0: . kālī atiśete kālitarā . gārgyaḥ atiśete gārgyataraḥ . gargāḥ atiśerate gargatarāḥ . yadi prathamāntāt svārthikaḥ kumāritarā
GS24pmbhasuu:10013_1: kiśoritarā avyatiriktam vayaḥ iti kṛtvā vayasi prathame iti ṅīp prāpnoti . tarapā uktatvāt strīpratyayaḥ na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:10013_2: ṭāp api tarhi na prāpnoti . ukte api hi bhavanti ete ṭābādayaḥ . uktam etat svārthikāḥ ṭābādayaḥ iti . ṅīp api tarhi prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:10013_3: . evam tarhi guṇaḥ abhidhīyate . evam api liṅgavacanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:10014: na sidhyanti . śuklataram . śuklatarā . śuklataraḥ . śuklatarau .
GS24pmbhasuu:10015_0: śuklatarāḥ iti . āśrayataḥ liṅgavacanāni bhaviṣyanti . guṇavacanānām hi śabdānām āśrayata liṅgavacanāni bhavanti . śuklam
GS24pmbhasuu:10015_1: vastram , śuklā śāṭī śuklaḥ kambalaḥ , śuklau kambalau śuklāḥ kambalāḥ iti . yat asau dravyam
GS24pmbhasuu:10016_0: śritaḥ bhavati guṇaḥ tasya yat liṅgam vacanam ca tat gu asya api bhaviṣyati . atha vā kriyā abhidhīyate . evam api liṅgavacanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:10016_1: na sidhyanti . āśrayataḥ liṅgavacanāni bhaviṣyanti . evam api dvivacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:10017_0: prāpnoti . yaḥ ca atiśete yaḥ ca atiśayyate ubhau tau tasya āśrayau bhavataḥ . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . katham . śetiḥ akarmakaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10017_1: akarmakāḥ api dhātavaḥ sopasargāḥ sakarmakāḥ bhavanti . karmāpadiṣṭāḥ vidhayaḥ karmasthabhāvakānām karmasthakriyāṇam vā bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:10018: śetiḥ . atha yadi eva dvitīyāntāt utpattiḥ prathamāntāt vā svārthikaḥ atha
GS24pmbhasuu:10019_0: api guṇaḥ abhidhīyate atha api kriyā kim gatam etat iyatā sūtreṇa āhosvit anyatarasmin pakṣe bhūyaḥ sūtram kartavyam . gatam
GS24pmbhasuu:10019_1: iti āha . katham . yadā tāvat dvitīyāntāt utpattiḥ prathamāntāt vā svārthikaḥ tadā kṛtyalyuṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10020_0: bahulam iti evam atra lyuṭ bhaviṣyati . yadā guṇaḥ abhidhīyate tadā nyāyasiddham eva . yadā lapi kriyā tadā api nyāyasiddham
GS24pmbhasuu:10020_1: eva . atha vā atiśāyayati iti atiśāyanam . kaḥ prayojyārthaḥ . guṇāḥ guṇinam prayojayanti guṇī vā guṇān prayojayati . kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10020_2: punaḥ iha śetyarthaḥ . iha yaḥ yatra bhavati śete asau tatra . guṇāḥ ca guṇini śerate . śetyarthaḥ kāritārthaḥ vā nirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10020_3: ayam samīkṣitaḥ . śetyarthe na asti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10021: kāritārthe bravīmi te . guṇī vā guṇasaṃyogāt guṇaḥ vā guṇinā yadi abhivyajyeta saṃyogāt kāritārthaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:10022: (P_5,3.55.3) KA_II.415.18-416.15 Ro_IV.209-211 iha asya api sūkṣmāṇi vastrāṇi asya api sūkṣmāṇi vastrāṇi iti paratvāt ātiśāyikaḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10023_0: atiśāyane bahuvrīhau uktam . kim uktam . pūrvpadātiśaye ātiśāyikāt bahuvrīhiḥ sūkṣmavastratarādyarthaḥ . uttarapadātiśaye
GS24pmbhasuu:10023_1: ātiśāyikaḥ bahuvrīheḥ bahvāḍhyatarādyarthaḥ iti . iha trīṇi śuklāni vastrāṇi prakarṣāpakarṣayuktāni . tatra pūrvam apekṣya
GS24pmbhasuu:10023_2: uttare dve tarabante . tatra dvayoḥ tarabantayoḥ ekasmāt prakarṣayuktāt śuklataraśabdāt utpattiḥ prāpnoti śuklaśabdāt eva
GS24pmbhasuu:10024_0: pratyayavijñānam . śuklataraśabde śuklaśabdaḥ asti . tasmāt utpattiḥ bhaviṣyati . na etat vivadāmahe śuklataraśabde śuklaśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10024_1: asti na asti iti . kim tarhi . śuklataraśabdaḥ api asti . tataḥ utpattiḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10025: tadantāt ca svārthe chandasi darśanam śreṣṭhamāya iti . tadantāt ātiśāyikāntāt ca svārthe chandasi ātiśāyikaḥ dṛśyate . devo vaḥ savita
GS24pmbhasuu:10026_0: prarpayatu śreṣṭhamāya karmaṇe . evam tarhi madhyamāt śuklaśabdāt pūrvaparāpekṣāt utpattiḥ vaktavyā . madhyamaḥ ca śuklaśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10026_1: pūrvam apekṣya prakṛṣṭaḥ param apekṣya nyūnaḥ na ca nyūnaḥ pravartate . atha vā utpadyatām . luk bhaviṣyati . vācakena khalu
GS24pmbhasuu:10027: śuklataraśabdāt utpadyamānaḥ vācakaḥ syāt . na khalu api bahūnām prakarṣe tarapā bhavitavyam . kena tarhi . tamapā . pūrveṇa spardhamānaḥ ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:10028_0: labhate sitaḥ . parasmin nyūnatām eti na ca nyūnaḥ pravartate . apekṣya madhyamaḥ pūrvam ādhikyam labhate sitaḥ . parasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:10028_1: nyūnatām eti yathā amātyaḥ sthite nṛpe . astu vā api taraḥ tasmāt . na apaśabdaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:10029: vācakaḥ cet prayoktavyaḥ vācakaḥ cet prayujyatām .
GS24pmbhasuu:10031: tatra idam na sidhyati . dantoṣṭhasya dantāḥ snigdhatarāḥ . pāṇipādasya pādau sukumāratarau . asmākam ca devadattasya ca devadattaḥ abhirūpataraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10032: iti . yadi punaḥ dvyarthopapade iti ucyeta . tatra ayam api arthaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10033: vibhajyopapadagrahaṇam na kartavyam . iha api śaṅkāśyakebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10034_0: pāṭaliputrakāḥ abhirūpatarāḥ iti dvyarthopapade iti eva siddham . na evañjātīyakā dvyarthatā śakyā vijñātum . iha api prasjyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:10034_1: . śaṅkāśyakānām pāṭaliputrakāṇām ca pāṭaliputrakāḥ abhirūpatamāḥ iti . avaśyam khalu api
GS24pmbhasuu:10035: vibhajyopapadagrahaṇam kartavyam yaḥ hi bahūnām vibhāgaḥ tadartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:10036: śaṅkāśyakebhyaḥ ca pāṭaliputrakebhyaḥ ca māthurāḥ abhirūpatarāḥ iti . tat tarhi dvyarthopapade iti vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . na idam pāribhāṣikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10037: dvivacanasya grahaṇam . kim tarhi anvarthagrahaṇam . ucyate vacanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10038: dvayoḥ arthayoḥ vacanam dvivacanam iti . evam api tarabīyasunoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10039: ekadravyasya utkarṣāpakarṣayoḥ upasaṅkhyānam . tarabīyasunoḥ ekadravyasya utkarṣāpakarṣayoḥ upasaṅkhyānam vaktavyam . parut bhavān paṭuḥ āsīt .
GS24pmbhasuu:10040: paṭutaraḥ ca aiṣamaḥ iti . siddham tu guṇapradhānatvāt . siddham etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:10041: katham . guṇapradhānatvāt . guṇapradhānaḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ kriyate .

GS24pmbhasuu:11206_3: . vṛkṣam , plakṣam . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yat pūrvasmin yoge dīrghagrahaṇam tat uttaratra nivṛttam . evam api idam iha pūrvasavarṇagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:11206_4: kriyate . tena ami api pūrvasavarṇaḥ prasajyeta vṛkṣam , plakṣam . dvimātraḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . savarṇagrahaṇam na

GS24pmbhasuu:11207_0: yadi evam agnī vāyū trimātraḥ prāpnoti vṛkṣam , plakṣam dvimātraḥ . tasmāt savarṇagrahaṇam kartavyam . tasmin ca kriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:11207_1: dīrghagrahaṇam anuvartate . tasmin anuvartamāne ami pūrvaḥ iti api vaktavyam . atha kimartham pṛthak

GS24pmbhasuu:11208_1: tana ami api dīrghaḥ prasajyeta . vṛkṣam , plakṣam . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . dīrghagrahaṇam nivartayiṣyate . evam api pūrvasavarṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11208_2: prasajyeta . savarṇagrahaṇam na kariṣyate . yadi savarṇagrahaṇam na kriyate pūrvasmin yoge vipratiṣiddham
GS24pmbhasuu:11209: . yadi pūrvaḥ na dīrghaḥ atha dīrghaḥ na pūrvaḥ . pūrvaḥ dīrghaḥ ca iti vipratiṣiddham . tasmāt ubhayam ārabdhavyam pṛthak ca kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11210: (P_6,1.102.2) KA_III.78.20-80.21 Ro_IV.441-446 prathamayoḥ iti yogavibhāgaḥ savarṇadīrghārthaḥ . prathamayoḥ iti yogavibhāgaḥ kartavyaḥ .

GS24pmbhasuu:11212: pūrvasavarṇadīrghaḥ bhavati ekaḥ prathamayoḥ iti . kimarthaḥ yogavibhāgaḥ . savarṇadīrghatvam yathā syāt . ekayoge hi jaśśahoḥ pararūpaprasaṅgaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11213: ekayoge hi sati jaśśahoḥ pararūpam prasajyeta . vṛkṣāḥ , plakṣāḥ , vṛkṣān
GS24pmbhasuu:11214_0: , plakṣān . nanu ca pūrvasavarṇadīrghatvam pararūpam bādhiṣyate . na utsahate bādhitum . kim kāraṇam . ādguṇayaṇādeśayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11215: ādguṇayaṇādeśau utsargau . tayoḥ apavādāḥ vṛddhisavarṇadīrghapūrvasavarṇādeśāḥ teṣām sarveṣām pararūpam apavādaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11216: tat sarvabādhakam . sarvabādhakatvāt prāpnoti . atha kriyamāṇe api
GS24pmbhasuu:11217: yogavibhāge yāvatā pararūpam apavādaḥ kasmāt eva na bādhate . yogavibhāgaḥ anyaśāstranivṛttiyarthaḥ . yogavibhāgaḥ anyaśāstranivṛttiyarthaḥ vijñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:11219: yogavibhāgaḥ anyaśāstranivṛttiyarthaḥ cet ami atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:11220: vṛkṣam , plakṣam . yathā eva hi yogavibhāgaḥ pararūpam bādhate evam ami pūrvatvam api bādheta . nakārābhāvaḥ ca tasmāt iti anantaranirdeśāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:11221: natvasya ca abhāvaḥ . vṛkṣān , plakṣān . kim kāraṇam . ca tasmāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11222_0: anantaranirdeśāt . tasmāt iti anena anantaraḥ yogaḥ pratinirdiśyate . kim punaḥ kāraṇam tasmāt iti anena anantaraḥ yogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11222_1: pratinirdiśyate . iha mā bhūt . etān gāḥ paśya [R: etān gāḥ caturaḥ balivardān paśya] iti . astu tarhi ekayogaḥ eva . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:11222_2: ca uktam ekayoge hi jaśśahoḥ pararūpaprasaṅgaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ijgrahaṇam tu jñāpakam pararūpābhāvasya . yat ayam na
GS24pmbhasuu:11222_3: āt ici iti ijgrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na jaśśasoḥ pararūpam bhavati iti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . ijgrahaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11222_4: idam prayojanam . iha mā bhūt . vṛkṣāḥ , plakṣāḥ , vṛkṣān , plakṣān . yadi ca jaśśasoḥ pararūpam syāt ijgrahaṇam anarthakam
GS24pmbhasuu:11222_5: syāt . paśyati tu ācāryaḥ na jaśśasoḥ pararūpam bhavati iti . tataḥ ijgrahaṇam karoti . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:11223: jñāpakam . uttarārtham etat syāt . dīrghāt jasi ca ici ca iti . yadi uttarārtham etat syāt atra eva ayam ijdgrahaṇam kurvīta . iha api tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:11224: kriyamāṇam yadi uttarārtham na jñāpakam bhavati . evam tarhi yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:11225: uttarārtham etat syāt na eva ayam ijdgrahaṇam kurvīta na api jasgrahaṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11226: etāvat ayam brūyāt . dīrghāt śasi pūrvasavarṇaḥ bhavati iti . tat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . dīrghāt śasi eva na anyatra iti . saḥ ayam evam
GS24pmbhasuu:11227_0: laghīyasā nyāsena siddhe yat ijgrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na jaśśasoḥ pararūpam bhavati iti . atha vā punaḥ astu
GS24pmbhasuu:11227_1: yogavibhāgaḥ . nanu ca uktam yogavibhāgaḥ anyaśāstranivṛttiyarthaḥ cet ami atiprasaṅgaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ami api yogavibhāgaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:11229: tasmāt pūrvasavarṇadīrghāt iti . tat ca na . evam pratinirdiśyate . tasmāt akaḥ savarṇāt iti . atha vā tasmāt prathamyoḥ dīrghāt iti . atha vā punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11230_0: astu ami ekayogaḥ . nanu ca uktam yogavibhāgaḥ anyaśāstranivṛttiyarthaḥ cet ami atiprasaṅgaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . madhye
GS24pmbhasuu:11230_1: apavādāḥ pūrvān vidhīn bādhante iti evam ayam yogavibhāgaḥ pararūpam bādhiṣyate ami pūrvatvam na bādhiṣyate . yadi etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:11230_2: madhye apavādāḥ purastāt apavādāḥ iti na
GS24pmbhasuu:11231_0: arthaḥ ekena api yogavibhāgena . purastāt apavādāḥ anantarān vidhīn bādhante iti evam pararūpam savarṇadīrghatvam bādhiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:11231_1: prathamayoḥ pūrvasavarṇadīrghatvam na bādhiṣyate . atha vā saptame yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . idam asti ataḥ dīrghaḥ yañi supi
GS24pmbhasuu:11231_2: ca iti . tataḥ vakṣyāmi bahuvacane . bahuvacane ca ataḥ dīrghaḥ bhavati . ekāraḥ ca bhavati

GS24pmbhasuu:11249_1: . vākyasya samprasāraṇasañjñā na varṇasya . atha varṇasya samprasāraṇasañjñāyām doṣaḥ eva . varṇasya ca samprasāraṇasañjñāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:11249_2: na doṣaḥ . katham . anyaḥ ayam samprasāraṇāsamprasāraṇayoḥ sthāne ekaḥ ādiśyate . kāryakṛtatvāt vā . atha vā sakṛt kṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:11249_3: pūrvatvam iti kṛtvā punaḥ na bhaviṣyati . tat yathā vasante
GS24pmbhasuu:11250_0: brāhmaṇaḥ agnīn ādadhīta iti sakṛt ādhāya kṛtaḥ śāstrārthaḥ iti kṛtvā punaḥ pravṛttiḥ na bhavati . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . yuktam
GS24pmbhasuu:11250_1: yat tasya punaḥ pravṛttiḥ na bhavati . yaḥ tu tadāśrayam prāpnoti na tat śakyam bādhitum .
GS24pmbhasuu:11251_0: tat yathā vasante brāhmaṇaḥ agniṣṭomādibhiḥ kratubhiḥ yajeta iti agnyādhānanimittam vasante vasante ijyate . tasmāt pūrvoktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11251_1: eva parihāraḥ siddham asamprasāraṇāt iti . yadi tarhi na idam samprasāraṇam hūtaḥ iti dīrghatvam na prāpnoti . dīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:11251_2: vacanaprāmāṇyāt . anavakāśam dīrghatvam . tat vacanaprāmāṇyāt bhaviṣyati . antavattvāt vā . atha vā pūrvasya kāryam prati
GS24pmbhasuu:11253: āṭaḥ vṛddhiḥ bhavati iti etasmāt iyaṅ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . āṭaḥ vṛddhiḥ bhavati iti asya avakāśaḥ aikṣiṣṭa , aihiṣṭa . iyaṅaḥ avakāśaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:11254: adhīyāte , adhīyate . iha ubhayam prāpnoti : adhyaiyātām adhyaiyata .

GS24pmbhasuu:11259: prāpnoti akṛte api . anityaḥ iyaṅ . na hi kṛte āti prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . antaraṅgā āṭaḥ vṛddhiḥ . yasya ca lakṣaṇāntareṇa nimittam vihanyate na

GS24pmbhasuu:11260_1: paratvāt iyaṅ ādeśaḥ . āt guṇāt savarṇadīrghatvam āṅabhyāsayoḥ . āt guṇāt savarṇadīrghatvam bhavati vipratiṣedhena . kva
GS24pmbhasuu:11260_2: . āṅabhyāsayoḥ . āt guṇasya avakāśaḥ : khaṭvendraḥ , khaṭvodakam . savarṇadīrghatvasya avakāśaḥ :

GS24pmbhasuu:12430_1: ca iti . tatra bhavaet asiddhatvam pratyuktam bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvam tu na eva pratyuktam . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ bahiraṅgam antaraṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:12430_2: iti ca pratidvandvibhāvinau etau arthau katham . sati antaraṅge bahiraṅgam sati ca bahiraṅge antaraṅgam . na ca atra antaraṅgabahiraṅgayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12430_3: yugapat samavasthānam asti . na anabhinirvṛtte bahiraṅge antaraṅgam prāpnoti . tatra nimittam eva bahiraṅgam antaraṅgasya
GS24pmbhasuu:12430_4: . hrasvayalopāllopāḥ ca ayādeśe lyapi . hrasvayalopāllopāḥ ca ayādeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:12431: lyapi siddhāḥ vaktavyāḥ . praśamayya gataḥ , pratamayya gataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12432: prabebhidayya gataḥ . pracecchidayya gataḥ . prastanayya gataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12433: pragadayya gataḥ . hrasvayalopāllopānām asiddhatvāt lyapi laghupūrvāt iti ayādeśaḥ na prāpnoti . atra api eṣaḥ parihāraḥ samānāśrayavacanāt siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:12434: iti . katham . ṇau ete vidhayaḥ ṇeḥ lyapi ayādeśaḥ . vugyuṭau uvaṅyaṇoḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12435_0: vugyuṭau uvaṅyaṇoḥ siddhau vaktavyau . babhūvatuḥ , babhūvuḥ : vukaḥ asiddhatvāt uvaṅādeśaḥ prāpnoti . upadidīye , upadidīyāte
GS24pmbhasuu:12435_1: : yuṭaḥ asiddhatvāt yaṇādeśaḥ prāpnoti . vukaḥ tāvat na vaktavyaḥ . vukam na vakṣyāmi . evam vakṣyāmi : bhuvaḥ luṅliṭoḥ ūt
GS24pmbhasuu:12435_2: upadhāyāḥ iti . atra uvaṅādeśe kṛte yā upadhā tasyāḥ ūttvam bhaviṣyati . evam api kutaḥ nu khalu etat uvaṅādeśe kṛte yā upadhā
GS24pmbhasuu:12436: sāmpratikī yā upadhā tasyāḥ syāt bhakārasya . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . oḥ iti vartate . tena uvarṇasya bhaviṣyati . bhavet siddham babhūvatuḥ , babhūvuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12437: . idam tu na sidhyati : babhūva babhūvitha iti . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12438_0: guṇavṛddhyoḥ kṛtayoḥ uvarṇābhāvāt . na atra guṇavṛddhī prāpnutaḥ . kim kāraṇam . kṅiti ca iti pratiṣedhāt . katham kittvam
GS24pmbhasuu:12438_1: . indhibhavatibhyām ca iti . tat vai vayam kittvam pratyācakṣmahe vukā . iha tu kittvena vuk pratyākhyāyate . kim punaḥ atra
GS24pmbhasuu:12438_2: nyāyyam . vugvacanam eva nyāyyam . sati api hi kittve syātām eva atra guṇavṛddhī . kim kāraṇam . iglakṣaṇayoḥ guṇavṛddhyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12438_3: saḥ pratiṣedhaḥ na ca eṣā iglakṣaṇā vṛddhiḥ . evam tarhi na
GS24pmbhasuu:12439_0: arthaḥ vukā na api kittvena . stām atra guṇavṛddhī . guṇavṛddhyoḥ kṛtayoḥ avāvoḥ ca kṛtayoḥ yā upadhā tasyāḥ ūttvam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:12439_1: . katham . oḥ iti atra avarṇam api pratinirdiśyate . iha api tarhi prāpnoti . kīlālapaḥ paśya . śubhaṃyaḥ paśya iti . lopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12439_2: atra bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . iha tarhi prāpnoti . kīlālapau kīlālapāḥ iti . evam tarhi vyoḥ iti vartate . tena uvarṇam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12439_3: . oḥ vyoḥ iti . iha idānīm oḥ iti anuvartate . vyoḥ iti nivṛttam . yuṭaḥ ca api na vaktavyam . yuḍvacanasāmarthyāt na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:12439_4: . asti anyat yuḍvacane prayojanam . kim . dvayoḥ yakārayoḥ śravaṇam yathā syāt . na vyañjanaparasya anekasya ekasya vā yakārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:12441_0: (P_6,4.22.5) KA_III.192.9-193.19 Ro_IV.701-705 kim punaḥ prāk bhāt asiddhatvam āhosvit saha tena . kutaḥ punaḥ ayam sandehaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12441_1: . āṅā ayam nirdeśaḥ kriyate āṅ ca punaḥ sandeham janayati . tat yathā : ā pāṭaliputrāt vṛṣṭaḥ devaḥ iti sandehaḥ : kim prāk
GS24pmbhasuu:12441_2: pāṭaliputrāt saha tena iti . evam iha api sandehaḥ : prāk bhāt saha tena iti . kaḥ ca atra
GS24pmbhasuu:12442_0: viśeṣaḥ . prāk bhāt iti cet sunāmaghonābhūguṇeṣu upasaṅkhyānam . prāk bhāt iti cet sunāmaghonābhūguṇeṣu upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:12442_1: . śunaḥ paśya . śunā śune . samprasāraṇe kṛte allopaḥ anaḥ iti prāpnoti . yasya punaḥ saha tena asiddhatvam asiddhatvāt tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:12443: bhaviṣyati . yasya api prāk bhāt asiddhatvam tasya api eṣaḥ na doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12444: katham . na astri atra viśeṣaḥ allopena vā nivṛttau satyām pūrvatvena vā .
GS24pmbhasuu:12445_0: ayam asti viśeṣaḥ . allopena nivṛttau satyām udāttanivṛttisvaraḥ prasajyeta . na atra udāttanivṛttisvaraḥ prāpnoti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:12445_1: kāraṇam . na gośvansāvavarṇa iti pratiṣedhāt . na eṣaḥ udāttanivṛttisvarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:12446: pratiṣedhaḥ . kasya tarhi . tṛtīyādisvarasya . yatra tarhi tṛtīyādisvaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12447: na asti . śunaḥ paśya iti . evam tarhi na vayam lakṣaṇasya pratiṣedham
GS24pmbhasuu:12448: śiṣmaḥ . kim tarhi yena kena cit lakṣaṇena prāptasya vibhaktisvarasya ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:12449_0: pratiṣedhaḥ . yatra tarhi vibhaktisvaraḥ na asti . bahuśunī iti . yadi punaḥ ayam udāttanivṛttisvarasya api pratiṣedhaḥ vijñāyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:12449_1: . na evam śakyam . iha api prasjyeta kumārī iti . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12450_0: jñāpayati na udāttanivṛttisvaraḥ śuni avatarati iti yat ayam śvanśabdam gaurādiṣu paṭhati . antodāttārtham yatnam karoti
GS24pmbhasuu:12450_1: . siddham hi syāt ṅīpā eva . maghonaḥ paśya . maghonā maghone . samprasāraṇe kṛte yasya iti lopaḥ prāpnoti . yasya punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12450_2: saha tena asiddhatvam asiddhatvāt tasya na bhaviṣyati . yasya api prāk bhāt asiddhatvam tasya api eṣaḥ na doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12451: katham . vakṣyati etat maghavan-śabdaḥ avyutpannam prātipadikam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12452: bhūguṇaḥ . bhūyān . bhūbhāve kṛte oḥ guṇaḥ prāpnoti . yasya punaḥ saha
GS24pmbhasuu:12453_0: tena asiddhatvam asiddhatvāt tasya na bhaviṣyati . yasya api prāk bhāt asiddhatvam tasya api eṣaḥ na doṣaḥ . katham . dīrghoccāraṇasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12453_1: na bhaviṣyati . asti dīrghoccāraṇasya prayojanam . kim . bhūmā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12454: nipātanāt etat siddham . kim nipātanam . bahoḥ nañvat uttarapadabhūmni iti
GS24pmbhasuu:12455: . atha vā punaḥ astu saha tena iti . ā bhāt iti cet susamprasāraṇayalopaprasthādīnām pratiṣedhaḥ . papuṣaḥ paśya . tasthuṣaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:12456: ninyuṣaḥ , cicyuṣaḥ , luluvuṣaḥ , pupuvuṣaḥ iti . vasoḥ samprasāraṇe kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:12457: aci iti ākāralopādīni na sidhyanti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . uktam etat samānāśrayavacanāt siddham iti . katham . vasau ākāralopādīni vasantasya
GS24pmbhasuu:12458_0: vibhaktau samprasāraṇam . yalopaḥ . saurī balākā . yaḥ asau aṇi akāraḥ lupyate tasya asiddhatvāt īti yalopaḥ na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:12458_1: . atra api eṣaḥ eva parihāraḥ . samānāśrayavacanāt siddham iti . katham . aṇi akāralopaḥ aṇantasya īti lopaḥ . prasthādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:12458_2: . preyān , stheyān . prasthādīnām asiddhatvāt prakṛtyā ekāc iti prakṛtibhāvaḥ na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12459: yathā eva prasthādīnām asiddhatvāt prakṛtibhāvaḥ na prāpnoti evam ṭilopaḥ api na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:12461_0: saśakārasya grahaṇam kriyate na nāt nalopaḥ iti eva ucyeta . nāt nalopaḥ iti iyati ucyamāne nanditā nandakaḥ iti atra api
GS24pmbhasuu:12461_1: prasajyeta . evam tarhi evam vakṣyāmi nāt nalopaḥ aniditām . tataḥ halaḥ upadhāyāḥ kṅiti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12462: aniditām iti . na evam śakyam . iha na syāt : hinasti . tasmāt na evam
GS24pmbhasuu:12463_0: śakyam . na cet evam nanditā nandakaḥ iti prāpnoti . evam tarhi kṅiti iti vartate . evam api hinasti iti atra na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:12463_1: . na eṣā parasaptamī . kā tarhi . satsaptamī . kṅiti sati . evam tarhi naśabdaḥ eva atra kṅittvena
GS24pmbhasuu:12464_0: viśeṣyate kṅit cet naśabdaḥ bhavati iti . evam api yajñānām , yatnānām iti atra na prāpnoti . dīrghatvam atra bādhakam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:12464_1: . idam iha sampradhāryam . dīrghatvam kriyatām nalopaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12465: paratvāt nalopaḥ . tasmāt saśakārasya grahaṇam kartavyam . atha kriyamāṇe api saśakāragrahaṇe iha kasmāt na bhavati viśnānām , praśnānām iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12466: lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya eva iti evam na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:12467_0: (P_6,4.24) KA_III.194.10-195.4 Ro_IV.707-709 aniditām nalope laṅgikampyoḥ upatapaśarīravikārayoḥ upasaṅkhyānam . aniditām
GS24pmbhasuu:12467_1: nalope laṅgikampyoḥ upatapaśarīravikārayoḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . vilagitaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:12468: vikapitaḥ . upatapaśarīravikārayoḥ iti kimartham . vilaṅgitaḥ , vikampitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12469: . bṛheḥ aci aniṭi . bṛheḥ aci aniṭi upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . nibarhayati nibarhakaḥ . aci iti kimartham . nibṛṃhyate . aniṭi iti kimartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:12470: nibṛṃhitā nibṛṃhitum . tat tu upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . na kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12471: bṛhiḥ prakṛtyantaram . katham jñāyate . aci iti lopaḥ ucyate . anajādau api dṛśyate : nibṛhyate . aniṭi iti ucyate . iṭau api dṛśyate : nibarhitum
GS24pmbhasuu:12472: . ajādau iti ucyate . ajādau api na dṛśyate : nibṛṃhayati nibṛṃhakaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12473: rañjeḥ ṇau mṛgamaraṇe upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . rajayati mṛgān .
GS24pmbhasuu:12474: mṛgamaraṇe iti kimartham . rañjayati vastrāṇi . ghinuṇi ca upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:12475: kartavyam . rāgī . ghinuṇi nipātanāt siddham . kim nipātanam . tyajaraja iti . aśakyam dhātunirdeśe nipātanam tantram āśrayitum . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12476: : daśahanaḥ karaṇe : daṃṣṭrā . na etat dhātunipātanam . kim tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:12477: pratyayāntasya etat rūpam . tasmin ca asya pratyaye lopaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:12478: daṃśasañjasvañjām śapi iti . rajakarajanarajaḥsu upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12479: rajakaḥ , rajananam , rajaḥ iti . rajakarajanarajaḥsu kittvāt siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:12480: kitaḥ eva ete auṇādikāḥ . tat yathā rucakaḥ , bhuvanam , śiraḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12481: (P_6,4.34) KA_III.195.8-196.2 Ro_IV.709-711 śāsaḥ ittve āśāsaḥ kvau .
GS24pmbhasuu:12482_0: śāsaḥ ittve āśāsaḥ kvau upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . āśīḥ iti . kim punaḥ idam niyamārtham āhosvit vidhyartham . katham ca niyamārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:12482_1: syāt katham vā vidhyartham . yadi tāvat śāsimātrasya grahaṇam tataḥ niyamārtham . athi hi yasmāt śāsaḥ aṅ vihitaḥ tasya grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:12482_2: tataḥ vidhyartham . yadi api śāsimātrasya grahaṇam evam api vidhyartham eva . katham . aṅhaloḥ iti ucyate na ca atra halādim
GS24pmbhasuu:12482_3: paśyāmaḥ . nanu ca kvip eva halādiḥ . kvipaḥ lope kṛte halādyabhāvāt na prāpnoti . idam iha sampradhāryam . kviblopaḥ kriyatām
GS24pmbhasuu:12482_4: aṅhaloḥ itttvam iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt aṅhaloḥ itttvam
GS24pmbhasuu:12483: . nityaḥ kviblopaḥ . kṛte api aṅhaloḥ itttve prāpnoti akṛte api .
GS24pmbhasuu:12484_0: nityatvāt kviblope kṛte halādyabhāvāt na prāpnoti . evam tarhi pratyayalakṣaṇena bhaviṣyati . varṇāśraye na asti pratyayalakṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:12484_1: . yadi vā kāni cit varṇāśrayāṇi api pratyayalakṣaṇena bhavanti tathā ca idam api
GS24pmbhasuu:12485: bhaviṣyati . atha vā evam vakṣyāmi . śāsaḥ it aṅhaloḥ . tataḥ kvau . kvau ca śāsaḥ it bhavati . āryaśīḥ , mitraśīḥ . tataḥ āṅaḥ . āṅpūrvāt ca kvau
GS24pmbhasuu:12486: śāsaḥ it bhavati . āśīḥ iti . idam idānīm kimartham . niyamārtham .
GS24pmbhasuu:12487: āṅpūrvāt śāsaḥ kvau eva . kva mā bhūt . āśāsyate , āśāsyamānaḥ iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . aviśeṣeṇa śāsaḥ it bhavati iti uktvā
GS24pmbhasuu:12488: tataḥ aṅi iti vakṣyāmi . tat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . aṅi eva ajādau na anyasmin ajādau iti . iha api tarhi niyamāt ittvam prāpnoti . āśāsyate ,
GS24pmbhasuu:12489: āśāsyamānaḥ iti . yasmāt śāseḥ aṅ vihitaḥ tasya grahaṇam na ca etasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12490: śāseḥ aṅ vihitaḥ . katham āśīḥ iti . nipātanāt siddham . kim nipātanam .

GS24pmbhasuu:12492_1: . pramatya pratatya . tataḥ vā amaḥ . vā amaḥ iti vaktavyam . prayatya prayamya praratya praramya praṇatya praṇamya .
GS24pmbhasuu:12493: (P_6,4.40) KA_III.196.10-12 Ro_IV.712 gamādīnām iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt . parītat sahakaṇṭhikā . saṃyat , sanut iti . ūṅ ca gamādīnām iti vaktavyam . agregūḥ , bhrūḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12494: (P_6,4.42.1) KA_III.196.14-22 Ro_IV.712-713 atha kim ayam samuccayaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:12495: sani ca jhalādau ca iti , āhosvit sanviśeṣaṇam jhalgrahaṇam , sani jhalādau iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi samuccayaḥ sani ajhalādau api prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12496: sisaniṣati jijaniṣate cikhaniṣati . atha sanviśeṣaṇam jhalgrahaṇam jātaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:12497: jātavān iti atra na prāpnoti . yathā icchasi tathā astu . astu tāvat samuccayaḥ . nanu ca uktam sani ajhalādau api prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12498_0: . prakṛtam jhalgrahaṇam anuvartate . tena sanam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . sani jhalādau iti . atha vā punaḥ astu sanviśeṣaṇam . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:12498_1: jātaḥ , jātavān iti . prakṛtam jhali kṅiti iti anuvartate . yadi evam na arthaḥ jhalgrahaṇena . yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:12498_2: janasanakhanām anunāsikasya ākāraḥ bhavati jhali kṅiti . tataḥ sani . sani ca janasanakhanām
GS24pmbhasuu:12499: anunāsikasya ākāraḥ bhavati jhali iti eva . tasmāt na arthaḥ jhalgrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:12500_0: (P_6,4.42.2) KA_III.197.1-198.12 Ro_IV.713-716 sanoteḥ anunāsikalopāt āttvam vipratiṣedhena . sanoteḥ anunāsikalopāt āttvam
GS24pmbhasuu:12500_1: bhavati vipratiṣedhena . sanoteḥ anunāsikalopasya avakāśaḥ anye tanotyādayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12501: āttvasya avakāśaḥ anye janādayaḥ . sanoteḥ anunāsikasya ubhayam prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12502: sātaḥ sātavān iti . āttvam bhavati vipratiṣedhena . na eṣaḥ yuktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12503: vipratiṣedhaḥ . na hi sanoteḥ anunāsikalopasya anye tanotyādayaḥ avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12504: . sanoteḥ yaḥ tanotyādiṣu pāṭhaḥ saḥ anavakāśaḥ . na khalu api āttvasya anye janādayaḥ avakāśaḥ . sanoteḥ yat āttve grahaṇam tat anavakāśam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12505_0: tasya anavakāśatvāt ayuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . evam tarhi tanotyādiṣu pāṭhaḥ tāvat sāvakāśaḥ . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . anyāni tanotyādikāryāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:12505_1: . tanādibhyaḥ tathāsoḥ iti . āttve api grahaṇam sāvakāśam . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . sani ca ye
GS24pmbhasuu:12506: vibhāṣā ca . ubhayoḥ sāvakāśayoḥ yuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . evam api ayuktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12507_0: vipratiṣedhaḥ . paṭhiṣyati hi ācāryaḥ pūrvatra asiddhe na asti vipratiṣedhaḥ abhāvāt uttarasya iti . ekasya nāma abhāve vipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12507_1: na syāt kim punaḥ yatra ubhayam na asti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . bhavati iha vipratiṣedhaḥ . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham

GS24pmbhasuu:13818_1: ajgrahaṇe kasya acāmādigrahaṇam viśeṣaṇam syāt . igviśeṣaṇam iti āha . acām ādeḥ ikaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:13819: . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . iha eva syāt . aitkāyanaḥ , aupagavaḥ . iha na syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:13820: gārgyaḥ , vātsyaḥ iti . tat tarhi ajgrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:13821: prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . acaḥ ñṇiti iti . yadi tat anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:13822_0: ataḥ upadhāyāḥ acaḥ iti ajmātrasya upadhāyāḥ vṛddhiḥ prasajyeta . chedakaḥ iti . akāreṇa tapareṇa acam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . acaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13822_1: ataḥ iti . iha idānīm acaḥ iti eva anuvartate ataḥ iti nivṛttam . atha vā maṇḍūkagatayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13823: adhikārāḥ . yathā maṇḍūkāḥ utplutya utplutya gacchanti tadvat adhikārāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:13824: atha vā ekayogaḥ kariṣyate . acaḥ ñṇiti ataḥ upadhāyāḥ . tataḥ taddhiteṣu acām ādeḥ iti . na ca ekayoge anuvṛttiḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:13825_0: (P_7,2.117.2) KA_III,315.3-16 Ro_V,186-188 taddhiteṣu acāmādivṛddhau antyopadhalakṣaṇapratiṣedhaḥ . taddhiteṣu acāmādivṛddhau
GS24pmbhasuu:13825_1: antyopadhalakṣaṇāyāḥ vṛddheḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . krauṣṭuḥ jāgataḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:13826_0: . nanu ca acāmādivṛddhiḥ antyopadhalakṣaṇām vṛddhim bādhiṣyate . katham anyasya ucyamānā anyasya bādhikā syāt . asati khalu
GS24pmbhasuu:13826_1: api sambhave bādhanam bhavati asti ca sambhavaḥ yat ubhayam syāt . lokavijñānāt siddham . sati api sambhave bādhanam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:13827_0: takram kauṇḍinyāya iti sati api sambhave dadhidānasya takradānam nivartakam bhavati . evam iha api sati api sambhave acāmādivṛddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13827_1: antyopadhalakṣaṇām vṛddhim bādhiṣyate . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . na aprāpte dadhidāne takradānam ārabhyate tat prāpte ārabhyamāṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:13827_2: bādhakam bhaviṣyati . iha punaḥ aprāptāyām antyopadhalakṣaṇāyām vṛddhau acāmādivṛddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13828: ārabhyate . suśrut , sauśrutaḥ iti . puṣkarasadgrahaṇāt vā . atha vā yat
GS24pmbhasuu:13829: ayam anuśatikādiṣu puṣkarasacśabdam paṭhati tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ acāmādivṛddhau antyopadhalakṣaṇā vṛddhiḥ na bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13830_0: (P_7,3.1) KA_III,316.2-317.10 Ro_V,189.3-192.2 devikādiṣu tadādigrahaṇam . devikādiṣu tadādigrahaṇam kartavyam . devikādyādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:13830_1: iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt . dāvikākulāḥ śālayaḥ , śāṃśapāsthalāḥ devāḥ . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:13830_2: tadgrahaṇāt tadantagrahaṇāt vā . anyatra hi tasya vā grahaṇam bhavati tadantasya vā na
GS24pmbhasuu:13831_0: ca idam tat na api tadantam . ādyajviśeṣaṇatvāt siddham . ādyajviśeṣaṇam devikādayaḥ . na evam vijñāyate devikādīnām aṅgānām
GS24pmbhasuu:13831_1: acām ādeḥ ākāraḥ bhavati iti . katham tarhi . ñṇiti aṅgasya acām ādeḥ ākāraḥ bhavati saḥ cet devikādīnām ādjyac bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:13831_2: . āntaratamyanivartakatvāt vā . atha vā na anena anantaratamā vṛddhiḥ nirvartyate . kim tarhi antaratamā anena nivartyate
GS24pmbhasuu:13831_3: . siddhā atra vṛddhiḥ taddhiteṣu acām ādeḥ iti eva tatra anena antaratamā vṛddhiḥ nivartyate . parihārāntaram eva idam matvā
GS24pmbhasuu:13831_4: paṭhitam katham ca idam parihārāntaram syāt . yadi na ādyajviśeṣaṇam devikādayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:13832_0: avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam adyajviśeṣaṇam devikādayaḥ iti . yadi na ādyajviśeṣaṇam devikādayaḥ syuḥ iha api prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:13832_1: sudevikāyām bhavaḥ saudevikaḥ iti . atha atra api ādyajviśeṣaṇatvāt iti eva siddham parihārāntaram na bhavati . na brūmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13833_0: kartavyam iti . kim tarhi . yatra kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ tatra kartavyam . kva ca kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ . sañjñāvidhau . vṛddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13833_1: āt aic devikādīnām ākāraḥ iti . idhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam devikādiṣu tadādigrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:13833_2: anyatra tadgrahaṇāt tadantagrahaṇāt vā iti . parihṛtam etat ādyajviśeṣaṇatvāt siddham iti . nyagrodhe ca kevalagrahaṇāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:13833_3: nyagrodhe ca kevalagrahaṇāt manyāmahe ādyajviśeṣaṇam devikādayaḥ iti . tasya hi kevalagrahaṇasya etat prayojanam iha mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:13833_4: nyāgrodhamūlāḥ śālayaḥ iti . yadi ca ādyajviśeṣaṇam devikādayaḥ tataḥ kevalagrahaṇam arthavat bhavati . tat etat katham kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:13834: yadi nyagrodhaśabdaḥ avyutpannam prātipadikam bhavati . atha hi nyagrohati
GS24pmbhasuu:13835: iti nyagrodhaḥ tataḥ niyamārtham padāntaḥ iti kṛtvā na jñāpakam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:13836: vahīnarasya idvacanam . vahīnarasya ittvam vaktavyam . vahīnarasya apatyam vaihīnariḥ . kuṇaravāḍavaḥ tu āha . na eṣaḥ vahīnaraḥ . kaḥ tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:13837: vihīnaraḥ eṣaḥ . vihīnaḥ naraḥ kāmabhogābhyām vihīnaraḥ . vihīnarasya apatyam vaihīnariḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:13838_0: (P_7,3.3) KA_III,317.8-318.24 Ro_V,192.4-194.11 yvābhyām parasya avṛddhitvam . yvābhyām parasya avṛddhitvam siddham . kutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13838_1: . apavādau vṛddheḥ hi tau . apavādau hi vṛddheḥ tau aicau ucyete . nityau aicau tayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13839_0: vṛddhiḥ . atha vā nityau aicau . kṛtāyām api vṛddhau prāpnutaḥ akṛtāyām api . nityatvāt aicoḥ kṛtayoḥ yadi api vṛddhiḥ tayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13839_1: eva . kimartham na iti śiṣyate . atha kimartham pratiṣedhaḥ ucyate . ecoḥ viṣayārtham pratiṣedhasanniyuktavacanam . ecoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13839_2: viṣayārtham pratiṣedhasanniyogena aicau ucyete . yatra yvābhyām parāvṛddhiḥ tatra adhyaśveḥ yathā na tau . yatra yvābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:13839_3: parasya avṛddhitvam ucyate tatra aicau yathā syātām . iha mā bhūtām . ādhyaśviḥ , dādhyaśviḥ , mādhvaśviḥ iti . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:13840_0: . acām ādeḥ yvābhyām hi tau . acām ādinā atra yvau viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . acām ādeḥ yau yvau iti . katham dvyāśītike na tau . dvyāśītikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13840_1: iti atra kasmāt na tau bhavataḥ . yatra vṛddhiḥ acām ādeḥ tatra aicau atra ghoḥ hi sā .
GS24pmbhasuu:13841_0: tatra acām ādeḥ iti evam vṛddhiḥ tatra aicau ucyete . atra ghoḥ iti evam vṛddhiḥ . kim idam ghoḥ iti . uttarapadasya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:13841_1: . uttarapadādhikāre api avaśyam aijāgamaḥ anuvartyaḥ pūrvatryalinde bhavaḥ pūrvatrayalindaḥ iti evamartham . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13841_2: . uttarapadena atra acām ādi viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ acām ādinā yvau . uttarapadasya acām ādeḥ yau yvau iti . atha kasmāt padāntābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:13841_3: . atha kimartham padāntābhyām iti ucyate . yathā iṇaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:13842_0: bhavet yaṇaḥ . iṇaḥ yaṇādeśe mā bhūt. yataḥ chātrā , yātā iti . iha vaiyākaraṇaḥ , sauvaśvaḥ iti śākalam prāpnoti yvoḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:13842_1: sthānivadbhāvāt āyāvau prāpnutaḥ . śakalāyāvādeśeṣu ca uktam . kim uktam . śākale tāvat uktam sinnityasamāsayoḥ śākalapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13842_2: iti . āyāvoḥ kim uktam . acaḥ pūrvavijñānāt aicoḥ siddham iti . yvābhyām parasya avṛddhitvam apavādau vṛddheḥ hi tau , nityau
GS24pmbhasuu:13842_3: aicau tayoḥ vṛddhiḥ kimartham na iti śiṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:13843_0: yatra yvābhyām parāvṛddhiḥ tatra adhyaśveḥ yathā na tau , acām ādeḥ yvābhyām hi tau katham dvyāśītike na tau . yatra vṛddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13843_1: acām ādeḥ tatra aicau atra ghoḥ hi sā , atha kasmāt padāntābhyām yathā iṇaḥ na bhavet yaṇaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:13845: iti anuvartate utāho na . kim ca ataḥ . yadi anuvartate śauvam māṃsam ṭilope kṛte aijāgamaḥ na prāpnoti . atha nivṛttam svādhyāyaśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13846_0: dvārādiṣu paṭhyate tatra yāvantaḥ yaṇaḥ sarvebhyaḥ pūrvaḥ aijāgamaḥ prāpnoti . yatha icchasi tathā astu . astu tāvat anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:13846_1: . katha śauvam māṃsam . ānupūrvyā siddham etat . na atra akṛte aijāgame ṭilopaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:13847: . kim kāraṇam . prakṛtyā ekāc iti prakṛtibhāvena bhavitavyam . tat etat ānupūrvyā siddham bhavati . atha vā punaḥ astu nivṛttam . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:13848_0: svādhyāyaśabdaḥ dvārādiṣu paṭhyate tatra yāvantaḥ yaṇaḥ sarvebhyaḥ pūrvaḥ aijāgamaḥ prāpnoti iti . kaḥ punaḥ arhati svādhyāyaśabdam
GS24pmbhasuu:13848_1: dvārādiṣu paṭhitum . evam kil paṭhyeta svam adhyayanam svādhyāyaḥ iti . tat ca na .
GS24pmbhasuu:13849: suṣṭhu vā adhyayanam svādhyāyaḥ śobhanam vā adhyayanam svādhyāyaḥ . atha api svam adhyayanam svādhyāyaḥ evam api na doṣaḥ . acām ādeḥ iti vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:13851_0: paṭhyate tatra kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ yat tadādeḥ syāt . na eva prāpnoti na arthaḥ pratiṣedhena . tadādividhinā prāpnoti . na eva
GS24pmbhasuu:13851_1: tadādividhiḥ asti . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . pratiṣedhe śvādigrahaṇam jñāpakam anyatra śvangrahaṇe tadādigrahaṇasya śauvahānādyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:13852: jñāpakārtham . kim jñāpyam . etat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ anyatra śvangrahaṇe tadādividhiḥ bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:13853: śauvahānādyartham . śauvahānam nāma nagaram . śauvādaṃṣṭraḥ maṇiḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13854_0: ikārādigrahaṇam ca śvāgaṇikādyartham . ikārādigrahaṇam ca kartavyam . kim prayojanam . śvāgaṇikādyartham . śvagaṇena carati
GS24pmbhasuu:13854_1: śvāgaṇikaḥ . tadantasya ca anyatra pratiṣedhaḥ . tadantasya ca anyatra pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:13857: avayavāt ṛtoḥ iti vakṣyati taduttarapadasya yathā syāt acām ādeḥ mā bhūt .
GS24pmbhasuu:13858: na etat asti prayojanam . avayavāt iti pañcamī tatra antareṇa api
GS24pmbhasuu:13859_0: uttarapadagrahaṇam uttarapadasya eva bhaviṣyati . uttarārtham tarhi susarvārdhāt janapadasya iti . susarvārdhāt iti pañcamī
GS24pmbhasuu:13859_1: . diśaḥ amadrāṇām . diśaḥ iti pañcamī . prācām grāmanagarāṇām . diśaḥ iti eva . saṅkhyāyāḥ saṃvatsarasaṅkhyasya ca . saṅkhyāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13859_2: iti pañcamī . varṣasya abhaviṣyati saṅkhyāyāḥ iti eva . parimāṇāntasya asañjñāśāṇayoḥ iti . saṅkhyāyāḥ iti eva . idam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:13859_3: prayojanam je proṣṭhapadānām uttarapadasya yathā syāt pūrvapadasya mā bhūt . proṣṭhapadāsu jātaḥ proṣṭhapādaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:13860_0: taddhiteṣu acām ādivṛddheḥ uttarapadavṛddhiḥ vipratiṣedhena dvyāśītikādyartham . taddhiteṣu acām ādivṛddheḥ uttarapadavṛddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13860_1: bhavati vipratiṣedhena . kim prayojanam . dvyāśītikādyartham . acām ādivṛddheḥ avakāśaḥ . aitikāyanaḥ , aupagavaḥ . uttarapadavṛddheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13861: dviṣāṣṭikaḥ , triṣāṣṭikaḥ . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . dvyāśītikaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:13862: tryāśītikaḥ . uttarapadavṛddhiḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . kaḥ punaḥ atra
GS24pmbhasuu:13863: viśeṣaḥ acām ādivṛddhau vā satyām uttarapadavṛddhau vā . ayam asti viśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13864: . yadi atra acām ādivṛddhiḥ syāt aijāgamaḥ prasajyeta .
GS24pmbhasuu:13865_0: (P_7,3.14) KA_III,320.18-321.10 Ro_V,199.11-201.3 nagaragrahaṇam kimartham na prācām grāmāṇām iti eva siddham . na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:13865_1: . anyaḥ grāmaḥ anyat nagaram . katham jñāyate . evam hi kaḥ cit kam cit pṛcchati . kutaḥ bhavān āgacchati grāmāt . saḥ hi
GS24pmbhasuu:13865_2: āha . na grāmāt nagarāt iti . nanu ca bho
GS24pmbhasuu:13866: yaḥ eva grāmaḥ tat nagaram . katham jñāyate . lokataḥ . ye hi grāme
GS24pmbhasuu:13867_0: vidhayaḥ na iṣyante sādhīyaḥ te nagare na kriyante . tat yathā . abhakṣyaḥ grāmyakukkuṭaḥ abhakṣyaḥ grāmyaśūkaraḥ iti ukte
GS24pmbhasuu:13867_1: sutarām nāgaraḥ api na bhakṣyate . tathā grāme na adhyeyam iti sādhīyaḥ nagare na adhīyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:13868: tasmāt yaḥ eva grāmaḥ tat nagaram . katham yat uktam evam hi kaḥ cit kam cit pṛcchati kutaḥ bhavān āgacchati grāmāt saḥ āha na grāmāt nagarāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13869: saṃstyāyaviśeṣam asau ācaṣṭe . saṃstyāyaviśeṣāḥ hi ete grāmaḥ ghoṣaḥ nagaram saṃvāhaḥ iti . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat grāmagrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:13870: nagaragrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ anyatra grāmagrahaṇe nagaragrahaṇam na bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:13871_0: viśiṣṭaliṅgaḥ nadīdeśaḥ agrāmāḥ iti atra nagarapratiṣedhaḥ coditaḥ saḥ na vaktavyaḥ bhavati . yadi etat jñāpyate udīcyagrāmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:13871_1: ca bahvacaḥ antodāttāt iti atra nagaragrahaṇam kartavyam . bāhīkagrāmebhyaḥ ca nagaragrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:13873: kartavyam . idam caturtham jñāpakārtham . tatra atinirbandhaḥ na lābhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:13874: tasmāt yasmin eva grāmagrahaṇe nagaragrahaṇam na iṣyate tasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:13875: (P_7,3.15) KA_III,321.12-25 Ro_V,201.5-18 saṃvatsaragrahaṇam anarthakam parimāṇāntasya iti kṛtatvāt . saṃvatsaragrahaṇam anarthakam .
GS24pmbhasuu:13876_0: kim kāraṇam . parimāṇāntasya iti kṛtatvāt . parimāṇāntasya asañjñāśāṇayoḥ iti eva siddham . jñāpakam tu kālaparimāṇānām vṛddhipratiṣedhasya
GS24pmbhasuu:13876_1: . evam tarhi jñāpayati ācāryaḥ kālaparimāṇānām vṛddhiḥ na bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . dvairātrikaḥ , trairātrikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13877: bhavati . na etat asti prayojanam . na asti atra viśeṣaḥ satyām vā
GS24pmbhasuu:13878: uttarapadavṛddhau asatyām vā . idam tarhi . dvasamikaḥ , traisamikaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:13879_0: idam ca api prayojanam dvairātrikaḥ , trairātrikaḥ . nanu ca uktam na asti atra viśeṣaḥ satyām vā uttarapadavṛddhau asatyām
GS24pmbhasuu:13879_1: vā iti . ayam asti viśeṣaḥ . yadi atra uttarapadavṛddhiḥ syāt acām ādeḥ vṛddhiḥ na syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:13880_0: aparaḥ āha : jñāpakam tu kālaparimāṇānām parimāṇāgrahaṇasya . evam tarhi jñāpayati ācāryaḥ kālaparimāṇānām parimāṇagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:13880_1: grahaṇam na bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . aparimāṇabistācitakambalyebhyaḥ na taddhitaluki dvivarṣā , trivarṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:13882_0: (P_7,3.28) KA_III,322.2-6 Ro_V,202.2-7 parasya vṛddhiḥ na iti anuvartate utāho na . kim ca ataḥ . yadi anuvartate pravāhaṇeyī
GS24pmbhasuu:13882_1: bhāryā asya iti pravāhaṇeyībhāryaḥ vṛddhinimittasya iti puṃvadbhāvapratiṣedhaḥ na prāpnoti . atha nivṛttam na doṣaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:13883: atha vā punaḥ astu anuvartate . nanu ca uktam pravāhaṇeyī bhāryā asya
GS24pmbhasuu:13884: pravāhaṇeyībhāryaḥ vṛddhinimittasya iti puṃvadbhāvapratiṣedhaḥ na prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . mā bhūt evam . jāteḥ iti evam bhaviṣyati .

GS24pmbhasuu:14715_1: ruḥ . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . payaḥ śiraḥ . nanu ca atra api jaśtvam prāpnoti . saḥ yathā eva

GS24pmbhasuu:14718_1: rubādhanārtham ca . atha vā yat etat rāt sasya iti sagrahaṇam tat purastāt apakrakṣyate . saṃyogāntasya lopaḥ . tataḥ sasya
GS24pmbhasuu:14719: lopaḥ bhavati . tataḥ rāt . rāt sasya eva saṃyogāntasya lopaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:14720: atha vā rāt sasya iti atra saṃyogāntasya lopaḥ iti etat anuvartiṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:14721: (P_8,2.25) KA_III,402.3-403.24 Ro_V,389-391 dhi sakāre sicaḥ lopaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:14722_0: dhi sakāre sicaḥ lopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kim prayojanam . cakāddhi iti prayojanam . iha mā bhūt . cakāddhi palitam śiraḥ . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:14722_1: tarhi sicaḥ lopaḥ iti ucyate . āśādhvam tu katham te syāt . āśādhvam iti atra na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:14723_0: jaśtvam sasya bhaviṣyati . jaśtvam atra sakārasya bhaviṣyati . sarvatra evam prasiddham syāt . sarvatra evam jaśtvena siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:14723_1: syāt . iha api āyandhvam arandhvam iti jaśtvena eva siddham . śrutiḥ ca api na bhidyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:14724_0: śrutikṛtaḥ ca api na kaḥ cit bhedaḥ bhavati . luṅaḥ ca api na mūrdhanye grahaṇam . tatra ayam api arthaḥ iṇaḥṣīdhvaṃluṅliṭāndho'ṅgāt
GS24pmbhasuu:14724_1: iti atra luṅgrahaṇam na kartavyam . iha api acyoḍḍhvam aploḍḍhvam iti ṣatve sicaḥ dhasya ṣṭutve ca kṛte jaśtvena siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:14725: . idam eva rūpam syāt alaviḍḍhvam idam na syāt alavidhvam iti . tasmāt sicaḥ grahaṇam kartavyam . yadi tarhi sicaḥ grahaṇam kriyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:14726: ghasibhasyoḥ na sidhyet tu . ghasibhasyoḥ na sidhyati . sagdhiḥ ca me
GS24pmbhasuu:14727: sapītiḥ ca me, babdhām te harī dhānāḥ iti atra na prāpnoti . tasmāt sijgrahaṇam na tat . tasmāt dhica iti atra sicaḥ grahaṇam na kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:14728: katham cakāddhi palitam śiraḥ iti . evam tarhi sijgrahaṇam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:14729: katham sagdhiḥ ca me sapītiḥ ca me , babdham te harī dhānāḥ iti . iha tāvat sagdhiḥ iti na etat ghaseḥ rūpam . kim tarhi sagheḥ etat rūpam .
GS24pmbhasuu:14730_0: babdhām te harī dhānāḥ iti na etat bhaseḥ rūpam . kim tarhi bandheḥ etat rūpam . chāndasaḥ varṇalopaḥ vā yathā iṣkartāramadhvare
GS24pmbhasuu:14730_1: . atha vā chāndasaḥ varṇalopaḥ bhaviṣyati yathā iṣkartāramadhvare . tat yathā .
GS24pmbhasuu:14731: tubhyedam agne . tubhyam idam agne iti prāpte . āmbānām caruḥ . nāmbānām caruḥ iti prāpte . āvyādhinīḥ ugaṇāḥ . āvyādhinīḥ sugaṇāḥ iti prāpte .
GS24pmbhasuu:14732: iṣkartāram adhvarasya . niṣkartāram iti prāpte . śivā udrasya bheṣajī .

GS24pmbhasuu:15071_0: visarjanīyaḥ viśeṣyeta . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . iha eva syāt dviṣkaroti dviḥ karoti . iha na syāt catuṣkaroti catuḥ karoti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:15071_1: . dvistriścaturgrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe kṛtvo'rthagrahaṇe dvistriścaturaḥ viśeṣyante .
GS24pmbhasuu:15072: dvistriścaturṇām kṛtro'rthe vartamānānām yaḥ visarjanīyaḥ iti . etat api na asti prayojanam . padasya iti vartate tat kṛtvo'rthagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:15073: viśeṣayiṣyaḥ . padasya kṛtvo'rthe vartamānasya yaḥ visarjanīyaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:15074: kṛtvasujarthe ṣatvam bravīti . kasmāt catuṣkapāle mā . ṣatvam vibhāṣayā bhūt . nanu siddham tatra pūrveṇa . siddhe hi ayam vidhatte caturaḥ ṣatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:15075: tadā api krtvo'rthe . lupte kṛtvo'rthīye rephasya visarjanīyaḥ hi . evam sati tu idānīm dviḥ triḥ catuḥ iti anena kim kāryam . anyaḥ hi na
GS24pmbhasuu:15076: idudupadhaḥ kṛtvo'rthe kaḥ cit api asti . akriyamāṇe grahaṇe visarjanīyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15077: tadā viśeṣyeta . caturaḥ na sidhyati tadā rephasya visarjanīyaḥ hi .
GS24pmbhasuu:15078: tasmin tu gṛhyamāṇe yuktam caturaḥ viśeṣaṇam bhavati . prakṛtam padam tadantam tasya api viśeṣaṇam nyāyyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:15079: (P_8,3.45) KA_III,435.20-436.24 Ro_V,460-462 anuttarapadasthasya iti kimartham . paramasarpiḥkuṇḍikā . atha idānīm anena mukte pūrveṇa ṣatvam

GS24pmbhasuu:15080_1: tat yuktam tat ca me na iha . vyapekṣāsāmarthye pūrvayogaḥ na ca atra vyapekṣāsāmarthyam .

GS24pmbhasuu:15081_1: me prasajyeta . aikārthye sāmarthye sati vākye ṣatvam na syāt : sarpiṣ karoti . sarpiḥ karoti iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:15082_0: tasmāt iha vyapekṣām sāmarthyam sādhu manyante . atha cet kṛdantam etat tataḥ adhike na eva me bhavet prāptiḥ . yadi kṛdantam
GS24pmbhasuu:15082_1: etat tataḥ adhikasya ṣatvam na prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ tadādeḥ grahaṇam bhavati iti . vākye api
GS24pmbhasuu:15082_2: tarhi na prāpnoti . paramasarpiṣkaroti paramasarpiḥ karoti iti . vākye ca me vibhāṣā pratiṣedhaḥ na prakalpeta yat ayam anuttarapadasthasya
GS24pmbhasuu:15082_3: iti pratiṣedham śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati vākye vibhāṣā iti . atha cet saṃvijñānam nitye ṣatve tataḥ vibhāṣā iyam
GS24pmbhasuu:15082_4: . atha avyutpannam prātipadikam tataḥ nitye ṣatve prāpte iyam vibhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:15083: ārabhyate . siddham ca me samāse . ṣatvam . kimartham tarhi idam ucyate .

GS24pmbhasuu:15086: ṣatvam na me prasajyeta . tasmāt iha vyapekṣām sāmarthyam sādhu manyante .

GS24pmbhasuu:15088: vibhāṣā pratiṣedhaḥ na prakalpeta . atha cet saṃvijñānam nitye ṣatve tataḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:15090: (P_8,3.55) KA_III,436.25-437.6 Ro_V,463 atha mūrdhanyagrahaṇam kimartham na apadāntasya ṣaḥ bhavati iti eva ucyeta . tatra ayam api

GS24pmbhasuu:15093: ṇakāragrahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati . tatra ayam api arthaḥ padāntasya na
