GS24pmbhasuu:15095_0: (P_8,3.56) KA_III,438.1-19 Ro_V,464-465 sagrahaṇam kimartham na saheḥ sāḍaḥ mūrdhanyaḥ bhavati iti eva ucyeta . saheḥ sāḍaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15095_1: mūrdhanyaḥ bhavati iti ucyamāne antyasya prasajyeta . nanu ca antyasya mūrdhanyavacane prayojanam na asti iti kṛtvā sakārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:15095_2: bhaviṣyati . kutaḥ nu khalu etat anantyārthe ārambhe sakārasya bhaviṣyati . na punaḥ ākārasya syāt . sthane antaratamaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:15095_3: iti sakārasya bhaviṣyati . bhavet prakṛtitaḥ antaratamanirvṛttau satyām siddham syāt . ādeśataḥ tu antaratamanirvṛttau
GS24pmbhasuu:15096_0: satyām ākārasya prasajyeta . tasmāt sakāragrahaṇam kartavyam . uttarārtham ca sakāragrahaṇam kriyate . ādeśapratyayayoḥ sakārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:15096_1: yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt . citam , stutam . atha sahigrahaṇam kimartham na sāḍaḥ saḥ bhavati iti eva ucyeta . saheḥ eva sāḍrūpam
GS24pmbhasuu:15096_2: bhavati na anyasya . yadi evaṃ . sāḍaḥ ṣatve samānaśabdapratiṣedhaḥ . sāḍaḥ ṣatve samānaśabdānām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:15096_3: sāḍaḥ daṇḍaḥ. sāḍaḥ vṛścikaḥ iti . arthavadgrahaṇāt siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:15097_0: arthavataḥ sāḍśabdasya grahaṇam na ca eṣaḥ arthavān . arthavadgrahaṇāt siddham iti cet taddhitalope arthavattvāt pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15097_1: . arthavadgrahaṇāt siddham iti cet taddhitalope arthavattvāt pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . saha aḍena sāḍaḥ sāḍasya apatyam sāḍiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15098: ṣatvatukoḥ ekādeśasya asiddhatvāt na eṣaḥ sāḍśabdaḥ . evam api saha ḍena saḍaḥ saḍasya apatram sāḍiḥ atra prāpnoti . tasmāt sahigrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:15100: numvisarjanīyaśarvyavāye niṃseḥ pratiṣedaḥ vaktavyaḥ . niṃsse niṃssva iti
GS24pmbhasuu:15101_0: . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . numā eva vyavāye visarjanīyena eva vyavāye śarā eva vyavāye iti . kim vaktavyam etat
GS24pmbhasuu:15101_1: . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . pratyekam vākyaparisamāptiḥ dṛṣṭā iti . tat yathā .
GS24pmbhasuu:15102: guṇavṛddhisañjñe pratyekam bhavataḥ . nanu ca ayam api asti dṛṣṭāntaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15103: samudāye vākyaparisamāptiḥ . tat yathā . gargāḥ śatam daṇḍyantām .
GS24pmbhasuu:15104_0: arthinaḥ ca rājānaḥ hiraṇyena bhavanti na ca pratyekam daṇḍayanti . evam tarhi . yogavibhāgāt siddham . yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:15104_1: . numvyavāye . tataḥ visarjanīyavyavāye . tataḥ śarvyavāye . saḥ tarhi yogavibhāgaḥ kartavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:15106_0: (P_8,3.59.1) KA_III,439.10-18 Ro_V,466-467 ādeśapratyayayoḥ ṣatve sarakaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . ādeśapratyayayoḥ ṣatve sarakaḥ pratiṣedaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15106_1: vaktavyaḥ : kṛsaraḥ , dhūsaraḥ . atyalpam idam ucyate : sarakaḥ iti . saragādīnām iti vaktavyam iha api yathā syāt : varsam
GS24pmbhasuu:15107: . na vaktavyam . uṇādayaḥ avyutpannāni prātipadikāni . na vai etat ṣatve śakyam vijñātum uṇadayaḥ avyutpannāni prātipadikāni iti . iha hi na syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:15108: sarpiṣaḥ yajuṣaḥ iti . evam tarhi . bahulavacanāt siddham . bahulam pratyayasañjñā bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:15110_0: avayavaṣaṣṭhī : ādeśasya yaḥ sakāraḥ pratyayasya yaḥ sakāraḥ iti . āhosvit samānādhikaraṇā : ādeśaḥ yaḥ sakāraḥ pratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15110_1: yaḥ sakāraḥ iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . ādeśapratyayayoḥ iti avayavaṣaṣṭhī cet dvirvacane pratiṣedhaḥ . ādeśapratyayayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15110_2: iti avayavaṣaṣṭhī cet dvirvacane pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . bisam bisam . musalam musalam . samānādhikaraṇānām ca aprāptiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:15110_3: samānādhikaraṇānām ca ṣatvasya aprāptiḥ . eṣaḥ , akārṣīt .
GS24pmbhasuu:15111_0: astu tarhi samānādhikaraṇā . yadi samānādhikaraṇā siṣeca suṣvāpa , atra na prāpnoti . na dhātudvirvacane sthāne dvirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:15111_1: śakyam āsthātum . iha api hi prasajyeta sarīsṛpyate iti . tasmāt tatra dviḥprayogaḥ dvirvacanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:15112_0: iha tarhi kariṣyati hariṣyati pratyayaḥ yaḥ sakāraḥ iti ṣatvam na prāpnoti . astu tarhi ādeśaḥ yaḥ sakāraḥ pratyayasya yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15112_1: sakāraḥ iti . iha tarhi akārṣīt pratyayasya yaḥ sakāraḥ iti ṣatvam na prāpnoti . mā bhūt evam
GS24pmbhasuu:15113_0: ādeśaḥ yaḥ sakāraḥ iti evam bhaviṣyati . iha tarhi : joṣiṣat , mandiṣat iti pratyayasya yaḥ sakāraḥ iti ṣatvam na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:15113_1: . eṣaḥ api iṭi kṛte pratyayasya sakāraḥ . iha tarhi indraḥ mā vakṣat saḥ , saḥ devan yakṣat .
GS24pmbhasuu:15114_0: nānāvibhaktīnām ca samāsānupapattiḥ . nānāvibhaktīnām ca samāsaḥ na upapadyate ādeśapratyayayoḥ iti . yogavibhāgāt siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:15114_1: . yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . ādeśasya ṣaḥ bhavati iti . tataḥ pratyayasakārasya ṣaḥ bhavati iti . sa tarhi yogavibhāgaḥ kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15114_2: . na kartavyaḥ . katham . astu tāvat avayavaṣaṣṭhī . nanu ca uktam ādeśapratyayayoḥ iti avayavaṣaṣṭhī cet dvirvacane pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15114_3: iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . dviḥprayogaḥ dvirvacanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:15115_0: yat api ucyate samānādhikaraṇānām ca aprāptiḥ iti vyapadeśivadbhāvena bhaviṣyati . atha vā punaḥ astu samānādhikaraṇā . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:15115_1: kariṣyati hariṣyati . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati bhavati evañjātīyakānām ṣatvam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:15116_0: yat ayam sātpadādyoḥ iti sātpratiṣedham śāsti . atha vā punaḥ astu ādeśaḥ yaḥ sakāraḥ pratyayasya yaḥ sakāraḥ iti . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:15116_1: indraḥ mā , vakṣat saḥ devān yakṣat . vyapadeśivadbhāvena bhaviṣyati . saḥ tarhi vyapadeśivadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15116_2: . uktam vā . kim uktam . tatra vyapadeśivadvacanam ekācaḥ dve prathamārtham ṣatve ca ādeśasampratyayārtham avacanāt lokavijñanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15116_3: siddham iti . yat api nānāvibhaktīnām ca samāsānupapattiḥ iti ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:15117_0: nānāvibhaktyoḥ eṣaḥ samāsaḥ iti yat ayam śāsivasighasīnāñca iti ghasigrahaṇam karoti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . yadi hi ādeśasya
GS24pmbhasuu:15117_1: yaḥ sakāraḥ iti evam syāt ghasigrahaṇam anarthakam syāt . paśyati tu ācāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15118: ādeśaḥ yaḥ sakāraḥ tasya ṣatvam iti tataḥ ghasigrahaṇam karoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:15120: astautiṇyantānām mā bhūt . sisikṣati . atha evakāraḥ kimarthaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:15121: niyamārthaḥ . sthautiṇyantānām eva na anyeṣām iti . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:15122_0: prayojanam . siddhe vidhiḥ ārabhyamāṇaḥ antareṇa evakārakaraṇam niyamārthaḥ bhaviṣyati . iṣṭataḥ avadhāraṇārthaḥ tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:15122_1: yathā evam vijñāyeta stautiṇyoḥ eva ṣaṇi iti . mā evam vijñāyi stautiṇyoḥ ṣaṇi eva

GS24pmbhasuu:15125_1: . sani yaḥ abhyāsaḥ tasmāt yā prāptiḥ tasyāḥ niyamaḥ yathā syāt yaṅi yaḥ abhyāsaḥ tasmāt yā prāptiḥ tatra niyamaḥ mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:15125_2: iti . soṣupyateḥ san soṣupiṣate . atha vā abhyāsāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15126_0: yā prāptiḥ tasyāḥ niyamaḥ yathā syāt dhātoḥ yā prāptiḥ tasyāḥ niyamaḥ mā bhūt . adhīṣiṣati . nanu ca ṣaṇi iti ucyate . ṣaṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:15126_1: iti na eṣā parasaptamī śakyā vijñātum sanyaṅantam hi dvirucyate . tasmāt eṣā satsaptamī ṣaṇi sati iti . satsaptamī cet prāpnoti
